item.text: 'dul ba kha pa bzhugs so/ /
@##/ /'dul ba gzhi/bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ sdom la/ smyug ma'i lo ma gro
bzhin dang / /rjes su gnang dang bsrung phyir dang / /de bzhin bsegs su bcings pa dang / /
rtse mo rnyed pa spu gu can/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis shing gi mchil lham bcang
bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs nas de dag smyug lo'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang / de nyid
@##/ /nyes dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smyug lo'i mchil lham bcang bar
mi bya'o/ /de dag rtswa mun dza'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang / de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rtswa mun dza'i mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /de dag srad bu'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang / de nyid nyes dmigs su
gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srad bu'i mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag dreg gis btab ste
de dag shu ba byung bas ko ba'i mchil lham rlan par gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dreg gis thebs pa gang yin pa des/ srad bu'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/ gang gi tshe gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa
rab tu byung ba de'i tshe de'i rkang mthil la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spu sor bzhi tsam yod pa de/ drug sde dag gis mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag gis smras pa/
dga' bo nye dga'/ re zhig mar sar gyi gong bu 'dra ba 'di/ gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas ci zhig byed ces smras pa/ des thos so/ /des
thos nas nga rgyal skyes te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i drung du song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par gsungs pa gang lags/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes/ 'chag pas
thob pa yin no/ /de bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song nas 'chag sa bcas so/ /de 'chag pa na/ spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam po dag kyang
@##/ /zad do/ /de'i 'og tu pags pa rdol/ de'i 'og tu khrag byung ste/ de ji srid 'chag sa'i mgo gcig nas gcig shos su song gi bar du
de'i 'chag sa'i mgo gcig na yang khwa dag khrag 'thung la/ gnyis pa na yang 'thung ngo / /chos nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho
la gzhes pa ni/ dus dus su chu bor rgyu ba spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/ skabs 'dir ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing
gshegs pa yin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i gtsug lag khang gang na ba der gshegs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gro bzhin
skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i 'chag sa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin rmed pa yin pas/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed
de| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ gcig tu brtson pa'i 'chag sa 'di/ dge slong gang gi yin/ gro bzhin

skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas rim pa gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/ /rim gnyis pa ma yin/ rim gsum pa ma yin no/ /gal te

rdol bar gyur na/ lhan pas btab ste bcang bar bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste/ son nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shes par gyis shig /ston pas khyod la mchil lham rim gcig pa rjes su gnang ste/ rim gnyis pa ma yin/ rim gsum pa ma yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ ci/
dge 'dun thams cad la'am/ 'on te bdag 'ba' zhig la/ khyod 'ba' zhig la'o/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ ston pa'i bka' mi gcog na/ gal te bdag gis bcangs na gzhi des bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa

dag| e ma'o 'gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rab tu byung nas ltogs pa zhig rnyed do/ /gang yang yul tsam pa thun mong ma yin pa dang / glang po che bdun gyi tshogs spangs te rab tu byung la/ deng mchil lham theg gi ba

tsam la chags pa lta zhes gleng bar 'gyur te/ de lta mod kyi/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ltos te dge 'dun thams cad la rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis de bzhin du bcang bar bgyi'o/ /zhes pa'i skabs

de| bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la ltos nas dge 'dun thams cad
kyis rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya ste/ rim gnyis pa ma yin zhes rgyas par sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na rgan zhugs mchil lham
can gzhan zhig 'chag par byed pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong phar song / nga'i spyan snga na ma 'dug cig /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ re zhig 'jig rten thams cad kyi zang zing dang 'dres pa'i ston pa gang yin pa/ ston pa de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'di ltar myur
ba myur bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i brtul zhugs mi spyod na/ nga 'jig rten thams cad kyi zang zing dang bral bar gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs
gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag mchil lham 'chang ba yin te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mchil lham bcang bar mi
bya'o| |zhes gsungs pa dang / gar mkhan gzhan zhig rab tu byung ba de'i chu snod chag nas/ de rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas su rkang pa bkrus nas kha'i nang du chus bkang ste/ rma bya'i 'gros su song

ba de drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /rol mo'i sgra med par dge slong gar byed kyi/ rol mo'i sgra bya'o zhes de rnams kyis khas rol mo'i sgra bya bar brtsams

so| |de rnams la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci ma grangs pa byed dam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di la ma grangs su ci zhig yod/ khyed kyis rol mo'i sgra med par dge slong gar byed pa mthong
ngam zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ mkhyen bzhin rmed de/ sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmed pa/ dge slong / khyod kyis bsam pa ci zhig gis de lta bu byas/ btsun pa/ gnas mal bsrung slad du'o/ /dge slong 'di/ gnas mal bsrung ba'i phyir de lta bur byed pa la ltung ba
med do/ /de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ gnas mal bsrung ba'i phyir rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/ /rim gnyis pa ma yin/ rim gsum pa ma yin/ gal te rdol bar gyur na/ lhan pas

btab ste bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig la khyim bdag cig dad par gyur to/ /de nang par sngar langs te
mchil lham med par mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de mchil lham med pa khyim bdag des mthong ngo / /mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa la mchil lham ma mchis sam/ tshur spyon/ lham mkhan

gyi drung du bzhud/ mchil lham zhig 'bul du stsal to/ /de lham mkhan gyi drung du song nas/ des lham mkhan la smras pa/ kye nang rje/ 'phags pa 'di la mchil lham zhig phul cig ces bsgos nas song ngo / /de'i
tshe dge slong rnams dang / shi ba rnams dang gnyis kyi phyir mchil lham rim pa gcig pa dag byas so/ /dge slong de yang dang yang du lham mkhan gyi drung du song yang ma byin no/ /
dus gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag des yang dge slong mchil lham med pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod la lham mkhan gyi mchil lham ma phul lam/ khyim bdag/ lham mkhan

la bden par smra ba dkon pa khyod kyis ma thos sam/ yang dang yang du song yang ma byin no/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa tshur spyon/ khyim du bzhud/ des de khyim du khrid nas kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas te/
rim pa mang po can gyi mchil lham zhig byin no/ /dge slong gis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /des 'phags pa bsnams te/ bzhud la/ rim gcig pa'i mchil lham

mdzod la gsol cig /des de khyer te gnas khang du song nas des de dang gri blangs te shing drung du 'dug nas dral bar brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der byon nas/ dge slong ci byed/ bcom ldan
'das kyis rim pa mang po can gyi mchil lham bkag na/ bdag la rim pa mang po can 'di lta bu grub ste/ rim gcig par bgyis la bcang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du
e ma'o/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis rim pa mang po'i mchil lham ster ba lta snyam du dgongs nas/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ mchil lham rim

pa mang po can khyim pa'i dman ma yin phan chad pa bcang bar bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus te zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchil lham rim pa mang po can khyim
pa'i dman ma yin phan chad bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ khyim pa'i dman ma lags par brjod par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ tha na/ gom pa bdun nam brgyad bgos
par gyur na yang yin no/ /gleng gzhi ni/ yangs pa can no/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na 'di lta bu'i mchil lham dag byed de/ 'di lta ste/ khrig khrig/ tshig tshig chem chem zhes zer ba lug ru 'am/ byang

chub kyi shing gi lo ma lta bu khra bo/ kaR+sha pa Na lnga ri ba dag byed do/ /drug sde dag gis mchil lham dag gyon pa zhig mthong nas de dag gis rting pa rkang pa'i mthe bos mnan nas ltag pa nas phul te/

khyod kyis sbyin pa 'di phul bas sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas nas blangs pa dang / phyogs kun tu
'phags pa dag ni/ lham de lta bus 'phrog go/ zhes sgra grag go/ /rgan mo zhig gis mag pa zhig 'ongs pa dang de la des mchil lham zhig byin nas 'phags pa dag mchil lham 'phrog gi /ji nas
kyang 'phrog par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /bsod snyoms pa zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa/ des mthong nas de khyim zhig tu zhugs so/ /de yang de nyid du zhugs pa
dang | de khyim de nas byung nas khyim gzhan zhig tu zhugs so/ /bsod snyoms pas kyang de nyid du zhugs pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod don ci'i phyir kho bo'i rjes
bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang / ci/ mchil lham 'di 'phrog par bzhed mod/ bzhin bzang / khyod kyi mchil lham kho bo mi 'phrog ste/ 'on kyang kho bo bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /des smras
pa| 'phags pa/ 'phrog kyang rung / mi 'phrog kyang rung ste/ 'on kyang phyogs kun tu 'phags pa khyed cag mchil lham 'phrog go zhes sgra grags so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong
rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag mchil lham khrig khrig ces bya ba nas/ de lta bas na/ dge slong
gis mchil lham khrig khrig zer ba bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de lta bu bcang bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis de lta bu'i mchil lham bcangs na/ 'gal tshabs can du
'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong rnams mchil lham gyis rkang pa'i bol la rma byung ba/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas khyed cag gis zhabs kyi bol ci zhig
gis rma byung bar gyur/ mchil lham gyis so/ /ci/ khyed cag gis bsegs su bcings nas ma bcings sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das
la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ bsegs su bcings nas bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa

na| rkang pa'i mthe bor rma byung ngo / /de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas smras pa/ khyed cag gi zhabs kyi mthe bong ci zhig gis rma byung / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa na'o/ /ci/ khyed cag gis
mchil lham gyi rtse mo spu gu can ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis mchil lham gyi rtse mo spu gu can bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri las babs pa na/ rkang pa'i rting pa rma byung ba/ bram ze dang /

khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed cag rnams kyi zhabs kyi rting pa ci zhig gis rma byung / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs pa na'o/ /ci/ khyed cag gis mchil lham gyi rting
pa sbu gu can ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis mchil lham gyi rting pa spu gu can bcang bar bya'o/ /sdom la/ mgul chad dang / ni yu thung lham/ /kha khrod dag tu sgrog gu can/ /dom gyi pags pa
gnang ba dang / /smyung bu 'breng bu chu gri'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong rnams rtswa'i myu gus rkang pa rma byung ba dag /bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong
nas| smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /khyed cag gi zhabs ci zhig gis rma byung / rtswa'i myu gus so/ /ci/ khyed cag gis lham mgul chad ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang
ngo| |zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ lham mgul chad bcang bar bya'o/ /

gang gi tshe rtswa'i myu gu cher skyes pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa de bas kyang rma cher byung ba/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ khyed cag gi zhabs ci zhig gis rma byung / de
rnams kyis smras pa/ rtswa'i myu gu dag cher skyes pas bdag cag gi rkang pa de bas kyang rma cher byung ngo / /'phags pa rnams/ ci/ khyed cag gis lham yu thung ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan
'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/
lham yu thung bcang bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kha btag pa na/ de dag las kha cig nub phyogs su dong pa nas/ kha cig bal
yul gyi bar du dong ngo / /mnyan yod pa'i don mthun dag zong thogs te bal yul du lhags pa dang / de dag gis de rnams mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag gang nas da 'dir lhags/ de rnams
kyis smras pa/ mnyan yod nas so/ /bdag cag gi gnyen 'phags pa kun dga' bo yod na/ lan 'ga' yang 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'dir 'ongs te bdag cag la gtam ma dris so/ /de rnams kyis smras
pa| bdag cag gis/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i drung du song la sbran par bgyi'o/ /de rnams kyis zong rnams bsgyur ba'i zong dag khyer te mnyan yod du lhags nas/ de rnams kyis 'phags pa kun dga' bo

la smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi gnyen bal yul na mchis te/ de dag khyed mthong bar 'tshal lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni gnyen la gdung ba yin pas/ de gnyen dag blta ba'i phyir bal

yul du song ba las/ de lhags pas lag pa dang / rkang pa ser ga byung ba dang / de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma ral ba bzhin du khyod kyi lag pa dang rkang pa

ci zhig gis ser ga byung bar gyur/ de smras pa/ lhags pas so/ /khyod kyi gnyen dag ni/ lham sgro gu can ci ste 'chang / khyod ci'i phyir mi 'chang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i
skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ yul kha ba can rnams su lham sgrog gu can bcang bar
bya'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yul kha ba can rnams lham sgrog gu can bcang bar bya'o/ /
zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis yul kha ba can du brjod par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ gang na snod du chu 'khyag pa yin no/ /dge slong gzhan zhig la rngon pa zhig dad par gyur nas/

rngon pa des dom lpags shig rnyed pa dge slong de la phul ba dang / des ma blangs so/ /des dge slong de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gis dom lpags rnyed pa khyod la 'bul gyi/ bzhes
shig /dge slong des ma blangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed de/ sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ /dge slong 'o na'i phyi bzhin du rngon pa pha bi ci ste 'brang / btsun pa/ rngon pa des dom lpags shig rnyed nas/ des dge slong 'o ni la
stsal pa las/ dge slong gis de ma blangs pa dang / rngon pa de dge slong 'o na'i phyi bzhin mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ rngon pa dad pa can ni/ dkon te/ gal te brgya'am

stong zhig dang 'phrad na/ thams cad gsod pa yin pas na/ de bas na gal te rngon pas dom lpags byin na blang bar bya'o/ /blang nas dri gtsang khang gi sgo'am/ rkang pa'i 'og tu gding bar bya ste/ dom lpags
thams cad ni/ mig la phan no/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gi mchil lham ral nas/ de lham ral nas/ de lham mkhan gyi drung du song ste son nas/ smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bdag gi mchil lham ral pa brgyus
te| bdag la byin cig /lham mkhan gyis bsam pa/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong rnams ni/ rngan pa med par tshol gyi/ yun ring du bsgyangs pa dang / rang gi blo slar log par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ 'phags

pa| bdag/ brel gyi/ sang spyon cig /dge slong de yang dang yang du lham mkhan de'i drung du song yang des bsgyangs pa dang / de mdza' bshes dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ ci/ de

na khyod kyi zas sbyor ba'i khyim yod dam/ 'on te gnyen gyi khyim yod/ des smras pa/ de na bdag gi zas sbyor ba'i khyim yang med/ gnyen gyi khyim yang med mod kyi/ bdag gi mchil lham ral nas/ bdag gis
de la brgyus te byin cig ces smras na/ des bsgyangs so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ lham mkhan la bden par smra ba dkon par khyod kyis ma thos sam/ 'on kyang bdag gis shes kyi/ gal te bcom ldan
'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis de la brgyus te khyod la sbyin no zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong

gang zhig shes pa yod na/ des gang du gzhan gyis mthong na mi dad par mi 'gyur ba dben pa'i phyogs su 'dug ste brgyu bar bya'o/ /de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang gi/
rgyus shig /des smras pa/ ci/ 'di de bzhin du brgyur rung snyam mam/ de la re zhig smyung bu dang dra gri dang / 'breng bu yang dgos so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang zhig shes pa yod na/ des smyung bu dang 'breng bu ni/ bcang bar bya'o/ /dra gri ni/ bcang bar mi
bya'o| |ko lpags kyi gzhi rdzogs so// //sman gyi gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom la/ sman dag dang ni sde can dang / /rgyal po'i khab dang 'od ma'i tshal/ /shing mkhan id tsa nang ga la/ /kam+pi la dang sngon

rgyal po'i/ /gzhon nu 'phel dang nad pa dang / /gtam du gyur dang sder bsdus pa'o/ /sdom la/ sman ni rjes su gnang ba dang / /tshil dang g.yan pa mig sman dang / /smyon pa dang ni pi lin da/ /nam gru dang ni skyur

khu'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rnams ston ka'i nad kyis thebs te/ de rnams ston ka'i nad kyis
btab pas skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin rmed pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir da ltar dge slong 'di rnams skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas par gyur/ tshe dang ldan

pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong 'di rnams ston ka'i bro nad kyis btab ste/ 'di rnams ston ka'i bro nad kyis btab pas/ skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / bro 'tshal
bas nyams dmas par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / de rnams dus su za ba yin pas dus su sten par byed kyi/ dus las yol bar sten par mi byed pas/ de rnams skya bo seng
seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ ngas dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ 'on kyang da ltar dge slong 'di rnams skya bo seng seng por gyur
cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas par gyur tam/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/ /
zhes gsungs pa/ 'di dag dus su 'tshal ba lags pas dus su sten par bgyid kyi/ dus las yol bar mi sten te/ de'i slad du skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / bro
'tshal bas nyams dmas par gyur lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis sman rnam pa bzhi po/ dus su rung ba dang / thun tshod du rung ba dang /

zhag bdun pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba so sor bsten par bya'o/ /de la dus su rung ba ni/ lde gu dang / 'bras can dang / zan dron dang / sha dang / snum khur ro/ /thun tshod du rung ba ni/ btung ba rnam pa

brgyad po/ shing tog tso tsa'i btung ba dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang / rgya shug gi btung ba dang / a shwang+tha'i btung ba dang / u dum ba ra'i btung ba dang / ba ru sha ka'i btung ba dang / rgun 'brum gyi

btung ba dang / 'bra go'i btung ba dang / bar sdom la/ tso tsa chu shing rgya shug dang / /a shwad u dum ba ra dang / /pa ru sha ka rgun 'brum dang / /brgyad pa yang ni 'bra go yin/ /zhag bdun pa ni/ mar dkar dang / til

mar dang / bu ram gyi dbu pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sha kha ra'o/ /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba ni/ rtsa ba'i sman dang / sdong bu'i sman dang / lo ma'i sman dang / me tog gi sman dang / 'bras bu'i sman dang / trang chu lnga dang /

thal ba lnga dang / lan tshwa lnga dang / bska ba lnga'o/ /de la/ rtsa ba'i sman ni/ gla sgang dang / shu dag dang / yung nga dang / sge'u gsher dang / bong nga dkar po dang / gzhan yang / rtsa ba'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa/

zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /sdong bu'i sman ni/ tsan+dan dang / dbyi mo dang / shug pa dang / thang shing dang / sle tres dang / skyer pa dang / gzhan yang / sdong bu'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi

don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /lo ma'i sman ni/ pa to la'i lo ma dang / ba sha ka'i lo ma dang / nim pa'i lo ma dang / ko sha ta ka'i lo ma dang / sap+ta pa rna'i lo ma dang / gzhan yang lo ma'i sman gyi nang du gtogs

pa| zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /me tog gi sman ni/ me tog lnga po/ ba sha ka'i me tog dang / nim pa'i me tog dang / d+ha ka'i me tog dang / sha ta'i me tog dang / pad+ma ke sa ra'i me tog dang /

gzhan yang / me tog gi sman gyi nang du gtogs pa/ zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /'bras bu'i sman ni/ a ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / na le sham dang / pi pi ling dang / gzhan yang

'bras bu'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa/ zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /trang chu lnga ni/ shing kun dang / sra rtsi dang / rgya skegs dang / spra tshil dang / drod sman no/ /de la/ shing kun ni/ shing kun gyi

shing gi trang chu'o/ /sra rtsi ni/ shing sA la'i trang chu'o/ /rgya skegs ni/ /rgya skegs so/ /spra tshil ni/ spra tshil lo/ /drod sman ni/ de dag las gzhan pa'i shing rnams kyi trang chu'o/ /thal ba lnga gang zhe na/ nas kyi

thal pa dang / nas kyi phub ma'i thal ba dang / shing sa rdzi ka'i thal ba dang / til gyi thal ba dang / shing 'ba' shi ka'i thal ba'o/ /lan tshwa lnga gang zhe na/ rgyam tshwa dang / lan tshwa smug po dang / kha ru tshwa dang /

lan tshwa dang / rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa'o/ /bska ba lnga gang zhe na/ a mra'i bska ba dang / nim pa'i bska ba dang / 'dzam bu'i bska ba dang / shi ri sha'i bska ba dang / ko sham pa'i bska ba'o/ /de la/ dus su
rung ba gang yin pa dang / thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang / zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ dus su rung ba dang 'dres par
gyur na/ dus su spyad par bya'i/ /dus ma yin par longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang / thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang / zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar
du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ gal te thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres par gyur na/ thun tshod la yongs su spyad par bya'i/ thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/ /zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /
'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ zhag bdun pa dang 'dres par gyur na/ zhag bdun du spyad par bya'i/ zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/ /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba ni/
'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /byin gyis brlab pa ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ zan ma zos pa'i mdun du lag pa gnyis bkrus nas byin len byas te/
dge slong zhig gi 'dun du 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes pa'i sman 'di/ bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams
kyi don du 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlab po/ /de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod do/ /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlab pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thun tshod du rung ba
dang / zhag bdun pa yang byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de nas dge slong gzhan zhig rlung nad kyis thebs nas sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / kho bo 'di
'dra ba'i nad kyis btab na/ sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ tshil sten cig dang / khyod sos par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang / ci/ kho bo 'dre yin nam/ sman pas
smras pa/ dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ gal te sman pa na re/ dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so/ /zhes smras na/ tshil bsten par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ma shes nas sman pa la dris pa
dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed cag gi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyi/ de kho na'i drung du bzhud la zhus shig /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshil lnga so sor bstan par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ nya tshil dang / sbal pa dkar po'i tshil dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyi tshil dang / dom tshil dang / phag gi
tshil lo/ /tshil 'di lnga dus ma yin par btsos pa dang / dus ma yin par btsags pa dang / dus ma yin par byin len byas pa dang / dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na/ longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /
dus su btsos la dus ma yin par btsags/ dus ma yin par byin len byas/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na/ longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /dus su btsos/ dus su
btsags la/ dus ma yin par byin len byas/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na/ spyad par mi bya'o/ /dus su btsos/ dus su btsags/ dus su byin len byas la/ dus ma yin par
byin gyis brlabs nas spyad par mi bya'o/ /dus su btsos/ dus su btsags/ dus su byin len byas/ dus su byin gyis brlabs na/ til mar la spyod pa bzhin du zhag bdun du spyad par bya'o/ /de nas dge

slong des tshil longs spyad nas sos par gyur to/ /de sos par gyur pa dang / de tshil gyi lhag ma dag bor ro/ /ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas/ de yang sman pa'i drung du song

nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / kho bo la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab kyi sman ston cig /des de la yang tshil bstan pa dang / de dge slong de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyis tshil spyad pa/

kho bo la yang sman pas bstan na/ tshil lhag pa lta cung zad kyang yod dam/ des smras pa/ bdog bdog pa las bdag gis de bor ro/ /ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong

rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis tshil longs spyad pa'i lhag ma bor bar mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bcang bar bya'o/ /ngas dge slong tshil 'chang ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/
tshal 'chang ba'i dge slong gis tshil spyad pa'i lhag ma dge slong gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /gal te ma byin na sman khang du gzhag par bya ste/ su 'dod pa des blang bar bya'o/ /tshil 'chang ba'i dge
slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong
gzhan zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis thebs nas de sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / kho bo g.yan pa'i nad kyis thebs kyi sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bska ba sten cig dang
khyod sos par 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzang / ci kho bo 'dod pa la spyod pa yin nam/ des smras pa/ dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes pa'i skabs de/
bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du ste/ khyod kyi ston pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas de kho nas mkhyen par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i skabs
de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bska ba ni lnga ste/ a mra'i bska ba zhes bya ba nas/ gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge
slong des bska ba dag lde gur byas te lus la byugs pa las rma mched nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phye ma bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis rlon pa la btab pas ri lur gyur pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskam par bya'o/ /de dag gis nyi ma la bskams pa dang / mthu nyams par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis grib ma la bskams pa dang / 'on kyang rul par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma'i grib mar bskam par
bya'o| |dge slong gis bska bas lus byugs nas bkrus te bska ba'i bya ba mi byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pas ji tsam chog gi bar du dril nas khrus bya'o/ /bkrus
nas slar yang bska bas bskus nas bkrus na/ bska ba'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong des bska bas bskus pa dang nad zhi bar gyur to/ /des bska ba'i lhag ma bor ro/ /ji tsam na/
dge slong gzhan zhig de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas de yang sman pa'i drung du song ste zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du ste/ kho bos de ni bor ro/ /ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /zhes pa'i skabs
de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas bska ba 'chang ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ bska ba
'chang ba'i dge slong gis/ bska ba spyad pa'i lhag ma dge slong su slong ba de la sbyin par bya'o/ /gal te ma byin na/ sman khang du gzhag par bya'o/ /bska ba 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod
pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhig mig nad kyis thebs
nas| de sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / kho bo mig nad kyis thebs par gyur na/ kho bo la sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mig sman so sor sten cig dang / khyod sos
par 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzang / ci/ kho bo 'dod pa la longs spyod dam/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni/ sos par mi nus so/ /zhes bya ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pa na re/ sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes zer na/ mig sman
bsten par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis mig sman gang bsten par bya ma shes nas/ de dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyi zhes
bya ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig sman ni/ lnga ste/ me tog gi mig sman dang / khu ba'i mig sman dang /
phye ma'i mig sman dang / ri lu'i mig sman dang / btsag yug rnams kyi mig sman no/ /de nas dge slong des mig sman de bsten nas sos par gyur to/ /des mig sman gyi lhag ma gar bab bab tu bzhag
pa las/ de chud zos par gyur to/ /ji tsam na/ dge slong gzhan zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas/ des kyang sman pa la dris pa dang / des de la yang mig sman de nyid bstan to/ /de dge slong de'i

drung du song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa/ kho bo yang mig nad kyis btab par gyur na/ khyod la mig sman gyi lhag ma cung zad yod dam/ de btsal bar brtsams pa las/ ma rnyed nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
mig sman de bdog bdog ste/ bzhag pa las de stor to/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis
mig sman gar bab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'o/ /ngas mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis mig sman rnams so sor phye la gzhag

par bya ste/ me tog gi mig sman ni/ snod kyi nang du'o/ /khu ba'i mig sman ni/ gab tshe'i nang du'o/ /phye ma'i mig sman ni/ dong bu'i nang du'o/ /ri lu'i mig sman dang btsag yug rnams kyi mig sman ni/ sgye'u
'am| thun por skud pas bcing la/ zung nga la gdags par bya'o/ /mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par mi byed na/

'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa bye ma skyes sems 'khrugs te smyos par gyur nas de/ de dang de dag tu 'phyan pa/ ji tsam na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag
dag gis mthong ste/ de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di su'i bu zhig yin/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong mgon
med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu ma byung na/ 'di gnyen rnams kyis gso bar 'gyur pa zhig ces pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong bye ma skyes kyi dpyad sman pa la dris la byos shig /sman pa'i drung du dong nas/ bzhin bzang / dge slong zhig 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyi/ de'i
sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa dang / sha rjen 'tshal du gsol cig /des sos par 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzang / de ci/ 'dre yin nam/ 'phags pa/ de'i sman 'di lags te/ gzhan gyis ni/
sos par mi nus so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pa na re de'i sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos
par mi nus so zer na/ sha rjen pa sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byin pa dang / de zar ma btub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig ras kyis bkab la sbyin par bya'o//
de dag gis byin te byin ma thag tu ras phye ba dang / des lag pa la reg pa mthong nas/ de zhe log pas skyugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mod la ras dbye bar mi byas te/ de lta mod
kyi| bca' ba bzang ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag mdun du bzhag nas gang gi tshe lag pa bkrus pa de'i tshe de dbye bar bya'o/ /de sos par gyur pa dang / de de nyid la sred par
gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe sos par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa

bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya'o/ /longs spyod na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ rgyal po'i khab na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa pi linada'i bu gang gi tshe rab tu byung ba de tshun
chad rtag tu na pa dang / zug gzer mang por gyur pa dang / de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan/ khyod kyi snyun gyi zo ji lta/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag rgyun du na ba
dang | zug gzer mang pas theg pa'i skabs med do/ /gnas brtan/ khyod sngon ci zhig 'chang bar byed/ des smras pa/ sman gyi mchan khug go /de ci'i phyir mi bcang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang
ste| dge slong gis sman gyi mchan khug bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis rtsa ba dang / me tog dang / sdong bu dang / 'bras bu'i sman rags pa dag de'i nang du bcug pa dang / de dag rul nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag sbam pa'am/ bam por byas te zung nga la gdags par bya'o/ /de dag rul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus dus su bskam par bya'o/ /de
dag gis nyi ma la bskams pa dang / de dag mthu chung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis grib ma la bskams pa dang / 'on kyang rul par
gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grib ma la bskam par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis gting nas dong ba dang / char pa dang / rlung byung ste/ ma bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ bsdu bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / de dag gis sus bsdu ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pas so/ /khyim pa
med na/ dge sbyong gis so/ /dge sbyong med na/ dge slong nyid kyis bsdu bar bya'o/ /dge slong gis bsdus pa dang / 'dres par gyur nas/ 'dres so/ /zhes ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ so sor phye nas longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /ngas/ na ba dag la rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de thams cad mi na ba'i gnas skabs na spyod par mi bya'o/ /spyod na/
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru gar yang som nyi za bas/ de'i ming nam gru som nyi can nam gru som nyi can zhes bya bar grags so/ /de snga
dro sham thabs bgos/ chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ de rim gyis bu ram byed pa'i grong du phyin pa dang / ji tsam na/ 'bras phye
dang | bu ram 'bru bar byed pa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bu ram 'bras phye dang ma sbru zhig /'phags pa/ spyi bar bgyid pa gzhan 'ga' mkhyen nam/ kho bos spyi ba gzhan yang mi shes mod
kyi| bdag cag dus ma yin par longs spyod dgos so/ /'phags pa/ dus su'am dus ma yin par gsol yang rung ste/ de'i spyi pa ni/ 'di lags te/ gzhan gyis ni mi 'bru'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan
zhig na/ dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram dag rnyed pa na/ des ma zos so/ /de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis smras pa/ slob dpon/ dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed kyi/ longs
spyad du gsol/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / zas dang 'dres so/ /de de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang / de rnams la dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /dge 'dun gyi bca'

pa bu ram zhig rnyed na/ ci ste longs ma spyad/ de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres so/ /zhes gsung ngo / /de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad do/ /'khor phal pho che dang / dge
'dun ril las kyang phal po ches longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyis zas kyi bya ba mi byed pa ni/ mi

rnyed pas 'byung khungs yongs su dag pas longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru snga dro sham thabs bgos/ chos gos dang / lhung bzed
thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ rim gyis srang zhig tu phyin pa dang / des spos tshong zhig phye la reg nas bu ram la reg par byed pa mthong nas des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / phye la
reg nas bu ram la reg par ma byed/ dus ma yin par yang bdag cag gis longs spyad dgos so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag la yang dang yang du sug chab gtong ba su zhig mchis/ dus gzhan
zhig na| dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed pa dang / des longs ma spyad do/ /lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis smras pa/ slob dpon/ dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram dag rnyed na/ ci ste mi
gsol| des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'di zas dang 'dres so/ /de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang / de rnams la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram

zhig rnyed na/ ci ste mi za/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres so zhes gsung ngo / /de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad do/ /'khor phal po che de dang / dge 'dun ril las kyang phal
ches longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyis zas kyi bya ba mi byed pa mi rnyed kyi/ khyim pas yongs su
dag pas longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rlung nad kyis thebs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ bdag rang gi blos rim gro ni/ lan mang du byas mod kyi/ lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyi/ ma la da ni sman pa la dri'o/ /snyam nas/

de sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs par gyur na/ de'i sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ skyur khu'i nang du lan tshwa stsal la gsol

cig dang / sos par 'gyur ro/ /des skyur khu ni/ rnyed na/ lan tshwa med nas/ de lan tshwa btsal bar brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa po linada'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ nga la

lan tshwa rwa gang 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlabs pa zhig yod kyi/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ sbyin no/ /zhes smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus thos nas des smras pa/ tshe
dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dus su rung ba dang 'dres pa longs spyad par mi dbang ngo snyam mo/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das
la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ mi dbang ste/ dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang / thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa
dang | zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ gal te dus su rung ba dang 'dres par gyur la/ gal te byin gyis kyang ma brlabs na/ dus su rung pa dang 'dres pas/

dus su spyad par bya'i/ dus las 'das par mi bya'o/ /thun tshod du rung pa gang yin pa dang / zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ gal te thun tshod du rung ba dang

'dres par gyur la/ gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na/ thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres pas thun tshod du spyad par bya'o/ /thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/ /zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho
ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ zhag bdun pa dang 'dres par gyur na/ zhag bdun pa dang 'dres pas zhag bdun du spyad par bya'i/ zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/ /'tsho ba'i bar
du bcang ba gang yin pa de ni/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyad par bya ste/ gzhan du spyod na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //sdom la/ sde chen sha dang gzhang 'brum dang / /rlung nad can dang

gang po dang / /mes byin dang ni be'i ra to/ /sprin chen bya rog rnams yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ wA ra NA sir byon nas wA ra NA si na drang srong

smra ba ri dwags kyi nang na bzhugs so/ /wA ra NA si na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so/ /de'i chung ma ni/ sde chen ma zhes bya'o/ /de chung ma dang bcas te
dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi zhes bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ wA ra NA sir byon nas wA ra NA
si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim du lan mang du spyan drangs te zhal zas ni/ gsol na/
yo byad thams cad kyis ma bstabs kyi/ ma la bdag gis da bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstab par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
nas| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas khyim bdag sde chen/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun spyad
kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams 'bul na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag sde chen bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun

dang thabs cig tu khyim bdag sde chen gyis zla ba gsum du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gsos kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur kho na byas
nas so/ /khyim bdag sde chen gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rnams la lta bar byed pa las/ dge slong na ba/ nad tshabs
che ba/ sdug bsngal ba'i nad pa gzhan zhig yod pa de la/ sman pas sha khu 'thungs shig ces bstan to/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen dge slong de gang na ba der song ste son nas/ rkang pa gnyis la mgo

bos phyag byas te dris ba/ 'phags pa/ sman pas ci bstan/ des smras pa/ sha khu 'thungs shig lo/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen rang gi khyim du song ste chung ma la smras pa/ slob dpon che ge mo zhes bya ba la
sman pas sha khu 'thungs shig ces bstan gyi/ sbyor la skur cig /des bu mo zhig la rin bskur nas tshong 'dus su btang ba las/ de'i nyin mo rgyal po'i sras bltams nas/ de
dril sgrog tu bcug ste/ sus kyang srog gcad par mi bya'o/ /gang gis srog bcad na chad pas gcod par bcad do zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas rin gyis kyang tshong 'dus su sha ma rnyed nas de nas bu mo des de
ltar gyur pa dag /khyim bdag sde chen la rgyas par brjod pa dang / khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsam pa/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag cag gis yo byad thams
cad kyis bstabs na/ gal te dge slong zhig sman med pas shi bar gyur na ma legs so zhes de snyam du dpyad nas/ gri rnon po blangs te khyim du zhugs nas/ brla'i sha las bcad de bu mo la byin
nas bu sha 'di khu bar byos la 'phags pa che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig /des de khyer nas dge slong gis longs spyad pa las sos par gyur to// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu
rtsa gsum pa/ dge slong des 'di ltar bdag la khyim bdag gi chung ma 'dis rang gis shas bsnyen bkur byas par rig nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas/ glos
phab ste 'dug pa ni/ rigs pa ma yin gyi/ ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o//

snyam nas/ de brtson 'grus brtsam par brtsams te/ de brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / rtsal ba byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par
gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems/ ste'u dang tsan+dan du mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs

dral cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis

mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /skabs de la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ thugs su ma chud pa'am/ rnam par mi
mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
mdun gyis bltas te/ khyim bdag sde chen gyi khyim gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
bdag sde chen la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /khyim bdag gi chung ma sde chen ma mi snang na/ ga re/ bcom ldan 'das spyod lam rdo mi thogs pas phugs na mchis
so| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gang gis na rma de mdog 'dra ba dang / pags pa 'dra ba dang / ba
spu 'dra bar 'gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyis chung ma dad pa skyes te sgor byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci/ khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di/ byang chub sems dpa'i spungs nyams su myong bar byed dam/ des tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sgrim mi dgos par 'khor ba na/ /lus ni
shin tu rnyed par sla'i/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ /sbyin gnas shin tu rnyed par dka'/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar gshegs
par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed do/ /rnam grangs su mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gi lag
gis bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos
mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs
bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/
yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid
la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sha rnams kyi nang na ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi'i sha tha chad yin no/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis
mi sha bza' bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis mi'i sha zos na/ ltung ba spom por 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge
'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dge slong gi sha 'brim par byed na/ 'di ci'i sha zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gnas brtan gyis ma spobs na/ gnas brtan gnyis pas dri bar bya'o/ /dge
'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong thams cad the tshom skyes nas the
tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag sde chen gyi mchis brang gis rang gi shas dge slong 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyis
la| dge slong 'dis kyang sde chen ma la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da
ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang / dge slong 'di la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas te/ 'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas

pa de/ shin tu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i chung ma sde chen ma zhes
bya'o| |ji tsam na/ bram ze tshogs 'don du bcug pa gzhan zhig bram ze'i bu lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug go /de la khyim bdag sde chen dad pa skyes te/ des de 'khor dang bcas
pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te/ khyim bdag sde chen gyis bram ze de 'khor dang bcas pa la bkur sti kho na byas so/ /khyim bdag de'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang bar sngar langs te/ nad pa rnams
la lta bar byed pa las/ ji tsam na/ bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig na ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che bar gyur nas/ de la sman pas sha khu 'thungs shig ces bstan to/ /de nas khyim bdag

sde chen bram ze'i khye'u gang na ba der song ste son nas phyag byas te dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod la sman pas ci bstan/ des smras pa/ sha khu 'thungs shig lo/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen khyim du song nas/

chung ma la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba la sha khu 'thungs shig ces sman pas bstan gyi/ de sbyor la skur cig /des bu mo zhig la rin bskur te tshong 'dus su btang ngo / /de nyid kyi nyin mo rgyal
po'i bu btsas nas/ des dril sgrog tu bcug ste/ sus kyang srog gcad par mi bya'o/ /gang gis srog bcad par gyur na/ de chad pas gcod par bcad do zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas tshong 'dus su rin gyis kyang sha

ma rnyed do/ /de nas bu mo des de ltar gyur pa dag /khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma la rgyas par smras pa dang / khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsam pa/ bram ze 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la bdag cag gis

yo byad thams cad bstabs na/ gal te bram ze'i khye'u zhig sman med pas dus byas par gyur na ma legs so/ /zhes de snyam du dpyad nas gri rnon po blangs te/ khyim gyi nang du zhugs nas brla'i sha las bcad

de bu mo la byin nas/ bu/ sha 'di khu bar byos la/ bram ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig /des khyer nas bram ze'i khye'u des longs spyad nas sos par gyur to/ /bram ze'i khye'u des/ 'di ltar bdag
la khyim bdag gi chung ma des rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas par rig nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyad nas bdag glos phab ste 'dug pa na/ rigs pa ma yin gyi/
ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bdag gis 'bad par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas

de zhi ba'i phyogs su song ste/ mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba'i chung ma gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag

sde chen gyi chung ma 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'dis dge slong de la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas te/ 'dis kyang de la
brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/ /da ltar yang 'dis dge slong 'di la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas so/ /dge slong 'dis kyang 'di la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te
dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu gnag pa yin/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig tu dkar
ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni/ 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ da phyin chad las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma ni/ spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal par bya ste/ dge

slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che tsho rgu kha btag go /mu ge'i dus byung bas/ bram ze dang khyim

bdag rnams kyis glang po che'i sha za bar brtsams so/ /drug sde'i dge slong dag /snga dro sham thabs pa gos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /ji tsam na/ khyim
bdag gzhan zhig gis glang po che'i sha phru bar bcug ste 'tshod cing 'dug pa'i khyim der de dag zhugs pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyi/ bzhud

cig /de dag gis smras pa/ phru ba 'di'i nang na 'tshod cing 'dug na/ 'phags pa/ 'di ni/ glang po che'i sha lags na/ ci/ khyed cag kyang glang po che'i sha gsol lam/ kho bo cag ni/ 'tsho ba khyed cag la rag
las pa yin pas/ gal te/ khyed za na/ kho bo cag la yang byin cig /de dag la phul nas/ de dag gis lhung bzed kyi snod bkang ste phyir byung ba/ dge slong gzhan dag cig bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de dag

gis mthong ngo / /mthong nas dris pa/ e ma drug sde dag lhung bzed kyi snod khengs na/ ci yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ glang po che'i sha cung zad rnyed do/ /ci/ khyed cag glang po che'i sha yang za'am/ tshe dang ldan pa
dag /mu ge'i dus byung ba la/ gal te gzhan ma rnyed na/ ci/ kho bo cag ltogs te 'chi'am zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rgyal po'i glang po che tsho rgu kha btag la/ gal te khyed kyis glang po'i sha zos pa rgyal pos thos na/ khyed la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / mi dang / mi ma yin
pa gzhan dag kyang yod pas/ 'phags pa dag glang po che'i sha za ste/ des na bdag gi glang po che tsho rgu kha btag go zhes sems par mi 'gyur ram/ dge slong dag /de lta bas

na| dge slong dag gis glang po che'i sha longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /longs spyad na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /glang po che'i sha ji lta ba bzhin rta'i sha yang de dang 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das yul tsam pa na/ drang srong gar ga'i rdzing 'gram na bzhugs so/ /yul tsam pa'i klu dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can de/ tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung ste/ yan lag
brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas/ gnas snang bar lus chen por byas te lus btang nas 'dug cing 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa dag la cung zad kyang gnod pa'am skrag par
mi byed do/ /mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang / lug rdzi rnams dang / rtswa thun rnams dang / shing thun rnams dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang / lam gol bas
'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis/ klu'i sha la dum bu dum bur bcad nas longs spyod par brtsams so/ /drug sde'i dge slong dag /snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos dag thogs nas bsod
snyoms la zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis klu'i sha phru bar bcug ste 'tshod cing 'dug pa'i khyim der de dag zhugs so/ /khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ 'phags

pa| dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyi/ bzhud cig /de dag gis smras pa/ phru ba 'di'i nang na 'tshod cing 'dug na/ 'phags pa/ 'di ni/ klu'i sha lags na/ ci/ khyed cag kyang klu'i sha gsol lam/ kho bo cag
ni/ 'tsho ba khyed cag la rag las pa yin pas/ gal te khyed cag za na/ kho bo cag la yang byin cig /de dag la phul nas/ 'phags pa rnams kyang longs spyod do zhes phal mo che spyad par brtsams so/ /de

nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa 'di dag kyang klu'i sha la longs spyad pas/ skye bo'i tshogs phal mo ches longs spyad na/ bdag gi khyim thab kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal
brnag dgos/ bdag gis 'di'i phyir 'di kho na bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma de/ mtshan mo 'das nas kha dog 'phags pas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de'i tshe na tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing gi nye 'khor thams cad snang ba rgya chen
pos khyab par byas so/ /tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gi sdum thab dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can de/
tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung ste/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas lus btang ste mchis la/ 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa dang / skrag pa cung
zad kyang mi bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang / lug rdzi rnams dang / rtswa thun rnams dang / shing thun rnams dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams
dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum bur bkum nas 'tshal ba/ 'phags pa dag gis gzigs nas 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang gsol bar brtsams so/ /'phags
pa rnams kyis gsol la de dag gis kyang phal cher bkum zhing 'tshal bar brtsams nas/ bdag gi sdum thab kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal brnag 'tshal/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das
thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ gang gi phyir 'phags pa dag klu'i sha mi gsol bar dgongs pa'i rgyu cung zhig bca' bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma la cang mi gsung
bas gnang ngo / /de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung mas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de nyid du mi snang
bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mdang sum nga'i spyan sngar tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma mtshan mo 'das nas/ kha dog 'phags pas nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo

bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /yang de'i tshe tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing gi nye 'khor thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas so/ /tsam pa'i klu'i chung
ma phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gi sdum thab dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can de/ tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la rang gi gnas nas byung ste/
yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas lus btang ste mchis la/ 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa dang skrag pa cung zad kyang mi bgyid pa mu ge'i dus byung bas las

la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang / lug rdzi rnams dang / rtswa thun rnams dang / shing thun rnams dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum bur
bkum nas 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis 'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa dag gis kyang gsol bar brtsams so/ /'phags pa rnams kyis gsol to zhes de dag gis cher bkum zhing 'tshal bar brtsams na/
bdag gi sdum thab yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal brnag 'tshal/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ gang gi phyir 'phags pa dag klu'i sha mi gsol bar dgongs pa'i rgyu
cung zhig bca' bar gsol zhes zer nas/ ngas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung mas nga cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang la da lta lha dag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong de rnams ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams las nyams so/ /zhes smod par byed/
'phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa 'di ni/ bzang po ma yin/ rigs pa ma yin te/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis klu'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o/ /za na/ 'gal tshabs
can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i
rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na
bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lan mang du spyan drangs te/ zhal zas gsol na/ lan 'ga' yang zla ga gsum du yo byad thams
cad kyis ma bstabs kyi/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs shing / sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyang dbul lo/ /snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po'i
'byor ba dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin tu
'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin
du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos
phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du bsod snyoms dang / na bza' chos gos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams dang /
sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'bul na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /
de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
bos phyag byas nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /

bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad thams cad dang / sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rim gro kho na byas so/ /yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan
'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos yo byad thams cad dang / sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed bstabs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang
'di snyam du sems te/ de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin/ bdag kyang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin la/ de'i sman pa'i rgyal po ni/ 'tsho byed yin la
bdag gi sman pa'i rgyal po ni/ rgyun shes kyi bu yin gyi/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na byon pa de'i tshe/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la yo byad
thams cad dang / sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu bstab par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /ji tsam na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar zhugs nas/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos byas
pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas/ lhung bzed dad chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas nas/ mnyan

yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa nas mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
na bzhugs so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin
du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
tu ga bar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad
rnams dang / sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu dbul na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas
gnang ngo / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag byas nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad dang / sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes
kyi bus/ rim gro kho na byas so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ dge slong nad pa la
blta ba yin no/ /ji tsam na/ dge slong gzhan zhig gzhang 'brum gyis thebs nas de skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas pas
gyur pa de/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod ci'i phyir skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas
par gyur/ lha/ bdag gzhang 'brum gyis thebs so/ /de nas rgyal pos/ sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu la bsgo ba/ dge slong 'di'i dpyad byos shig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'chel/ de
ma dad pas/ de ma byas so/ /ji tsam na/ rgyal pos yang dge slong de mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod rgyun shes kyi bus dpyad ma bgyis sam/ lha/ ma bgyis so/ /de nas rgyal po
khros te/ rgyun shes kyi bu pho nyas bkug nas bsgo ba/ gal te khyod kyis dge slong 'di'i dpyad byas na/ de lta na legs/ gal te ma byas na/ khyod kyi dbang thang gcad do/ /de rang bzhin gyis
ma dad pa zhig pas ches 'khrugs nas dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i phyir lhas bdag gi dbang thang gcod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes/ des dge slong de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor bzo bcos
byas nas/ de dang de nas mtshon gyi las bya bar brtsams so/ /de nas dge slong de/ nyam nga ba dang / dog pa dang / gnod pa thob cing sdug bsngal rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzad pa/ yid du mi 'ong
ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong nas bsam pa/ nyam nga ba/ dog pa/ gnod pa thob pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta zhig/ skabs de la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen
pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bskul nas phyogs der gshegs pa dang / sman
pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs der gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kun nas dkris pa drag pos/ bcom ldan 'das
la smras pa/ dge sbyong bran mo'i bu tshur shog /nyan thos rkub phye ba ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid slar log ste/ gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas gdan bshams
pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa
de'i tshe/ zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag 'byung zhing / kha cig ni/ 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni/ steng du 'gro'o/ /gang dag 'og tu song ba
dag ni/ yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol
ba dang / so tham tham dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a chu zer ba dang / ut+pal ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po rnams su song ste/ tsha ba'i sems can
dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la ni/ bsil bar 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams gang dag yin pa de dag la ni/ dro bar 'bab bo/ /des sems can de rnams
kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par dag so sor zhi bar byas so/ /de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos par gyur tam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes par gyur snyam pa
la| de rnams dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa zhig btang ngo / /de rnams kyis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos
pa med la gzhan du skyes pa med kyis kyang / sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnams so sor zhi bar byas so/ /zhes de rnams sprul pa la sems
mngon par dad par gyur pas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/ gang du bden pa rnams mthong ba'i snod du gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba bzung
ngo| |gang dag steng du song ba de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /

tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal ba dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang /

bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal dang /
stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i dbyangs sgrog cing / tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyang bsgrags so/ /brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par
bya| |'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas/ /chos 'dul 'di la brtson gyur na/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug
bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams byul nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'gro'o//
de la/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las rnams lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni/
mdun logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par
nub par 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/ /
stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag
g.yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ sku'i lte bar nub par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal gyi nang du nub par
'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdzod spur nub par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tu nub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthil du nub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar
nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/ /tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur la/ /ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//
yang tshigs su bcad pa dag gsol pa/ rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/ /rtsa lag dung ltar
dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/ /de slad bstan pa nyid slob dus mkhyen nas/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog /nyan par 'tshal ba'i nyan pa po rnams kyi/ /the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa
dang / /dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol/ /tshwa chu ri bo lta bur brtan pa'i mgon/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pa ci slad 'jum pa ston mdzad pa/ /skye bo phal chen
'di dag de nyan 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med/ rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi ston te/ kun dga' bo/ sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu nyams shing chud zos par
gyur te/ des/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos bkur ba'i gdung rgyud nas bzung ste/ spyod pa skyon mi mnga' ba la bran mo'i bu zhes smras so/ /de deng nas zhag bdun na khrag dron du skyugs
te| dus byed par 'gyur te/ lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na/ rgyun shes kyi bu'am/ rgyun shes kyi bu 'dra ba la bsnyen bkur byed
du ma gzhug cig /gzhang 'brum yang gcad par mi bya'o/ /'on kyang gzhang 'brum gyi dpyad ni/ rnam pa gnyis kyis bya ste/ gsang sngags dang / sman gyis so/ /dge slong gis gzhang
'brum gcod dam/ rgyun shes kyi bu 'dra ba la bsnyen bkur byed du 'jug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong de rgyun shes kyi bus ji ltar gnod pa de nyid kyis dus las 'das
pa de lta de ltar byas so/ /de nas blon po dag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/ lha/ rgyun shes kyi bus ni/ bcom ldan 'das la yang bran mo'i bu zhes tshig tu smras la/ dge slong de

yang ji ltar gnod pa de nyid kyis dus las 'das pa de lta de ltar bgyis so/ /de nas rgyal po che thang du khros nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /ngas sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu yongs
su btang zin gyi/ dengs shig/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gum lags pa de dgum ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis zhag bdun na khrag drod du skyugs nas dus byed par 'gyur
te| lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur na/ nga'i yul nas spyugs shig /de dag gis de spyugs
nas/ yul gnas bcas zhes bya bar phyin no/ /yul gnas bcas na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ skyes bu gti mug/ gang gi phyir khyod khams gsum gyi mgon po la/ bran mo'i bu
zhes tshig tu smras pa/ khyod 'dir gnas su ga la rung zhes mang du spyos nas bskrad do/ /de de nas wA ra NA sir song ngo / /de nas kyang bskrad nas yangs pa can du song ngo / /de nas kyang bskrad nas
yul tsam par song ngo / /de nas kyang bskrad nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo / /de nas kyang bskrad nas shing drung zhig na gnas so/ /de nas kyang shing la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis bskrad nas 'bab
chu dang mtsho dang mtshe'u dag gi 'gram zhig tu song ba dang / der yang skabs ma rnyed nas/ des bsam pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na/ re zhig wa dag gis kyang skabs rnyed na/ bdag gi skabs
shing drung dang mtsho dang mtshe'u dag na yang med do/ /snyam pa dang / de la/ gang gis na/ khrag dron po skyugs nas dus las 'das pa de lta bu'i kun nas dkris
pa skyes so/ /dus las 'das ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag gsungs pa/ mi zhig
skyes par gyur pa yi/ /kha nas sta re tshig byung ste/ /nyes par smra ba smra tshig des/ /bdag nyid la ni gcod par byed/ /gang zhig smad 'os skye po bsngags byed cing / /bsngags 'os skye bo
rnam par smod byed pa/ /de ni kha yi nyes pa gang gis na/ /bde ba 'thob mi 'gyur ba'i nyes pa gsog /'dir ni rgyan pos rang gi nor yal ba/ /'di ni phung ba cung zad tsam yin te/ /bde
gshegs rnams la yid kyis gdug bsam pa/ /gang yin de ni phung ba chen po yin/ /'phags la smod byed lus dang ngag gi las/ /sdig to byas nas chu bur rdol rnams su/ /lo 'bum
dag dang chu bur can du lo/ /bzhi khri tshig stong gang yin dmyal der 'gro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ grong rdal mtshams ma
bcad pa gzhan zhig tu dgongs btab nas bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems
te| bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis rang gi blos ni/ rim gro lan mang du byas na/ sman pa la lan 'ga' yang ma dris kyi/ ma la bdag gis da ni sman pa la dri'o/ /snyam ste/ de sman pa'i drung du
song nas bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i snyun gyis thebs kyi/ sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gru gsum cha ba mar mang pos stsal ba sgrol la gsol cig/
snyun gdangs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rang nyid kyis byas te btsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du
rmed pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ci yin/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gi glo ba la bsam na/
bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis rang gi blos ni/ rim gro lan mang du bgyis na/ sman pa la lan 'ga' yang ma dris kyi/ ma la bdag gis da ni sman pa la dri'o/ /snyam bgyid nas/
bdag gis sman pa la smras na/ de'i mchid nas gru gsum chab mar mang pos stsal pa/ sgrol la stsol cig dang / snyun gdangs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchid nas/ de nas bdag gis bgyis
te| bsgral ba lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ gang du btsos/ mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /gang du bzhag /mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /sus btsos/ bdag gis mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /kun dga' bo/
mtshams kyi nang du btsos la/ mtshams kyi nang du bzhag kyang zhag lon pa longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /mtshams kyi nang du btsos la/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu zhag
lon pa yang longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu btsos la/ mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa yang longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu btsos la mtshams kyi phyi rol
du zhag lon na yang longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ mtshams kyi nang yang rung / mtshams kyi phyi rol tu yang rung ste/ dge slong gis btsos pa ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad du longs
spyad par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis btsos pa thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig
yod pa de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag
