par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas khyim bdag de stan las langs
te| bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/ ji tsam na/ spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol
pa| btsun pa/ gdugs tshod lags na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs
nas| khyim ga la ba der dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ni/ bsod snyoms bzhes nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i khyim na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsod snyoms bzhes
nas rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i khyim na bzhugs te/ lnga gang zhe na/ nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhugs
par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa yin no/ /skabs 'dir ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams
'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pas bsod snyoms bzhed nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i khyim na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod snyoms
nod pa yin te/ ji tsam na/ der 'bras chan ma tshos pa zhig phog pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das snyun
gdangs nas ring po ma lon la/ 'bras chan 'di yang ma tshos pa zhig pas 'di gal te longs spyad na snyun slar ldang bar 'gyur srid kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang yang / 'di nyid
kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/ des chu snod blangs te chus btab nas ji srid tshos pa de srid du btsos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ ci/ dge 'dun thams cad
kyi 'bras chan yang 'di 'dra'am/ btsun pa/ ma lags te/ 'on kyang ma dral ba lags so/ /'o na/ 'di ga las 'ongs/ des skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ngas rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de yang khyod kyis shes so/ /de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis ma
tshes pa byin len byos la/ btsos la longs spyad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ma tshos pa byin len byos la/ btsos te longs spyad par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / drug
sde rnams kyis 'bras skam byin len byas te/ btsos nas longs spyad par brtsams pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ 'bras chan sum cha tshos pa byin len byos la/ btsos te longs spyad par bya'o/ /tshod ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / nya dang / sha dag ni/ kha dog gyur na/ byin len byas te longs
spyad par bya'o/ /'o ma la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi khu ba rnams/ gang gi tshe lan gnyis lan gsum du bskol bar gyur pa de'i tshe byin len byas te bskol nas spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /
'di las gzhan du longs spyad na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe grong

khyer slo ma lta bu zhes bya ba na/ khyim bdag 'byor pa zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la
nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/
dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig
btsas nas/ de nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags/ nye du
rnams kyis smras pa/ khye'u 'di/ khyim bdag 'byor pa'i bu yin pas/ de lta bas na/ khye'u'i ming 'byor len zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes khye'u de'i ming 'byor len zhes bya bar
btags so/ /yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u btsas nas/ de'i ming ni/ 'byor skyob ces bya bar btags so/ /yang de'i khye'u zhig btsas
te| de'i ming ni/ 'byor dga' zhes btags so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag 'byor ba nad kyis btab par gyur nas de shin tu tshig rtsub por smra ste/ des na/ chung ma dang /
bus kyang yal bar bor ro/ /de'i mngag gzhug byed pa'i bu mo zhig yod pa des bsam pa/ bdag gi jo bos thabs brgya stong du mas longs spyod rnams bsags na/ de nad kyis thebs
par gyur pa dang / chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor ro/ /bdag gis rje bo yal bar 'dor ba ni/ bdag la rigs pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas/ des sman pa'i drung du song ste/ jo bo khyod kyis
khyim bdag 'byor pa mkhyen tam/ shes so/ /de ci bya/ de 'di 'dra ba'i bro nad cig gis thebs te/ de chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor na/ de'i sman ston cig /des smras pa/ chung ma dang
bu dag gis kyang yal bar bor ro/ /zhes khyod nyid zer na/ 'o na/ de la su zhig rim gro byed/ de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi mod kyi/ ci nas kyang sman rin chung ba zhig ston cig /des/ de'i sman ni/
'di yin no/ /zhes bstan to/ /de nas des bdag rang gi rgyags las kyang cung zad sbyar/ khyim de nyid nas kyang cung zad brkus nas/ rim gro byas te de sos par gyur to/ /des bsam pa/ bdag gi
chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor te/ 'di ltar bdag gson por gyur pa ni/ bu mo 'di'i mthu yin gyi/ 'di la phan gdags par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bo ni/ chung
ma dang / bus kyang yal bar bor ba las/ kho bo cung zad cig gson pa de thams cad ni/ khyod kyi drin yin na/ khyod mchog ci 'dod pa sbyin gyi/ smros shig /gal te jo bo/ bdag khyod kyi thugs su
'thad par gyur na/ bdag khyod dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'tshal lo/ /des smras pa/ nga dang khyod lhan cig 'grogs pas ci byed/ kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin la bran las dbyung bar bya'o/ /des smras pa/
jo bo/ bdag rgyangs bkum par mchis kyang bran mo kho na lags par bas te/ gal te rje'i sras khyod dang lhan cig 'grogs na/ de lta na/ bran mor mi 'gyur lags so/ /des gal gyis chu bar

shes nas smras pa/ bu mo gang gi tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig /des dus gzhan zhig na/ rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur nas des de la sbran to/ /de nas
khyim bdag 'byor pa dang / de gnyis lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pas/ de sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /gang gi nyi ma la sems can zhugs par gyur pa'i
nyin de kho na nas bzung nas/ khyim bdag 'byor ba'i nor thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba
mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba/ yan lag dang nying
lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de btsas nas lhag par khyim bdag 'byor pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /de nyi
ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de zhes bya ba nas gang po zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes de'i ming gang po zhes btags

so| |zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /khye'u gang po ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de/ dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur
du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de chen por gyur pa de'i che yi ge dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang / lag rtsis dang / dbyung pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing /

brtag pa brgyad po gzhi brtag pa dang / ras brtag pa dang / rin po che brtag pa dang / shing brtag pa dang / glang po che brtag pa dang / rta brtag pa dang / gzhon nu brtag pa dang / gzhon nu ma brtag
pa la shin tu byang zhing / brtag pa gzhan yang byed pa dang / klog pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag 'byor pas 'byor len la sogs pa bu rnams rim bzhin du khyim
phub pa dang / de dag chung ma la lhag par chags pas/ 'tsho nam yal bar bor te 'jo sgeg lhur len cing 'khod do/ /de nas khyim bdag 'byor pa/ lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du
chud cing 'dug pa de/ bu rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/ yab/ khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ bu dag/ nga ni/ ji srid gser 'bum ma rnyed
pa de srid du khyim ma phub bo/ /khyed cag 'tsho nam yal bar bor nas chung ma la lhag par chags pas 'jo sgeg lhur len cing 'khod de/ nga shi nas khyim mya ngan gyis gang bar 'gyur na/ ji ltar sems
khong du chud par mi 'gyur/ 'byor len gyis/ rin po che'i rna rgyan thogs pa phral nas shing gi rna rgyan zhig btags te/ bdag gis ji srid gser 'bum ma grub pa de srid du rin po che'i rna rgyan gdags

par mi bya'o/ /zhes dam bcas so/ /gcig gis ni/ rgya skegs kyi rna rgyan no/ /gcig gis ni/ zha nye'i rna rgyan no/ /de dag gi ming 'byor len dang / 'byor skyob dang / 'byor dga' zhes bya ba gang yin pa de
dag nub par gyur nas/ shing gi rna rgyan can/ rgya skegs kyi rna rgyan can/ zha nye'i rna rgyan can zhes bya bar ming grags so/ /de rnams zong thogs te/ rgya mtsho chen por dong ba
dang / gang pos smras pa/ yab/ bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen por mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu khyod bus pa yin gyi/ 'di nyid du 'dug /tshong khang gi bya ba dag byos shig /ces de ni/ de nyid du 'dug
go |de rnams kyis kyang gru bo che grub nas lhags te/ lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas smras pa/ yab/ bdag cag gi zong 'di rtsir gsol/ brtsis nas re res kyang gser 'bum 'bum rnyed par
gyur to/ /gang pos kyang de nyid du chos dang mthun par bsgyur ba gser 'bum lhag cig rnyed nas/ gang bos kyang pha'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ yab/ bdag gi tshong khang nas bsgyur
ba'i rdzas kyang rtsir gsol/ des smras pa/ bu khyod 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug na/ khyod la ci zhig rtsir yod/ des smras pa/ yab/ 'on kyang rtsir gsol/ mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /brtsis nas gang
po yang rigs par bsgrubs pa bzhi po nyid ma gtogs pa/ gser 'bum lhag cig byung ngo / /khyim bdag 'byor pa/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa/ sems can 'di ni/ bsod
nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig lta ste/ 'dis 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du gser 'bum snyed cig grub bo/ /snyam mo/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag 'byor pa nad kyis btab par
gyur nas des bsam pa/ bdag shi ba dang 'di dag 'bye bar 'gyur gyi/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des de dag la smras pa/ bu dag/ shing skam po dag lta gon gyis shig /de rnams
kyis shing dag sta gon dag byas pa dang / des smras pa/ me bus shig /de rnams kyis me bus pa dang / des smras pa/ mgal ba re re nas phyung zhig/ de rnams kyis mgal ba re re nas phyung ba dang / me de
shi bar gyur to/ /des smras pa/ bu dag/ khyod kyis mthong ngam/ yab/ mthong lags so/ /des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/ mgal ba tshogs pas me 'bar ltar/ /spun tshogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /

mgal ba phral na shi 'gyur ba/ /mi rnams kyang ni de dang 'dra/ /bu dag /nga shi nas khyed cag gis bud med kyi tshig mnyan par mi bya'o/ /bud med kyis ni bza' dag 'byed/ /sngar ma rnams ni ngag gis 'byed
ngan la smras pas gsang tshig 'phel/ /'dod pa yis ni mdza' bshes 'byed/ /de dag gzhan ni/ dong ngo / /'byor len de nyid na 'dug pa dang / des smras pa/ bu khyod kyis ji ltar gyur kyang gang po gtang
bar mi bya ste/ sems can 'di ni/ bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin no/ /zhes bsgo ste/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing / /mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/ /phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral
ba ste| |gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /zhes smras nas/ dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /de rnams kyis de ras sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan te/
bkur sti cher byas nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregs so/ /de nas mya ngan sangs pa byas nas smras pa/ gang gi tshe bdag cag gi pha gson pa de'i tshe ni srog de la
rag las na/ da de dus las 'das na/ gal te de 'tsho nam yal bar bor te 'dug na/ khyim zhig par 'gyur zhing / nye du rnams kyis kyang dpyas par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag cag zod
thogs te/ yul gzhan du 'dong ngo / /gang pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag kyang mchi'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la tshong khang gi bya ba dag byos shig /kho bo
cag kho na 'dong ngo zhes de rnams kyis zong khyer te yul gzhan du dong ngo // //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ gang po la ni dgos pa thams cad gtad nas de nyid na gnas
so| |chos nyid kyis/ phyug pa'i khyim bdag na nyin re zhing 'god pa 'bog pa yin pas de dag gi chung mas bran mo dag mngags te 'god pa nod du btang ba las/ gang po tshong pa dang / tshong dpon
dang / ded dpon dang / gzhan yang rjes su 'tsho ba dag gis yongs su bskor cing 'dug ste/ de dag gis skabs ma rnyed do/ /ji tsam na/ de dag langs te dong par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de dag la nyin
par gyi 'god pa phog go/ bu mo de dag ring zhig lon te 'ongs pa dang / kye ma/ bu mo khyed cag ring zhig cis thogs zhes spyos pa las/ de dag gis smras pa/ gang po tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang /
ded dpon dang / gzhan yang rjes su 'tsho ba dag gis yongs su bskor cing nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bur gzi brjid 'bar zhing bzhugs te/ gang gi tshe de dag langs te mchis pa de'i tshe phog go/ de dag
gis smras pa/ gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu dag dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur ro/ /'byor len gyi chung mas bran mo la smras pa/ ring mo zhig tu ci'i phyir thogs
des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod 'or che'o/ /khyod kyis dus shes par byos la song zhig /des dus shes par byas nas song ba dang myur du thob bo/ /gzhan dag ni/ ring du

thogs par gyur nas de dag gis de la dris pa/ khyod ni/ ci ste myur bar 'khor/ des thams cad smras nas/ de dag kyang de dang lhan cig 'dong bar brtsams so/ /gang po yang tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang /
ded dpon dang / gzhan yang rjes su 'tsho ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa las/ de dag kyang dong nas des de la nyin par gyi 'god pa phog go /de dag gis kyang myur du thob bo/ /de dag
gi jo mo dag gis smras pa/ myur du 'khor ba 'di la rgyu ci yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ jo mo thu mo snyun mi mnga' bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshe de'i bran mo mchis pa de'i tshe phog lags kyi/ bdag
cag de dang 'grogs te mchi'o/ /de dag mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu dag dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam dus gzhan
zhig na/ 'byor len dang / 'byor skyob dang / 'byor dga' rnams lhan cig tu dga' zhing mthun rgya mtsho chen po nas gru bo che grub ste 'ongs so/ /'byor len gyis
chung ma la dris pa/ bzang mo/ gang pos khyod legs par bskyangs sam/ des smras pa/ ji ltar ming po'am/ bus bgyi ba bzhin du legs par bgyis so/ /gzhan dag la khyim thab dag
gis smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu dbang phyug la dbang bgyis pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur lags so/ /de dag gis bsam pa/ bud med
dag ni/ mdza' bshes kyi dbyen du 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ka shi ka'i ras kyi tshong khang gi sgo phye ma thag tu 'byor len gyi bu 'ongs nas/ gang pos/ de la ka
shi ka'i ras yug cig bskon no/ /mna' ma dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ bu/ 'di sus byin/ des smras pa/ khu gus byin no/ /gzhan dag gis mthong nas kyang rang rang gi bu btang
ba dang / ka shi ka'i ras kyi tshong khang gi sgo ni/ bcad/ ras sbom po dag yod pa'i tshong khang gi sgo phye ba la de dag kyang ma stes te phyin nas/ de dag la gang pos ras sbom po bdag bskon
no| |de dag gis mthong nas khyim thab dag la smras pa/ khyed cag gis gzigs sam/ kha cig la ni/ ka shi ka'i ras yug stsal la/ kha cig la ni/ ras sbom po dag go/ de dag gis
lan btab pa/ ci/ gdon mi za bar 'di ltar ka shi ka'i tshong khang gi ras kyi sgo ni/ bcad la/ ras sbom po'i sgo phye ba la bab pa zhig ma yin grang / de dag gis smras pa/ da dung yang brtag par

bgyi'o| |ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ sha kha ra'i tshong khang gi sgo phye ba na 'byor len gyi bu 'ongs nas/ des sha kha ra phor bu gang thob ste/ des de khyer nas khyim du song ba dang / mna' ma dag gis

mthong nas smras pa/ bu/ 'di sus byin/ des smras pa/ khu gus byin no/ /de dag gis kyang rang rang gi bu btang ba dang / sha kha ra'i tshong khang gi sgo ni/ bcad/ bu ram gyi tshong khang gi sgo phye ba dang / de dag
kyang ma stes te/ bu ram gyi tshong khang gi sgo phye ba'i khar 'ongs nas de dag gis bu ram zhig thob bo/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyis gzigs sam/ gcig la ni/ sha kha ra stsal la/ gzhan
la bu ram stsal lo/ /de dag gis de mthong ste/ ji ltar khyim bgo ba byed par stsol ba de ltar khyim thab dag bye nas de dag phan tshun gros byas pa/ bdag cag gi khyim gtan zhig gis bgo
bar bya'o/ /gcig gis smras pa/ phu bo chen po sbran pa snyam/ gcig gis smras pa/ re zhig ji lta bgo bar dpyad do/ /gnyis kyis rang gi blos dpyad pa/ gcig gis ni/ khyim na yod pa dang zhing
na yod pa'o/ /gcig gis ni/ tshong khang na yod pa dang yul gzhan na yod pa'o/ /gcig gis ni gang po'o/ /gal te phu bo chen pos/ khyim na yod pa dang zhing na yod pa blangs na/ bdag cag gis
tshong khang na yod pa dang yul gzhan na yod pas rang 'tsho bar nus so/ /'on te tshong khang na yod pa dang yul gzhan na yod pa blangs na/ 'on kyang bdag cag gis khyim
na yod pa dang zhing na yod pas rang 'tsho bar bya zhing / gang po yang mnar bar nus so/ /snyam nas/ de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas te/ 'byor len gyi drung du song nas spun zhig par 'gyur gyi/
bdag cag khyim bgo'o/ /des smras pa/ khyim 'jig par byed pa ni/ bud med dag yin pas/ legs par brtags te bya ba snyam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis brtags zin
gyi| bgo'o/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ gzu bo mi lnga zhig bos shig /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis snga mo zhig tu bgos zin na/ gzu bo mi lnga ci dgos kyi/ gcig gis
ni| khyim na yod pa dang zhing na yod pa dag go /gcig gis ni/ tshong khang na yod pa dang yul gyi mtha' na yod pa'o/ /gcig gis ni/ gang po'o/ /des smras pa/ ci/ gang po la skal pa mi sbyin
na ma/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bran mo'i bu de la bgo skal sus sbyin/ der ma bos kyi/ de nyid bdag cag gis bgo'o/ /gal te khyod bzhed na/ khyod nyid snyoms shig /des bsam pa/
pha na re/ bdag khyod kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang yang gang po gtang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bsgo bas/ gang po blang bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ gang
po ni/ kho bos bkur ro/ /khyim na yod pa dang zhing na yod pa dbang ba gang yin pa de ni/ rings par khyim du song nas smras pa/ mna' mthu mo phyung zhig /de'i phyir phyung ba dang / slar yang ma
'jug cig /ci'i phyir/ bdag cag gis khyim du gtogs pa bgos zin to/ /tshong khang na yod pa dang yul gzhan na yod pa dbang ba gang dag de yang / de ma thag tu tshong khang du song nas smras
pa| gang po mar bobs shig/ des babs pa dang / da phan chad ma 'dzeg cig /ci'i phyir/ bdag cag gis khyim bgos te/ yul gzhan na yod pa dang tshong khang na yod pa ni/ bdag gi yin
no| |des smras pa/ bdag gi bgo skal byin cig /des smras pa/ khyod bran mo'i bu yin na/ khyod la ci'i phyir bgo skal byin/ der ma zad/ khyod nyid kho bo cag gis bgos te/ phu bo chen pos
thob bo/ /'byor len gyi chung ma gang po dang lhan cig 'grogs te gnyen zhig gi khyim du dong ba dang / bus pa bkres nas ngu bar brtsams so/ /des smras pa/ gang po/ bus pa dag la g.yar
tshus stsol cig /des smras pa/ kaR+sha pa na phog cig /des smras pa/ khyod kyis gser 'bum snyed kyi spogs byas na/ bus pa dag gis g.yar tshus ma mchis pa lta/ ci/ kho bos khyed cag
gis khyim 'di 'dra ba 'khos su 'bebs par 'gyur bar shes sam/ gal te/ kho bos shes par gyur na/ gser 'bum phrag du ma spags pa zhig /bud med kyi gos kyi mthar ma sha
ka sgyu ma can dag thum po byed pa de ni/ chos nyid yin te/ des ma sha ka sgyu ma can zhig phog ste/ g.yar tshus bsnams te byon cig /des de khyer te tshong 'dus su song
ba las| mi zhig gis rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bdas pa'i shing las khur cig khyer te grang bas sbrebs nas 'dar zhing 'ong ba de/ des mthong nas dris pa/ kye nang rje/ ci'i phyir de ltar 'dar/
des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang ma 'tshal te/ cung zad du na shing khur 'di thogs nas bdag 'di 'dra bar grang bar gyur to/ /de shing brtag pa la mkhas pas/ des shing de brtag par brtsams

pa dang / de na tsan+dan sa mchog yod par mthong nas/ des de la smras pa/ kye nang rje/ rin ji tsam du btsong / kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgyar ro/ /des de shing khur de blangs nas tsan+dan sa mchog phyung ste/
tshong 'dus su song nas sog les dum bu bzhir gshags te/ dum bu de rnams kaR+sha pa Na stong du btsong nas/ de nas de la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim ga ge mo
zhes bya ba na 'byor len gyi chung ma 'dug gi /der shing khur 'di khyer la gang pos bskur ba yin no/ /zhes byos shig /des de khyer nas ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa dang / des brang brdungs
nas smras pa/ 'di ltar/ de nor 'khyams na/ shes rab kyang 'khyams sam/ ci/ btso ba tshol du btang na/ btso rgyu gang yin pa de nyid med par bus pa bskur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan
zhig na/ grong khyer slo ma lta bu'i rgyal po tsha ba'i rims chen pos thebs nas/ myog myog por gyur pa de la sman pas tsan+dan sa mchog bstan to/ /de nas blon po rnams kyis tsan+dan sa mchog bcal

bar brtsams pa dang / de rnams kyis tshong 'dus su brgyud pa las thos nas/ de rnams gang po'i drung du song ste tsan+dan sa mchog yod dam/ yod do/ /rin ji tsam du btsong / kaR+sha pa Na stong ngo / /de
rnams kyis/ kaR+sha pa Na stong gis nyos nas rgyal po la byugs pa dang sos par gyur to/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ gang gi khyim na tsan+dan sa mchog yod pa'i khyim de ci 'dra ba zhig yin snyam
nas| rgyal pos blon po rnams la rmed pa/ 'di ga las 'ongs/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gang po las so/ /gang po 'dir khug cig /der pho nya song nas smras pa/ gang po/ lhas bka'
stsal to/ /des dpyad par brtsams pa/ rgyal po bdag la ci'i phyir bka' stsol/ des yang bsam pa/ de tsan+dan sa mchog gis snyun gdangs par gyur pas de'i phyir bdag la bka' stsal gyi/
tsan+dan sa mchog thams cad khyer te 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ des tsan+dan sa mchog gi dum bu gsum ras kyi nang du dkris te/ gcig lag tu thogs nas rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/
gang po/ tsan+dan sa mchog cung zad yod dam/ des smras pa/ lha/ 'dir mchis so/ /'di la rin ji tsam/ gser 'bum mo/ /gzhan yang yod dam/ lha mchis so/ /zhes des dum bu gsum char
bstan pa dang / rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ gang po la gser bzhi 'bum byin cig/ gang pos smras pa/ lha/ gsum gyi ni stsol cig /gcig gi ni/ lha
la skyes su 'bul lo/ /gsum gyi byin nas/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gang po khyod nga'i thugs su 'thad kyi/ mchog ci 'dod pa gsol cig dang sbyin no/ /lha/ gal te thugs dang 'thad par gyur na/
lha'i yul du sus kyang mi gtse bar mchis par gsol/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /deng phyin chad khyed kyis gzhon nu rnams la bsgo bar bya'o/ /gang po la ni ma yin
no| |ji tsam na/ tshong pa lnga brgya tsam rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che grub nas grong khyer slo ma lta bur lhags so/ /tshong pa'i tshogs kyis nang khrims bcas pa/ bdag cag sus kyang gcig
pus tshogs las gar te tshong pa'i drung du 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /gal te song na/ de la kaR+sha pa Na drug cu dbab po/ /blangs kyang tshogs 'dus te blang bar bya'o/ /zhes bcas so/ /kha cig gis

smras pa/ gang po yang sbran pa snyam/ kha cig gis smras pa/ bkren pa de la sbran na ci yod/ de'i tshe gang po phyir byung ba na/ des tshong pa lnga brgya tsam rgya mtsho chen po nas gru po che grub nas grong
khyer slo ma lta bur phyin no/ /zhes thos nas de grong khyer du ma zhugs pa nyid du de dag gi drung du song ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag /rdzas 'di dag ci yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di dang 'di
dag yin no/ /rin ji tsam/ ded dpon gar phyin yang khyod kho na dri bar bas so/ /des smras pa/ gal te de yin yang 'on kyang rin thang smos shig /de dag gis gser sa ya dang brgyad 'bum du rin
btab bo/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /thag bcad pa'i gser sum 'bum khyer cig /zong 'di dag ni/ kho bo'i yin no/ /lhag ma ni/ nang du phyin nas sbyin no/ /de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes
pa dang / des gser sum 'bum yang blangs nas thag bcad pa'i phyir byin/ rang gi rgyas kyang btab ste song ngo / /de nas tshong pa'i tshogs kyis/ tshong pa'i g.yog gi mi dag rdzas ci yod ltos shig
ces mngags nas/ de dag song ste dris pa/ rdzas 'di dag ci yin/ 'di dang 'di dag yin no/ /bdag cag la 'di 'dra bas ni/ mdzod dang bang ba gang bar 'dug go /de rnams kyis smras pa/ gang
yang rung / ma gang yang rung ste/ 'on kyang 'di btsong zin to/ /su zhig la/ gang po la'o/ /gang po la btsong na/ chen mo zhig khugs mod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ des thag bcad par byin pa
gang yin pa de/ khyed kyis rin du yang mi sbyin no/ /des thag bcad par ci byin/ gser sum 'bum mo/ /des phu bo de dag las brkus yang dag go /de rnams slar log ste tshong pa'i tshogs
la smras pa/ rdzas de dag ni/ btsong zin to/ /su zhig la/ gang po la'o/ /gang po la btsong na/ chen mo zhig khugs mod/ /des thag bcad par byin pa gang yin pa de khyed kyis rin du yang
mi sbyin no/ /des thag bcad par ci byin/ srang sum 'bum mo/ /des spun de dag la brkus yang dag go/ de rnams kyis de bos nas smras pa/ gang po/ tshong pa'i
tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/ sus kyang gcig pus zong mi blang gi/ tshong pa'i tshogs kho na blang bar bya'o zhes bcas na/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir blang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gang
gi tshe khyed kyis khrims su bca' ba byas pa de'i tshe/ ci/ kho bo'am kho bo'i phu nu po dag la bsgo'am/ khyod kho nas khrims su bca' ba byas/ khyed cag gnyid srungs shig /de nas tshong
pa'i tshogs khros nas/ kaR+sha pa Na drug cu'i phyir bzung ste nyi ma la bzhag pa/ rgyal po'i mi gang gis mthong ba de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba/ shes ldan
dag| de rnams khug cig /de dag gis de rnams bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag gis ci'i phyir gang po bzung ste nyi ma la bzhag/ lha/ tshong ba rnams
kyis khrims su bcas pa/ sus kyang gcig pus zong 'jal tshong mi bgyi'o/ /zhes bcas pa las/ 'di gcig pus 'jal tshong bgyis pas so/ /des smras pa/ lha/ gang gi tshe
'di dag gis khrims su bca' ba bgyis pa de'i tshe 'di dag gis/ ci/ bdag gam/ bdag gi phu nu bo dag la bsgo'am/ zhes rmed gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gang
po'i shags bzang ngo / /de rnams skyengs nas de btang ngo / /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po la rdzas shig gi dgos pa byung nas/ des tshong ba'i tshogs bkug ste bgo ba/ shes ldan dag

nga la rdzas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig dgos kyi/ de nga la phul cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gang po la mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ nga de la bka' mi stsol gyi/ khyod nyid kyis de nyos la nga la phul
cig /de dag gis gang po la pho nya btang ste/ tshong ba'i tshogs 'bod do zhes byas so/ /des smras pa/ kho bo mi 'ong ngo / /de nas tshong pa'i tshogs thams cad 'dus te/ de'i khyim du song nas sgor

bsdad de/ de la 'phrin btang nas/ gang po/ tshong pa'i tshogs sgo na sdod kyi/ phyung zhig ces spring ngo / /de nga rgyal dang nyam bu shed dang bcas pa'i dregs pas byung ba dang / tshong ba'i tshogs kyis
smras pa/ ded dpon ji ltar nyos pa bzhin du zong byin cig /des smras pa/ gal te ji ltar nyos pa bzhin zong byin na/ kho bo tshong pa chen po yin mod/ de dag gis smras pa/ rin nyis 'gyur
gyi byin cig dang / tshong pa'i tshogs mchod par 'gyur ro/ /des bsam pa/ tshong ba'i tshogs mchod par bya ba yin no snyam nas/ des sa ya dang lnga 'bum/ rin nyis 'gyur du byin no/ /
lhag ma ni/ khyim du sbas nas des bsam pa/ ji ga/ zil pa'i thigs pas bum pa dgang bar nus sam/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya ba'i
phyir des grong khyer slo ma lta bur dril bsgrags tu bcug pa/ shes ldan grong khyer slo ma lta bu na gnas pa'i tshong pa dag nyon cig /ded dpon gang po rgya mtsho chen
por 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ khyed cag las gang dag ded dpon gang po dang lhan cig sho gam med pa dang / la gcan pa'i gla med pa dang / gru btsas med par rgya mtsho chen por 'jug
par spro ba de dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byos shig /tshong pa lnga brgya tsam gyis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas so/ /de nas ded dpon gang po dge mtshan
dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/ 'khor tshong pa lnga brgya dang rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las gru bo che grub nas grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'khor to/ /de lta bur
lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las gru bo che grub nas slar 'khor to/ /phyogs kun tu gang pos lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las gru bo cher grub nas
slar 'khor to/ /zhes sgra grags pa dang / mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa dag zong thogs te grong khyer slo ma lta bur dong nas/ de dag lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas ded dpon gang na ba der
dong ste lhags nas smras pa/ ded dpon rgya mtsho chen por bzhud dam/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen po nas gru bo che grub ste/ slar 'khor ba las bdun
par 'jug par khyed cag gis mthong ba'am/ thos pa 'ga' yod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ gang po/ bdag cag bshul ring po nas khyed kyi ched du lhags te/ gal te mi 'jug na/
khyod nyid tshad ma yin no/ /des bsam pa/ bdag la ni nor gyis cung zad kyang mi chog pa med na/ 'di dag gi don du 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de de rnams dang lhan cig tu rgya mtsho chen por
chas so/ /de dag gis nam tho rangs kyi dus su ched du brjod pa dang / pha rol 'gro byed dang / bden pa mthong ba dang / gnas brtan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su
bcad pa dang / rig gnas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / thub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / don gyi tshoms kyi mdo dag gsang bstod de bton pa dang / des de dag thos nas smras pa/ shes ldan
dag /glu bzang po zhig gis longs shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ ded dpon/ de dag ni/ glu ma lags so/ /'o na ci/ de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka'o/ /des/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos
pa thos nas/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes phyed nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa/ shes ldan dag /sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i
sras/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma/ shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos dur smrig bgos te/ yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ de bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ ded dpon/ de ni sangs rgyas zhes bgyi'o/ /shes ldan dag/
bcom ldan 'das de/ da ltar gang na bzhugs/ ded dpon/ /mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /des de snying la bzung
nas de rnams dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te gru bo che grub nas slar lhags so/ /de'i phu bo 'byor len gyis bsam pa/ 'di rgya mtsho chen por 'gro 'gro bas dub bar gyur gyi/ 'di'i
khyim dbub par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ khyod kyi don du tshong pa dang / tshong dpon gang gi bu mo blang pa phu bo la smros shig /des smras pa/ bdag 'dod pa mi 'tshal gyi/ gal te
gnang na/ rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ gang gi tshe bdag cag khyim gyi 'tsho nam la ma zhugs pa de'i tshe rab tu mi 'byung bar/ da ci'i phyir du rab tu 'byung / des smras pa/ de'i tshe ni/ mi
rigs lags so/ /da ni/ rigs lags so/ /des de gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas/ gnang ngo / /des smras pa/ phu bo/ /rgya mtsho chen po na nyes dmigs ni/ mang la/
mnog ni/ chung ngo / /der 'jug pa ni/ mang la/ slar 'khor ba ni/ nyung bas khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad du rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par mi bya'o/ /khyod la rigs pas bsgrubs pa'i
nor phal mo che yod la/ khyed kyi nu bo dag rigs pa ma yin pas bsgrubs pa yin pas/ gal te de dag na re/ lhan cig 'khod par bya'o zhes zer na/ 'dug par mi bya'o/ /zhes smras nas/ rim
gro ba gcig khrid de mnyan yod du song ste/ mnyan yod kyi skyed mos tshal du 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'phrin pa btang ste/ khyim bdag/ ded dpon gang po khyim bdag
lta bar 'dod nas skyed mos tshal na sdod do zhes spring pa dang / mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar chu'i bzhon pas dub/ da ni/ thang gi bzhon pas 'ongs so snyam mo/ /de nas
dris pa/ kye nang rje/ zong ji snyed cig khyer/ nga la zong ga la yod/ rim gro ba dang gnyis su ste/ de dang bdag tu bas so/ /mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsam pa/ gang bdag gis skyes bu dam pa
de la bkur sti ma byas par khyim du 'bod pa ni/ bdag rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas/ des de bkur sti chen pos khyim du bos nas bsku mnye byas te khrus byas nas zan byin te dga'
ba'i gtam byas te 'dug nas/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis dris pa/ ded dpon/ dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ khyim bdag/ bdag ni/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba
dang | bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lo/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ ro stod bstod nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste ched du brjod pa/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas/
kye ma'o chos/ kye ma'o dge 'dun/ kye ma'o chos legs par gsungs pa nyid de la ni/ da skyes bu gtso bo 'di lta bu yang / rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi
tshogs rgya chen po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod rgyas pa rnams kyang spangs nas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod
par gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ ded dpon gang po khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du
ma'i gung la bzhugs nas chos 'chad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin skyes dang bcas te 'ongs pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin skyes dang bcas te da ltar 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni/ 'di lta bu med de/ 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i skyes bu'o/ /de nas
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te ded dpon gang po dang lhan cig phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ ded dpon gang po 'di/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen
par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/ de bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu dbyung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon gang po la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog /tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal ba'i mod kho nar de skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ skra dang / kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs
nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog gsungs pa yis/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas
gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos pa ji lta bus gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa dang / rtun pa dang ldan la/ bdag nyid la bdag nyid gtod cing
gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa legs par bshad du gsol/ gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa dang / rtun pa dang ldan la bdag
nyid la bdag nyid gtod cing gnas na/ rigs kyi bu dag /gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas/ khyim ma mchis
par rab tu 'byung bar bgyid pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na ma mchis pa de mthong ba'i chos de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas/ bdag
gi skye ba ni/ zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni/ spyad do/ /bya ba ni/ byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar bgyid pa'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gang po/ gang khyed 'di skad du srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba
nas de lta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa legs par bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar smra ba ni yang legs so zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te/ de'i phyir rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad
do| |gang po/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang / chags pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / kun tu chags par 'gyur ba
yod la/ de dag gal te/ dge slong gis mthong nas mngon par dga' ba dang / mngon par bstod pa dang / lhag par chags pa dang / lhag par zhen cing gnas na/ de dag la mngon par dga' ba
dang / mngon par bstod pa dang / lhag par chags pa dang / lhag par zhen cing gnas pa de la kun tu dga' ba 'byung ngo / /kun tu dga' ba yod na/ dga' ba dang yid bde bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba dang
yid bde ba yod na/ kun tu chags par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu chags pa yod na/ kun tu sbyor bar 'gyur te/ dga' ba dang / kun tu chags pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan par gyur ba'i dge slong ni/ gang

po| mya ngan las 'das pa las ring du gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /gang po/ rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro dang / lus

kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa dang / chags pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / kun tu chags par
'gyur ba rnams yod la/ de dag gal te/ dge slong gis thos nas zhes bya ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa las ring du gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /gang po/ mig gis rnam par
shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang / chags pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / kun tu chags par 'gyur ba yod la/ de dag gal te/ dge slong gis
mthong nas mngon par mi dga' ba dang / mngon par mi bstod pa dang / lhag par ma chags pa dang / lhag par ma zhen cing gnas na/ de dag la mngon par mi dga' ba
dang / mngon par mi bstod pa dang / lhag par ma chags pa dang / lhag par ma zhen par gnas pa de la kun tu dga' ba mi 'byung ngo / /kun tu dga' ba med na/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba
med par 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba dang yid bde ba med pa na/ kun tu ma chags par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu chags pa med na/ kun tu sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu sbyor ba med na/ dga' ba dang /
kun tu chags pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong ni/ gang po/ mya ngan las 'das pa la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /gang po/ rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra dang / snas rnam
par shes par bya ba'i dri dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa dang / chags
pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / kun tu chags par 'gyur ba yod la/ de dag gal te/ dge slong dag gis thos nas zhes bya ba nas/ de ni/ mya ngan
las 'das pa la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang po/ ngas mdor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis khyod la gdams na/ gang du gnas par 'dod/ gang du gnas
bca' bar 'dod/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis bdag la gdams lags pas/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar mchis par 'tshal
lags so/ /gang po/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mtha'i mi rnams ni/ gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ rtsub pa/ gshe ba/ spro thung ba/ 'phya ba yin te/ gang po/ gal te khyod la gro
bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams/ mngon sum du sdig pa/ tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub pos gshe bar byed/ zher 'debs par byed/ 'phya bar byed na/ de la khyod ji snyam du byed/
btsun pa/ gal te gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams bdag la mngon sum du sdig pa/ tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub pos gshe bar bgyid/ zher 'debs par bgyid/ 'phya
bar bgyid na/ de la/ bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o/ /gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni/ rung ba dag yin no/ /e ma'o/ /gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi
rnams ni/ blo dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag bdag la sdig pa/ tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub pos gshe bar byed/ zher 'debs par byed/ 'phya bar byed kyang / lag pa'am/ bong bas ma
brgyab snyam mo/ /gang po/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni/ gtum pa zhes bya ba nas 'phya bar byed pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ gang po/ gal te gro bzhin skyes
gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis dbyug pa'am/ mtshon gyis brgyab na/ de la khyod ji snyam byed/ btsun pa/ gal te bdag la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i
mi rnams kyis dbyug pa 'am/ mtshon gyis brgyab par gyur na/ de la bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o/ /gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni/ rung ba dag yin no/ /
kye ma'o/ /gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni/ blo dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag bdag la dbyug pa 'am/ mtshon gyis brgyab kyang / thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral
bar mi byed do snyam mo/ /gang po/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni/ gtum pa zhes bya ba nas 'phya bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ gal te gang po/ gro bzhin skyes
gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis khyod thams cad du srog dang bral bar byed na/ de la khyod ji snyam byed/ btsun pa/ gal te bdag la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams
kyis/ thams cad du srog dang bral bar bgyid na/ de la bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lus rnag can 'dis skyo ba dang / ngo tsha dang / rnam par smod pa gang dag
mtshon gyis kyang 'debs par byed/ dug kyang za bar byed/ thag pas kyang 'gegs te 'chi bar byed/ g.yang sa nas kyang mchongs te 'chi ba yod na/ kye ma'o/ /gro bzhin skyes gnas
pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni/ rung ba dag yin no/ /kye ma'o/ /gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni/ blo dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag bdag gi lus rnag can 'di las/ tshogs chung dus grol bar
byed do snyam bsam par bgyi'o/ /gang po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gang po khyod/ bzod pa dang des pa 'di dang ldan par gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar gnas par nus pa ni/ khyod kyang
legs so/ /gang po song la/ ma bsgral ba rnams ni/ sgrol cig /ma grol ba rnams ni/ grol cig /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni/ dbugs phyung zhig /yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni/
yongs su mya ngan las zlo zhig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du
bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms las slar log ste/ gnas mal ji ltar longs spyod pa 'khos su phab nas lhung
bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mtha' gang na ba der chas te rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba na/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar phyin to/ de nas tshe dang ldan
pa gang po/ snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mthar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ rngon pa zhig mda'
gzhu lag tu thogs te ri dwags gshor du 'gro ba des mthong nas/ des bsam pa/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'di mthong ba ni/ kha rje ma rung bar byas so/ /snyam du bsam nas/ gzhu rna drung du
bkang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang na ba der brgyugs pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bla gos bsnyil te smras pa/ bzhin bzang / dgang dka'
ba 'di'i don du zhugs pas 'di la snun cig /tshigs su bcad de yang smras pa/ gang gi don du mkha' la bya rgyu ri dwags rnyis zin gyur/ /g.yul ngor mda' mdung mda' bo che
thogs mi rnams 'chi 'gyur la/ /bkren pa nyon mongs yul ngan rgyu zhing mchil pas nya zin pa/ /sdig pa rab mang lto 'dir khyod kyis tsham rims mda' 'phongs shig /des bsam
pa| rab tu byung ba 'di ni/ 'di lta bu'i bzod pa dang / des pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir 'di la mda' 'phang snyam du bsam nas/ de sems mngon par dad par gyur te/ /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa gang pos de la chos bshad de skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bzhag pa dang / des ri khrod pa gzhan lnga brgya ni/ dge bsnyen du byas/ lnga brgya ni/
dge bsnyen mar byas nas gtsug lag khang lnga brgya rtsig tu bcug ste/ khri dang khri'u dang / stan nang tshangs can dang / sngas nang tshangs can dang / gor thabs brgya phrag du ma 'bul du
bcug go /zla ba gsum po de 'das pa dang / des rig pa gsum lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas
dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon sum du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/
shing gi rna cha can gyi nu bo gnyis/ longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su zad la gtugs par gyur nas/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ byur lta bu de/ bdag cag gi khyim nas song gi/ tshur
shog /lhan cig gnas par bya'o/ /des smras pa/ byur lta bu de gang zhig yin/ gang po yin mod/ de ni/ kho bo'i khyim nas dpal byung ba yin gyi/ de byur lta bu ni/ ma yin no/ /de
gnyis kyis smras pa/ dpal yang rung / byur yang rung / tshur shog /lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o/ /des smras pa/ khyed cag gi nor ni/ rigs par bsgrubs pa ma yin la kho bos ni/
rigs par bsgrubs pa yin pas/ khyed cag dang kho bo lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/ /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bran mo'i bu des rgya mtsho chen por yang song yang song nas khyod kyi longs spyod
dag bsgrubs pa/ khyod de la spyod pas rgyags su zad/ khyod kyis ni/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par ga la nus/ de de gnyis las nga rgyal bzung nas/ nges
bsam pa/ bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o snyam nas zhes bya ba nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na/ gru bo che de rjes su
mthun pa'i rlung gis tsan+dan sa mchog gi tshal du bdas so/ /sa mkhan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /tsan+dan sa mchog gi tshal zhes grags pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'di yin gyi/ 'di las
'doms la longs shig /de'i tshe na/ tsan+dan sa mchog gi tshal gyi dbang po gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba yin te/ de yang gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar song ngo / /
de nas tsan+dan sa mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis gcod par brtsams so/ /gnod sbyin mi dga' ba zhes bya bas tsan+dan sa mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis gcod pa mthong ngo / /
mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dpon po mkhyen par mdzod cig /tsan+dan sa mchog gi
tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis 'gum na/ khyod kyi 'phrin las sam bgyi ba gang lags pa de mdzod cig /de nas gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po gnod sbyin gyis mdun ma byas nas mi bzod pa
skyes te/ rlung nag po chen po 'jigs su rung ba bslangs nas/ tsan+dan sa mchog gi tshal gang na ba der chas so/ /sa mkhan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i tshong ba dag nyon cig/
rlung nag po chen po 'jigs pa zhig yod do/ /zhes grags pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'di yin gyi/ ngo lon soms shig /de nas tshong pa'i tshogs de rnams 'jigs skrag/ phongs te ba spu'i khung bu
thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas lha rnams la gsol bar byed par rtsom ste/ zhi ba dang ni chu lha lus ngan nor lha sogs/ /lha mi lto 'phye gnod sbyin lha min dbang po rnams/ /bdag cag
shin tu nyam thag 'jigs par gyur lags kyi/ /bsnyengs bral de ring bdag cag rnams kyi mgon mdzod cig /mi rnams kha cig bde sogs khyod la 'dud/ /gzhan dag tshangs dad khyab
'jug lha chen dang / sar brten shing dang tshal la brten pa la/ /sha za'i rlung gis zin pas skyabs tshol 'dud/ /shing gi rna cha can sems las chung ngus 'dug pa dang / tshong pa rnams kyis
smras pa/ ded dpon/ bdag cag ni/ sdug bsngal mi zad pa/ nyam nga bar gyur na/ khyod ci'i phyir sems las chung ngur 'dug /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bo la nu bos bsgo ba/
phu bo rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa ni/ gnog chung la nyes dmigs mang ba ste/ sred pas ldongs pa phal cher 'jug kyang / slar 'khor ba nyung bas khyod kyis rnam pa gang gis kyang rgya
mtsho chen por 'jug par mi bya'o zhes bsgo ba las/ kho bos de'i tshig ma mnyan te/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pas da ci byar yang med do/ /khyod kyi nu bo gang
yin/ gang po yin no/ /tshong pa'i tshogs rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'phags pa gang po de ni/ bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin gyi/ de nyid la bdag cag skyabs
su 'gro bar bya'o zhes/ de thams cad kyis tshig mthun par 'di skad ces/ 'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /
zhes smras so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po la mngon par dga' ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /'phags pa/ khyod kyi gcen ni/ sdug bsngal mi zad pa/ nyam nga bar gyur gyi/ dgongs su gsol/ des bsam ste/ de nas sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag na/
gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha' nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen por gru'i dngor skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas
rlung nag po de ri rab la phog ste/ rdugs pa bzhin du slar log par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen pos bsam pa/ sngon chad ni/ rlung nag pos gru gang la reg pa de shing bal
gyi 'da' bu bzhin 'phangs pa dang / 'jig par 'gyur na/ da rlung nag po de ri rab la phog ste/ rdugs pa bzhin du slar log par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas/ phan tshun
du brtag par brtsams pa las ji tsam na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gru'i dngor skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang des smras pa/ 'phags pa gang po mtho
'tsham ste ci bgyi/ gang pos smras pa/ rga ba'i chos can khyod nyid kyis nga la mtho 'tsham mam/ gal te ngas 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs ma thob par gyur na/ khyod kyis nga'i phu bo
ming lus par byas par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen pos smras pa/ 'phags pa/ tsan+dan sa mchog 'di ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i don du srung lags so/ /gang pos smras
pa| dpon po ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang che/ 'phags pa/ ci/ bcom
ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngam/ byung ngo / /gal te de lta na/ da gang ma gang ba de khongs shig /de nas tshong pa'i tshogs de rnams srog byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la sems mngon
par dad nas gru de tsan+dan sa mchog gis bkang ste chas pa dang / rim gyis grong khyer slo ma lta bur phyin to/ /de nas gang pos phu bo la smras pa/ gang gi ming gis gru bo che grub ste 'ongs pa
de ni/ de dbang pas khyod kyis rin po che ni/ tshong pa 'di rnams la bgos shig /bdag gis ni/ tsan+dan sa mchog 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
kyi phyir tsan+dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzang rtsig go /des tshong pa de rnams la rin po che rnams bgos so/ /de nas gang pos tsan+dan sa mchog gi khang bzang zhig rtsig par brtsams te/
des bzo bo dag bkug nas/ smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci/ nyi ma re re zhing kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgyad len nam/ 'on te tsan+dan sa mchog gi phye ma pho sum gang len/ de dag gis smras
pa| 'phags pa/ tsan+dan sa mchog gi phye ma pho sum gang 'tshal lo/ /ji tsam na/ ring por mi thogs par tsan+dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzang brtsigs te byi dor thams cad zin par gyur
to| |de na zhogs ma dang phye ma'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag kyang btags nas de nyid la zhal zhal du byugs so/ /des spun de rnams phan tshun thams cad bzod pa gsol du bcug
nas smras pa/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drongs la zhal zas gsol cig /'phags pa gang po/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs/ mnyan yod
na'o| |lam ji srid mchis/ mnyan yod du dpag tshad brgya lhag tsam mo/ /re zhig rgyal po la brtag par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gyis shig /de dag rgyal po'i drung du dong nas/ lha/ bdag
cag ni/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te zhal zas gsol bar 'tshal na/ lhas bdag cag la bstang du gsol/ rung gi/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa gang po khang steng du 'dzegs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su kha bltas te/ pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te 'dug nas me tog gis gtor/ bdug pas bdugs nas khyim
pa zhig gser gyi bya ma bum 'dzin du bcug ste gsol pa 'debs pa la zhugs pa/ tshul khrims rnam dag shin tu rnam dag blo/ /zhal zas dus su rtag tu don gzigs pa/ /mgon med
gyur pa rab tu gzigs nas ni/ /shin tu thugs brtser mdzad de gshegs par gsol/ /de nas me tog de rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus
me tog gi khang bzang du byas te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du rgan rim bzhin du gnas par gyur to/ /bdug pa ni/ sprin ltar spungs so/ /chu ni/ bai DUr+ya'i phur ma lta bur gyur to/ /tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas pa yin pas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ spyan 'dren pa gang nas mchis/ kun dga' bo/ grong khyer slo ma
lta bu nas so/ /btsun pa/ grong khyer slo ma lta bur ji srid cig mchis/ kun dga' bo/ dpag tshad brgya lhag tsam yod kyi/ song la/ dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang dang gang / sang
grong khyer slo ma lta bur song nas zas za bar spro bas tshul shing longs shig ces sgos shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas tshul shing blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis
tshul shing blangs so/ /de'i tshe yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa gang po shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des kyang
tshul shing blang bar brtsams pa dang / de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa zan 'di ni/ /ko sa la bdag po'i pho brang ngam/ /rab sbyin
khyim dang ri dwags kyi/ /khyim gyi zas kyang ma lags so/ /grong khyer slo ma zhes bya ba/ /dpag tshad brgya lhag mchis pa der/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bzhud 'tshal bas/ /gang po khyod ni ma
gsungs bzhugs/ /de shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba yin gyi/ des rdzu 'phrul ma skyes pas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag gi nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mtha' dag rtsal
cing bor la spangs shing so sor spangs na/ bdag mu stegs can dang thun mong ba'i rdzu 'phrul la sgyid lug gam snyam nas/ des brtson 'grus la gnas te/ rdzu 'phrul bskyed pas ji
srid tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan gsum pa la tshul shing ma byin pa de'i bar du des lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyangs nas tshul shing blangs te/ de nas tshigs su bcad
de smras pa/ go'u tam 'di ni mngon shes drug po nyid/ /grags pa dang ni thos pas 'thob min la/ /tshan gyi yon tan rnams dang ngag dang ni/ /yid smon chen pos kyang ni ma yin gyi/ /
bdag 'dra yongs su rtogs par byed pa rnams/ /rga bas dar yal gyur kyang zhi ba dang / /tshul khrims lhag mthong stobs dang bsam gtan stobs/ /rnam pa du mas mngon shes drug ldan
'gyur| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'di ni/ nga'i dge slong rnams kyi mchog yin te/ nga'i nyan thos mchod pa'i tshul shing blang ba la
dang po tshul shing len pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan gang po mchog yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la/ ngas dge slong dag /khyed kyis dge ba mi spyom pa dang / sdig pa mi bcab par gnas par bya'o/ /zhes bshad mod kyi/ 'on kyang grong
khyer de na mu stegs pa rnams gnas pas khyed las gang gis rdzu 'phrul gang thob pa de/ des grong khyer slo ma lta bur song la zan bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes sgos shig/ btsun pa/ bka'
bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das las nyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan
'das kyis 'di skad ces/ ngas dge slong rnams kyis dge ba mi spyom pa dang / sdig pa mi bcab par gnas par bya'o/ /zhes bshad mod kyi zhes bya ba nas song la zan bza' bar bya'o
zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal pos grong khyer slo ma lta bu rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams sel du bcug ste/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhim po'i pog phor
sna tshogs bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/ me tog sna tshogs chal bar bkram ste/ dga' dga' ltar byas so/ /grong khyer slo ma lta bu la sgo bco brgyad yod la/ rgyal po de
la yang bu bcu bdun yod de/ grong khyer gyi sgo re re so sor rgyal po'i bu rnams 'byor pa mchog dang bkod do/ /sgo chen por ni/ slo ma lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal po/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa

chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / shing gi rna cha can dang / rgya skegs kyi rna cha can dang / zha nye'i rna cha can 'dug go /ji tsam na/ lo ma 'brim pa dang / shang tshe 'brim pa dang /
snod spyad 'brim pa dag rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags pa rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ ci/ btsun pa gang po/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/ des smras pa/ 'di dag ni/ lo ma
'brim pa dang / shang tshe 'brim pa dang / snod spyad 'brim pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /ji tsam na/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan
la snyoms par zhugs pa rnam pa du mas lhags pa dang / rgyal pos yang dris pa/ ci/ btsun pa gang po/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/ des smras pa/ ma lags te/ 'di dag ni/
dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa/ rnam pa du mas lhags pa lags so/ /de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kha cig seng
ge stag dang glang po che rta klu dang khyu mchog bzang po bcibs/ /kha cig rin chen gzhal med khang dang ri dang shing mdzes shing rta 'bar la brten/ /gzhan dag nam mkha'i ngos las chu 'dzin
glog gi phreng bas brgyan pa lta bur ni/ /rab tu dgyes bzhin lha yi pho brang lta bur rdzu 'phrul dag gis gshegs par brtson/ /kha cig sa brtol gyen du 'byung / /kha cig nam mkha'i dkyil
nas 'bab/ /kha cig stan las sprul par byed/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mthu la ltos/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang
du zhugs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ sku drang por bsrang nas dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go /ji tsam na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa
dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa na/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos
kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/ shar phyogs mtho na/ nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na/ shar phyogs dam/ /lho phyogs
mtho na/ byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na/ lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na/ dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na/ mtha' dma' 'o/ /rgyal pos tshe dang ldan pa gang po la dris pa/ 'phags
pa gang po/ 'di ci zhig lags/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa des na/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par
gyur pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od bkye ste/ des 'dzam bu'i gling gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to/ /yang rgyal po ngo
mtshar du gyur pas mig phye nas dris pa/ 'phags pa gang po/ 'di ci lags/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer bkye ba lags
so|| ||'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu lnga pa/ 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu slo ma lta
bur gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha des ba ku la'i yal ga zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la grib ma byed cing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad
pa mdzad de/ thos nas lha de 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par gyur to/ /ji tsam na phyogs
gzhan zhig na/ yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam gnas pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po
brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu
yang de rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dang ba chen po skyes so/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyi sems can gyis dang por sangs rgyas mthong ba
ltar lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems goms par byas pa dang / bu med pas bu rnyed pa dang / dbul pos gter mthong ba dang / rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang
phyug thob pa ni/ de ltar nyams dga' ba skyed pa ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/ dge slong gi dge
'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya
ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa/ bdag cag la 'di lta bu ni/ mas ma bgyis/ phas ma
lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lhas ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram zes
ma lags pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni/ bkum
thar pa dang mtho ris kyi sgo ni/ phye nas bdag cag lha dang mi rnams su ni bkod de/ btsun pa/ bdag cag 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos
dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis lags kyi/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la cung zad cig stsol cig dang / de la bdag cag bgyi ba dag bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu skra dang sen mo bregs te byin no/ /de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten zhig brtsigs so/ /de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na
gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des/ mchod rten de'i 'khor sar ba ku la'i yal ga de bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ mchod rten 'di la bgyi ba bgyid
cing mchis so/ /zhes de de nyid na gnas so/ /de la kha cig gis ni/ yugs sa mo'i mchod rten no zhes bya bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni/ ba ku la'i 'khor sa zhes bya bar shes te/ mchod
rten la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag da dung yang phyag byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na bsti gnas gzhan zhig na drang srong lnga brgya gnas te/ de dag gis ni/ bsti gnas
de me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pas/ de dag des rgya gas nas ci yang mi sems so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/
bsti gnas der gshegs te byon pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis bsti gnas de'i me tog dang 'bras bu ni/ brlag /chu ni/ bskams/ ne'u gsing rnams ni/ rlogs
'dug gnas dag ni/ brtib bo/ /de nas drang srong de dag lag pa 'gram par gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir sems
khong du chud cing 'dug /de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams kyi zhing rkang gnyis khyod 'dir gshegs nas bdag cag ni/ gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur to/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong dag /bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa ci ste ma rung / ji sngon gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'am/ bcom
ldan 'das/ mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul brtul ba dang / sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas/ bcom ldan
la sems mngon par dad pa skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun
pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs
su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong ba/
dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la dge slong tshur shog /tshangs par spyad pa
spyod cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang / skra dang kha spu zhag bdun
skyes pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus
ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bka' bar gyur/ /de dag gis 'bad pa dang bcas pas brtson 'grus brtsams pas/ 'khor ba'i

'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de dag la 'doms par
byed pa'i drang srong gang yin pa des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi cha byad 'dis skye bo'i tshogs chen po bslus pa de dag je dad pa skyes par bgyis la slad kyis rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'o/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong lnga brgya dang / sngon gyi dge slong rnams kyis zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas de nyid rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' la
gshegs te/ rim gyis gtun ri la byon to/ /de'i tshe gtun ri la drang srong shing gos can zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ drang srong des bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba nas kun nas mdzes pa rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems
mngon par dad par gyur te/ de dad pa skyes nas bsam pa/ ma la bdag ri las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das blta zhing 'gror ni bcom ldan 'das gdul ba la gzigs pas 'das par
'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag nyid mchong bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de ri las bdag nyid mchongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad
pa mdzad de/ de thos nas shing gos can gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge
slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung ngo / /zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ nga'i dge slong dad pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni/ 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong shing gos can no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge
slong stong gis yongs su bskor te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing grong khyer slo ma lta bur gshegs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te sgo gcig nas zhugs na/ gzhan dag
gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas/ ma la nga rdzu 'phrul kho nas 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las grong khyer slo ma lta bu'i dbus su gshegs so//

de nas slo ma lta bu'i bdag po rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / shing gi rna cha can dang / rgya skegs kyi rna cha can dang / zha nye'i rna cha can dang / rgyal po'i sras bcu bdun po de dag kyang

rang rang gi 'khor dang srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas zham ring byas shing tsan+dan gyi phreng ba'i
khang bzang gang na ba der gshegs te/ byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po des bcom
ldan 'das ma mthong ngo / /tsan+dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzang zhig la thug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te tsan+dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzang zhig par gyur na/ sbyin bdag rnams
kyi bsod nams kyi bar chad du 'gyur gyi/ ma la ngas 'di shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs des sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa
med par mthong bar 'gyur bar shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul to/ /de nas 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa
mdzad de/ de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po dag rtogs te/ kha cig gis ni/ thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ kha cig gis ni/ nges par
'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/ kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ lhan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis

ni| rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o/ /kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o/ /'khor de phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la
bab par bkod do/ /de nas shing gi rna cha can dang / rgya skegs kyi rna cha can dang / zha nye'i rna cha can gyis/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas gdan
bshams te/ nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la
bab par dgongs su gsol/ de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / gau ta ma zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de gnyis kyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer slo ma lta bu na chos 'chad
kyi dong nas mnyan par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas de gnyis klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang grong khyer slo ma lta bur chu bo lnga brgya phab nas chas so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi
mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang ge ta ma 'di gnyis gal te grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'ongs par gyur na/ yul phung par byed par
'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rings pa'i bsod snyoms
longs shig /mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rings pa'i bsod snyoms ni/ lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ glo bur ba dang / 'gro bar chas pa dang /
nad pa dang / nad g.yog dang / dge bskos so/ /skabs 'dir ni/ bcom ldan 'das dge bskos su dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de nyid nas steng gi nam
mkha' las gshegs so/ /bcom ldan 'das dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / go'u ta ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/ klu'i
dbang po/ grong khyer slo ma lta bu la soms la/ yul phung par ma bya zhig /de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag cag gang srog chags grog sbur la yang gnod pa mi
bgyid pa de lta bu'i dad pas mchis na/ slo ma lta bu na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang go'u ta
ma la de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas
gsol ba'i mdzad pa brtsams pa dang / klu re re nas bsam pa/ kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis chu'i btung ba gsol lo snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
gal te gcig gi chu gsol na ni/ des na gzhan dag gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu song la/ gang na chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de las chus lhung bzed khongs la khyer te shog cig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/
zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gang du chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de nas cus lhung bzed bkang nas khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed bkang ba'i chu phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te gsol lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ pha dang mas ni/ bu gsos/ bsrings bskyed de nu mas bsnun/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshogs ston par byed pa yin pas shin tu
dga' ba byed pa ste/ bus/ phrag pa gcig la ni ma bzhag/ gcig shos la ni pha bzhag nas lo brgya tshang bar khur du thogs sam/ sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya
dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ de lta bu'i dbang phyug la bdag por bcug kyang bus
pha ma la de tsam gyis phan thogs pa'am/ lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis/ pha ma dad pa med pa dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du
'jug la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de/ so sor 'god par byed pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang / ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
shes rab 'chal ba shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de/ so sor 'god par byed na/ de tsam gyis/ bus pha dang ma la phan thogs
pa dang lan lon pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs na/ bdag gis ni/ ma la lan ci yang ma lon gyi/ ma la bdag gis bdag gi ma gang du skyes pa bsam mo snyam nas/ bsam pa la zhugs
pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes par mthong ngo / /des na/ de sus gdul ba yin par brtags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yin par mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du
sems te/ bdag lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs pas/ ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la don 'di gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sngon dge slong dag /pha dang ma ni/ bu la shin tu dga' ba byed pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes
te| de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'dul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dong / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ri rab kyi rtse mo la gom pa por zhing
gshegs pa dang / zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du byon to/ /bu mo bzang mo des/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga'

ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ kye ma'o/ /yun ring po zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo / /kye ma'o/ /yun ring mo ring mo zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo / /de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos smras pa/
shes ldan dag /rab tu byung ba 'di ni/ rgan na/ ji ltar bu mo 'di/ de'i ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bo'i lus 'di 'dis bskyed de/
des na kho bo'i ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun par 'phags pa'i bden pa
bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bu mo bzang mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi rnams su rab tu bzhag ces bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin no/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pas mi bzad pa'i/ /ngan song lam ni khyod kyi mthus bcad do/ /mtho ris 'gro ba bsod nams bzang ldan phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam
yang bdag gis thob/ /khyod la brten nas shin tu rnam dag mig /nyes dang bral bas dag pa deng 'dir thob/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang zhi thob nas/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol
bdag gis brgal/ /'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye rga 'chi dang na dang rnam bral ba/ /srid pa stong du rnyed par rab dka' ba/ /thub pa khyod mthong deng 'dir 'bras bur bcas/ /
btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags shing mngon par 'phags te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan
chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsam pa thag pas skyabs su mchi bar mngon par spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs cig tu deng bsod snyoms sbyor zhing
mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo bzang po de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bu mo bzang mos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig
ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gdan la bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag
nas stob cing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag /rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol
zin nas/ phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bting nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang / de la bcom
ldan 'das kyis chos bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos blangs te 'khru bar byed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u
'gal gyis bu/ 'dong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs so/ /su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi'o/ /gal te de lta na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal soms shig /bcom ldan 'das/ 'o
skol byon lags sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ yu bu phyin zin to/ /de nas ngo mtshar du dad pa'i yid kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu
yid mgyogs yin no/ /btsun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo de lta bu ni/ bdag gi glo bar ma chud do/ /gal te bdag gis glo bar chud par gyur na/ bdag gi lus til gyi phye ma ltar bgyis kyang bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni/ shing tshig pa bzhin cir bgyir yang ma mchis so/ /dge slong rnams the
tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa/
nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des bran mo'i mngal du skyes shing rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon
sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gang po nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi
za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/ gang pos las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags
pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ las dge ba dang
mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs
dang dus/ /rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA sir nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas sde snod
gsum par gyur te/ chos bzhin gyis dge 'dun gyi zhal ta pa byed do/ /re zhig cig na dgra bcom pa zhig la dge bskos bab ste/ des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang / rlung
langs pas phyag dar phan tshun du khyer bar gyur to/ /des bsam pa/ re zhig rlung zhi bar gyur gyi bar du gzhag go snyam pa las/ ji tsam na gtsug lag khang de ma phyags pa zhal ta pa des mthong
nas| de kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba/ bran mo'i bu gang zhig dge bskos byed/ dgra bcom pa des mthong nas/ des bsam pa/ 'di kun nas dkris pa yin pas
