re zhig bzhag la phyis go bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ khyod kyis kho bo su yin shes sam/ des smras pa/ shes te/ khyod
dang kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin no/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta yin mod kyi/ kho bos ni/ rab tu
byung ba'i bya ba byas te/ /kho bo ni/ 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol ba yin la/ khyod ni/ 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin pas/ khyod kyis ngag rtsub po'i las phyung gi/ nyes pa la
nyes par shogs shig dang / des na las de srab pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /des nyes pa las nyes par bshags pa/ sems can dmyal bar skye zhing bran
mo'i bur 'gyur ba las/ de sems can dmyal bar ma skyes par tshe rabs lnga brgyar bran mo'i mngal du skyes te/ da ltar gyi bar du srid pa tha ma la yang bran mo'i mngal du skyes par gyur to/ /
gang yang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ phyug pa dang / nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so/ /gang yang de na bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang /
khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par byas pa des na/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra
bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gcig tu gnag pa yin/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin
pa ni/ gcig tu dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni/ 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni/ spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar
ba la brtsam par bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gleng gzhi ni/ rgyal po'i khab na'o/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na/ klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo gnas so/ /de nyid kyi mthus/ dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang rtag
tu 'bab la/ chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang skam par mi 'gyur/ lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/ lo tog rnams kyang lhag par legs par 'gyur ro/ /
gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba na/ de gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas/ nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed du 'ong
ngo| |de nas klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang / ri bo 'di snyam du sems te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'di gnyis/ ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la
bsnyen bkur byed cing 'ong na/ bdag cag 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni/ bzang po ma yin gyi/ ma la bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das
la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de gnyis la de 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong
zhing / chos dang dge 'dun la'ang skyabs su dong nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa
de'i tshe lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur to/ /de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis shing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos pa de'i tshe/ lus dang longs spyod lhag
par 'phel bar gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ bdag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po dag /khyed rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa yin gyi/ rgyal po la rtogs shig /de gnyis kyis bsam pa dang / don gyis na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis
rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes smras nas/ de nyid na gnas so/ /klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang / ri bo'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gal te nub mo bcom ldan 'das bltar 'gro na ni/ lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis so/
'on te nyin par na ni/ khyim bdag gi cha byad kyis so/ /de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas shing nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal
rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi kun du spyod pa ni/ de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ 'ga' zhig bdag mthong na/ ldang bar mi byed pa med grang zhes mi gnang chen
gtong bar byed de/ des mi gnang chen zhig mngags te/ kye/ nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed ltos shig /de song ba las ji tsam na/ khyim bdag gnyis shig
mthong nas des bsam pa/ 'di gnyis ni/ lha'i yul na gnas pas ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed snyam nas/ des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag gnyis shig mchis pa ni/ lha'i yul
nyid na gnas pa lags so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bsam pa/ de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed kyi/ 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na
ba der song ba dang / klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang / ri bos rgyal po gzugs can snying po mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal
po gzugs can snying po mchis na/ ci/ re zhig rgyal po la bsti stang bgyi'am/ 'on te chos la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i
dbang po dag /chos la bsti stang byos shig /dam pa'i chos la ni/ 'di ltar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bla mar byed la/ chos la ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyang bla mar byed
do| |tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang / /ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin dang / /da ltar sangs rgyas gang yin pa/ /mang po'i mya ngan 'joms mdzad
pa| |bzhud dang bzhugs dang 'byon 'gyur ba/ /thams cad dam chos bla mar byed/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/ /de bas 'dir bdag phan 'dod pa/ /bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa
yis| |sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te/ /dam pa'i chos la bkur sti bya/ /de gnyis kyis ldang ba ma byas so/ /de nas rgyal po mi bzod pa skyes te/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis chos bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang dang ni 'khrug pa dang / /ma dad pa yi sems kyis ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyis bshad pa'i/ /dam chos shes par mi nus so/ /gang gis khros dang bag med pa'i/ /sems ni dul bar byas pa dang / /'di la mnar sems spangs pa des/ /legs par gsungs
pa shes par 'gyur/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ khyim bdag 'di gnyis 'ongs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi chos nyan pa'i bar yang chad par gyur to snyam nas/ de stan las langs
te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo / /de song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ khyim bdag 'di gnyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas
dong ba de'i tshe khyed gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug cig ces sgos shig /de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ba dang / blon po bdag gis bsgo ba/
lha'i zhal nas/ khyed cag gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug cig ces gsung ngo / /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal mchi'o/ /bsam pa/ bdag cag gnyis kyis/ yun ring po

zhig nas bsam pa gang yin pa de ni tshegs chung dus grub bo/ /snyam mo/ /de nas 'od pa'i chu chen po nas phyung nas grog mo chung ngu'i nang du zhugs so/ /grog mo chung du nas grog mo chen por ro/ /grog mo

chen po nas chu bran du'o/ /chu bran nas chu chen por ro/ /chu chen po nas rgya mtsho chen por te/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ de gnyis phyir zhing lus dang longs spyod shin tu 'phel bar
gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur la
thug /lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma bab pas lo nyes par gyur te/ mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar
gyur to/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ rgyal po'i khab 'di na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang grog mkhar gnas te/ de gnyis kyi mthus/ dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang 'bab/ chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u

rnams kyang chu che/ lhas kyang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pa nyid kyis lo tog legs par rgyas par gyur na/ da ni/ dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams
kyang chung ba dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur la thug /lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyes par gyur te/ mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas
zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / grog mkhar shi'am/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis khyer ba'am/ sbrul khas sdigs kyis bzung ba'am/ des
'jigs nas bros par ma gyur grang / de lta mod kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin gyi/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
la zhu'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de gnyis ni/ shi
ba yang ma yin/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis kyang ma khyer/ sbrul khas sdigs kyis kyang ma bzung / des 'jigs pas kyang ma bros mod kyi/ rgyal po khyod nyid kyis yul nas bskrad do/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de gnyis mthong bar yang mi dran na/ de gnyis yul nas bskrad pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po/ ngas khyod dran par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis
khyim bdag gnyis shig yul nas bskrad pa dran nam/ bcom ldan 'das/ dran lags so/ /de gnyis ni/ klu'i rgyal po ri po dang grog mkhar yin no/ /btsun pa/ de gnyis gang du mchis/
rgya mtsho chen por dong ngo / /bdag gi yul ma rung bar gyur lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de gnyis la bzod pa byin cig dang / ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po na mchis na/
ji ltar bzod pa stsal/ de gnyis tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi la khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang / ngas rtags bstan gyis/ khyod kyis
bzod pa byin cig /bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ bdag gis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi'am/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang lag pa rkyongs la klu'i dbang po bzod par
gsol lo/ /zhes smros shig dang bzod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos de gnyis 'ongs pa la 'bad de sdod cing 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na/ de gnyis khyim bdag
gi cha byad du byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang / de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags bstan pa dang / rgyal pos lag pa mngon du brkyangs
nas smras pa/ klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod par gsol lo/ /rgyal po chen po/ bzod par bgyi'o/ /gal te bzod par gyur na/ 'dir spyon cig /rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
las bdag cag gis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas de nyid kyi tshe bdag cag gi lus dang longs spyod skyes te/ gal te da che bzhin du 'dir 'ongs na/ yul ma
ga d+ha ru yang mi shong bar 'gyur ro/ /'o na yul ma ga d+ha ma rung bar 'gyur mod/ ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar mi 'gyur/ khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khang bzang gnyis brtsigs la/
zla ba drug cing dus mchod kyis shig dang / kho bo cag gi 'khor bzhag la/ dus mchod kyi tshe yang 'du bar bya'o/ /rgyal pos de bzhin du byed pa dang / de gnyis kyis 'khor dag kyang
bzhag la/ dus mchod kyang rang nyid nyams su myong bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ de dag gi 'khor bag med par gnas pa na/ klu gdug pa dag gis glags rnyed nas/
de dag gis ser ba dbab par brtsams so/ /rgyal po'i khab na/ bram ze ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod de/ des de bab cing bab pa dag bcad pa dang / de la yul ma ga d+ha na gnas
pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis dbang thang byin no/ /lho phyogs na/ bram ze mes byin zhes bya ba ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa zhig yod pa des/ byang phyogs na/ yul nus pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/
de na rgyal po sde mchog ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /de'i yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yod de/ de na sman mthu che ba pha rol gnon pa yod par thos nas/ de'i ched 'gro'o/ /zhes
de chas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ bram ze ser ba'i sngags 'chang ba de'i gnas su zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na/ ser ba chen po 'bab pa bram ze gnyug mar gnas pa des gcad
par ma nus nas/ de phyir byung / nang du zhugs par byed pa dang / bram ze mes byin gyis dris pa/ mkhan po/ ci'i slad du mkhan po 'di phyir byung / nang du zhugs par mdzad des smras pa/ bu/ ser ba
chen po bab pa gcad par ma nus par bas mod/ bdag gis dgum mo/ bu legs so/ /de chu nyung zhig la bzlas te gtor bas tshal pa brgyar gyes so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim
bdag rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas rngan pa thogs te/ bram ze de'i khyim du dong nas smras pa/ mkhan po/ rgyal po'i khab kyi skye bo'i tshogs mngon par dga' bar gyur gyi/ rngan pa
longs shig /ci'i phyir/ khyod kyis ser ba chen po khums pa'i slad du'o/ /des smras pa/ kho bos ni/ ma bcad de/ 'on kyang bram ze 'dis bcad do/ /de
dag bram ze de'i drung du dong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug cig dang / dbang thang sbyin no/ /de bzhin du gnas par bya'o/ /zhes de gnas so/ /des ser ba de dus tha gi tsam zhig gi bar
du sngags kyis bgags te mi 'bab par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis ser ba mi
'bab na/ ci'i phyir de la dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do/ /bram ze des sngags brtul nas yul nus pa can du song ba dang phyir yang ser ba 'bab par gyur to/ /de rnams bram ze
de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po/ bram ze'i khye'u de gar mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag gis de la bkur sti ma byas pas de song ngo / /mkhan po/ gal te mchis na/ bdag cag
la sbron cig /de bzhin du bya'o/ /de yang rim gyis rgyal po sde mchog gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po sde mchog la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa/ lha khyod kyi
yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis pa de'i gnas na/ mod la mthu skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sman mchis kyi/ lhas de ston cig dang / lha'i skal ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /
rgyal pos smras pa/ kye bram ze/ klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes ni/ gtum po yin pas des khyod brlag par mi byed grang / lha/ re zhig bdag la sngags kyi mthu dang sman gyi mthu mchis te/ gal te
klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes dang 'dra ba'i klu rnams kyis dzam+bu'i gling 'di lta ste/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin gang bar gyur kyang / bdag gi ba spu gcig kyang bskyod par
rngo mi thogs na/ klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'on kyang lha'i mi dgum pa la thug pa 'ga' mchis sam/ bram ze/ yod do/ /lha/ dkri zhig dang / des de'i gnas ston par
'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal pos mi de la bos te bsgo ba/ kye nang rje/ bram ze 'di la klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas ston cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po'i ltar mnyan

nas bram ze de khrid de chas so/ /ji tsam na/ mi ring ba zhig tu bsdad nas de la smras pa/ bram ze/ tshal sngo zhing sngo ba dag sbrengs pa pha bi mthong ngam/ mthong ngo / /de ni/ klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes
kyi gnas yin no/ /de song ste/ des der mod la mthu bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman las khur du sbrags nas des de thogs te/ yul nus pa can du song nas rgyal po sde mchog gi skal pa byin te/
rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ bram ze de nyid kyi khyim du zhugs so/ /de nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la sbran pa dang / de dag mchod yon thogs te lhags
nas| bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug cig /dbang thang sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ khyed cag gis bkur sti ma byas pas kho bo mi 'dug go /de rnams kyis de gzhag
par gal gyis 'chu bar brtsams te gsol ba btab pa dang / khas blangs nas de dag gis 'tsho ba'i ris bcad do/ /'jig rten ni/ phun sum tshogs pa 'dod kyi/ rgyud pa dang mi mthun pas/
des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa
na| khye'u zhig btsas te/ des de'i ming ri bo can zhes bya bar btags so/ /de/ yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i ming ni/ ser
ba zhes bya bar btags so/ /bram ze mo ni/ 'khor bral zhes bya'o/ /mna' ma ni/ klog ces bya'o/ /des bsam pa/ yang dang yang du ser ba gcod cing ci las med yun ring rab tu sngags kyis
bgag par bya'o/ /zhes des yun ring por sngags kyis bgag pa byas te bzhag pas ser ba mi 'bab par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag
kho na'i bsod nams kyi mthus ser ba mi 'bab na/ ci'i phyir dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do/ /bram ze de phrag dog gis zil gyis non pas bu yang sngags kyi tshig rnams 'dzin
du ma bcug go /bde ba la chags pas kha ton yang ma byas la/ sman yang skam du ma bcug go /des sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/ bsam na brjed/ sman ni/ ma bskams pas rul bar gyur

to| |de rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la snying na ches nas/ de rnams la klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mu stegs kyi gnas dang / dka' thub kyi tshal de dang de dag tu song nas dris pa/ shes
ldan dag /gang gis gang bsam pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ mer zhugs shig /kha cig gis smras pa/ dug
zo zhig /kha cig gis smras pa/ g.yang sa nas bdag nyid mchongs shig /kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag rang gi ske la thag pa thogs te/ shing gi yal ga las 'phyang du chug cig /ces thams cad
kyis 'chi ba'i thabs bstan gyi/ nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni/ ma yin pas/ de rim gyis 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo / /des dge slong zhig mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ gang gis gang bsam pa
dang gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta 'ga' mchis sam/ de smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu phyung zhig /der ci zhig bgyi/ der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du

tshangs par spyod pa yang spyad par bya/ bsam gtan dang gdon pa dang ldan par yang gnas par bya ste/ gal te re zhig mthong ba'i chos nyid la kun shes pa thob pa na/ des na de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal
gyi mthar phyin pa yin no/ /'on te sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin dus byed na/ gang bsam pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
ro| |'phags pa/ /de ni rngo mi thogs na/ gzhan yang cung zad ci mchis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol cig /de yang rngo mi thogs na/
gzhan bstan du gsol/ bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol te/ smon lam thob cig dang / gang bsam pa dang gang don du gnyer ba de
thams cad 'grub bo/ /'phags pa/ de ni/ rngo thogs kyi/ bgyi'o/ /zhes bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drangs te/ gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab pa/
dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig /ces smon lam btab bo/ /de la chung mas
dris pa/ rje'i sras/ smon lam ci zhig btab/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par
gyur cig /ces smon lam btab bo/ /legs te/ bdag kyang khyod kyi chung mar gyur cig /bus smras pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bur gyur cig /de bzhin du bu mos smras pa/ bdag kyang
khyod kyi bu mor gyur cig/ de bzhin du mna' mas smras pa/ bdag kyang mna' mar gyur cig/ ces byas nas/ de rnams khyim rnying pa zhig tu zhugs te nyal ba dang / sprin kha dog lnga pa las
char babs te/ rtsig pa 'gyel bas non te kha btag go /klu rab mdzes shi 'phos nas 'khor drug khri dang skyes nas/ de yang rab mdzes zhes bya bar grags so/ /chung ma 'khor bral zhes
bya'o| |bu ni/ ri bo can zhes bya'o/ /bu mo ni/ ser ba zhes bya'o/ /mna' ma ni/ klog ces bya'o/ /chos nyid kyis/ klu'am/ klu'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon par gnas gsum dran par 'gyur te/
gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o/ /des bltas na/ mi las shi 'phos so/ /gang du skyes she na/ klu rnams su'o/ /las gang gis she na/ smon lam
gyi dbang gis so/ /ci'i phyir snyam na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir ro/ /des bsam pa/ ci/ lo tog ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa la bya na/ mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal skye bar
'gyur ram/ 'on te ma skyes pa rnams la 'gyur snyam na/ des ji ltar skyes pa la byas pa ltar ma skyes pa la ni de ltar ma yin par mthong nas/ des 'khor rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan tshur
shog/ yul ma ga d+har dengs la char pas lo tog thams cad skrun cig/ de rnams kyis lo tog thams cad bskrun pa dang / de nas drug stong gi 'khor dang / gshol mda' tsam gyi char
gyi rgyun gyis ji ltar yul ma ga d+har sog ma yang khyer ba de lta bu'i char gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams so/ /de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/ sog ma yang klu 'dis
'phrog go/ zhes de'i ming sog ma med ces bya bar thogs so/ /sdom la/ rgyal po'i khab dang nA lan+da/ /'od ma'i dbyug pa dmar bu'i grong / /chu bo gang+gA sprin brtsegs dang / /sgra chen yangs pa
tha ma yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe gzhon nu ma skyes dgra lhas sbyin gyis rbad nas/ pha chos kyi rgyal
po| chos dang ldan pa bsad de rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings nas/ rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa mang po bya bar brtsams te/ dgongs pa man chad
bya ba'i phyir glang po che nor skyong dang / khyi gtum po za ba dag rbad pa dang / de'i ma/ lus 'phags mas smras pa/ bu/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa ma byed cig /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyi/ rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de gnod par gyur ta re/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yul ang+ga dang / ma
ga d+ha rnams 'byor cing nyams dga' ba yin no/ /snying rnyog pa can des smras pa/ ci/ gang na bcom ldan 'das med pa'i yul de dag zhig pa dang / stongs par gyur tam/ de nas
thams cad kyi thams cad du bzlog kyang ma btub nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 'di/ bsod nams ma yin pa mang du gsog gi/ ngas 'di gzhi med pa'i
dad pa la gzhag tu re zhig de'i dus la ma bab pas mnyan yod du gshegs so/ /snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu
zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mtha'i rgyal phran
dag gis bcom ldan 'das la ma skyes dgras bkur sti ma yin pa byas pas de bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs nas rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon to/ /zhes thos nas/ de
dag 'di snyam du sems te/ re zhig rgyal po sdig can des/ pha chos kyi rgyal po/ chos dang ldan pa bsad na/ des kyang mchog nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi rnams
kyis mchod pa de la yang bkur sti ma yin pa byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas
gshegs te mnyan yod du byon par gyur pas/ de yong ye rgyal srid las dbyung bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de dag gis phan tshun pho nyas bzlugs nas blo gros gcig tu byas te/ dpung gi
tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon pa/ glang po che ba'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang rgyal po'i
khab tu dong ste/ lo bcom nas phru mar bskor te 'khod de/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis kyang ser ba'i rgyun phab pas lo tog lhag ma rnams ma rung par byas so/ /dka' thub kyi chu
lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams bskams la thug pas mu ge byung bar gyur to/ /chu lhag ma gzhan dag kyang mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis dug gis ma rung bar
byas so/ /de nas ma skyes dgra /sdug bsngal mi bzang pa/ rtsub pa/ nyam nga bar gyur pa la mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de rma la thal bas btab pa ltar mi ngas gyung ste/ khyogs
dang khyogs 'drud par gyur te/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ gnod pa brgya phrag du mas snying dkrugs pas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas
lus 'phags mas smras pa/ bu/ ci'i phyir sems khong du chud/ yum/ gnod pa brgya phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to/ /bu/ kho mos sngar khyod la bcom ldan 'das la
bkur sti ma yin pa ma byed cig// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu drug pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyi/
bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de gnod par gyur ta re zhes ma smras sam/ de ni/ 'di yin no/ /yum/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bu/ bcom ldan 'das la bzod par
gsol cig/ yum/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bu/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ khong khro ba
dang rjes su chags pa spangs pa yin no/ /zhes ma thos sam/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dpung pa gcig la ste'us 'jog par byed la/ gcig shos la
tsan+dan sa mchog gis nyug par byed na/ de la/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags pa yang mi mnga'/ khong khro ba yang mi mnga'o/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi
zhig la smras pa/ kye nang rje tshur shog/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la son nas/ kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gnod
pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa mi mnga'am/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par bzhugs sam zhes snyun gsol la/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol
cig| btsun pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mchid nas/ btsun pa/ bu ngan pa ni/ mchis kyi/ pha ngan pa ni/ ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs
brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na/ ring por mi thogs pa kho nar rgyal
po'i khab kyi grong khyer stongs te ming lus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsol cig/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas chas te/
rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
go |phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas bde ba la reg par bzhugs sam/ zhes snyun gsol lags so/ /zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /kye/ mi khyod dang / lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga
d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mchid nas/ btsun pa/ bu ngan pa ni/ mchis kyi/ pha ngan pa ni/ ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal po'i
khab tu gshegs su gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na zhes bya ba nas ming lus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas mi de la
gnang ngo / /de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ji srid bzhed kyi bar du mnyan yod du bzhugs nas/
nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yul ma ga d+har byon to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus rlung gtong ba'i
lha'i bu rnams kyis ni/ dug gis ma rung bar byas pa'i chu de dag bskams so/ /char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ngo / /lha rnams ni/ char pa
'bebs pa la zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis ni/ rgyal po'i khab nas mi ma yin pa rnams bskrad nas mi ngas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis ni/ bcom
ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong nas grong khyer bskor ba btang ste dong ngo / /tshong pa rnams kyis ni/ zong dag bkram mo/ /bzo phal pa gzhan dag gis ni/ rang rang byed par brtsams so/ /yul so
so na gnas pa'i tshong pa rnams dang / ded dpon rnams ni/ zong dang 'jug par brtsams so/ /lo ni/ legs par gyur to/ /lam po che dang / srang dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo rnams su
ni| bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid chen po sgrog par gyur to/ /mu stegs pa rnams ni bag 'khums par gyur to/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams ni/ rab tu dga'
bar gyur to/ /lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+har gshegs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang snying dga' ba dang / mgu
ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ dengs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir dpag tshad phyed
dang gsum gyi lam bstar ba dang / grong khyer dag bzang por byos shig /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad kyang rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo sel te tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag
thob la dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po pyongs shig /dri zhim po'i pog phor dag shoms la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dag tshugs shig /bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med mdzes pa dag byos
shig| lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas thams cad rgyas par byed du bcug go/ de
nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pa dang / rgyal po chen po'i mthus/ bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bsur song
ngo| |de nas bcom ldan 'das dul pa 'khor du ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra
bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral/ mdzes par 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang
po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi
tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo dmag gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam
mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshong dpon rang gi skye bos bskor ba lta bu/ rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs
kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los bsgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri
pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lus 'phags po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor
ba lta bu/ thag bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi
tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu rgya mtsho mi g.yo ba lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po che dam pa rgyags pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bsam g.yeng pa'i spyod
pa can/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong gi 'od zer
bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa gsum dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / thugs rje chen po
dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang po dang lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham ring byas te rgyal po'i khab kyi
grong khyer du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas
mnan pa de'i tshes rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / shar phyogs
mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho
na mtha' dma' bar gyur to/ /'jig rten 'di/ 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas pa thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /lhas kyang bar snang la rnga brdungs so/ /nam mkha'
la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / gur
gum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / gos dag 'thor bar byed de/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ de lta bu'i ya mtshan dag
byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang / dog pa dag ni/ yangs par gyur to/ /dma' ba dag ni/ mtho bar gyur to/ /mtho ba dag ni/ phya le bar gyur to/ /glang po che dag ni/ skad 'byin par gyur
to| |rta dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to/ /khyu mchog dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to/ /khyim gyi nang na bzhag pa'i snod sna tshogs dag ni/ ma brdungs par rang sgra 'byin par gyur te/ long
ba rnams kyis ni/ mig thob par gyur to/ /'on pa rnams ni/ rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ /lkugs pa rnams ni/ smra nus par gyur to/ /dbang po lhag ma ma tshang ba rnams ni/ dbang po so sor
thob par gyur to/ /chang gis myos pa rnams ni/ myos pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /dug 'thungs pa dag zhi bar gyur to/ /phan tshun 'khon byung ba rnams ni/ mdza'
bar gyur to/ /sbrum ma dag ni/ bde bar btsas par gyur to/ /btson du bcings pa dag ni/ thar par gyur to/ /nor med pa dag ni/ nor rnyed par gyur to/ /de lta bu'i 'byor pa de mthong nas/
dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yul gang zhig tu 'jig rten gtso bor gshegs pa der/ /lo nyes mi ngas dang ni phyi dgra'i 'jigs pa med/ /lha rnams char 'bebs
skye bo bsod nams rab tu byed/ /der ni ya mtshan rgya phrag gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/ skye bo'i tshogs dbugs phyung nas
rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste 'od ma'i tshal du gshegs so/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga
d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad ces bya
ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang /
snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi
gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/
zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de nas sangs rgyas la mngon par dga'
ba'i lha rnams kyis/ mi ngas de bskrad nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas sgra sgrog ces bya ba'i nang du byung ste yangs pa can du 'dug nas/ yangs pa can gyi skye bo'i
tshogs la mi ngas byung bar gyur te khyogs dang khyogs 'drud par gyur to/ /yangs pa can na bram ze mdun na 'don mda' bo che zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i rmi lam na/ yangs pa can na gnas
pa'i lha zhig gis smras pa/ gal te mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog /shAkya'i rigs dag pa yi bcom ldan 'das/ /yangs pa can du gshegs par gyur na ni/ /gnod pa rnams ni rnam par 'jig
par 'gyur/ /des nam langs nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya su zhig gtang zhes phan tshun bgro bar brtsams pa dang / mdun na 'don dma' bo che 'di nyid thams cad du nus pa
yin la/ bdag cag la byams pa yin gyi/ gtang ngo / /de la de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin nas/ bdag cag gi tshig gis bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas snyun gsol la zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di skad ces kyang gsol
cig |btsun pa/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs su gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ma gshegs na/ ring por mi thogs pa
kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur zhes gsol cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ni/ khyed la yun ring du
gnod pa byed pa'i phyir rgol ba dgra bor gyur pa yin pas/ bdag la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur grang / de dag gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yul 'khor gzhan dang 'gyed par yang //
pho nya mi gsod ces grag na/ /khyod ni rgyal ba'i pho nya yin/ /kun gyis mi gsod smos ci dgos/ /de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo che/ dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su
'gyur ba dag byas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de lam gyis dub pa bsal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du
yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mdun na 'don mda'
bo ches/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye go'u ta ma/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa
chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol lags
so| |mda' bo che khyod dang / yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur cig /kye go'u ta ma/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs su gsol/
gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ma gshegs na/ ring por mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stong shing ming tsam lus par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ mda' bo che/ 'dir nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs
pas rgyal po la rtogs shig /gal te rgyal pos gnang na/ nga de bzhin du gshegs par bya'o/ /des yangs pa can du bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'di skad ces gsung ngo / /zhes spring ngo / /
de rnams kyis kyang spring pa/ de nyid kyi phyir khyod lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song la son nas bdag cag gi tshig gis lus 'phags ma'i
bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang / bde ba la reg par gnas
sam zhes kyang dris la/ 'di skad ces/ lha/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das la rjes
su ma gnang na/ ring por mi thogs pa kho nar yangs par can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smros shig /de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches bsam pa/ ci/ re zhig rgyal po la
bsnyen par bya'am/ 'on te blon po rnams la bya snyam du bsam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'ga' zhig gi ngag las bsnyen par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bsnyen par byed pa la bsnyen par bya'o/
zhes 'byung bas/ mdor na/ blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya bar brtsams so/ /de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ mdun na 'don dgos
pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ kho bo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha la gsol ba 'debs su mchis kyi/ khyed cag gis grogs mdzod cig /de rnams kyis smras
pa| de bzhin du bya'i/ kho bo cag gis ji tsam na bos pa de'i tshe khyod shog cig/ de nas de dag gis skabs shes nas bos pa dang / de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo che/ lus 'phags ma'i
bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song ste son nas/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu
'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras
so| |lha/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ lha la gnod pa chung ngam/ reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba rgyas par snyun gsol lo/ /mda' bo che/ khyod dang / yangs pa can gyi tshogs
bde bar gyur cig /lha/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ 'di skad ces/ lha/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang ba mdzad du
gsol/ lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das la rjes su ma gnang na/ ring por mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/
mda' bo che/ kho bos yun ring mo zhig nas/ kye ma/ yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsam pa ste/ gal te yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs par gyur na/ kho bo yid
la bsam pa tshegs chung ngus rdzogs par ma gyur tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mda' bo che song ngo / /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gcig kyang yangs
su btang ba lta mchis sam/ shes ldan dag/ med do/ /de lta na/ lhas/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis so/ /lhas/ bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang yang rung /
ma gnang yang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ yangs pa can gyi sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gshegs par 'gyur ba nyid do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ kho bos ma shes kyi/ gal
te de ltar na khug cig /de dag gis mda' bo che bkug nas rgyal po smras pa/ mda' bo che/ kho bos dam bca' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su gnang bar bya'o/ /gal te kho bos bcom ldan
'das la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ji 'dra ba byas pa de kho na 'dra bar yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi bya na/ de lta na kho bos rjes su gnang ngo / /des/ yangs pa can rnams la rgyal pos 'di skad
ces gsung ngo / /zhes spring ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po mi gcig pur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / bkur sti byed na/ bdag cag tshogs su gyur pas ci ste mi bya zhes
de dag gis bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol cig dang / bdag cag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang ches khyad par 'phags pa'i mchod pa dang / bkur sti bgyi'o/ /zhes spring
ngo| |de nas mda' bo ches don de dag rgyal po la rig par byas so/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos
gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par spro lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la thugs
brtse bas gnang bar mi 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma
ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig
nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo / /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas
zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das la
gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni/ btul lags na/ btsun pa/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med/
'di| yun ring mo zhig nas bdag cag la sha 'khon ma mchis par ni/ sha 'khon bgyid/ 'gran zla ma mchis par ni/ 'gran zlar gyur/ gnod pa ma mchis par ni/ gnod pa bgyid par gyur
te| lo tog gang dag skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzon par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste klu'i rgyal po sog ma med legs par gdul bar gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i
rgyal po ma skyes dgra la yon bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs te gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo / /byang phyogs na ni/ phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ me
tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod snyoms mod pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs drang po yod do/ /zhes gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das
nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ rgyal po'i khab nas chu bo gang+gA'i bar gyi lam dang grong khyer
dag che thang du stor du bcug ste/ lam rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo thams cad bsal nas tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi pog phor
dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/ bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med khang dag byas so/ /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis/ chu bo gang+gA nas yangs pa can gyi bar du de
bas lhag par khyad par du 'phags par lam dang grong khyer dag stor du bcug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nA lan+da gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de
nas bcom ldan 'das dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ nA lan+dar byon nas/ nA lan+da na a mra'i tshal dgag dbye can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe nA lan+da
na kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa zhes bya ba/ rgas pa/ 'khogs pa/ gtugs pa/ btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa zhig gnas pa la/ nA lanada'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams pa kur sti
byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed de/ dgra bcom par bkur ro/ /de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa'i sngon gyi grogs po dang / blon po dang / gnyen dang / snag gi gnyen
mtshams su gyur pa'i lha gang yin pa de/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces/ drang srong khyod tshur shog /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /ces smras na/ gang yang bdag gi tshig mi snyan pa de srid pas ma la bdag de'i drung du song ste/ yid kyi dri ba 'dzin du gzhug go /snyam nas/ de nas lha de/ kun tu

rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas kun tu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong tshur shog /kho bo las yid kyi dri ba longs la kun chub par gyis shig /ji ltar
mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya/ ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya/ ci'i phyir spong / ji ltar nad med pa 'thob/ drang srong gang zhig
khyod kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa 'di dag tshig gis lung bstan pas sems rangs par byed pa de'i thad du khyod tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur

to| |de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pas/ lha de las yid kyi dri ba bzung ste kun chub par byas nas/ 'od srung rdzogs byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'od srung rdzogs byed kyi drung du/ yid kyi dri ba
yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
bzhin du'o/ /'od srung rdzogs byed kyis/ de'i yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par mi shes na/ lan glan pa lta smos kyang
ci dgos/ de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa/ 'di snyam du sems te/ 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis/ bdag gi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par
mi shes na/ lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam nas/ de kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka
ta'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i mdun du yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ ji ltar mdza' bo
ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gyis kyang / bdag gis yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa
rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par mi shes na/ lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba/ 'di snyam du sems
te/ gang la yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa 'di dag tshig gis lung bstan pa mi thob pa de 'dra ba'i rab tu byung bas bdag la ci zhig bya/ bdag gi nye du rnams la
longs spyod rgya cher yod pas/ ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa la yang longs spyod cing / sbyin pa yang gtang / bsod nams kyang bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /yang de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag/ dge
sbyong go'u ta ma gang na ba der 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de chas pa dang / yang bsam pa/ re zhig/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rgan rabs gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs byed nas gcer bu
pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ de rnams kyis re zhig yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par mi shes na/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ gzhon pa/
gsar du rab tu byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsam ste slar ldog par 'dod pa las/ yang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi kun tu rgyu rnying pa/ rgan po/ 'khogs pa/ spyod pa'i slob
dpon dag las bdag gis dge slong gzhon nu la brnyas par mi bya/ dge slong gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste/ dge slong gzhon nu yang de ni/ dbang che ba/ mthu che bar gyur pa yin no/ /
zhes thos so snyam du bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid kyi zhu ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ ji ltar mdza' bo ma
yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'thob ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis kun tu rgyu 'dam
bu'i tshong pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mdza' bo gzhan la rnam par smod byed cing / /de ni bdag tu zad do zhes
smra la| |las kyang sla rgu 'dam zhing byed pa da/ /bdag gi bshes ma yin par shes par bya/ /gang zhig bden pa ma yin tshig /mdza' bo dag la smra byed cing / /smra la las su mi byed
pa'ang / /mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs shes te/ /de lta bu ni/ mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par
rig par bya zhe na/ gang zhig rtag tu bdag med dbye ba yi/ /bsam pas glags lta de ni mdza' min gyi/ /gang zhig 'dir ni snying dang 'dra gyur par/ /gzhan gyis mi phyed de ni mdza' bo
yin| |de lta bu ni/ bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir spong zhe na/ skyes bu gces pa mthar 'byin cing / /'bras bu lta bar byed pa ni/ /rab tu dga' ba
bskyed pa'i gnas/ /rab bsngags 'dren pa'i zhi ba bsgom/ /de don du gnyer bar bsgom mo/ /ji ltar nad med 'thob ce na/ /rab tu dben pa'i ro dang ni/ /nye bar zhi ba'i ro shes nas/ /
chos la dga' ba'i ro 'thung ba/ /nad med sdig pa med par 'gyur/ /de ltar na/ nad med pa 'thob bo/ /de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta
ma'i thugs kyis ni/ bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen no/ /snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /go'u ta ma/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang
bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i spyan sngar bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshang pa legs
par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa des zhes bya ba nas sems shin tu rnam par
grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dmar bu can gyi
grong du 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
cig tu dmar bu can gyi grong khyer dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can na nub mo nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga dang / khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas/ lam ring po
'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to/ /bzhi po de dag /gang zhe na/ nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma
mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
ma shes/ ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ngas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad
de/ da ni/ srid pa gzhan med do/ /ngas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing
so sor rtogs pas/ srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/ da ni/ srid pa gzhan med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bde bar gshegs pas de
skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga dang khyed cag kho na yis/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag /ji lta ba bzhin ma mthong bas/ /lam ring
du ni 'khor bar gyur/ /bden pa de dag mthong nas ni/ /srid pa'i sred pa bcad nas su/ /'khor ba'i skye ba zad pas na/ /da ni srid pa gzhan med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /dmar bu can gyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so/ /dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim
bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas
kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyur 'phrad cing 'dus nas/ dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /lnga po 'di dag ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag/ 'di la/ bag med pa bag
med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i
rgyus| longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dang po yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag med pa
bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur
te| bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i
sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gnyis pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag med pa
bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rung / bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung / khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang rung / dge sbyong gi 'khor du'ang rung / 'khor gang
dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor de dang der zhum zhum por gyur nas dga' ba med pa dang / bag tsha bas 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/
gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas bag tsha bas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gsum pa'o/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag med
pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas bag med pa'i rgyus yid la gcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag med pa bag med pa la
gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag med pa bag med pa
la gnas pa'i rgyus/ lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag med pa bag
med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs
lnga pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /lnga po 'di dag ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/
longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa
'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon dang po yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ phyogs mtshams
su dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang
phyogs mtshams su dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no/ /bram
ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rung / bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung / khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang
rung / dge sbyong gi 'khor du'ang rung / 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der zhum zhum por ma yin pa dang / dga' ba dang / bag tsha ba med pas 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang
khyim bdag dag /bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus zhes bya ba nas bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon
gsum pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ yid la gcags pa med bar 'chi bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang
khyim bdag dag/ bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim
bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skyes par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag
dag |bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skyes par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon lnga pa
yin no/ /de nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi gnas su do mod bzhugs par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi grong
gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dbyar byed kyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ma ga d+ha'i
ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ dmar bu can gyi grong du gshegs nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs te/ de
la dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur sti byas so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rta rgod ma dang ldan pa'i shing rta thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs
nas| gser gyi bya ma bum dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs te/ bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / bram ze'i tshogs kyi mdun gyis bltas nas dmar bu can gyi grong
nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo / /de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas
kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar
'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i
bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang
dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab
tu dga' bar mdzad de/ cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs
tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna
chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas 'dug gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas 'dug gnas kyi phyi rol du zhabs
gnyis bkrus te 'dug gnas su zhugs nas/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go /bcom
ldan 'das 'dug gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na/ lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'phags pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba
mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te 'dug gnas nas byung nas 'dug gnas kyi grib ma la
dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod
kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig par brtson pa su yin ci thos/ btsun pa/ bdag gis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed lags par thos so/ /kun
dga' bo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed ni/ mkhas pa yin te/ 'di ltar/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig
bgros pa lta zhig /kun dga' bo/ /'di na nga 'dug gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na/ lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu
che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so/ /kun dga' bo/ /phyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis bres ba'i phyogs der 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi
phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang du lha bar ma dang phal bas gnas kyis bres pa'i phyogs der ni/ 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi phyir mi bar ma
dang phal pa rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir ni/ mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis bres pas phyogs 'dir 'di lta ste/ gnas
kyi phyir dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ ya rabs kyi gnas kyi gnas dang / ya rabs kyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang /
zong 'grem pa rnams kyi nang na yang 'di lta ste/ dmar bu can gyi grong khyer 'di mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ /'di la bar chad gsum 'byung bar rig par bya ste/ me dang / chu dang /
nang 'khrug gis so/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig
nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ gser gyi bya ma bum thogs te gsol ba 'debs shing spyan sngar 'dug go /'di skad ces kyang gsol te/ kye go'u ta ma/ sbyin pa 'di las bsod
nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi ci mchis pa de/ dmar bu can na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du
yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gang zag dad pa can/ /gang zhig lha
rnams mchod byed pa/ /ston pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa ste/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/ /mkhas shing yid ni gzhungs pa yis/ /gang gi phyogs su gnas 'cha' ba/ /
tshul khrims ldan pa bshos gsol nas/ /de yi 'og tu yon bsngo bya/ /de rnams rjed pas rjed 'gyur zhing / /mchod pas kyang ni mchod par 'gyur/ /de nas lto nas byung ba yin/ /bu la ma
bzhin 'di la brtse/ /lha rnams brtse bas skyes bus ni/ /bde ba bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la
chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs
te gshegs so/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis/ der rgyus lhag gang yin pa de thams cad sbyin par btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin
rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di snyam du sems te sems las mngon par 'du byed de/ bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo gang nas phyir gshegs pa de ni/ bdag
gis go'u ta ma'i sgo zhes gdags so/ /chu bo gang+gA'i 'jug ngogs gang nas brgal ba de yang go'u ta ma'i 'jug ngogs zhes gdags so/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga
d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ dmar bu can gyi grong gi dbus thog thag gshegs nas byang phyogs su rgyu ste chu bo gang+gA gang na bar gshegs so/ /de
nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar bya'o snyam du bsam nas/
rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ba dang / yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bsam pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i
rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la rang nyid lhag par spro bar gyur na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag gis spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de rnams kyis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs
lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / /klu rnams kyis bsam pa/ re zhig mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la lhag par spro bar gyur na/ bdag cag klu rnams
ni| rnam par ltung ba'i lus can yin na/ ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo /
rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsam pa/ re zhig mi bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong ba 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la lhag par spro
bar gyur na/ mngon sum du mthong ba bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug
gi steng du bzung ngo / /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsam pa/ lha dang mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la spro bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/
de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ji ltar/ 'di dag phyir zhing dad pa
mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab po/ /snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ji ltar/ re re'i yid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na bdag
gdugs 'dzin to/ /snyam pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya/ lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i
gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin
las ci zhig mdzad na/ des na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya/ lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis/ sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan na las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ /lus can rnams la
'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po/ mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/
rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/ legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po de la bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba zhig yod do/ /rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ bu btsas shing btsas pa
dag phyi bzhin khrid de 'khyam par byed do/ /btsun mo rnams kyis bsam pa/ rgyal po 'di'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ sras btsas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid nas 'khyam par mdzad pas
bdag cag bu yod bzhin du bu med pa dang 'dra'i/ da ni/ nad khrims shig bca' ste/ gal te bdag cag las 'ga' zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur na/ des rgyal po la gdags par
mi bya'o/ /zhes bcas so/ /ji tsam na/ btsun mo gzhan zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de de dag gis phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag ste/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /
khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs lta bu/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/
smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /ji tsam na/ chen por gyur pa dang / btsun mo de dag thams cad khye'u de la bu'i
sdug pa skyes so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu bdun pa/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling nas rin po che sna
bdun gyis sna drangs shing khams kyi rgyal phran stong gis yongs su bskor te/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas/ gzi brjid nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas
lhag par spa zhing 'ongs pa/ gzhon nu khang bzang gi steng na 'dug pa des mthong nas/ des ma la dris pa/ yum/ mchi ba pha bi su lags/ bu/ khyod kyi yab rgyal po legs mthong chen
po yin no/ /yum/ de 'das na/ bdag rgyal por 'gyur ram/ bu/ rgyal po de'i sras stong du gcig gis ma chang ba zhig yod pa de dag thams cad kyi phu bo gang yin pa de/ de 'das na
rgyal por 'gyur na/ khyod ni/ thams cad kyi nu bo yin no/ /des smras pa/ yum/ gal te de 'das na bdag rgyal por mi 'gyur na/ gnang bar mdzod cig dang / bdag dad pa yang dag pa
kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ bu/ khyod la bdag cag gi bu'i sdug pa nyams su myong gi /de ltar ma byed cig /yum/
gdon ma 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /de dag gis de gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas smras pa/ bu/ gal te de lta na/ dam zhig bcas nas gnang bar bya ste/ gang yang
khyod kyi yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs na/ de khyod kyis bdag cag la smros shig /de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de de dag gis gnang nas/ de mtha' gcig tu song ste mkhan po dang slob dpon med
par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtswa bdun gyi chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa/ bdag gis ma de rnams la khas blangs pa smra dgos pas/
song la sngon gyi dam bcas pa mthar dbyung ngo / /snyam nas/ bdag nyid chen po de dag ni/ ngag gis chos mi ston gyi/ lus kyis yin pas/ des de rnams kyi mdun du 'bar ba dang / gsal ba
dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa dag gi cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo ni/ rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas/ de dag shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin
rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam/ rtogs so/ /'phags pa/ khyod ni/ bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la/
bdag cag kyang bsod nams 'tshal ba lags na/ khyod 'di nyid du skyed mos tshal du bzhugs shig dang / bdag cag gis rgyun du bsod snyoms dbul
bar bgyi'o/ /rang sangs rgyas des khas blangs nas/ de dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so/ /rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa/ bdag gi lus
rnag can 'dis/ bya ba gang yin pa de ni byas kyi/ ma la bdag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go /snyam nas/ de nas de ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma
brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag kyang bstan nas phung po lhag ma
med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs so/ /de nas de dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs te/ spungs nas bsregs te me'i phung po de 'o mas bsad nas rus pa
de dag /gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste skyed mos tshal de nyid du rus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ mgul gdub dang / gdu bu rgyan can dang / gzhan yang / rgyan rnam pa sna
tshogs kyis brgyan cing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag btsugs so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nas

sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / bya ko ki la dang / shang shang te'u skad 'byin pa'i
tshal gseb tu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir song nas de skyed mos tshal du 'khyams pa las/ dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten de mthong ngo / /des skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mi la smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ 'di
ci yin/ des smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis ni/ ma 'tshal te/ 'on kyang 'di'i don ni/ btsun mos 'tshal to/ /de nas des btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa dang / de dag gis rkang pa gnyis
la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/ /des smras pa/ de bzhin du sbyin no/ /de dag gis skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed cag gis/ bu rgyal
srid la mngon par dga' na/ de kho bo la ma gsol ba bzang po ma yin pa zhig byas so/ /gal te gsol bar gyur pa dang / kho bo de kho na la rgyal srid dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur
ba zhig /'on kyang ngas bdag nyid chen po de mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs gdags so/ /zhes de nas de bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi
mchod rten de la gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs rnams btags so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po chen po legs mthong gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid
yin no/ /gang yang ngas de na bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs btags te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ ngas

'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byas so/ /las de kho na'i lhag mas/ da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyis rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs nyis
stong lnga brgya/ dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur to/ /gal te/ ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu ma rtogs par gyur na/ gzhan du yang / ngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong
lnga brgya byed par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ nga'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can gang yin pa de/ ngas nyan thos rnams kyi longs spyod du rnam par smin par bsngos te/ gal te mu tig bre gang
gis 'bras bre gang khugs kyang / 'on kyang nga'i nyan thos rnams ni/ bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par
smin pa ni/ gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsam par bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /lus 'phags ma'i bu/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras
gru zam 'jugs su bcug pa dang / yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gru zam btsugs so/ /klu rnams kyis bsam pa/ bdag cag klu rnams ni/
rna ma par ltung ba'i lus can yin pas/ ma la bdag cag gis gdengs ka'i zam pas/ bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gA las bsgral bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de rnams kyis gdengs ka'i zam pa btsugs
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed cag las/ gang zhig lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam
las chu bo gang+gA brgal bar spro ba de ni/ de las rgol cig /gang zhig yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis gru zam btsugs pa las spro ba gang yin pa de yang / de las rgol cig /nga yang dge
slong kun dga' bo dang thabs cig klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las chu bo gang+gA brgal bar bya'o/ /de na kha cig ni/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las
brgal to/ /kha cig ni/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi gru zam las so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las
brgal to/ /de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kha cig zam pa btsugs nas chu bran bor te rgya mtsho brgal/ /skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye bo
rnams chu brgal/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bram ze brgal bar gyur nas skam la bzhugs/ /dge slong dag 'dir khrus byed nyan thos rnams ni gzings 'cha' na/
gal te kun na chu yod khron pa'i chus ni ci zhig bya/ /sred pa'i rtsa ba bcad nas su zhig spyod pa tshol bar byed/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa phyogs gzhan zhig na mtho zhing mtho ba'i sa
phyogs shig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod rgyal po sgra chen gyi lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la/
sbom du 'dom drug cu yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig yod de/ sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas chu bo gang+gA'i nang du bor ba
gang yin pa de/ lta bar 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ba de'i dus la bab lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de'i tshod la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mchod
sdong de bsgrengs na/ dge slong rnams lta bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / dra bas 'brel pa/ bsod
nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'i phyag gis sa la reg par mdzad pa dang / klu rnams kyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i
phyir sa la reg par mdzad snyam na/ mchod sdong gzigs par bzhed par mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis bsgrengs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mchod sdong lta bar brtsams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
legs ldan ni/ 'dod pa chung ba yin pas mtha' gcig tu song nas phyag dar khrod pa dag 'tshem mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mchod
sdong nub par 'gyur gyi/ rtags zungs shig /ces pa las/ de nub par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong rnams mchod sdong la
lta ba bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni/ 'dod pa chung bas mtha' gcig tu mchis nas phyag dar khrod pa 'tshem pa la gzigs/ ci lags/ re zhig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad
du'am/ 'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags/ gal te re zhig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du lags na ni/ /gzhan yang / 'dod chags bral ba zhig mchis lags so/ /'on te sngon
bsten pa'i slad du lags na ni/ 'dis gang du bsten lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yang yin la/ sngon bsten pa'i phyir
yang yin no/ /'dis sngon gang du bsten lags/ dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba rgyal po rab sgrog ces bya ba zhig byung ste/ de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang grogs por gyur to/ /de bu 'dod kyang bu
