med nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/ nor rdzas mang po zhig bsags na/ bdag la bu med pas/ bdag shi na rgyal
po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /de nas brgya byin gyis mthong nas dris pa/ grogs po/ khyod ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug/
des smras pa/ ko'u shi ka/ nor rdzas 'di snyed cig bsags na/ bdag la bu med pas/ bdag shi na rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur bas so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po/
khyod sems khong du chud par ma byed cig /gal te lha'i bu 'ga' zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos byung bar gyur na/ de khyod kyi bur bsko bar bya'o/ /chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'chi 'pho'i chos 'byung
ba la ni/ ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gos ma rnying pa rnams rnying par 'gyur ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba ma rnying pa dag rnying par 'gyur ba dang / lus las dri mi zhim pa 'byung bar 'gyur
ba dang / mchan khung gnyis nas rdul 'dzag pa dang / rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/ /ji tsam na/ lha'i bu zhig la snga ltas lnga byung bar gyur nas/ de la lha'i dbang po brgya
byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po/ rgyal po rab sgrog gi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor cig /des smras pa/ ko'u shi ka/ de ni/ bag med pa'i gnas yin te/ ko'u shi ka/
rgyal po rnams ni/ nyes pa mang po byed pa yin pas/ chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur na/ mi rung ngo / /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po khyod la ngas dran
par bya'o/ /ko'u shi ka/ lha rnams ni/ dga' ba mang pos bag med pa yin no/ /grogs po de ni/ bden na/ 'on kyang kho bos khyod la dran par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po rab sgrog gi btsun mo dam pa'i

mngal du nying mtshams sbyar to/ /gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams blangs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas te
zhes bya ba nas sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de'i nye du dag 'dus shing tshogs nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags/ gnyen rnams kyis smras

pa| gang gi nyi ma kho na la khye'u 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur pas/ de bas na/ khye'u'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes de'i
ming sgra chen zhes bya bar btags te/ khye'u sgra chen ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas zhes bya ba nas brtag pa brgyad dang / dbye ba dang / klog pa la mkhas shing shes nyen can du gyur to/ /zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur cing / yul gyi dbang phyug dang / mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan
nas gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta'i thabs
dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / lcags kyu'i sgyur thabs dang / zhags pas gdab pa dang / mda' bo che 'phen pa dang / dbyug
pas brdeg pa dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gom stangs dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba dang / dbyug pa dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra drag par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / mi
tshor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dag ste/ gnas lnga po/ de rnams la shin tu byang bar gyur to/ /chos nyid kyis/ re zhig pha ji tsam gson gyi bar du bu'i ming mi grags pa yin no/ /
dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po rab sgrog shi nas sgra chen rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang / des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal
srid byed du bcug par gyur to/ /de nas brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po/ kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrog gi bur bskos te/ chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig /sems
can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgos sam/ des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas slar yang chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du
bcug par gyur to/ /lan gnyis su yang brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po/ kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrog gi bur bskos te/ chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig /sems can
dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgos sam/ des smras pa/ ko'u shi ka/ bdag cag rgyal po rnams ni/ dga' ba mang pos bag med pas skad cig tu brjed par 'gyur gyi/ bdag
la khyod kyis mtshan ma zhig zhog cig dang / bdag gis mthong nas nges par sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bgyi'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu las thams cad pa
la bsgo ba/ las thams cad pa/ song la khyod kyis rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang / lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod pa/ sbom du 'dom drug cu yod pa/ thams
cad gser las byas shing / rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul cig /de nas lha'i bu las thams cad pas rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang / lha'i mchod sdong
srid du 'dom stong yod pa/ sbom du 'dom drug cu yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul to/ /de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis mchod sbyin gyi khang
ba rtsig tu bcug nas rang gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba mchod sdong gi zhal ta bar bzhag go/ de nas mchod sdong la 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mi thams cad lta bar spro bas lhags
nas/ zan zos shing mchod sdong lta bas rang gi las sgrub par mi byed do/ /de nas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad byas pas rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin ming du
par gyur to/ /blon po rnams kyis dpya nyung du phul ba dang / rgyal po sgra chen gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci'i phyir dpya nyung zad cig dbul/ lha/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i
skye bo'i tshogs mchis nas 'tshal ma 'tshal zhing mchod sdong la lta zhing mchis te/ rang gi las grub par mi bgyid pas/ zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas/ dpya thang
bzhin mi 'du lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ mchod sbyin gyi khang pa drol cig /de rnams kyis de dral na yang de bzhin du skye bo'i tshogs de rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas za zhing mchod
sdong la rtog cing 'dug ste/ rang gi las sgrub par mi byed pas/ zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad byas pas de bzhin rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'du bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos dris
pa| shes ldan dag /mchod sbyin gyi khang pa dral na/ ci phyir da dung dpya nyung bar gyur/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ skye bo'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas 'tshal zhing
mchod sdong la rtog cing mchis te/ rang gi las sgrub par mi bgyid pas/ zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas des na dpya nyung bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis

sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas mchod sdong de chu bo gang+gA'i nang du bor ro/ /dge slong dag /de ji snyam du sems/ rgyal po rab sgrog gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong
legs ldan 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis sngon 'di bsten to/ /btsun pa/ mchod sdong 'di gang du zhig par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ma 'ongs pa na mi

rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur te/ mi tshe lo brgyad khri ba rnams kyi rgyal po dung zhes bya ba yang dag par sdom pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa

chos kyi rgyal po/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che
dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni/ blon po rin po che nyid do/ /de la/ bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi
gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par ba sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa
'di nyid 'tshe ba med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dung gi mdun na 'don bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe zhes
bya ba zhig 'byung ste/ de'i chung ma ni/ tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ngo / /de byams pa chad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas pas/ bu byams
pa zhes bya ba zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe/ bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go /des bram ze'i khye'u de rnams byams pa la
gtad nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas/ bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri po rnams/ bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis gter chen po bzhi
po| ka ling+ka nas dmar ser te/ /mi thi la nas skya bo'o/ /sa 'dzin nas ni e la'i 'dab/ /wA ra NA si'i grong na dung / /mchod sdong 'di yang khyer nas rgyal po dung la dbul bar 'gyur ro/ /
rgyal po dung gis kyang bram ze tshangs pa'i che la sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshes kyang bram ze'i khye'u byams pa la'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u byams pas kyang bram ze'i khye'u de rnams
la'o| |de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis mchod sdong de dum bu dum bur bcad nas 'gyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas/ mchod sdong de'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas
de nyid kyis skyo ba skyes nas nags su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi nyi ma kho na la lags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la byams pa tshad med pa'i yang lag gis rgyas par byas nas bla na med
pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mtshan/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//

gang gi nyi ma kho na la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba de kho na'i nyi ma la rgyal po dung gi rin po che sna bdun nub par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po

dung yang khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri'i 'khor dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i chung ma rin po che sa ga

zhes bya ba yang / bud med brgyad khri'i 'khor dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe yang /
bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri'i 'khor dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas byams pa/ 'khor dge slong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang ri bya gag rkang gang na ba der gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de na dge slong 'od srung gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa 'dug pas/ ri bya
gag rkang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la kha dbye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas/ dge slong 'od srung gi
rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa phyag g.yas pas blangs nas/ phyag g.yon par bzhag ste nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces/ dge slong dag /skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo
brgya thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du byung ba de'i nyan thos rnams las chog shes pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mchog ni/ 'od srung
yin no/ /zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'di yin te/ shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i bstan pa yang 'dis yang dag par bsdus so/ /zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de
rnams kyis mthong nas skyo ba skyes te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus kyis ji ltar 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs thob par gyur snyam nas/ de rnams skyo ba skyes pa de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa mngon
sum du byed par 'gyur te/ 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dgra bcom pa nyid dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan mngon du bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /mchod sdong de ni/ der zhig par 'gyur
ro| |btsun pa/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis dkon mchog gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so/ /bcom
ldan 'das gang du smon lam btab lags/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ yul dbus su rgyal po gos sbyin zhes bya ba/ 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang /
skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog rnams

phun sum tshogs par 'gyur to/ /byang phyogs na rgyal po nor ldan zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du
'jug go/ /de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur to/ /ji tsam dus
gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyi mdun na 'don las khye'u spyi gtsug rin po ches brgyan pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ de'i ming rin chen gtsug tor can zhes
btags so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas skye ba skyes te nags su song ngo / /gang gi nyi ma kho na la nags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la des bla
na med pa'i ye shes thob nas de'i ming yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de
nas gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po nor ldan steng gi khag bzang gi gzhir song ste blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug go/ /de blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga'i ci 'dra ba de
ltar rgyal po gzhan 'ga'i yul na 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dang / shing rnams me
tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ yul dbus nas tshong pa zong thogs te
byang phyogs su 'ongs pa de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ yul dbus na rgyal po gos sbyin zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis so/ /rgyal po nor ldan gyis thos ma thag tu mi bzod pa chen po skyes te/
de mi bzod pa skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig dang yul 'khor gzhom par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan dpung
gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che pa'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ yul dbus su dong nas chu bo gang+gA'i
lho phyogs kyi 'gram du 'khod do/ /rgyal po gos sbyin gyis/ rgyal po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che pa'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs
dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ yul dbus su 'ongs te chu bo gang+gA'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram na 'khod do/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag
bzhi pa/ glang po che ba'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ chu bo gang+gA'i byang phyogs kyi 'gram na 'dug go /de nas yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis/ de gnyis kyi 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram du nub mo nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i
tshe| brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams/ yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de rnams kyi kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen po byung bar gyur pa/ rgyal po nor ldan gyis mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la dris pa/
shes ldan dag /rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul na snang ba chen po byung ba 'di/ ci yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
chen gtsug tor can byung ste/ de la blta ba'i phyir brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa mchis pa des na/ snang ba chen po 'di byung ste/ de ni/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing
mthu che ba lags pas/ 'di ni/ de'i mthu lags so/ /rgyal po nor ldan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gi yul du gang la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong
ba'i rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing de lta bu byung ba de la/ bdag gis gnod pa ci 'dra ba zhig bya zhes/ des de la pho nya btang ste/ grogs po khyod la bdag cung zad kyang mi byed kyi/ tshur spyon/
khyod ni/ bsod nams kyi mthu chen po can zhig pas khyod kyi yul na gang la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba/ rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing / yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can bzhugs so/ /'on kyang khyod kyi mgul nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/ de lta na/ bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes
spring ngo / /rgyal po gos sbyin yid ma ches nas/ de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag la rgyal po nor ldan gyis spring pa/ grogs po sdug pa khyod la bdag cag ci yang mi byed kyi/ tshur shog /khyod kyi mgul pa
nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/ de lta na/ bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur zhes mchi na/ de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po song zhig dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi'am/
rgyal po chen po/ rgyal po dpung chen po rnams la ni/ gtugs par bya dgos so/ /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can
gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas chas te/ rgyal po nor ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po nor ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyi mgul pa
nas 'khyud de yid gcugs par byas te btang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ rgyal po thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa'i rgyal po gang lags/
rgyal po chen po/ 'khor los bsgyur ba yin no/ /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug
tor can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal
po gos sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /sta
gon byas te/ nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol
pa| btsun pa/ gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug
tor can snga dro sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas rgyal po
gos sbyin gyi bkad sa ga na ba der gshegs te/ byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / rang gi lag nas stob
cing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ btsun pa/ sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
'dis| bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cig ces smras nas/ de ma thag tu dung yang bus so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal
po gos sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khyod/ skye rgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dung zhes bya bar 'gyur
ro| |de nas skad chen po'i sgra dag byung ngo / /rgyal po nor ldan gyis ca co'i sgra dag thos nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /rgyal po gos sbyin gyi/ yul na ca co'i sgra grags
pa de| ci zhig yin/ de rnams kyis legs par brtags nas smras pa/ lha/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po gos sbyin 'khor los bsgyur
ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas/ des na/ ca co'i sgra grags pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po nor ldan gyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
pa| 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi ba gang lags/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas yin no/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba de logs su thal
mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du
gsol| yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po nor ldan la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag/
sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod
gsol pa/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
chen gtsug tor can snga dro sham thabs mnams/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun
gyis bltas te rgyal po nor ldan gyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba
dag /rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po chen gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ 'jig rten 'di dag thams
cad la byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten gyi ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces btab bo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
po khyod/ skye rgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ smon lam
gyi dbang gis dkon mchog gnyis gcig car 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ grong spyil
bu can zhes bya ba gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yul

spong byed ces bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / grong spyil bu can du byon te grong spyil bu can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi shiM sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'di dag ni/ tshul khrims yin no/ /'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin yin no/ /'di ni/ shes rab yin no/ /dge slong dag/ tshul khrims goms
par byas na/ ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin goms par byas na/ shes rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab goms par byas na/ 'di lta ste/
'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag las sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos
kyis ni/ bdag gi zag pa ni/ zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni/ bsten to/ /bya ba ni/ byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes yang dag pa kho
nar shes par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ sgra can gang na ba der 'dod ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang sgra can du byon nas/ sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrog gi gnas na bzhugs so//
de'i tshe sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung nas/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi/ nye ba dang / lhag par brtson pa dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes
dang / yid 'ong dang / nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin tu bzang dang / grags pa dang / grags byin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang
po snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bas sgra can
gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung ste/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi/ nye ba dang / lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang / yid 'ong dang
nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin tu bzang dang / grags pa dang / grags sbyin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang sgra can du bsod snyoms
la rgyus te/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing / lhung bzed dang chos gos 'khos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas
lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang pos 'dir snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas sgra can du bsod
snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ btsun pa/ bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/ sgra can 'dir skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung nas/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen
brtan pa yang gum/ nye ba dang / lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang / yid 'ong dang / nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin
tu bzang ba dang / grags pa dang / grags sbyin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang gum mo/ /zhes thos lags na/ btsun pa/ de rnams kyi 'gro ba ni/
gang | skye ba ni/ gang / mngon du 'gro ba ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge bsnyen brtan pa ni/ tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs
pas rdzus te skyes te/ /der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /nye ba dang / lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i
khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang / yid 'ong dang / nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin tu bzang dang / grags pa dang / grags sbyin dang / dge bsnyen grags
mchog kyang tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas rdzus te skyes te/ der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi
'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen nyis brgya lnga bcu lhag cig shi ba de dag kyang tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas rdzus te skyes
te| der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen sum
brgya shi ba de dag ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum yang spangs la/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag kyang bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin te/ 'jig rten 'dir
lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /grong khyer sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen lnga brgya lhag cig shi ba de dag ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs

pas rgyun du zhugs pa/ rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gzhol ba/ re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa yin te/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams
sbyar zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /khyed dus las 'das shing shi bar gyur pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
pa la mtho 'tsham pa yin te/ des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang skye ba yod na 'chi ba'i dus byed pa yin te/ ngo mtshar ci zhig yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings 'di ni/ gnas pa ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mngon par mkhyen pas mngon
par byang chub nas gsungs te/ 'dogs par mdzad/ rab tu 'jog par mdzad/ rnam par 'byed par mdzad/ rnam par 'grel bar mdzad/ gsal bar mdzad/ 'chad par mdzad/ yang
dag par rab tu 'chad par mdzad pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pas 'di skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i
rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched
drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis
rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen
po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'di med na 'di mi 'byung la/ 'di 'gag na 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gag pas 'du byed 'gag /
'du byed 'gag pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gag pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gag pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gag
pas reg pa 'gag /reg pa 'gag pas tshor ba 'gag /tshor ba 'gag pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gag pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gag pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gag
pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gag pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ sdug
bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /'on kyang khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyi/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
zungs shig dang bshad do/ /chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa ni/ chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin
no| |'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims ni/ chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/ ngas khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do/ /zhes gang gsungs pa bshad
pa ni/ de yin no/ /a mra skyong mas/ bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sgra can du byon nas sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrog gi gnas na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /
thos nas kyang a mra skyong ma de la/ ne tso bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba mi skad shes pa zhig yod de/ ne tso bzhin rgyas la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzhin rgyas tshur shog /khyod bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der song la phyin nas/ kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/
gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang / bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces/ a mra skyong ma'i mchid nas/ btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ thog mar bdag gi a mra'i tshal du gshegs par gsol zhes kyang gsol cig /de nas ne tso bzhin
rgyas kyis a mra skyong ma'i ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba de/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi'i khye'u dag gis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ne
tso 'gro ba 'di ni/ smad 'tshong ma'i yin no/ /zhes de dag gis de la mda' 'phangs par brtsams pa na/ de yang de dag gi steng du babs so/ /de nas ne tso des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
yul 'khor gzhan dang 'gyed par yang / /pho nya mi gsod ces grags na/ bdag lta rgyal ba'i pho nya bas/ lus can kun gyis ga la gsod/ /de rnams kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de
smras pa/ khyod kyi tshig gis mda' 'phangs pa'ang / /ldog na bdag cag smos ci dgos/ /khyod ni rdzu 'phrul ches bskyabs pas/ /'jigs pa med par 'gro bar gyis/ /de nas ne tso bzhin
rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la a mra skyong ma mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs
dang / bde ba la reg par gnas zhes snyun gsol lags so/ /bzhin rgyas/ khyod dang a mra skyong ma bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa/ a mra skyong ma'i mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das nam yangs
pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ thog mar bdag gi a mra'i tshal du gshegs su gsol/ /zhes de skad mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ne tso bzhin
rgyas la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa bskyed nas song ba las ring po ma lon pa kho nar 'ol bas srog dang phral te dus byas nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so/ /chos nyid kyis/ skyes nas ring por ma lon pa'i lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo ni/ sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang /
las gang gis yin pa'o/ /des bltas nas/ dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pas so/ /
de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/ bdag rigs pa ma yin gyi/
ci nas kyang bdag zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs shing /
se mo do dang / do shal gyis lus brgyan nas de nyid kyi nub mo lha rnams kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba'i me tog gis thu ba bkang
nas| shin tu 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog gis/ de'i nub mo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de'i tshe sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen pos sgra sgrog gi 'dug gnas thams cad gsal bar gyur to// //
'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de
dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas/ ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho
ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa/ 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la mas
ma bgyis te/ phas ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang / /gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang /
bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams nas ni/ rkang pa drangs/ lha dang mi
rnams la ni/ rab tu bzhag /'khor ba las ni/ ring du mdzad/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni/ bkum/ mtho
ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni/ phye/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu mngon sum du bgyis lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag /bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi
lags kyi/ bdag /dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ /deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i
bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas/ tshong pa zong rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul ngor
rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa bzhin du/ 'byor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yangs pa can gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /a mra
skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi bdag gi a mra'i tshal kho na na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyan
thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas yangs pa can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ des ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan
'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang / yang dge slong rnams
la bka' stsal pa/ a mra skyong ma pha bi 'ong gi/ brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig /ngas rjes su bstan pa ni/ 'di yin no/ /ji ltar na/ dge
slong brtson 'grus la gnas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la/ dge slong gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin
to| |rab tu 'jog go/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /rab tu 'jog go/ /dge ba'i chos
ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /rab tu 'jog go/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / nyams par mi

'gyur ba dang / goms pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba dang / ye shes rgya chen po mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems
rab tu 'dzin cing rab tu 'jog pa ste/ de ltar na/ dge slong brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ dge slong shes bzhin can yin zhe na/ 'di la/ dge slong gis 'gro ba dang ldog pa la shes bzhin
gyis gnas shing lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang pa dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa dang / 'gro ba dang /
'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid ma log pa dang / smra ba dang / mi smra ba dang / gnyid kyis snyoms pas dub pa rnams la shes bzhin gyis gnas pa ste/ de ltar na/ dge
slong shes bzhin can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la/ dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran
pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/ /phyi'i lus dang / nang dang phyi'i lus dang / nang gi tshor ba rnams dang / phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / nang
dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / nang dang phyi'i sems dang / nang gi chos rnams dang / phyi'i chos rnams dang / nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes
su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang yi mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/ de ltar na/ dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa
yin no/ /dge slong dag /ngas a mra skyong ma pha bi 'ong gi/ brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan par gnas par gyis shig /ngas rjes su bstan pa ni/ 'di yin no/ /zhes
ngas gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni/ de yin no/ /de nas a mra skyong ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par
mdzad| yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin
tu bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas a mra skyong ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
bcom ldan 'das 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi
sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das cang
mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis/ bcom
ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / yangs pa can du byon te yangs pa can gyi a mra skyong ma'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos
nas kyang so so nas shing rta dang rta rnams la zhon te/ kha cig ni/ rta sngon po dang / shing rta sngon po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag sngon po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs dang / ral gri
shubs sngon po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa sngon po dang / 'khor sngon po/ kha cig ni/ rta ser po dang / shing rta ser po dang / srab skyogs dang /
lcag ser po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs dang / ral gri shubs ser po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa ser po dang / 'khor ser po/ kha cig
ni| rta dmar po dang / shing rta dmar po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag dmar po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs dang / ral gri shubs dmar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /
gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa dmar po dang / 'khor dmar po/ kha cig ni/ rta dkar po dang / shing rta dkar po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag dkar po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs
dang / ral gri shubs dkar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa dkar po dang / 'khor dkar por chas te/ skad mthon po dang / skad chen por slar
khyed| slar khyed ces zer zhing yangs pa can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can
gyi li tsa byi rnams rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed cag las/ sus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed

mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro ba ma mthong ba de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la ltos shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi yangs pa can
gyi li tsa byi dag bzhin du rdzu 'phrul 'di dang / 'byor pa 'di dang / cha lugs 'dis skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro'o/ /ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/ bzhon pa las
babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston
par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de'i tshe bram
ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ spobs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag ni/ spobs lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ser skya'i bu/ khyod spobs par gyis shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ang+ga'i
rgyal po nor bu'i go 'chang ba/ /ma ga'i rgyal pos rnyed pa rab rnyed de/ /de yi yul du byung ba'i sangs rgyas ni/ /grags pa'i sgra dag gangs kyi ri bo bzhin/ /ji ltar pad+ma bzang po legs
'khrungs pa/ /dgongs ka kha bye dri zhim ldan pa bzhin/ /bar snang la ni nyi ma lhag ge bar/ /snang ba lta bur nyi ma'i rgyud la ltos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab stobs/ /ji
ltar mtshan mo me 'bar lta bu ltos/ /de ni mig byed snang bar byed pa ste/ lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom rnam par 'dul/ /le tsa byi lnga brgyas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras
so| |bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so/ /zhes bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir byin no/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos
phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ gnas 'jog dag /nga sngar a mra skyong mas spyan drangs so/ /btsun pa/ a mra skyong ma
dman pa/ shes rab dman pa des/ bdag cag bslus lags te/ des na/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das thog ma nyid du blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi ba'i rngo ma thogs
mod kyi/ da dung yang bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dag 'dun la bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gnas 'jog /de ni/ legs par smras so/ /zhes
bka' stsal to/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas dong ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu ni/ de nyid du 'dug go /de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams dong nas
ring po ma lon par shes nas stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'dir bdag la li tsa byi lnga brgyas bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir stsal ba 'di dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs
brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bla gos lnga brgya bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
rnam pa lnga/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ ser skya'i bu/ 'di la/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig
rten du 'byung zhing / de chos thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su
byang ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ston par 'gyur te/ ser skya'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad
du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang po yin no/ /gang dag chos de zhes dang bcas pas nyan cing bla mar byed/ dam par byed/ yid la byed cing sems rtse gcig tu rna ba blags nas
sems thams cad bsdus nas nyan par byed pa 'di ni/ ser skya'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung
ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gnyis pa yin no/ /chos de gang dag gis thos nas de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa 'di ni/ ser skya'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gsum pa yin no/ /chos de gang dag gis thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / nges par
'byung ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba rgya chen po 'thob pa 'di ni/ ser skya'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung
ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba bzhi pa yin no/ /chos de gang gis thos nas don zab mo'i gzhi shes rab kyis so sor rtog par byed pa 'di ni/ ser skya'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba lnga pa yin no/ /ser skya'i bu/ skyes bu
dam pa dag ni/ byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba can yin no/ /de dag cung zad tsam byas na yang chud gzon par mi byed na/ mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de lta bas na/ ser skya'i bu/ khyod kyis
'di ltar byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba can du bslab par bya ste/ cung zad tsam byas na yang chud mi gzon na/ mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ ser skya'i bu/ khyod kyis de lta bur bslab
par bya'o/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas a mra skyong mas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /sta gon byas te/ nang par sngar langs nas gdan
bshams te nor bu'i chu snod dag bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol ba/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod bshams lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ da de'i dus
la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs man pas/ lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos dag bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas/ a mra skyong ma'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//
de nas a mra skyong mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par
byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gis lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung
bzed gyu bar rig nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong mas sbyin pa phul ba de la rjes
su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang par mdzad de/ sbyin la dga' 'gyur skye bo sten byed na/ /snyan pa thob cing de yi grags pa 'phel/ /ser sna med cing tshogs par 'gro ba dang / /zhum par mi 'gyur
'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa bde 'dod pas/ /ser sna'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa gtong / /de dag yun ring sum cu rtsa gsum gnas/ /lha rnams dang ni skal pa mnyam par
dga'/ /sbyin gtong dge byed de ni shi 'phos nas/ /rang gi 'od kyis dga' ba'i tshal na rgyu/ /de na de gnyis rtse zhing dga' byed pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag dang ldan/ /ma bcings skyob pa
de yi gsung thos nas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos mtho ris dga'/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ stan las langs te song ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams
cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na gal te lha rnams su skyes na yang lha mthu che bar gyur la/
gal te mi rnams su skyes na yang mi mthu chen por gyur cing / da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dper yang bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/
'di dag nyid kyis/ las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam
par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i
phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu
dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung

zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/ de 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang grong khyer wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na nye bar bsten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe wa ra NA si na dge bsnyen lnga

brgya gnas so/ /de rnams kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rim gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis rin po che'i

gling du phyin to/ /de nas rin po che rnams kyis gru bo che yongs su bkang nas chas pa dang / de nas rlung gis bdas nas rgya mtsho chen po'i gling zhig tu phyin to/ /de rnams bred cing re ba med par gyur nas/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir bye ma las mchod rten byas nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byas so/ /de nas gnyid log pa dang / lha zhig gis smras pa/ khyed cag ma
'jigs par bag yod par byos shig dang / zhag bdun gyi nyin par dus rlabs 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de nas khyed cag bde legs su 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur
ro| |nam nangs nas de rnams phan tshun du smra zhing gros bya bar brtsams te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag la lhas mi 'jigs pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas 'od srung gi mthus yin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bdag cag gis rin po che phul ba dag slar blangs te 'dong ba ni/ mi rigs so/ /zhes de
rnams kyis gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa la
bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ gal te bdag cag lha rnams su skyes par gyur na/ bdag cag mthu che ba kho nar gyur cig /gal te mi'i nang du mi rnams su skyes par gyur na/ mthu
che ba dang / mi rnams su skyes na yang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi dper rung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag
ni| li tsa byi lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir bye ma'i mchod rten byas shing rin po che dag gis mchod pa byas pas/
des na mi mthu chen po rnams su skyes par gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yang dper rung bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par
smin pa ni/ gcig tu gnag pa yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi 'dren ma yin/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig tu dkar ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ gang yang las gcig tu
gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni/ spongs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer du song la sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog la/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di smros
shig| bi sa ra ta/ bi sar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis dgongs pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsam pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsam pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsam pa/ bden pa'i tshig smra ba thams cad kyis bsam pa/
chos rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsam pa/ tshangs pas bsam pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsam pa/ dbang pos bsam pa/ lhas bsam pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsam
pa| lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsam pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsam pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsam pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi

sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ yams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'dug par gyur cig /nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/
nir gats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs te/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams

dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin brgya
stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/ de dag gis

khyed rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyi/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni/ brlag
par gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'dod pa de dag ni/ 'khod cig /dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la
thugs brtse ba can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /su mu su mu/ /su mu su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mi ri mi ri

mi ri mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/

rI rI rI rI rI rI ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri ti/ ha sa/ mi ri mi ri ti/ mi rI mi rI/ sI sI mi/ kang+ka ra/ kang+ka ra ta/ kang+ka ra ta/ kang+ka ra ta/ kang+ka ra ta/ ka tsA kang+ka rA kang+ka ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/

kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA ti/ ku rI she/ kang+ka rI she/ kang+ka rI she/ ri ri ri ri ri/ re phA sA ri/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu ri phu ri phu ri phu/ nA thA nA thA thA/ ri phu ri phu/ nA thA thA nir rir gats+tsha ta/ ri
phu ri phu/ nir gats+tsha ta/ pa la ya te/ ri phu ri phu/ pa la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs
rje dang dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs te/ lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi bla ma sangs rgyas kyis chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig grub
ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang gis sred pa'i chags pa dag /rnam par bcom nas 'dul mdzad pa/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur
'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi
rten| |sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu
gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi skyob gyur pa/ /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la
bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing sa ba mi mnga' ba/ /gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo
chen po gang skyes pas/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams dang / /nags
tshal bcas par rab g.yos nas/ /sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /
bdud yid mi bder gyur ba de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa gsungs pa gang / /thub pa grags pa byung ba de/ /khyed la bde
legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kyi yid 'phrog pas/ /mu stegs byed rnams pham mdzad la/ /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed
la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni
bsam pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs
shog| phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la gnas par shog /khyed cag kun la bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /
sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi/ /sdang sems can rnams byer gyur cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams
dang | |dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /
bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad ni med gyur cig /kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa'am
'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams/ /skye rgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /ces rjod cig/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin
'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa can du song ste/ grong khyer gyi them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang /
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsam pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsam pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsam pa/ bden
pa'i tshig smra ba thams cad kyis bsam pa/ chos rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsam pa/ tshangs pas bsam pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsam pa/ dbang pos bsam
pa| lhas bsam pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsam pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsam pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsam pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsam pa/
bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug cig /yams kyi nad nye bar zhi

bar 'dug par gyur cig /nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs te/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /
lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po
brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/ de dag gis khyed rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyi/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha
ta| myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni/ brlag par gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung ba byed
par 'dod pa de dag ni/ 'khod cig /dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /su mu/ su mu/ su mu/
su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/
mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/
rI rI rI rI rI rI ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri mi ri ti/ mi ri mi ri/ si si mi/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra/ ka tsA kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/

kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA tI/ ku rI she/ kaM ka rI she/ kaM ka rI she/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ re phA sA ri/ ri phu ri phu ri phu/ ri bu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ nA thA thA/ ri phu ri phu/
nA thA thA/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ pa la ya thA/ ri phu ri phu/ pa la ya thA/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la
phan par lhag par dgongs pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs te/ lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad kyi
bla ma| sangs rgyas kyis chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig grub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang gis sred pa'i chags pa dang / rnam par bcom nas 'dul
mdzad pa/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad
ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par
'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du brtag bskyangs de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor
ba yi| |sems can kun gyi skyob gyur pa/ /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' ba//
gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa ste/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa
de| |khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams dang / /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos nas/ /sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyed la bde legs
mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi
'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa gsungs pa gang / /thub pa grags pa 'byung ba de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang gis chos kyi yid 'phrog pas/ /mu
stegs byed rnams pham mdzad la/ /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs
mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni
bsam pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam
'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyin ma'i gung la gnas par shog /khyed cag kun kyang bde legs shog/
khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi/ sdang sems can rnams byer gyur cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can
rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom pa yi bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig /sems can
kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad ni med gyur cig /kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig /gang yang
sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams/ /skye rgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang
spyod gyur cig /ces brjod pa dang / der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus mi ngas zhi bar gyur to/ /sdom la/ 'od ma dang ni dbus kyi grong / /
mi thi la dang lus 'phags dang / /sA la khron pa ngan spong bu/ /ngur smrig gtsug phud bsngags ldan dang / /gnag lhas dang ni sdig can dang / /ku sha'i grong khyer tha ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'od ma can gyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan

'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / 'od ma can gyi grong du byon nas/ 'od ma can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi grong shiM sha ba'i tshal na
bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mu ge nyam nga ba/ dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'dir
mu ge nyam nga ba/ dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung gi /dge slong dag /tshur khyed las smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang / gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang / 'grogs bshes
ji lta bu yod pa de dag ni/ yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor gyi spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam chos shig /nga yang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang /
'od ma can gyi grong 'di nyid du dbyar gnas par dam bcas na thams cad bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur grang / btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis
bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang / gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang / grogs bshes ji lta bu yod pa dag ni/ yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor spong byed
kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang 'od ma can gyi grong de nyid du dbyar bzhugs par dam bcas so/ /
dbyar gyi gnas der bcom ldan 'das snyun tshabs chen po/ mi bzod pa/ drag po grongs la thug pa zhig gis thebs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag
nad tshabs chen po/ mi bzod pa/ drag po shi la thug pas thebs la/ dge slong gis dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor ba na/ bdag yongs su mya
ngan las 'das pa ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ ma la bdag gis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis bcil la/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyis ting
nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil
nas| mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad pas/ sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum du mdzad de bsgrubs nas bzhugs te/ des na bcom ldan 'das lhag par spyod pa
dang / lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das snyun tshabs chen po/ mi bzad pa/ drag po grongs la thug pas thebs pa glo bar chud nas/ bdag gi lus dug 'tshal ba bzhin du phyogs kyang bslad/
bdag gis thos pa'i chos rnams kyang bskyud par gyur lags te/ de la bdag glo ba re ba na re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi slad du zhal chems cung zad bka'
ma stsal gyi bar du/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o snyam du bgyid do/ /kun dga' bo/ gang zhig 'di snyam du/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/ bdag gi yin te/ bdag gis dge
slong gi dge 'dun bstan par bya'o/ /bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun drang ngo snyam du sems pa de ni/ dge 'dun gyi phyir kha chems cung zad smra bar 'gyur
ba nyid na/ kun dga' bo/ nga la ni 'di snyam du dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/ nga'i yin te/ ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun bstan par bya'o/ /ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun drang ngo snyam du
dgongs pa mi mnga' na/ ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir zhal chems kho na cung zad bstan du ci yod/ gzhan yang / kun dga' bo/ nga la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rag lus pa
ci zhig yod/ kun dga' bos/ ngas rtag tu goms par bya ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ bshad zin to// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi
shu rtsa dgu pa/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ gang zhig gzhan dag gis shes na mi rung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas bcab bo/ /snyam du dgongs pa'i slob
dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi mnga'o/ /kun dga' bo/ 'on kyang gang gi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa snyun tshabs chen po/ mi bzad pa/ drag po grongs la thug pas thebs/ de la nga 'di snyam
du sems te/ bdag nad tshabs chen po/ mi bzod pa/ drag po shi la thug pas thebs la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor ba na/ bdag yongs
su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ ma la bdag gis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil la/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyi ting nge 'dzin
mtshan ma med pa lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs nas gnas par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ ngas tshor ba gcig pu de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil nas/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad par
sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum du bsgrubs te bzhugs te/ des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par spyod pa dang ldan zhing lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang
kun dga' bo/ da ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pas/ sku bgres 'khogs gtugs par gyur te/ rnam pa gnyis la brten nas 'tsho'o/ /dper na/ shing rta rnying
pa rnam pa gnyis la brten nas brtan pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pas/ sku bgres 'khogs gtugs par gyur te/ rnam pa gnyis la brten
nas 'tsho'o/ /de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig /nyon mongs par ma byed cig /smre sngags ma 'don cig /skye ba dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / 'dus byas pa dang /
bsags pa gang yin pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ rnam par 'gyes pa'i chos can de la mi 'jig pa de lta bu lta ga la rnyed de/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /
kun dga' bo/ gang yang ngas khyod la sdug pa dang / phangs pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang 'bral ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / mi ldan par 'gyur
bar snga nas bshad zin to/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ da lta'am/ nga 'das kyang rung / bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis
gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan dang skyabs gzhan gyis ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ da lta'am/ nga 'das kyang rung / gang su dag bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid
skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par byed kyi/ gling gzhan dang / skyabs gzhan gyis ni/ ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ nga'i nyan thos bslab pa
'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ ji ltar na/ dge slong gis bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/
gling gzhan dang / skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di la dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa

dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gnod sems dang / yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/ /phyi'i lus dang / nang dang phyi'i lus dang / nang gi tshor ba rnams dang / phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / nang dang phyi'i tshor ba

rnams dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / nang dang phyi'i sems dang / nang gi chos rnams dang / phyi'i chos rnams dang / nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus
dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la gnod sems dang / yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong 'di lta bu ni/ bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid
skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas kyi/ gling gzhan dang / skyabs gzhan gyis ni/ ma yin pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dbus kyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od
zer sngon pa dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung zhing / kha cig ni/ 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /gang dag 'og tu song ba de dag ni/ yang sos dang / thig
nag dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol ba dang /
so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a chu zer ba dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su song nas/
tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la ni/ bsil bar 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la dro bar 'bab bo/ /des sems can de rnams
kyi gnod pa'i khyad par dag so sor bcil lo/ /de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan tu skyes snyam pa dang / de
rnams dang pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa zhig btang ngo / /de rnams kyis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag
ni| 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang med la/ gzhan du skyes pa'ang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnams so
sor bcil lo/ /zhes de rnams sprul pa la sems mngon par dang par gyur pas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/ gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar
'gyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba bzung ngo / /gang dag steng du song ba de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga'
