bu me zhig /n+ya gro d+har bag mar btang ba dang / bram ze'i gu mos bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes pa/
sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa dang / 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ gshegs pa na rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu
de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ shAkya'i rigs dga' ba las/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyal srid kyang spangs/ btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod
kyi 'byor pa rnams kyang spangs nas rab tu byung ba de yin te/ de da ltar bsod snyoms la rgyus/ gal te bdag las bsod snyoms kyi zan bzhes na ni/ de la bdag gis dbul lo/ /snyam mo/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis de'i sems mkhyen nas lhung bzed zed de/ sring mo/ gal te khyod kyis yongs su gtang na/ lhung bzed 'dir phul cig /de nas de lhag par dad pa skyes te/
bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to/ /snyam du rig nas dad pa drag pos bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa
mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba nas mdzod spur nub par gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par ni zhes bya ba nas 'dzum pa mdzad ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /
kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bram ze'i bu mo gang zhig dad pa skyes nas nga la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba de mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ bram ze'i bu mo de dge
ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bskal pa bcu gsum du log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang / lus phyi ma
dang / bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la rang sangs rgyas shin tu legs smon zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /kun tu bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms zan
zhig phul bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /sgra grags so/ /de'i khyo me tog dang yam bsreg shing gi phyir dgon par song ba des bdag gi chung mas dge sbyong go'u ta ma
la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas/ de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang mi bzod pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin
pa dang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /shes ldan go'u ta ma/ bdag gi sdum par byon tam/ bram ze/ son to/ /shes ldan go'u ta ma la bdag gi mchis brang gis bsod snyoms
bshos shig phul nas/ khyod kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan skad na/ mad dam/ bram ze/ bden no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ khyod 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung na/ de bsod
snyoms bshos tsam gyi slad du ji ltar shes bzhin gyi rdzun gyi tshig gsungs/ sa bon 'di tsam gyi 'bras bu 'di'o/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod la su zhig yid ches
par 'gyur/ bram ze/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ /khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /bram ze ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos mthong ba 'ga'
yod dam/ kye go'u ta ma/ re zhig /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gzhan lta zhog /n+ya gro d+ha 'di nyid du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos shig mthong ba de re zhig gson cig /kye go'u ta ma/

n+ya gro d+ha 'di'i shar phyogs na n+ya gro d+ha'i shing chen po zhig mchis te/ de'i ming gis grong 'di n+ya gro d+ha zhes bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og na shing rta lnga brgya ma reg cing / phan tshun ma thug par mchi
lags so/ /bram ze/ n+ya gro d+ha de'i sa bon tshad ji tsam zhig yod/ ci/ re zhig zhing rnang tsam mam/ kye go'u ta ma/ ma lags so/ /re lde tsam mam/ til 'dru ba'i 'khor lo tsam mam/ shing
rta'i 'khor lo tsam mam/ ba'i ko ba tsam mam/ bil ba tsam mam/ ka pid tha'i 'bras bu tsam mam/ kye go'u ta ma/ ma lags so/ /kye go'u ta ma/ ye yungs kar gyi bzhi cha tsam mchis
lags so/ /bram ze/ sa bon de tsam gyis 'bras bu shing chen po de tsam zhig skyes so/ /zhes bya ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ shes ldan go'u ta ma/ yid ches kyang rung / ma
ches kyang rung / bdag gis mngon sum du gyur lags so/ /kye go'u ta ma/ re zhig zhing snag che ba/ ser sme ba/ dog sa tshwa rgo ma mchis pa'i phyogs su sa bon gsar ba grung po ma nyams par mchis pa la
dus dus su lhas char phab na/ des na shing n+ya gro d+ha chen po 'dir 'khrungs lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bram ze khyod yis ji lta bur//

zhing dang sa bon mngon sum ltar/ /de bzhin las kyi rnam smin yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum mo/ /ji ltar bram ze khyod kyis sa bon ni/ /chung dang shin tu shing chen de mthong ba/ /bram ze ngas
kyang sa bon chung ngu dang / /phun sum chen po de yang de bzhin mthong / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas ljags brkyangs pas dbu skra la thub pa'i bar zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yogs
nas/ bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi zhal nas ljags byung bas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yogs par byed pa de/ ji ga 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
rgyal po rgyal srid stong gi phyir yang shes bzhin du rdzun gyi tshig gsung ngam/ kye go'u ta ma/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yi lngags ni sgyu med bden
pas bskyed pa dag /ji ga mi bden pa ni gsung bar 'gyur srid dam/ /bram ze nga yis ji skad bshad pa de bzhin pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yin zhes rtogs par bya ba'i rigs/ /de nas bram ze
de mngon par dad nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med
pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/
'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ bdag dge
bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas bram ze de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
la mngon par dga' nas yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /sdom la/ kim pi la dang sbrul gdug dang //
ma thu la dang yul 'khor skyong / /glang chen grong dang grong khyer che/ /srug na dang ni bram ze'i grong / /grong khyer nag po ro hi ta/ /gsing ma can dang de bzhin du/ /dga' ba 'phel bas tshogs su
ni| byas te yang dag brjed pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kim pi lar byon nas kim pi la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la la bka'
stsal pa/ kim pi la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi las brtsams te sgom pa khyod la bshad kyi/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /zhes de skad bka' stsal pa

na| tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la cang mi smra'o/ /lan gnyis su yang de bzhin/ lan gsum du yang de bzhin brjod par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la/ khyod la ston pa gsung ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ 'tshal to/ /tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma/ rab tu 'tshal to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de'i dus la bab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa bzhi las brtsams te sgom pa bshad na/ de'i slad du dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang
bshad do/ /'di la dge slong gang yang grong dang / grol rdal zhes bya ba dang / dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na dbugs brngubs so/ /zhes slob ste zhes bya ba nas 'gog pa'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs
phyung ba slob ste zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so/ /zhes slob pa zhes bya ba nas lus kyi
'du byed shin tu sbyangs te lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo / /zhes slob ste zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos lus la
lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/ /kun dga' bo/ dper na/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod
rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas shar phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyams pa zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo/ ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten
'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa/ 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so/ /zhes bya ba nas nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes pa
zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dga' ba so sor myong ba zhes bya ba nas sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs te/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing
dbugs phyung ngo / /zhes slob bo/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/ /dper na/ kun dga' bo/ lam po
che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyams pa zhig 'ongs na/ zhes bya ba nas tshor ba rnams la

tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong
ba dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs na/ sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs so/ /zhes slob po/
sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung na/ sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo / /zhes slob ste/ sems la sems kyi rjes su lta'o/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas
pa na| nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te mchod rten de nyid la nub phyogs nas zhes dper bya'o/ /de lus de dang / tshor ba de dang / sems de la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba gnyis ka nub pas/
chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ dper na/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod
rten brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyams pa zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo/ ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur

ram| btsun pa/ de ltar 'gyur lags so/ /zhes bya ba nas de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod
par shes te/ kun dga' bo/ de ltar na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i dbang du byas te bsgoms pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ri bor zhig tu byon to/ /

ri bor de na tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i zhang po drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba de/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'dul bar 'gyur bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ zhang po la soms shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos
bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de'i gdul ba'i dus shes nas drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su 'jug par brtsams so/ /de nas drang srong des smras pa/ dge sbyong 'dug cig /bram ze
rnams kyi bsti gnas 'dir ma 'jug cig /des smras pa/ nga yang bram ze yin no/ /drang srong des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze khyod la bsang byed med/ blugs gzar yang ni yod ma
yin| |khyod ni mgo reg me mchod min/ /bram ze bdag ces ci ste smra/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze nga yin ngo tsha shes/ /bsang byed blugs
gzar shes rab nyid/ /chu rgyun rtag 'bab dad pa ni/ /nga yi ril pa spyi blugs yin/ /nang du legs par mnyam bzhag pa'i/ /bden pa kho bo'i me mchod de/ /yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis/ /nyin

mtshan du ni sbyin sreg byed/ /gal te de ltar gyur na yang / /dge sbyong mgo reg la ni/ 'dir skabs mi 'byed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rlung dang char drag btang nas mtsho
bran dang nye ba zhig tu song nas shing zhig gi drung du brten cing 'dug go /de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i 'khor zhig gnas pa des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
chen po yin te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bla mar bya ba yin gyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di'i mchod pa bya ba la brtson par bya'o/ /snyam ste/ klu de gnas nas byung nas tshe dang
ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i lus la lan bdun dkris te steng nas mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go /drang srong rnams kyi chos nyid kyis gal te sdug bsngal ba lam bsam na/ drang
srong gi chos las nyams par 'gyur bas/ de nas drang srong de 'di snyam du sems/ rab tu byung ba de/ rlung dang char drag gis nyen nas shi bar gyur te/ bdag drang srong gi chos las nyams par gyur

na mi rung ngo / /snyam nas/ de nas bsti gnas de nas phyir byung ste blta bar brtsams pa na/ des de mthong nas smras pa/ kye rab tu byung ba/ kho bo cag gi bsti gnas su zhugs shig /des smras pa/ drang
srong chen po/ khyod drang srong gi chos de las nyams par gyur tam/ drang srong des de'i nga ro las ngo shes nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po lags sam/ drang srong / bdag skye bos
de ltar shes so/ /'phags pa don ci zhig la byon/ khyod nyid kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas 'ongs so/ /tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhud do/ /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos zhang po khrid nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig
tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gi zhang po drang srong gi nang du rab tu byung ba 'di lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'di la chos bshad pa'i rigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ drang srong de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad
pa mdzad de/ de thos pas/ drang srong de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas/ de nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs
pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung
ngo| |zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus
gzugs bkab par gyur/ /ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po song ba dang / klu gzhon nu de gnas de na gcig pu mi dga' bar gyur nas/ de nas ri bor der
yams kyi nad dag btang ste/ bdag nyid drang srong gi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas bsti gnas der song ste gnas so/ /de nas ri bor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de/ bsti gnas der lhags
nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag cag la yams kyi nad byung na/ bdag cag gis ji ltar bgyi/ drang srong gis smras pa/ phyogs 'di nyid du shog la 'dug cig dang zhi bar
'gyur ro/ /de nas ri bor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de/ phyogs der lhags nas gnas so/ /phyogs der sprul gyis gdugs byas pas sbrul gdugs/ sbrul gdugs zhes bya bar grags
te| dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma thul na 'bab chu rab tu bzang ldan zhes bya ba'i 'gram/ slob pa
rnams kyi a mra'i tshal na zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos
kyi skyabs la gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan ma yin/ skyabs gzhan ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /khyed kyis bdag nyid gling dag dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang /
chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan ma yin zhing / skyabs gzhan ma yin pa 'di la so sor yang dag par bslab par bya'o/ /mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams ni ji lta bu zhig yin/ gang zhig yod na/ ci la brten nas/ ci la mngon par zhen te/ bdag ni ci yin zhes rjes su
lta ba rnams la/ mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing / /skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas
par 'gyur/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos rnams kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis don 'di nyid dge slong rnams la bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das las dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ /dge slong dag /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la
yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag /gzugs yod na/ gzugs la brten nas gzugs la mngon par zhen te/ gzugs ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la
mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing / skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ dge
slong dag/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod na/ rnam par shes pa la brten nas rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen te/ rnam par shes pa ni bdag
yin no zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing / skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing

'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag/ khyed kyis ltos shig ces bya ba nas/ dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na brngubs so zhes slob ste/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong

ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ dper na/ kun dga'
bo| lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyams pa 'ongs na zhes bya ba nas tshor ba la tshor ba'i
rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba
dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs so/ /zhes slob pa dang / sems rnam
par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung na/ sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo / /zhes slob ste/ sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems la sems
kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/ /dper na/ nub phyogs nas khyogs 'ongs pa de nyid bya'o/ /de lus de dang / tshor
ba de dang / sems de la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba de dag nub pas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos chos la chos kyi rjes
su lta zhing gnas so/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ 'di lta ste/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/
de nas byang phyogs nas ni/ bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyams pa 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo/ ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa/
de ltar 'gyur lags so/ /zhes bya ba nas de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la
byed pa yod par shes te/ kun dga' bo/ de ltar na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brten nas sgom pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bang mdzod
stug po can du byon nas bang mdzod stug po can na bang mdzod stug po'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas
ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas bang mdzod stug po can na bang mdzod stug po'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas
khyur 'dus shing 'phrad nas bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu
'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag
par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum cu bzhi pa/ de'i tshe khyim bdag gi
bu yul 'khor skyong / 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba'i don bdag gis
shes pa ltar na/ khyim pa khyim na gnas pas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa gcig tu sal gyis dag pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/

rnam par byang ba spyad pa 'di ni/ sla ba ma yin pas/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang
dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par dga' ste yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis bang mdzod stug
po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /khyim bdag gi bu/ pha dang ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/ btsun pa/ ma gnang ngo / /khyim bdag gi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni/ pha dang ma gnyis kyis ma gnang ba rab tu 'byin pa dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed do/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis ci nas pha dang mas gnang ba de ltar bgyi
lags so/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rang nas/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / pha dang ma la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /yab yum mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig /khyod nged kyi bu
gcig pa/ sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ bzod pa/ mi mthun pa med pa yin pas khyod shi bar gyur na/ nged mi 'dod bzhin du 'bral grang / gson bzhin du ga la gtang / yab yum/ gal te re zhig
gnang na/ legs/ gal te ma gnang na/ deng slan chad 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal lo/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis nyi ma gcig kyang zan bcad pa byas so/ /
gnyis dang gsum nas bdun gyi bar du zan bcad pa byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul
'khor skyong shes par gyis shig /khyod ni/ shin tu gzhon pa/ bde ba 'dod pa yin pas/ khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi shes te/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/ /
rab tu dben pa bya dka'o/ /gcig pa nyid la mngon par dga' ba dka'o/ /gnas mal dgon pa dang / nags khrod dang / bas mthar gnas pa ni/ brnag dka'o/ /bu yul 'khor skyong /
tshur 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang spyod cig /sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig/ bsod nams kyang gyis shig /de skad smras na/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o/ /de nas khyim bdag
gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas nye du rnams la bcol ba/ kye nye du dag/ re zhig bu yul 'khor skyong slongs shig/ de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi nye du rnams khyim
bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig /khyod ni/ shin tu gzhon
pas bde ba bzhed pa lags zhes bya ba nas bsod nams dag gyis shig /ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de skad smras na/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o/ /de nas
khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldang rnams la bcol ba/ kye gzhon nu dag /re zhig bu yul 'khor skyong slongs shig/ de nas khyim bdag gi bu
yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldang rnams kyis/ yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sras des pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig /khyod ni/ shin tu gzhon pas bde ba bzhed pa lags
la zhes bya ba nas bsod nams dag mdzod cig /ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du'o/ /de skad smras na/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o/ /de nas gzhon nu dag gis/ yul 'khor skyong
gi pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum/ sras yul 'khor skyong 'di gum pas ci zhig bgyi/ rab tu 'byung du gnong dang / gal te dga' bar gyur na/ 'di gson po nyid du gzigs par
'gyur la/ gal te mngon par mi dga' bar gyur na yang / bu'i gnas pha ma gnyis ma lags pa gzhan su zhig mchis/ gzhon nu dag/ bdag cag la gal te rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na/ de bzhin
du gnang bar bya'o/ /de nas yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldang dag gis/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig /pha dang mas gnang ste/
'di skad ces/ gal te bu rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na'o/ /zhes kyang zer ro/ /shes ldan dag /blta bar bya'o/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang stobs bskyed nas
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim
bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol te/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ pha dang mas gnang lags kyi/ btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs pa spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis
legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong
rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ bang mdzod stug po can du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /
mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bsnyen par rdzogs te lo bcu lon
nas dgra bcom pa thob ste rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag khyim par gyur pa na/ pha dang ma la rab tu byung nas blta bar bya'o/ /zhes
khas blangs pa yod kyi/ ma la bdag gis khas blangs pa de mthar dbyung ngo / /snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa/ sngon bdag khyim par gyur pa na/ pha dang ma la blta bar bgyi'o/ /zhes g.yar gyis blangs pas bdag g.yar gyis blangs pa de mthar 'byin du mchi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sems khyab par mdzad cing / khyab par mdzad nas thugs la mdzad cing / thugs la mdzad nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong ni/ slar yang
khyim na gnas pa'am/ gsog 'jog spyod pas 'dod pa dag la longs spyod pa'i 'os ma yin no/ /snyam du mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yul 'khor
skyong / khyod song la sems can ma bsgral ba rnams ni/ sgrol cig/ ma grol ba rnams ni/ grol bar gyis shig/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni/ dbugs phyung zhig/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa
rnams ni/ yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la

mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te
mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms las slar log nas gnas
mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhos su phab ste/ lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas bang mdzod stug po can gang na pa der song ste/ rim gyis spyad pa spyod cing rgyu ba na/ bang mdzod stug po can du
phyin nas bang mdzod stug po can gyi bang mdzod stug po'i tshal du 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang
chos gos thogs te/ bang mdzod stug po can du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ de rim gyis bang mdzod stug po can nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der song nas/ de'i

tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha/ bar sgo'i khyams na skyes pa skra mkhan gyis skra dang / kha spu 'chos pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong
sgo drung na 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kha zer bar byed de/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni dag gis/ kho bo'i rigs kyi rgyun bcad de/ 'o na dag gis/ kho bo'i bu gcig pa/ sdug pa/ yid
du 'ong ba/ bzod pa/ mi mthun pa med pa/ yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni rnams la su zhig bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems/ de nas

tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ rang gi khyim nas rgya gag ma gtogs pa sbyin pa yang ma thob/ bskrad kyang ma bskrad pa dang / myur ba myur bar phyir byung ngo / /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong

gi sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo zhig /zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa zhig dor ba'i phyir thogs te sgor byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang
bran mo rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo/ gal te zan dron rul ba zhag lon pa 'dor ba yin na/ kho bos bza'i/ lhung bzed 'dir chug cig /'phags pa gsol cig /de nas sngon gyi
bran mo rgan mo des zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa lhung bzed du 'jug pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / bzhin dang / sna dang / smra dngags dag gi mtshan
ma shin tu legs par bzung nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /rje'i sras/ yul 'khor skyong lags sam/ sring mo/ /kho bo skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so/ /de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo de/ rings

pa rings par/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha la 'di skad ces smras so/ /jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig/ sras yul 'khor
skyong bang mdzod stug po can du byon nas ring mo zhig lags na/ nyid kyi khab tu ni/ 'byon mi bzhed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ lag pa g.yon pas skra bsdus nas ras yug
gcig gi smad g.yogs bgos bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong rtsig drung zhig tu 'jug
nas zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa za bar byed pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yul 'khor skyong / khyod bang
mdzod stug po can du phyin nas ring po zhig lon na/ ci'i phyir rang gi khyim du 'jug par mi 'dod/ zan dron rul ba zhag lon pa khyod kyi gre bar yang ji ltar 'gror btub/ khyim bdag/ khyod kyi
khyim du 'ongs na/ rgya gag ma gtogs pa sbyin pa yang ma thob/ bskrad kyang ma bskrad pa dang / myur ba myur bar byung ngo / /bu yul 'khor skyong yin par kho bos mi shes mod/ gal te kho bos
shes na/ de skad mi smra ba zhig /bu yul 'khor skyong bzod par gsol lo/ /khyim bdag bzod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la yan
lag thams cad kyis 'khyud pa byas nas rang gi khyim du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ yul 'khor skyong gi ma la 'di skad ces smras
so| |bu yul 'khor yun ring zhig lon nas khyim du 'ongs kyi/ kye re zhig /khyod bdag nyid kyis snod du tshos la sta gon gyis shig dang / de la bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas

tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas/ rang nyid kyis snod du bcos nas sta gon byas so/ /de nas mi zhig gis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mdun du gser gyi phung po chen po/ gal te mi gcig
pha rol na 'greng na/ mi gcig tshur rol na 'dug pa mi mthong la/ mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug na/ gcig pha rol na 'greng ba mi mthong ba spungs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas/ tshe dang
ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul 'khor skyong khyod kyi ma la/ bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi nor dang / bud med kyi bag rdzongs dang / bud med kyi khud pa zhes bya ba gang
yin pa yang 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gzhan yang / khyod kyi pha'i ni/ mtshan mas thebs pa'i gser dang / sa le sbram yang brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / brgya stong phrag du ma yod
na| phal gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bu yul 'khor skyong tshur/ khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig /sbyin pa dag kyang thong zhig /bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig /khyim
bdag gi chung ma khyod gal te kho bo'i tshig la dad pas mnyan par bya bar sems pa lta na/ bdag gis gdams shing rjes su bstan to/ /bu yul 'khor skyong / gdams ngag stsol cig /bu
yul 'khor skyong rjes su ston cig dang / khyod kyi tshig la bdag dad pas mnyan par bgyi'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma tshur/ khyod kyis sha na'i ras sgye gsar pa byos la/ gser
dang sa le sbram gyis bkang ste shing rta'i nang du chug la chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun shugs drag cing gting zab pa gang na yod pa der 'or cig/ gzhi de las khyod kyi mya ngan
dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams skye bar gyur ta re/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
de lta bu'i bya bas kyang bu yul 'khor skyong bzlog par bya ba ma nus so/ /snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas/ mna' ma la bcol ba/ kye bag gsar/ re zhig ji lta bu'i mnye
ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyi bdugs pa dang / phye
ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ bu yul 'khor skyong de/ sngon khyim par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus
pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba gyis la/ bu yul
'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs la 'di skad ces/ gang gi slad du rje'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha'i bu mo ji lta bu zhig /ces kyang smros shig /de
nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor gyi chung mas/ ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan
rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / sngon khyim par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar
'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa
rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /rje'i sras gang gi slad du bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha mo de/ ji lta bu zhig lags/ sring mo/ kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa ni/ lha'i bu mo'i ched du ma yin no/ /de

nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ sngon gyi chung ma la sring mo/ zhes tshig tu smras pas/ brgyal nas sa la 'gyel te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab
yum/ gal te kha zas btang ba lags na/ ci/ mi stsal tam/ btang snyoms su bzhag ste/ ci mtho 'tsham lags sam/ bu yul 'khor skyong / longs spyod cig /ces/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul
'khor skyong gi pha dang mas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed
de/ rnam grangs du mas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag pas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis zos nas lag pa bkrus
te| lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ltos
shig lus ni nor bu dang / /rna rgyan gyis ni bkra byas kyang / /nad dang slu ba'i chos can de/ /brtan par gnas pa yod ma yin/ /skra yi lan bu brgyad lhas shing / /mig ni mig sman gyis
bskus pa'ang / /byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/ /pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/ /dri rnams kyis ni lus bskus la/ /rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa yang / /byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/ /pha rol
tshol ba ma yin no/ /mig sman gser gyis bkra byas shing / /rul pa'i lus ni brgyan pa yang / /byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/ /pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/ /ri dwags 'chor bas rnyi btsugs
nas/ /ri dwags bzung bar ma nus ltar/ /rngon pa 'o dod 'bod bcug la/ /zos nas gnas su 'gro bar bya/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ pha dang ma la chos dang ldan pa'i
gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la song ngo / /de nas tshe dang

ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung du nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug go /de'i tshe rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul
'khor skyong gi snyan pa yang sgrog cing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/ bdag

phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas/ tshal srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/ kwa ye nang rje/ khyod song la myur du bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal phyag dar byos shig /sang nga
der skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro'o/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skyes pa des/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal thams cad phyag dar byed pa na/ mi des tshe dang

ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung na nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ gang gi snyam pa yang dang yang du
sgrog cing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur
snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni/ 'di yin te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu phyin gyi/ ma la bdag gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya la sbran par

bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas skyes pa de rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrog cing bzhugs la/
nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye na/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam
pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni/ de lags te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu mchis lags te/ lhas de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab
byas/ mi gzhan zhig la bsgo ba/ kwa ye nang rje tshur/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du sdogs shig /de la nga zhon nas deng kho nar shes ldan yul 'khor skyong blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /lha/ bka'
bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po myur du bsdogs te/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di
skad ces smras so/ /lha/ chibs pa bzang po bsdogs lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas bang mdzod stug

po can nas byung ste tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song nas/ de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun

dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so/ /
tshur spyon/ rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul lags pas/ bzhed na bdag kyang stan la g.yar drongs shig /kye yul 'khor skyong / bdag gi yul lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag yul 'khor skyong gis
bdag stan la g.yar drang bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po/ gdan mchis kyi/ gal te bzhed na/ bzhugs shig/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig /mngon du
yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul
'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / gal te rigs dman pa'am/ longs spyod rnams yongs su zad pa'am/ gtugs par gyur na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos
ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba yod na/ bdag cag rigs ni/ ko'u rab bya yin la/ longs spyod ni/ rgya che ba yin gyi/ 'di ltar/ kho bos
shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la longs spyod kyi skal ba bdag las bgo bsha' bya'i/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong tshur/ khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yongs
su spyod cig /sbyin pa dag thong zhig /bsod nams dag gyis shig /rgyal po chen po/ cha ma lags pa'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du 'bod kyi/ 'tsham pas ni/ ma lags so/ /khyod lta bus bdag 'dra
ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di lta bu'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du yang ma 'bod cig /bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong dang 'tsham pa'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du 'bod pa ji lta bu zhig lags
rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/ khyod kyis 'di skad ces/ kye yul 'khor skyong / kho bo'i yul 'byor cing gnod pa med pa/ bsdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med la/ slong ba po'i bsod snyoms rnyed sla ba
yin gyi/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / bang mdzod stug po can 'dir mnos shig dang / bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar
bya'o| |zhes bgyi ba lags na/ rgyal po chen po/ sems mngon par dad pa gang lags pa de tsam gyis bgyis lags te 'tshal lo/ /gzhan yang / gal te zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs
phye na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la bdag zhu lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ /gsungs shig /thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o/ /kye yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po 'di dag ni/ yongs su nyams pa
lags te/ de dag gis yongs su nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dag /skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur
ro| |bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga bas yongs su nyams pa dang / nad kyis yongs su nyams pa dang / nye dus yongs su nyams pa dang / longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa'o/ /kye yul 'khor
skyong / rga bas yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la/ rigs kyi bu rgas 'khogs/ gtugs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni/ bdag rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pas/ bdag
gis re zhig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na/ mi bdog na/ lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha sbu bregs la/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag
pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo / /snyam nas/ de rga ba'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim
nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/ 'di ni/ rga bas yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs

te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni/ gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ skra nag pa/
na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gang gi tshe/ rtsed mo dang / dga' ba dang / ma gu ba dang / cha ba dang / brgyan pa'i gnas la brtson pa dang ldan pas gnas
par bya ba de'i tshe/ nye du rnams mchi mas brnangs shing ngu bzhin dang bcas pas ma rangs bzhin/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
med par rab tu byung na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis/ ci zhig shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
khyim med pa rab tu byung / de la ni/ kho bo rangs pa ma yin te/ mi bzod do/ /kye shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / nad kyis yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la/ rigs kyi bu na ba/ sdug bsngal
pa| nad tshabs che bar gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ na ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che bas/ bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang / longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na/
mi bdog na/ lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nad kyis
yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni/ nad kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /

shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni/ nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung ngo / /

zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / gnod pa med cing / nad med pa'i rang bzhin can dang / ran par 'jug pa'i drod dang ldan pa ste/ ha cang bsil ba
ma yin pa dang / ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang / khams snyoms pas gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar
'ju bar 'gyur na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / de la ci zhig shes/ mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la ni/ kho bo rangs pa ma yin te/ mi bzod do/ /
kye yul 'khor skyong / nye dus yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la/ rigs kyi bu'i nye du rnams rabs chad/ nye du rnams kha btag nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye du rnams rabs
chad| nye du rnams kha btags pas/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nye dus yongs su nyams pas yongs
su nyams pa skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni/ nye dus yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni/ nye
dus yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab
tu byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong gi nye du ni/ ko'u rab bya'i rigs nas bzung ste brgyud pa/ bang mdzod stug po can 'di nyid na rgyas par yod na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong
gis/ ci zhig shes/ mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la ni/ kho bo rangs pa ma yin te/ mi bzod do/ /kye yul 'khor skyong / longs spyod kyis
yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la/ rigs kyi bu'i longs spyod bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi longs spyod ni/ bsrabs
pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur gyi/ ma la bdag skra dang / kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su
nyams pa skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni/ longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong
ni/ longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni/ bang mdzod stug po can
'di na/ rigs mchog dang / rigs bzang po yin pas 'di lta ste/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin na/ 'di la shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis/ ci zhig shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang
kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de la ni/ kho bo rangs pa ma yin te/ mi bzod do/ /rgyal po chen po/ bzhi po 'di dag /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ yid 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs te/ yid 'byung ba de dag gis yid byung nas/ rigs
kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni/ rga bas
nye bar khrid pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ ngoms
mi shes te/ sred pas 'khol bas chog mi shes pa yin par bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
med par rab tu byung ngo / /bdag gis/ mdor bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i don rgyas par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis/ don de nyid ci nas/ bdag gis
shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par ma phye ba 'di ni don rgyas par 'tshal bar 'gyur bar rgyas par bshad du gsol/ shes ldan
yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni/ rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te

gsungs/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe khyod lo nyi shu'am/ nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par
gyur pa na/ na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu/ lang tsho la bab pa/ skra nag pa/ nyams rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang / da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste/ tshe'am/ kha dog gam/ stobs sam/ shugs
sam/ smra dngags sam/ srid du'am/ sbom du mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong ngam/ kye yul 'khor skyong / gang gi tshe bdag lo nyi shu'am/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa na/ na tshod kyis
gzhon nu thor bu/ lang tsho la bab pa/ skra nag pa/ nyams rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang / da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste/ tshe'am/ kha dog gam/ stobs sam/ shugs sam/ srid du'am/ sbom
du'am/ smra dngags su mnyam zhing mtshungs par ma mthong ste/ da ni/ bdag na tshod kyis lo brgyad cu lon pas/ rgas 'khogs/ gtugs ta/ bar 'ga' bdag 'dug pa dang / langs pa
yang gzhan gyi bya dgos so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas 'jig
rten 'di thams cad ni/ rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni/ bdag rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/ /gang yang shas ldan yul 'khor
skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa/ bdag la ni/ bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra

mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta rkya dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang /
bro gar len pa rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa/ gang dag bdag gi gshed ma phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba dag mchis pa slar 'joms par
bgyid pa mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis
ci la dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod ba de bzhin du lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po/ da ltar khyod la lus
kyi gnod pa 'ga' mchis sam/ kye yul 'khor skyong / bdag la mchis te/ da ltar rlung gis rgyab tu gnod do/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang gi tshe rlung gis rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag

gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta rkya dang / shing rta pa dang
bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag
yin pa tshur/ bdag la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig /ces bgyis na/ 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor
skyong / ma lags so/ /gang gi tshe rlung gis bdag gi rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang /
khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta rkya dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang /
bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur bdag la byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi
bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig /ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi/ de'i tshe bdag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal drag po/ rtsub ba/ tsha ba/ mi bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams
myong ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa de 'di las dgongs nas/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ rjes su 'gro ba med de
skyabs med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
ste| de la ni/ bdag rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang rangs te bzod do/ /gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten
'di ni/ thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong / bdag cag la bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang zhes
bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu rnams mchis te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang dag bdag mtshan rje bzhin 'breng la/ 'greng na 'greng ba dang / nyal na zhugs tshe bgyid pa dag mchis na/ 'on kyang
shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul
'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang

gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de
'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu dag tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu
'gro ba'i phyi bzhin shog cig /ces bgyis na/ 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags so/ /kye yul 'khor skyong / gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye
bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang /
bran dang / las bgyid pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu'i bar gang dag yin pa tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /bdag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi ba'i phyi bzhin shog
cig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste/ bdag 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni/ thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ bdog pa med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/
bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni/ bdag rangs te bzod do/ /
shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / gang yang 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol

bas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong / bdag sgra ngan rgyas pa'i 'di nyid la yongs su spyod cing / btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su longs
spyod na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor

skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'di na sgra ngan rgyas pa
la yongs su spyod cing / btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las/ shar phyogs nas mi yid gcugs pa/ yid ches pa
brtan po/ 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas/ de 'di skad ces/ lha/ bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir mchi ba na/ de na bdag gis ljongs 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs
pa| skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dag cig mthong ste/ lha/ ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs te/ bzhon pa dang choms
nas rnal du dgod par rung ngo / /zhes smra na/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod yul der dra ma drangs shing / drangs nas bcom ste rnal du dgod dam/ khyod ljongs de dag 'dod dam/ kye
yul 'khor skyong / gal te bdag gis ljongs de dag/ 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs pa dang / dra ma drangs nas choms pa dang / bcom
nas rnal du dgod du rung bar shes na/ ljongs de dag tu dra ma drangs shing / dra ma drangs nas bcom la/ bcom nas rnal du 'god do/ /bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshal lo// //'dul
ba gzhi/ bam po sum cu lnga pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ de las
dgongs nas/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos
ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni/ bdag rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / khyod gang la rangs te bzod pa de la/ bdag

kyang rangs te bzod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de skad ces smras nas/ gnas brtan dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig rten dag na nor dang ldan pa'i mi/ /de dag chags
dang bcas pas gsog byed cing / /nor rnams rnyed nas gtong bar mi byed la/ /phyir zhing 'dod pa don du gnyer ba mthong / /mi dbang rgya mtsho mtha' yis gtugs pa'i sa/ /thag bcug bcom ste cham du phab
nas ni/ /rgya mtsho tshun chad kyis kyang mi chog ste/ /chags pas pha rol don du gnyer bar 'bad/ /mi dbang de bzhin mi gzhan mang po dag /yongs su gzung la ngoms pa yod min pas/ /chog mi shes pas

rang gi lus por te/ /sred dang ma bral bar ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /srog ni ther zug ma yin tshe thung ste/ /rga bas gzir ba la ni skyabs yod min/ /'chi ba la ni nor rjes 'brang mi 'gyur/ /nye du ma yin grogs
min bu ma yin/ /spun dang sring mo de bzhin grogs kun dang / /snying du sdug pa'i tshogs ni 'dus nas ni/ /kye ma kye hud 'di ni lhar gyur ces/ /skra bshig mchi ma can gyi gdong gis ngu / /de ni ras
kyis dkris te phyung nas ni/ /me 'bar nas ni de nas sreg par byed/ /rang gi las kyis sems can de khrid nas/ /de yi nor rnams bgo skal spyod pas 'phrog /'di ni skye ba na
yang gcig pu skyes/ /'chi ba na yang gcig pu 'chir 'gyur zhing / /gcig pus sdug bsngal nyams su 'dir myong 'gyur/ /skye bo 'khor bar grogs yod ma yin no/ /phyug po'am yang na bkren
ba'am brtan po'am/ /bus pa de bzhin gnyis kas reg myong nas/ /brtan po de yis nam yang g.yogs mi 'gyur/ /bus pa bus pa yin phyir rtag tu g.yo/ /blo chung mi mkhas rjes su slob byed
cing / /de nas las rnams gsum po byed 'gyur zhing / /mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'khon dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal las mi 'grol/ /shes rab nor rnams kun gyi
mchog tu gsungs/ /de yis bdag nyid shes pas bdag nyid rig /srid dang srid min bdag nyid ma rtogs pas/ /blun po sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa yin/ /phran tshegs thabs sam yang na
chos min pa'am/ /mthu yis gzhan dag las ni gang 'phrog pa/ /nyes byas las byed 'khor ba la brten nas/ /nying tor brgyud pas grol bar 'gyur ma yin/ /ji ltar rkun po khyim 'bigs
bzung nas ni/ /sdig pa'i las can rang gi las kyis bcom/ /de bzhin skye rgu nyes byed 'di dang ni/ /'jig rten pha rol rang gi las kyis bcom/ /shing las shing thog bzhin du mi rnams ni/ /
gzhon dang bar ma rgan po rnams kyang ltung / /'dod pa sna tshogs stug cing yid 'ong ba/ /rang bzhin de lta bu yis sems rab 'joms/ /'dod pa rnams kyis 'di 'ching chags par 'gyur/ /'dod pa yod

na 'khon dang 'jigs pa skye/ /de ltas rgyal po 'di nas rab byung ste/ /dge sbyong nyid ni nyams pa med mchog yin/ /de nas rgyal po chen po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa la
mngon par dga' ste/ yi rang nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das glang po che'i grong rdal du byon pa dang / bram ze zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das
sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i
ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang pa de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas tshigs su bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa/ gser gyi mdog can
mig tu sdug pa dang / /dga' ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun dang ldan/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lha yi lha/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byon pa lags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa
mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa na zhes bya ba nas mdzod spur nub par gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yis/ /zhes bya ba nas kun dga' bo/ de de
bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par
'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bram ze de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa gang yin pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /'di dge
ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal ba nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ 'on kyang lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang /
lus phyi ma dang / bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la/ rang sangs rgyas bstod 'os zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa la gzigs/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas grong mchog

lnga byin pa de/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde
ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba la rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ de lhag par snyan dngags la dga' bar gyur to/ /wA ra NA si na bram ze snyan dngags mkhan gzhan

zhig yod pa de la/ bram ze mos smras pa/ bram ze/ grang ba'i dus la bab kyi/ rgyal po de'i spyan sngar song la rjes su mthun pa'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byos dang / gal te na grang ba'i skyabs cung zad
'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de song ba las ji tsam na/ rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas byung ngo / /bram ze des bsam pa/ ci/ bdag gis rgyal po la bstod dam/ 'on te glang po che dam pa la snyam pa las
de 'di snyam du sems te/ glang po che dam pa 'di ni/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin la/ rgyal po la ni khyad par du yin pas/ re zhig glang po che dam pa mngon par bstod
bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa srung bu yi lus kyi sha tshugs ltar/ /mtshan mchog ldan pa'i gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/ /mdog dang tshad kyis lus kyi gzugs
legs pa/ /glang chen dbang po bkra shis rab tu bsngags/ /de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo'i glang chen sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ /mi rnams mig 'phrog dga'
ba skyed pa gang / /de la khyod kyis bstod pa'i tshig smras kyi/ /khyod la grong gi mchog ni lnga sbyin no/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni/
nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni/ bram ze 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas 'di la grong mchog lnga byin no/ /
da ltar yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas yang 'dir rang byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /grong khyer chen por gshegs nas grong khyer chen por sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan
zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yul srug nar gshegs pa dang / yul srug na na bram ze dbang po zhes bya ba/ gzugs dang / lang tsho dang / thos pas rgyags par gyur nas
bdag dang 'dra ba ni/ 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/ /zhes sgrog cing rnam par sgrog go /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la
bzhugs te chos 'chad do/ /bram ze dbang po zhes bya bas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma yul srug nar byon to/ /zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/
blta na sdug pa zhes thos kyi/ ci/ bdag las lhag par gzugs bzang ba yin nam/ 'on te ma yin bltar 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de byung ba dang / ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i
mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun
nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bdag pas gzugs lhag par bzang mod kyi/ tshad ni/ lhag par ring ba ni/ ma yin no/ /snyam nas/ bcom
ldan 'das de'i gtsug tor blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na ma mthong nas de phyogs shin tu mtho ba zhig la 'dzegs na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze dbang po la
bka' stsal pa/ bram ze nyon mongs kyi/ thong zhig /gal te ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzegs te bltas kyang 'on kyang ches nyon mongs su zad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ni/ mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
gzhan yang / khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor mi mthong ngo / /zhes thos sam/ 'on kyang gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad
mthong bar 'dod na/ khyod kyis khyim na me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na/ tsan+dan sa mchog las byas pa'i mchod sdong nyid yod kyi/ de phyung la gzhol cig dang de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum las
'khrungs pa'i sku'i tshad ni/ de yin no/ /bram ze dbang pos bsam pa/ de yang ngo mtshar zhig ste/ bdag gis lan 'ga' yang ma thos na/ song ste blta'o/ /snyam nas/ de rings pa rings par song nas me'i
sbyin sreg byed pa'i thab kyi 'og tu brko bar brtsams pa las/ de thams cad du de bzhin du gyur to/ /de mngon par dad par gyur nas bsam pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma
ni/ gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyi/ song la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das dang lhan
cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa
dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes
bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das
dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon
par dad lags so/ /de nas bram ze dbang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis tsan+dan sa mchog gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze
gnang gi /song la shoms shig /de nas des sa phyogs dben pa skabs yod pa zhig tu rim gro chen pos mchod sdong de bsgrengs nas dus mchod chen po bshams so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan
dag gis kyang / rten dge bar gyur cig /ces bya bar rig nas rtswa ku sha btags te/ bram ze dbang pos mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams pas na/ dbang po'i dus mchod ces bya bar grags so/ /
gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas/ mu stegs can rnams ni/ spa bkong / lha dang mi rnams ni/ dga' bar mdzad/ skye bo dam pa rnams ni/ yi rang par mdzad
pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams bros nas mtha' 'khob tu gnas shing / kha cig ni/ bram ze'i grong zhes bya bar dong nas gnas so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa
na bram ze'i grong du gshegs so/ /mu stegs can rnams kyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rings pa rings par bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du dong ste lhags
nas smras pa/ chos thob par gyur cig /chos thob par gyur cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /de ci zhig /kho bo cag gis khyed kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni/ mthong gi /ji srid rgud pa mi
mthong ba de'i bar du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gi rgud pa gang lags/ shes ldan dag /dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor
stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing 'ong ste/ bu dang bcas pa du ma bu med par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /gang gi tshe kho nar bzhugs shing grogs
bgyi ba la thug pa de kho na'i tshe bzhud pa ni/ bzang po ma lags te/ bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma rung ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma
gsod na ni/ 'khod par bya'o/ /bzhugs shig /gsad par bgyi'o/ /zhes de rnams lag na dbyug pa dang gzhu thogs/ khu tshur bcangs/ go bgos te byung ba dang / lam gyi dbus na
shAkya rgan po zhig 'dug pas mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gang du 'dong / de rnams kyis smras pa/ dgra gsad pa'i phyir ro/ /khyed cag gi dgra su yin/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o/ /
shes ldan dag /gal te bcom ldan 'das dgra yin na/ byams pa gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ /shes ldan dag /slar log cig /de rnams ldog tu ma btub pa dang / des bsam pa/ 'di
dag ni/ chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des ri brag tu zhugs nas me btang ba dang / ri brag kun tshig
nas ca co dang / ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba/ de rnams kyis thos nas sdangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag dang dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ thag ring po kho na yin gyi/ ri brag 'dir ni phung
po chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brag bsregs kyi/ me gsad kyi/ slar ldog go /zhes de rnams kyis gsad par brtsams pa dang / gsad par ma nus pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon
nas bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog dag/ 'di ci byed/ bcom ldan 'das/ ri brag rnams zhugs kyis tshig na/ dgum par rngo ma thogs lags so/ /ngas gsad dam/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'gum du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung phyung ma thag kho nar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de zhi bar gyur to/ /de rnams
mngon par dad par gyur nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci zhig gi slad du gshegs lags/ khyed cag kho na rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa
dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus
nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong
rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ shAkya rgan po 'dis nye du la chags pas/ bsod nams ma lags pa
mang du bsags te ri brag bsregs pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang gnyen la chags
pas/ bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags te ri brag bsregs pa de/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ri brag cig na spre'u lnga brgya'i
tshogs gnas pas/ lo tog skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzan to/ /ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /spre'u rnams kyis
lo tog la gnod pa byed na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ spre'u rnams gsad mod/ de rnams ji ltar gsad par bya/ ri brag gi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de/
shing tin tu ka gcig pu zhig bzhag la nye 'khor rnams tsher mas bskor dang / de la bza' ba'i phyir spre'u rnams 'dzeg par 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur dang / der de rnams gsad par bya'o/ /de
nas de rnams kyis ri brag gi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de/ shing tin tu ka gcig pu bzhag nas nyen kor rnams tsher ma'i ra bas bskor te/ srung ma pa'i mi bzhag nas bsgo ba/ khyed kyis
gang gi tshe spre'u rnams tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la sbron cig /de nas dus gzhan zhig na shing tin tu ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu chags te smin pa dang spre'u rnams kyis sde dpon la
smras pa/ sde dpon/ shing tin tu ka smin cing mchis kyi/ gsol du gshegs so/ /de nas sde dpon 'khor lnga brgya dang shing tin tu ka de la 'dzegs te shing tin tu ka la bza' bar brtsams
so/ /de nas srung ma'i mis ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /shing tin tu ka la spre'u thams cad 'dzegs nas za bar byed kyi/ khyed cag gi bya ba'am byed pa
gang yin pa de/ gyis shig /de nas ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lag na mda' gzhu dang dgra sta thogs/ khu tshur bcangs te rings par song nas shing tin tu ka gcad par brtsams pa dang /

de nas spre'u de rnams bred de mchong brgal zhing shing ka phan tshun rgyu bar byed do/ /sde dpon ni/ sems las chung ngus za bar byed pa dang spre'u de rnams kyis de la smras pa/ sde dpon/ bdag cag ni/
sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga ba thob cing mchis te phan tshun du rgyu lags na/ khyod ci'i slad du thugs khral chung ngur bzhugs/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bya ba mang po'i mi rnams la/ /
bya ba min pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /shing gi 'phro ni mang yod pas/ /sems las bskyungs te bza' bar gyis/ /de nas yang sde dpon gyi phru gu zhig ri brag de na bcings te 'dug pa de lag pa 'gram pa
la gtad nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na spre'u bzang po zhig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang / de sems khong du chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ grogs
po/ ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud/ des smras pa/ da ltar ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kho bo'i nye du gsod du dong na/ ci'i phyir sems
khong du chud par mi 'gyur/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis pha rol gnon pa ma byas/ bcings na/ ji ltar pha rol gnon par bya/ kho bos khyod dgrol lo/ /zhes des de bkrol ba dang / de nas des ri
brag der me btang ste ri brag kun tshig pas/ ca co dang / ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sdangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag dang / spre'u rnams ni/ thag ring po kho
na yin gyi/ phung po chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brag bsregs kyi/ me gsad kyi/ slar ldog go /zhes de rnams me gsad pa'i phyir rgyugs pa dang / spre'u rnams kyang shing tin tu ka las
babs nas bros so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ spre'u'i phru gu gang yin pa de ni/ shAkya rgan po 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brag bsregs la/ da ltar
yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brag bsregs so/ /nag po'i grong khyer du gshegs nas nag po'i grong khyer du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ro hi ta
kar byon nas ro hi ta ka na gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyi gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe gnod sbyin glang chen stobs/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar song ba dang / gnod sbyin
glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bskyed par byon nas ro hi ta ka na bdag gi gnas kho na na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste phyin pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la/
chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i
bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das do mod bdag gi gnas su bzhugs par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi

gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul te/ stan nang tshangs can dang / sngas nang tshangs can dang / gor bu lnga brgya
dang / zhugs ling lnga brgya bshams so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun thabs gcig tu sang
bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas gnod sbyin
glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te song nas de'i ne'u zla kha che yul gyi gnod sbyin sgra sgrog ces bya ba de la des bsgo ba/ kho bos
sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyi/ byang phyogs kyi 'bras bu rnams skur cig /ces des pho nya btang nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing
bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gtsug lag khang chag chag dang phyag dar byas nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas khang skyong gis
gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / gnod sbyin sgra sgrog gis rgun 'brum gyis skon pa bkang ste/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi lag tu bskur te/ de dag gis gtsug lag khang gi dbus su phung por spungs te
bzhag go /dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu 'di dag ci'i yin pa dang / ji ltar brtag par bya ba mi shes nas de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
