pa/ dge slong dag /byang phyogs kyi nags kyi 'bras bu rgun 'brum zhes bya ste/ mes brtag pa byos la rims shig /dge slong rnams 'brum bu re re nas byed pa dang / shin tu yun ring du thogs par
gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung po gnyis sam gsum du byos la mes reg par byos shig /de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan
pa'i phyir 'dug go /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin
du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs pa dang / rgun 'brum mang du lhag par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rgun 'brum rnams mnyes la khu ba brim par bya'o/ /'on kyang lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dro 'jar byas te bzhag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dus ma yin pa'i btung bar 'gyur
ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus nas gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs
te/ nga ni tshe thung ngu'i dus la byung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la bab na/ gdul ba'i don bya ba ni/ rab tu mang bas gal te nga dge slong kun dga' bo dang thabs
gcig tu byang phyogs su gshegs na ni/ gdul ba rnams kyi don bya dka' bar 'gyur gyi/ ma lang nga gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig gshegs par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje bos pa/ dran dang ldan rnams bzang por shog /dran dang ldan rnams rtag tu bzang / zhi ba
thob pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dran dang ldan pa bde bar nyal/ /dran dang ldan rnams bzang por shog /dran dang ldan rnams rtag tu bzang / /rgyal dang pha rol rgyal spangs nas/ /dran dang ldan pa
bde bar nyal/ /bar sdom la/ spungs pa can na sangs rgyas stobs/ /re tu ka na chos stobs te/ /sin+d+hu na ni phor chen zhabs/ /mgo reg spyi blugs sog ma med/ /hu lu klu dang de bzhin
nags/ /gnyis 'grogs drang srong nyams pa dang / /kan tha 'bras kyi grong khyer du/ /mchog gi ma btul dbang ldan rdza/ gsing ma'i gnod sbyin chen po dang / de bzhin brtsegs skyong
dga' 'phel dang / srid pa'i lha dang gtum byed kyi/ /bu bdun rnams ni btul ba dang / /gnod sbyin phyugs skyong 'gro mgyogs dang / /nab so'i klu la gzugs brnyan btang / spu bu can
dang sbubs can btul/ /mdung can gyi ni grong khyer na/ /mdung can zhes bya'i gnod sbyin mo/ /'bra go can dang rdul mchod rten/ /sog med tshogs su bsdus te brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje tshur/ byang phyogs su klu sogs ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das
kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na

tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags
so/ /de ni/ u sha'i ri yin te/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na zhig nas dang rjes su mthun pa rnams kyi gnas mal gyi mchog /ta ma sa'i tshal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das spungs pa can du gshegs so/ /de'i tshe spungs pa can na gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs zhes bya ba 'dug pa/ sdig pa'i bsam pa can zhig gnas pas/ spungs can na gnas
pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis mgu bar byas kyang de dus dus su gnod pa byed do/ /spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das spungs pa can du gshegs nas phyogs che ge mo na
bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston
par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad ces bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i
bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs 'di/ bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas sha 'khon ma mchis par ni/ sha 'khon bgyis/
'gran zla ma lags par ni/ 'gran zla bgyis/ glags ma btsal bar ni/ glags tshol bar bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ gnod
sbyin sangs rgyas stobs gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshe gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sangs rgyas
stobs la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas stobs/ khyod kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis thos lags so/ /sangs rgyas stobs/ khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar gshegs pa/
bdag gis thos lags so/ /dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log cig /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ldog lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs
skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bzhag go /de nas des spungs pa can zhes bya ba'i gnas mal brtsigs so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis kyang yo byad thams
cad ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs zhabs 'bring du chas pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis slar bzlog nas bka' stsal
pa| skye bo'i tshogs 'di srungs shig ngas kyang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ci nas spyan ldings te 'bab par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gzhan dag gis kyang phyogs der
mchod rten brtsigs pas/ mchod rten spungs pa can zhes bya bar grags so/ /re tu kar byon nas re tu kar gnod sbyin chos stobs zhes bya ba btul te/ des re tu ka zhes bya ba'i gnas mal brtsigs
so| |sin+d+hur gshegs pa dang / sin+d+hu na mnyan pa gzhan zhig yod pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis dad pa bskyed de/ de nas dad pa skyes nas bden pa rnams la bzhag
go| gnod sbyin phor chen btul nas zhabs gnyis kyis bcags pas/ phor chen zhabs kyis bcags pa zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su gshegs nas/ der drang srong mgo reg dang ril ba spyi blugs can btul nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gnas mal ril ba spyi blugs
can zhes bya ba brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/
bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas su gshegs so/ /klu'i rgyal po
sog ma med kyis bcom ldan 'das gnas su gshegs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang khros/ 'khrugs/ rngam/ yi ma rang nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ ser ba
dang / rdul gyi char dbab par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'khrugs so/ /zhes byams pa la snyoms par bzhugs pa dang / char pa de dag a ka ru'i phye ma dang / ta ma la'i
phye mar gyur nas 'bab par brtsams so/ /de nas 'khor lo dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung thung la sogs te/ mtshon cha rnams dbab par brtsams pa/ de dag kyang

lha'i ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra bar gyur nas 'bab par brtsams so/ /de nas sog ma med kyis khro ba'i mes du ba dbyung bar brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis dud pa dbyung bar brtsams so/ /de nas de spungs dang / rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal bcom par gyur nas gnas su zhugs te 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu
gdug pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba ni/ rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis te/ 'jigs pa dang / 'khrugs pas yin gyi/ ma la ngas 'di 'jigs su gzhug go /snyam du thugs su chud nas gnod sbyin lag
na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'jigs par gyis shig /de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ rdo rje ri'i rtse mo la 'phangs
nas ri'i rtse mo bshig ste lhung ba des/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas non par gyur to/ /de nas sog ma med sdangs/ skrag /phongs nas 'bros par brtsams pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyi me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas phyogs thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na zhi zhing bsil
bar gyur pa ma gtogs par de gang dang gang du song ba de dang de na mi mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ bdag la mtho 'tsham lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rga ba'i chos can/ ci ngas mtho
'tsham mam/ gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu dag ma thob na khyod kyis nga ming lus par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang /
g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang / dra bas 'brel pa/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas spyi bo la reg par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/
bzhin bzang / khyod kyis bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi la zas byin te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gya nom pa dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba las/ khyod kyis smon lam log
bar btab pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes te/ rdeg pa dang gsod pa la zhen cing pha rol gyi srog 'phrog pa dang / pha rol gyi srog la gnod par byed pas 'tsho bar byed na/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas
sems can dmyal ba ma gtogs par khyod kyi 'gro ba ni/ gang zhig yin/ skye ba ni/ gang zhig yin/ tshe phyi ma ni/ gang zhig yin/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ci zhig bgyi ba bka'
stsal du gsol/ bzhin bzang tshur/ nga las skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung la yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la mi 'jigs pa byin cig /btsun pa/ bdag
deng slan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su mchi ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos nas yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la yang mi 'jigs pa stsal bar bgyi'o/ /
de nas de'i chung ma dang / bu mo dang / mna' ma rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag cag kyang skyabs su mchi zhing bslab pa'i gzhi
rnams nod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams byin no/ /de'i bu ri bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang skyabs su mchi
ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams nod lags so/ /sog ma med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag klu rnams ni/ mi mdza' ba mang ba lags kyi/ ri bo la skyabs su mchi ba stsal
cing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams ni/ mi dbog par gsol/ 'di dag cag srung bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la skyabs su 'gro ba byin no/ /de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo
rjes/ sog ma med grogs po dang / gnyen med pa dang / mdza' bshes rnams 'dul bar gyur pa mthong nas yid rab tu dga' bas gar byas te smras pa/ khros pas lce bskyod mgo mang bskul
nas mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bebs/ /rang gnas skyes bu rang la phyogs pa ri mtho rtse lta bu/ /du ma'i tshogs lhags ngal chad dbugs brdzangs bzur cing lta byed pa/ /sbrul bdag sog ma med de
drang srong bka' btsan rnams kyis btul/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sog ma med 'khor drug khri dang bcas pa btul nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa

dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa
dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /lag na rdo rje/ de ni/ kha che'i yul yin te/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon nas dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa/ dge
slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des klu gdug pa hu lu du btul nas thabs bshams te/ de las skyil mo krung shong ba'i sa blangs nas kha che'i yul kun tu bstan pa 'jog par

'gyur ro/ /nga'i lhag mthong dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal gyi nang na 'di lta ste/ kha che'i yul mchog tu 'gyur te/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal drug khri dang / grong rdal drug stong dang / grong rdal
drug cu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams ni/ kha che'i yul yin no/ /yul gnyis 'grogs su drang srong dang gnod sbyin nyams pa 'khor dang bcas pa btul lo/ /yul kan thar gnod sbyin mo 'khor dang
bcas pa btul to/ /'bras kyi grong khyer du byon nas 'bras kyi grong khyer du rgyal po sde mchog gi ma bden pa rnams la rab tu bzhag go /yul dbang ldan du byon te dbang ldan na rdza mkhan gzhan
zhig yod pa de/ bzos shin tu rgyags te/ snod rnams bskams nas 'khor lo las 'gogs par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ rdza mkhan gyi cha byad nyid du mngon
par sprul te/ de dang lhan cig gtam bya bar brtsams pa/ khyod kyis snod ci 'dra ba dag cig 'khor lo las 'bebs par byed/ des gsol pa/ bskams nas 'bebs so/ /nga yang bskams nas
'bebs so/ /khyod dang bdag mnyam lags so/ /'di kho nar zad dam ci/ nga ni/ so btang nas kyang 'bebs so/ /khyod lhag go /so btang ba 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do/ /'o na ci zhe na/ gser

dang / dngul dang / baiDUr+ya dang / shel gyi rang bzhin du yang byed do/ /de mngon par dad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdza mkhan gyi cha byad mi snang bar mdzad de/ rang bzhin gyi cha byad du
zhugs nas de 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas te bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod do/ /gsing ma can du gshegs nas gsing ma can du gnod sbyin chen po 'khor dang bcas pa skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab
pa'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bzhag go /brtsegs skyong du klu ba lang skyong dang dgar ba gnyis so/ /dga' 'phel du gshegs nas dga' 'phel du rgyal po srid pa'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gtum
byed kyi bu bdun dang / gnod sbyin sa 'tsho bden pa dag la rab tu bkod do/ /de na mtsho chen po yod pa gang yin pa de na 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis klu'i skye gnas su skyes te lo bcu gnyis 'das
shing steng du byung ste 'khrug pas 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la chos ma bshad pas/ des na bdag cag rnam par lhung ba klu'i skye gnas su skyes
kyi| ci nas kyang bdag cag gis de'i bstan pa zhig par bya'o/ /zhes smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ klu 'gro mgyogs dang nab so ni/ 'di ltar mthu che zhing / rdzu 'phrul
che ba yin pas/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas nga'i bstan pa thal bar brlag par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod do/ /snyam du mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das klu 'gro mgyogs
dang nab so gnyis ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis la bka' stsal pa/ 'gro mgyogs dang nab so/ /tshig bzhi pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba yod pa
bshad kyi/ shes par byos shig /btsun pa/ bdag cag dam pa'i chos 'tshal bar bgyid pa su zhig mchis snyam du rig nas de nyid du slar zhugs te/ de gnyis 'di snyam du sems so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la chos bshad na/ bdag cag gis rnam par ma shes so/ /snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs der sku'i gzugs brnyan btang nas 'gro mgyogs
dang nab so gnyis kyis de la bltas shing bcom ldan 'das da dung bzhugs pa lta zhes slar yang dang yang du zhugs so/ /phyogs de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo spu bu can dang
sbubs can gnyis btul to/ /mdung can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so/ /mdung can gyi grong khyer na gnod sbyin mo mdung can zhes bya ba khro zhing gtum la gzu lums can zhig gnas pas/ mdung

can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag za bar byed do/ /mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das 'das mdung can
gyi grong khyer du gshegs nas phyogs che ge mo na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyur 'phrad cing 'dus nas mdung can gyi grong khyer nas byung ste bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po so drug pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag cag gdugs
tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas
zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis klu
gdug pa dang gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni/ btul lags na/ btsun pa/ gnod sbyin mo mdung can zhes bgyi ba 'di/ bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas sha 'khon ma mchis par ni/
sha 'khod du bgyis/ 'gran zla ma lags par ni/ 'gran zla bgyid/ glags ma btsal bar ni/ glags tshol bar bgyid de/ byis pa btsas shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/ gnod sbyin mo mdung can gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshe gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can la bka' stsal pa/ mdung can khyod kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis thos lags so/ /mdung chen/ khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar gshegs
pa| bdag gis thos lags so/ /dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log cig /btsun pa/ dam zhig bcas te/ gal te 'di dag bdag cag gi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig par bgyid na/
bdag ldog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag /khyed kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das/
thos lags so/ /khyed cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das/ rtsig lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ rtsig lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor
dang bcas te btul nas gshegs so/ /'bra go can du gshegs pa dang / 'bra go can na byis pa chung ngu dag cig rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa chung ngu dag rdul

gyi mchod rten la rtse ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang / yang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis byis pa chung ngu rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse ba dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa/

mthong lags so/ /lag na rdo rje/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bzhi brgya lon pa na/ 'dir ku sha na'i rigs kyi rgyal po ka ni ska zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur pa des/ phyogs 'dir mchod rten brtsigs par

'gyur te/ de'i ming ka ni ska'i mchod rten zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing / nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang sangs rgyas kyis bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka nas klu'i
rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang 'bum phrag bdun btul nas ro hi ta kar gshegs te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas nang du yang dag bzhag go /bcom ldan
'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dang po'i rgyal srid gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /
de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ni/ 'di skad ces/ kun dga' bo/ byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog
ma med 'dul du 'dong / byang phyogs na ni/ phan yon rnam pa lnga yod do/ /zhes gsungs la/ da bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ kun dga' bo/ dang po'i rgyal srid gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /
zhes gsungs na/ de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /nga gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu byang phyogs su gshegs nas ta ma sa'i tshal
rnams lung bstan to/ /zhes bya ba nas rdul gyi mchod rten lung bstan to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /kun dga' bo/ ro hi ta ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs
pas| srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang / 'bum phrag bdun btul to/ /byang phyogs na ni/ nyes dmigs lnga yod do/ /mtho na dman can dang / sdong dum dang / tsher mas gang ba dang / rdo ba
dang | gseg ma dang / gyo mo mang ba dang / khyi za ba dang / bud med gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa'o/ /sdom la/ dang po'i rgyal srid rtag bzang dang / bcom dang ni o ta la'i/ /kun dga'
ra ba dgra mtha' dang / /tshugs par dka' dang gang+gA'i chu/ /yi dwags dus dpag phyi ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dang po'i rgyal srid du gshegs
nas| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bskur ba/ dang por rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de
ni| dang po'i rgyal po yin no/ /de'i phyir 'di dang po'i rgyal srid ces bya bar grags so/ /rta bzang du gshegs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i rta bzang po rin po che byung ste/ de'i phyir 'di rta bzang zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /bcom brlag gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal

pa| kun dga' bo/ /khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa pha bi mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de ni/ ri bo rtse mthon zhes bya ste/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo
brgya lon pa dang bcom brlag nas gar mkhan dang / dpa' bo zhes bya ba spun gnyis kyis de la gtsug lag khang rtsig par 'gyur te/ de'i ming gar mkhan dpa' bo
zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing / lhag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ bcom brlag 'dir spos tshong gi khye'u sbas pa zhes bya ba

'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bu nye sbas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi mtshan med pa zhig byung ba de/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed
par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa nyi ma'i gung zhes bya bas/ nye sbas de rab tu 'byin par 'gyur te/ gdams ngag ston pa rnams kyi phyi ma ni/ nye sbas yin par 'gyur
ro| |gar mkhan dpa' bo de la phug/ srid du khru bco brgyad pa/ zheng du khru gnyis pa/ 'phang du khru bdun pa zhig yod par 'gyur te/ des gang dang gang dag la gdams ngag bstan nas dgra
bcom pa mngon sum du byas pa de dang de rnams kyis/ thur ma sor bzhi tsam pa re re phug de'i nang du 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe phug de/ dgra bcom pa'i thur mas gang bar gyur pa de'i tshe/
nye sbas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dgra bcom pa'i thur ma de dag nyid spungs nas de rnams kyis sreg par byed do/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes

nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa na skye bo mang po la snying brtse ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas lung bstan pa la
gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de'i tsher ma zad/ ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa de/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la

zungs shig dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ri rtse mthon po 'di nyid kyi ngos gsum la rang sangs rgyas dang / drang srong dang / spre'u rnams gnas te/ ngos gcig na ni/ rang sangs rgyas lnga

brgya'o/ /gnyis pa la ni/ drang srong lnga brgya'o/ /gsum pa la ni/ spre'u lnga brgya'o/ /spre'u'i sde dpon gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ spre'u'i phru gu btsas shing btsas pa dag gsod par byed pa yin no/ /de nas
spre mo de dag phru gu'i mya ngan gyis non pas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan spre mo dag/ nyon cig /bdag cag gi phru gu btsas shing btsas pa dag /sde dpon 'dis gsod par byed kyi/
de la thabs shig bsham bar bya ste/ bdag cag las spre mo gang zhig sbrum par gyur ma/ des sde dpon la brjod par mi bya'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nas spre mo zhig sbrum par gyur nas/ de de
rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu sbas nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bus bsnyod de spre'u'i phru gu byung nas/ de yang de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu bsnun gsos bskyed de/ de gang gi tshe chen
por gyur pa de'i tshe/ des sde dpon de rang gi khyu nas bskrad nas ri bo rtse mthon na phan tshun du 'khyams par brtsams so/ /de 'khyams pa na rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra
thos nas/ de de rnams kyi drung du song ste/ gang gi tshe bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de rnams la rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / so shing dag 'bul bar byed
do| |de rnams kyis kyang de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do/ /rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni/ zos shing zos nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ spre'u des kyang
de rnams kyi spyod lam mthong nas skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi lus rnag can 'dis thob par
bya ba gang yin pa ni/ thob zin gyi/ bdag cag gis zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs 'jug go/ snyam nas/ de rnams 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog
'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de rnams ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de'i tshe mi ldang nas spre'u
des de rnams ma mthong bas mi dga' bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na spre'u de phug tu zhugs nas rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyi chos gos rnams nas bsigs par brtsams so/ /de nas phug de na gnas pa'i

lha gang yin pa de/ 'di snyam du sems te/ spre'u 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi sku bshig ni/ mi rung ngo / /snyam nas rdo leb chen pos sgo bcad nas 'dug go/ /de nas spre'u de/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang /
smre sngags bton te song nas ri bo rtse mthon la kun nas 'khyams pa na/ mi rnams 'dod pas mi dga' bar gyur te rna ba gtod cing mi'i sgra thos par 'dod pa las/ des drang srong de rnams smra ba'i sgra
dag thos nas/ de mgron po lam stor ba bzhin du rings pa rings par de rnams kyi drung du song ngo / /drang srong de dag kyang dka' thub drag pos gdung bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ lag pa bsgrengs nas
'dug go/ kha cig ni/ rkang pa ya gcig gis so/ /kha cig ni/ gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed do/ /gang gi tshe spre'u de de rnams dang lhan cig bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ drang srong
de rnams la rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / so shing dag sbyin par byed do/ /de rnams kyang de la zas kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do/ /des de rnams kyi spyod lam dkrugs
shing / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam ston par byed de/ de na gang dag lag pa bsgreng ba de rnams kyi lag pa dag phab nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste sbran nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/
gang dag rkang pa ya gcig pa de rnams kyi rkang ba phab nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ gang dag gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed pa de rnams kyi me bsad nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste mdun
du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /de nas drang srong de rnams kyis gdams ngag 'bogs pa la smras pa/ mkhan po/ spre'u 'di bdag cag gi dka' thub la bar chad
bgyid do/ /zhes de rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ spre'u de dag ni/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gdon mi za bar 'dis drang srong kha cig gi spyod lam
de lta bu mthong gi/ khyed cag gis kyang skyil mo krung chos la 'dug cig/ de rnams kyi skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang / de rnams sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur nas/ de rnams
kyis mkhan po dang slob dpon med pa'i shes pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang mthun pa'i chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas de rnams spre'u de
la chos las byung ba'i dad pa skyes nas de rnams kyis ljongs nas bsod snyoms lo thog gsar pa dang / 'bras bu gsar pa dang / dus gsar gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams las de la
thog mar byin nas/ bdag nyid longs spyod par byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spre'u de dus las 'das so/ /de nas rang byang chub de rnams kyis/ yul khams dang phyogs sna tshogs na
yod pa'i shing dri zhim po rnams blangs te/ shing dri zhim po thams cad kyis phung por spungs nas bsregs so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ rang byang chub rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas

pa'i spre'u gang yin pa de ni/ nye sbas 'di nyid yin te/ 'di de'i tshe yang skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs so/ /da ltar na yang ngas 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / snying brtse bar lung bstan to/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs na/ bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis/ dge slong go'u ta ma bcom brlag tu phyin nas de shin
tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag par 'dod de/ 'chad par byed/ 'dogs par byed/ rab tu 'jog par byed/ rnam par 'jog par byed/ bye brag tu 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ ston
par byed/ yang dag par rab tu bstan par byed do/ /zhes thos nas/ gal te de bcom brlag tu 'dug na/ bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i bar chad du 'gyur la/ de ni/ bkur sti ma yin
pas skrag go /zhes grag gi /gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma yin pa byas na/ de lta na de bcom brlag tu 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te de la mi smad rigs kyis bkur sti ma yin pa
byas na/ ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin gyi/ gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma yin par byas na/ des ni/ legs par 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi nang na skyes bu gtso bo su
zhig yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe bcom brlag na bram ze sngor gyur ces bya ba/ rig byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed pa/ pha rol gyi rgol ba tshar
gcod par nus pa/ de'i tshig bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhig yod do/ /de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze rnam 'dus shing tshogs te/ sngor gyur gyi drung du song nas mkhan
po| |'dir dge sbyong go'u ta ma mchis nas/ der shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do/ /zhes thos zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de ni/
bkur sti ma yin pas skrag go /zhes gda' na/ gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na/ de lta na de bcom brlag tu mchis par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te de la mi smad rigs
kyis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na/ ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin gyi/ gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na legs par 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi skyes bu gtso
bo mkhan po ma lags pa su zhig mchis/ khyod kyis de la bkur sti ma lags pa'i tshig gi rgya lcag gis spyo bar gsol/ sngor gyur gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag gi lce 'di ni/ bden
pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ gal te spyo bar 'os pa zhig na/ spyo'o/ /'on te bstod par 'os pa zhig na/ bstod do/ /de nas bram ze sngor gyur/ bcom brlag na gnas pa'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan
rabs rnams kyis mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba na/ bram ze sngor gyur gyis rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba/ shing drung zhig na

brten cing zhi ba'i spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ya mtshan skyes te mig bgrad de bltas nas bstod par brtsams pa/ lus dang ngag dang dbang por bcas pa yi/ /yid kyis tshul bzhin
rtse gcig bgyis nas ni/ yon tan rang bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho che/ /khyod kyi yon tan phyogs gcig brjod par bgyi/ /smra ba rnams kyi dam pa rab mchog lags/ /skyon med dbang po shin tu mnyam
par bzhag /pha rol rgol ba brtson pa thams cad kyis/ /don dam thugs su chud la bskyod mi nus/ /khyod kyi spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa nyid/ brtul zhugs bsgrubs pas brtul zhugs shin tu rdzogs/
stobs ldan khyod kyi ting 'dzin zad med pas/ /sred med bu dang ri yi rgyal po bzhin/ /skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la gnod mi mnga'/ /mi zhum bsnyengs pa mi mnga' dub mi mnga'/ /'byung po rnams la'ang
mi bzod 'ga' mi mnga'/ /khyod ni ma chags 'thab pa ga la mnga'/ /brtabs pa med cing ha cang zhum mi mnga'/ /gdung ba med cing dgyes pa'ang yod mi mnga'/ /ri yi bdag po lhun po rab brtan ltar/ /
khyod kyi thugs ni rtag tu dge ba nyid/ /thub pa skyes mchog khams rnams thams cad nas/ /khyod kyi ye shes yangs pa sgrib mi mnga'/ /skye mched rnam pa sna tshogs dag la ni/ /ma thogs nyams shing zad
pa med par 'jug /thub pa khyod la gang la'ang som nyi med/ /yid gnyis yod min the tshom yod ma yin/ /khyod nyid kyis ni mchog dang mchog min pa/ /rig pas
thugs su chud nas thams cad mkhyen/ /mthong na dga' bar 'gyur la mthong na legs/ /mthong na legs pas mthong na mkhas pa dga'/ /khyod la dga' ba dang mi dga' mnyam pas na/ /rtag tu
dga' ba'i spyod lam de bzhin mdzod/ /khyod ni snyan pa'i spobs par ldan pa lags/ /'dzum pa'i gsung dang dran ldan bsnyengs pa med/ /mkhas rnams 'dod pa rab tu 'chad pas na/ /'jig rten

gsum du khyod kyi grags pa 'byung / /mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang / /srin po mang dang 'jig rten 'dir mkhas dang / thub pa'i drung du yang dang yang lhags nas/ /khyod la yang dang yang zhu
mi bzod med/ /khyod ni snyan pa'i gsung gis dga' mdzad pas/ /mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang / /srin po yid gnyis bsal rnams thub pa che/ /khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal slar
mchi'o/ /bzhengs dang bzhugs dang gshegs dang bzhud pa dang / /mnal dang mi gsung yang na gsung ba 'am/ /'on te lhung bzed chos gos bsnams ba dag /go'u ta ma khyod kyi thams cad
mdzes pa nyid/ /thogs pa med mnga' mi myur mnyam pas na/ /gsung ni snyan pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan/ /mi yi mchog ni dus su gsung bas na/ /gsung gi zlos pa rnam par spangs pa
lags/ /'jig rten na ni stobs dang ldan par grags/ /skyes bu mkhyen pa skyes bu khyu mchog gtso/ /'jig rten lhar bcas 'di ni mtha' dag la/ /nga rgyal mi mnga' khyad du gsod mi mdzad/ /mdza' ba

dang ni mdza' ba ma lags dang / /mthun pa dang ni mthun pa ma lags dang / /g.yo dang mi g.yo rang bzhin gnas pa la/ /ngo mtshar 'dzin pa nam yang mi mnga'o/ /smre sngags 'don cing snying brtser smra ba
dang / /kha chu 'dzag pas nyam thag skad 'byin dang / /yongs su gdungs dang rnam par gdungs ldan dang / /'jigs dang rims nad mya ngan gyis nyen pa/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa brgya yis gtses pa dang /
yun ring nas ni mgon med bde ba med/ /srid pa'i sred par zhugs shing mun bsgribs pa'i/ /'gro ba 'khrugs pa la ni rab gzigs nas/ /bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs mthu dag gis/ /thub pa
thugs rje chen po 'jug mdzad cing / /shAkya skyes kyi mchog ni khyod nyid kyis/ /phongs par gyur rnams dgrol phyir brtson pa mdzad/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas 'di dang / /srid pa'i sdug
bsngal zad pa gang min dang / /srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba yi/ /lam ni mtshungs pa med pa khyod kyis bshad/ /rnam par 'dren pa chen po brtson 'grus che/ /rab mchog pha rol smra ba
rnams kyi mchog /'jig rten gsum na khyod mtshungs ma mchis na/ /khyod las lhag pa lta zhig ga la mchis/ /khyod la khong khro rjes su chags mi mnga'/ /thub pa khyod la yongs su zad mi mnga'//
sdug dang 'gal dang rtsod pa brtul zhugs bzang / /khyod la mi mnga' rtag tu mi mnga' lags/ /thub pa sdug dang mi sdug bde ba dang / /sdug bsngal mnyam dang de bzhin mi mnyam
spangs/ /dga' dang mi dga' ba dag bzod mdzad de/ /yang dag bsdams shing 'di na nyer zhi spyod/ /smad pa byas kyang gnod pa mi mnga' la/ /rab tu bsngags pas khengs par mi 'gyur pas/ /grags pa
grags pa ma yin khyod la mnyam/ /glang chen mche bar ldan pa g.yul ngo ru/ /'dor ba drag tu 'phangs pa'i mda' dag ltar/ /skye bo sdig can rnams kyis smras pa yi/ /tshig ngan tshig rtsub dag kyang

bzod par mdzad/ /drang srong khyod snyan gsung zhing tshig kyang bzod/ /shin tu ngan du smras kyang mi bzod med/ /smad par smras sam dge bar smras kyang rung / /thub pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa lags/ /mchod
'os rtag par mi dang lha dag dang / /lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams dang ni/ /drang srong bdag nyid chen pos rtag mchod na/ /khyod ni thugs brtan gzhan du 'gyur mi mnga'/ /'di bas bdag mchog
ces kyang rlom mi mnga'/ /'di bas bdag chung zhes kyang rlom mi mnga'/ /bdag ni 'di dag mnyam zhes mi rlom pas/ /khyod la nga rgyal rnam pa gsum mi mnga'/ /brtan dang ldan pa bong ba gser dang

mtshungs/ /bai DUr+ya dang gseg ma gyo mor mtshungs/ /thub pa chen po lha dang bcas pa yi/ /'gro ba 'di ni rtswa shing 'dra bar spyod/ /zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer dang phrad nas/ /grang dang tsha ba'i rlung dag langs na

yang / /ri yi dbang po lta bur bzod mdzad de/ /thugs brtan khyod la rab tu gnod mi mnga'/ /gzims cha dang ni stsang nas bshos dang ni/ /bla gos sham thabs rnam pa sna tshogs dag /thub pa zag med so/ /
sor brtags nas ni/ /de yi don du ston par mdzad pa lags/ /mgon po bdag la med ces thugs ngan med/ /ma bcings legs gsungs bdag gir 'dzin mi mnga'/ /gnod pa sna tshogs dag las yongs
su grol| rnyed pa rnyed na'ang dgyes par mi 'gyur la/ /de ma rnyed pas kyang ni zhum mi 'gyur/ /khyad du gsod pa bzod pa mdzad cing 'dir/ /bkur sti dag la'ang chags pa mi mnga' lags/ /lha gnas ri yi
ngos las 'khrungs pa yi/ /khrag ltar dmar pa'i tsan+dan mchog dag dang / /mda' dang ral gri rnon pos khyod kyi thugs/ /lan 'ga' yang ni 'gyur ba mi mnga' lags/ /don med gtam ni gsung bar mi mdzad
gang / /skye bo ngan pas bsten pa'i gtan ma lags/ rnyed pas gtam min zang zing bcas gtam min/ /bdag nyid che rnams mi 'dod ma lags kyi/ /gtam gang rab dben bde ba skyed byed cing / /rab tu zhi
ba 'ga' zhig rab brjod pa/ /lha las 'das pa'i gtam ni gang dag cig /gsung nas sdig pa rnam par 'dul ba gsung / /snyan pa rnams dang 'brel pa rnams dang ni/ /legs par bshad dang snying por ldan pa/
yi| |rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag thub pa che/ /'gro ba'i don slad rab tu gsung bar mdzad/ /mi mkhas dag dang log par lta rnams dang / /gzu lums can dang dga' bar ldan rnams dang / /phra ma can dang
tshig rtsub rgyu can gang / /de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen/ /mi ni gang dag drang zhing sgyu med pa/ /bden la dga' zhing dbang po thul ba dang / /rtag tu legs par brtags

nas byed pa ni/ /de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen/ /chos mkhyen lugs mkhyen gang zag mkhyen pa dang / /drug po mngon mkhyen khyed la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /thub pa zhing mkhyen mchog dang mchog min
mkhyen| |tshul dang tshul min mkhyen khyod mgos phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rgya chen legs mthong nas/ /bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig yongs su brjod par bas/ /'phags pa khyod kyi
yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol ni/ /rtogs par rngo thogs 'gro ba'i nang na mi ma mchis/ /de lta bu la sogs pa bstod pa lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis sngor gyur ji ltar stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bram ze sngor gyur gyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas song ste
de lam du zhugs pa na bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis tshig gi rgya lcag gis pags pa las thal ba tsam du brgyad de/ mkhan po khyod la kho bo cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma la bkur sti ma
yin pa byos shig /ces smras na/ khyed da gzod slar bstod bstod de 'ong ngam/ shes ldan dag /kho bos sngar kho bo'i lce ni/ bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ gal te smad par 'os pa zhig na/
smod la/ bstod par 'os pa zhig na/ bstod do/ /zhes ma smras sam/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bstod par 'os bas kho bos bstod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/
lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas bcom brlag tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de'i tshe bcom brlag na rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bab bo/ /de nas bcom brlag na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de/
'di snyam du sems te/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma bcom brlag tu 'ongs na/ bdag gi rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bar chad byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar sgren
mor byung nas 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo/ re zhig bud med ni/ shin tu bkab kyang bzang ba ma yin na/ sgren mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas lha mo de skyengs nas phyogs
gcig tu song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam las gzur te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bcom brlag na ni/ nyes dmigs lnga po 'di dag yod do/ /lnga gang zhe na/ mtho na dman dang / sdong dum dang tsher mas gang ba dang / rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo mang
ba dang / dgongs ka za ba dang / bud med mang ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs par bcom brlag gi gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas gang na ba de logs su gshegs te byon nas gnod sbyin
bong bu'i gnas byul te shing drung zhig tu brten cing nyin mo'i gnas pa'i phyir bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu bong bu'i gzugs su byas nas 'phyan pa dang / de la khye'u
dang / bu mo dag zhon pa dang / des de dag rtser bcug /dga' bar byed du bcug nas nags thibs por song nas za bar byed pas/ de'i ming gnod sbyin bong bu/ gnod sbyin bong bu zhes bya
bar grags so/ /bcom brlag gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las/ lha mo zhig gis mtho ba tsam pas/ bcom
brlag tu ma gshegs par gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas su gshegs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bcas dag so so nas snod du btsos shing bsdogs te/
shing rtar bcug nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas
cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis slad du 'dir gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bca' ba dang / bza' ba
dag gis shing rta bkang ste 'tshal te mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ de bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
pa| kun dga' bo/ song la gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na/ dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su sdus shig /bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod du gzhug
go |btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na/ dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de dag thams
cad rim gro'i gnas su bsags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing mchis pa de dag thams
cad rim gro'i gnas su bsags lags te/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge
'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa
dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas zhes bya ba nas/ phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni/ btul lags na/ btsun
pa| gnod sbyin bong bu 'di/ bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas/ sha 'khon ma mchis par ni/ sha 'khon bgyid/ 'gran zla ma lags par ni/ 'gran zla bgyid/ glags ma btsal bar
ni| glags tshol bar bgyid de/ nges bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ gnod sbyin bong bu gdul
bar gsol| de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu la bka' stsal pa/ bong bu/ khyod kyis thos sam/
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis thos lags so/ /bong bu/ khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag gis thos lags so/ /dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa las log cig /bcom
ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gi slad du phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs par dam 'cha' bar bgyid na/ bdag ldog go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bcom brlag gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag /khyed cag gis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ thos lags te/ rtsig go /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor lnga brgya dang btul to/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis de'i ched du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin mda'
can dang / gnod sbyin nags ldan dang / gnod sbyin mo bslang rnyed ma dang / mchu rnams btul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom brlag tu zhugs so/ /zhugs nas gnod sbyin mo

'gran zla ma 'khor lnga brgya dang btul nas de'i don du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi nang dang phyi rol du gnod sbyin nyis stong lnga brgya btul nas
de'i ched du bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lhag khang nyis stong lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das o ta lar gshegs te/ o ta la na o ta la'i nags khrod na
bzhugs so/ /de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bu zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so/ /zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro
na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ o ta la ra bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / phyogs gzhan zhig na zhing pa lnga brgya
tsam mgo bo rdul gyis g.yogs shing sha na'i ras kyis smad g.yogs nas zhing rmod pa las/ zhing pa de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ gzi brjid kyis mdzes par mthong ngo / /zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de rnams la chos bshad pas zhes bya ba nas mchod par bya ba dang / rjed
par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas rmon pa stong po de dag gnya' shing dang / ru dag bcad nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ste
lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor te 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes nas
zhes bya ba nas bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
zhus pa/ btsun pa/ zhing pa lnga brgya bo 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur nas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skyes shing / 'di rnams ni/
rmon par gyur lags/ dge slong dag/ 'di rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ 'di rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin

te| 'di rnams kyis de na le los dus 'das par byas pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur to/ /rmon pa 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid la rab tu byung ba nas bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo
rnams la gus par ma byas pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes so/ /'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de'i las

kyi rnam par smin pas nga las bden pa mthong bar byas so/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bus dge sbyong

shAkya'i sras/ shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs

rgyas nas dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang o ta lar byon nas o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs te/ shes ldan dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad
pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su grags par gyur te/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i skye rgu dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams la rang gi mngon par
shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi zag pa zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar byed cing / de chos
bshad pa ni/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba 'ba' zhig ston to/ /
zhes thos nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze de lta bu lta ba ni/ legs pa yin/ nye bar 'gro ba ni/ legs pa yin/ bsnyen bkur byed pa ni/ legs pa yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas/ shing rta rta rgod ma
dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas gser gyi 'khar ba dang / ril
ba spyi blugs thogs te o ta la nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas
song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zhugs nas/ bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta las bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
bcom ldan 'das la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta las 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye go'u ta ma/ dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa dang / yul tha dad pa can/ rang rang gi spyod yul dang / yul

nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyi/ gzhan gyi spyod yul dang / yul gzhan nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang
lus kyi dbang po gang dag lags pa de rnams kyi spyod yul dang / yul nyams su myong bar bgyid pa ni/ gang lags/ de rnams kyi rton pa yang gang lags/ bram ze/ dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa

dang / yul tha dad pa can 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po gang dag yin pa de rnams kyis spyod yul dang / yul nyams

su myong ba ni/ yid yin no/ /de rnams kyi rton pa yang yid yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ yid kyi rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ yid kyi rton pa ni/ dran pa yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ dran pa'i rton pa gang lags
bram ze/ dran pa'i rton pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa ni/ rig
pa dang / rnam par grol ba yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /kye
go'u ta ma/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ ha cang thal ches so/ /ha cang thal ches so/ /dri ba rnams kyi mtha' gzung bar mi nus te/ nga'i drung du ni/ yang dag par sdug
bsngal zad par bya ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi mthar bya ba'i phyir tshangs par spyod pa mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa can spyod par byed do/ /de
nas bram ze o ta la'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la gnod pa ci zhig bya snyam mo/ /des kyang sngon dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol nas smon
lam btab na/ des ci bsam pa dang / ci gsol ba de thams cad so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes thos so/ /de nas bram ze o ta la'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang
bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /
stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas smon lam log par gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag gi shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ji snyed cig bshos gsol ba 'di thams
cad bdag gi slad du gyur cig /snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bram ze o ta la'i bu'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bram ze o ta la'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bram ze/
khyod kyis mi rung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni/ 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar/ dge slong 'di thams cad ni/ yang srid pa zad pa yin gyi/ sems gzhan skyed cig ces bka' stsal nas bcom
ldan 'das yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /dge slong dag /bram ze o ta la'i bus smon lam log pas bslang ba'i sems sdig pa can bskyed kyi/ khyed cag gis zan zos
nas gtsug lag khang gi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cig dang / log pa'i smon lam 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas phyi bzhin
'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yul o ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / o ta la na bran mo rgan mo ka tsang ga la zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de bum pa thogs nas chu 'chur
khron pa'i drung du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
kun dga' bo/ /song la rgan mo pha bi la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyi/ /chu phul cig ces sgos shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi
ltar mnyan nas rgan mo ka tsang ga la gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgan mo ka tsang ga la la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ka tsang ga la/ bcom ldan 'das skyems kyi /chu phul cig /des smras pa/
'phags pa/ bdag nyid 'tshal te mchi'o/ /de nas ka tsang ga las chu bum pa bkang nas rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang / ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas

lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu yang de'i bu'i sdug pa skyes nas des lag pa bsgrengs te bu bu zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par brtsams pa dang /

dge slong rnams kyis de bzlog go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyod kyis rgan mo 'di ma zlog cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang / /rtag tu nga yi yum gyur pas//

nga yi sku la reg pa las/ /gal te 'di ni bzlog byas na/ /de'u re mod la khrag dron dag /'di yi kha nas skyug par 'gyur/ /bu la gdung ba 'di mthong nas/ /byas pa gzo ba rjes dgongs te/ /thugs rje dang ni thugs
brtse bas/ /sku la reg tu gnang bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la mgul nas 'khyud du gnang bas/ de bu la chags pa dang bral nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos

bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas ka tsang ga las 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas
lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa/ 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas ma bgyis te/ mas ma lags zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa
dag gis kyang gsol ba/ ma la lan du phan 'dogs pa'i/ /bu mchog gis ni bgyi ba gang / /thar la sems gzhol 'gyur ba de/ /khyod kyis de ring bdag la mdzod/ /khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro
la| |drangs te mtho ris thar la bzhag /khyod kyis rtsol ba chen po yis/ /dka' ba legs par mdzad pa lags/ /ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas dus gzhan zhig na ka tsang ga las jo bo la gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/ /de nas des rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no/ /de brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas nas nyon mongs pa
thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom mar gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas rjed par bya bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
du'o|| ||'dul ba gzhi/ bam po so bdun pa/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bsdus te mdor bka' stsal nas/ gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i

phyir 'jug par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ ka tsang ga las de rgyas par lung ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga'i nyan thos dge slong ma mdo sde rnam par 'byed

par byed pa rnams kyi nang na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma ka tsang ga la 'di mchog yin no/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun
pa| ka tsang ga las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na/ rgas nas rab tu byung bar gyur/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na/ dbul ba dang / bran mor gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi srid pa tha ma pa de'i mngal du ma
bzung bar gyur/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong ma ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las byas shing tshogs rnyed pa dag ces bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bu 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong
dag/ sngon byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa na/ 'di nga'i yum du gyur te/ gang gi tshe nga rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ 'dis nga bzlog pas/ las de'i
rnam par smin pas rgas nas rab tu byung ngo / /nga sbyin pa gtong ba na/ 'dis bar chad byas pas/ des na/ dbul bar gyur to/ /ji ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo ltar 'dis bsod nams dbang che bar grags par

'gyur ba'i las ma byas te/ des na/ nga'i srid pa tha ma 'di'i mngal du ma bzung ngo / /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las rab tu byung nas/ dge slong ma slob pa dang / mi slob pa rnams
la bran mo/ zhes tshig tu brjod pas/ des na/ bran mor gyur to/ /de na 'dis gang dag bklags shing ston pas phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pas/ des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom
pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /rab tu 'byin pa'i mkhan po gang yin pa de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog
tu bstan pa dang / des na 'dis kyang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yon gnas bla na med pa la tshe ji srid
cig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa na/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis/ bram ze'i

khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze khye'u khyod skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /
zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po 'di/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'phyed par byed pa
rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu ston par gyur cig /ces byas te/ de'i smon lam
gyi dbang gis/ ngas da ltar mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ gcig tu nag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa
yin la zhes bya ba nas brtson par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yul dgra mtha' gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das
kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na kun dga' ra ba zhig na bram ze zhig khron pa nas chu bcus shing kun dga' ra ba bcu bar
brtsams so/ /bram ze des rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bsam pa/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma kun dga' ra bar zhugs na/ kun dga' ra ba dang / chu
ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas/ sgo bcad de/ dpyad thag dang chu snod sbas nas 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis kun dga' ra bar zhugs pa dang / gnod sbyin
gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis khron pa de bzung nas/ kun dga' ra ba de thams cad chus g.yogs par byas so/ /de nas bram ze/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin
no| |snyam du rig nas mngon par dad par gyur te gsol pa/ shes ldan go'u ta ma tshur spyon/ dpyad thag ni/ 'di lags/ chab snod ni/ 'di lags kyi/ chab ci bder bzhes su gsol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te kun na chu yod na/ khron pa'i chus ko ci zhig bya/ /'dir ni srid pa'i rtsa bcad nas/ /gang zhig yongs su
brtsal bar spyod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs

pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra
phyi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /de nas brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal pa
byas nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//
zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang yul dgra mthar gshegs te dgra mtha' na sbu gu can gyi shing nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so/ /

de'i tshe dgra mtha' na rgyal po bram ze me sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /rgyal po bram ze me sbyin
gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / dgra mthar byon nas dgra mtha' na sbu bu can gyi shing nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'di snyam
du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ mtha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas te dgra bcom par bkur la/ gal te bdag gis dge sbyong
go'u ta ma la bkur sti ma byas na/ mtha'i rgyal phran rnams/ shes ldan dag/ kye ma rgyal po bram ze me sbyin ni/ byis pa yin te/ de'i grong dang zhing na dge sbyong
go'u ta ma nye bar brten cing bzhugs na/ bsnyen bkur ma byas so/ /zhes smod par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams
cad kyis bstab bo/ /snyam du bsam nas/ rgyal po chen po'i 'byor ba dang / rgyal po chen po'i mthus dgra mtha' nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu
'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom lda
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /shes ldan go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun
dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po
bram ze me sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de rang gi

khyim du song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sna bco brgyad dang / sran tshod sna tshogs dang / tshod ma ro dang ldan pa dang / 'bras chan rab tu mang por
chos shig /dgra mthar dril sgrog tu bcug pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma zla ba gsum du gzhan gyis gdugs tshod ma gsol cig /gang zhig gis gdugs tshod gsol na/ de ni/ chad par gsad do/ /
zhes des de skad du dril bsgrags nas nub mo nyal ba dang / rmi lam na bdag gi rgyu mas dgra mtha'i grong khyer thams cad bskor bar rmis so/ /rmis nas kyang sngangs skrag byed cing spu zing zhes byed
nas myur ba myur bar mal chen po nas langs te/ lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam du sems khong du
chud cing 'dug pa las/ de nam nangs nas bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa/ mkhan po/ /bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i rmi lam zhig mthong na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bram ze mdun na
'don gyis bsam pa/ ji ltar lhas rmi lam bzang po zhig rmis te/ gal te bdag de dang mthun par bsnyad na/ 'di lhag par yang dge sbyong go'u ta ma
la dad pa skyed par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di ngan par bsnyad do/ /snyam du bsam nas smras pa/ lha/ rmi lam mi bzang lags so/ /mkhan po/ 'di'i 'bras bu cir 'gyur/ lha/
gdon mi 'tshal bar rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ e ma'o/ /kyi hud bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ srog gi bar chad
du mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsam nas/ bram ze mdun na 'don la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gis na/ kho bo rgyal srid las nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur
ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/ des smras pa/ lha/ gal te mi gda' ba'i phyogs su zla ba gsum bzhugs na/ de nas lha rgyal srid las mi nyams shing / srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur
lags so/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bsam pa/ gal te de lta na/ de bya sla bas dril sgrog tu gzhug go/ snyam nas/ des yul thams cad du dril sgrog tu bcug pa/ nga la zla ba
gsum du blta zhing nye bar su yang ma 'ong zhig/ gang zhig 'ongs na/ de ni chad par gsad do/ /zhes dril sgrog tu bcug nas zla ba gsum du mi snang ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug go/ tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba las/ ji tsam na rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams sems las chung ngus 'khod pa dag mthong
ngo| |mthong nas kyang smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci/ sems las chung ngus 'khod dam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci zhig bgyir mchis/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs
pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis mi bstab bam/ khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod nas gdugs tshod kyang sta gon mi byed/ gdan yang mi shom na/ ci/ sangs rgyas
la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod gcod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ lhas lnga brgya rnams kyi ched du zhal zas bsod pa mang du sta gon byos shig ni/
bka' stsal gyi/ che ge mo zhig gi don du'o/ /zhes bka' ma stsal lags so/ /shes ldan dag/ deng lha la zhus shig /'phags pa/ lhas dril sgrog tu stsal pa/ da la zla ba gsum du lta zhing nye
bar su'ang ma 'ong zhig /gang zhig 'ongs na/ de chad par gsad do/ /zhes bsgrags na/ ci/ bdag cag la mgo bo gnyis mchis sam/ bdag cag ni/ mi zhu lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo/ /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyal par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
dga' bo/ song la snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams
su shes ldan dag /khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des/ zhal zas gsol cig ces sbron cig /btsun
pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che
dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol
bar spro ba des/ zhal zas gsol cig /dgra mtha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ bdag cag lta zhig /re res kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro lags mod kyi/ rgyal po sdig pa can 'dis dril sgrog tu stsal pa/ gzhan sus kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
dge 'dun spyan drangs te zla ba gsum du zhal zas ma gsol cig /gang zhig gis zhal zas gsol na/ de ni/ chad par gsad do/ /zhes bsgrags lags so/ /ji tsam na byang phyogs nas ded
dpon zhig rta lnga brgya la khal bkal te dgra mthar phyin nas des bsam pa/ gal te mod la chas na/ rta rnams kyi rmig pa dub pas 'theng bar 'gyur zhing / lom par yang mi 'gyur bas 'di
nyid du gnas par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de de nyid du 'dug nas/ des rta cang shes la ni/ chas nas bre'u chung do/ /rta lhag ma rnams la ni/ bre'u chung re re thang chad do/ /des rgyal po rtsis mgo 'di
dang 'di dag byas so/ /zhes thos la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa yang thos nas/ des bsam pa/ bdag ni/ rgyal po 'di'i yul na gnas pa ma yin pas/ bdag la rgyal pos ci byar

yod snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa kun dga' bo/ /bdag gis rta cang shes la ni/ chas nas bre'u chung do/ /rta lhag ma rnams la ni/ bre'u chung re re'i thang
lags na/ gal te bcom ldan 'das nas gsol bar spro na/ bcom ldan 'das la ni/ bdag gis nas bre'u chung ngo / /dge slong lhag ma rnams la ni/ bre'u chung re re dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga nyid kyis las
tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i las nga nyid kyis byas shing bsags pas/ nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag
gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur te/ las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ lus can
dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /song la dge slong rnams la tshul shing brims te/ khyed cag
las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig dgra mthar zla ba gsum du longs spyad par spro ba des/ tshul shing longs shig ces sgos shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas tshul shing brim par brtsams pa na/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga ba rgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang bas tshul shing blangs
so| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ bser ma'i bro nad mchis pas/ dgung zla gsum du stsang nas kyis longs spyad par mi spro lags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
dgal gyi bu chen pos gsol ba/ bdag ni/ 'di'i bro g.yog lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu dbyar dgra mthar bzhugs

par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu ni/ ri bo rtse gsum gyi khar song ste dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bdud

rtsis bstabs so/ /de nas ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la ni/ nas bre'u chung do do 'bul lo/ /dge slong gzhan rnams la ni/ nas bre'u chung re re'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su byos shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skal blangs te bud med rgan mo gzhan zhig gang na yod pa der song nas phyin pa dang / bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du
nas la ci legs su bya na/ khyod nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag rgan mos rngo thogs te/ 'on kyang bu mo 'di gzhon lags kyi/ 'di la stsol cig dang / 'dis ni/ ci legs su bgyid

par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de'i drung du song ste phyin nas smras pa/ sring mo/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su byed nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag
dang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag la tshig 'di 'ga' gsung ba lta na/ ci legs su bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ byi dor gyis shig dang smra'o/ /de nas 'dru zhing dris pa/ 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas zhes bgyi
pa 'di ci lags/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsam pa/ gal te 'di la bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ zab pa yin pas/ 'dis shes par mi 'gyur ba'i
gnas gang yin pa yod kyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/ snyam du bsam nas smras pa/ sring mo/
'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ rin po che sna bdun yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bdun po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang
po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni/ blon po rin po che yin no/ /sring mo/ 'khor los
bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'di la rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la mgo
khrus byas te smyung ba byas nas/ de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug pa na/ shar phyogs nas 'khor lo rin po che lte ba dang bcas pa/ rtsibs
stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ mdzes pa/ mkhan bzos ma byas pa/ bzang po/ thams cad gser las byas pa zhig
'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gang yin pa 'dis/ gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba nas thams cad gser las byas zhes bya
ba nas de ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes thos so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bdag ni/ gdon mi za bar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por
'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'khor lo rin po che de brtag par 'dod nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'khor lo rin po che de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas lag pa g.yon par bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pas spor zhing / kye 'khor lo rin po che/ sngon gyi 'khor
los bsgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig /rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig /ces smra'o/ /de nas 'khor lo rin po che de/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
rgyal pos spar ba dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas shar phyogs su sngon gyi 'khor los bsgyur nga 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo rin po che
de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po che de sdod pa der 'khor los bsgyur
ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur zhing / shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na
ba der song ste lhags pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces/ lha tshur gshegs/ lha byon pa legs so/ /yul 'khor 'byor pa dang /
rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba gang lags pa 'di ni/ lha'i lags kyi/ lhas rjes su bskyang du gsol/ bdag cag ni/ lha'i bka' bzhin
bgyid pa lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de'i phyir sna bo dag /khyed cag rang rang gi yul 'khor chos kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i/ chos ma yin pas ni/ ma yin no/ /'ga' zhig
chos ma yin pa spyod dam/ 'dren mar spyod pa zhig yod na/ khyed kyis de yul 'khor du ma bzhag cig /de lta na khyod cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yin no/ /de nas 'khor lo rin po che
des shar phyogs mngon par phab nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas slar log ste/ lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang sngon gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang
yin par 'gro bar 'gyur pas/ de nas 'khor lo rin po che de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos sbar ba dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas byang phyogs su sngon gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba
'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo rin po che de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po che de sdod pa der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur zhing / byang phyogs kyi khams kyi
rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces/ lha tshur gshegs/ lha byon pa legs
so| |yul 'khor 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba gang lags pa 'di ni/ lha'i lags kyi/ lhas rjes su bskyang du gsol/ bdag cag
ni| lha'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de'i phyir sna bo dag /khyod cag rang rang gi yul rnams chos kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i/ chos ma yin pas ni/ ma yin no/ /
'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam/ 'dren mar spyod na/ khyod kyis yul 'khor du ma bzhag cig /de lta na khyed cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yin no/ /de nas 'khor lo rin po che des byang

phyogs mngon par phab nas byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas slar log ste rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin nas dkor khang gi steng du srog shing btsugs pa bzhin du gnas so/ /sring mo/ /'khor
los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ 'khor lo rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ glang po rin po che ji
lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'di la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i glang po ni/ thal kar me tog ku mu da'i mdog lta bu/ yan
lag bdun legs par gnas pa/ gzugs bzang pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa yin no/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'di mthong nas sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/
kye ma'o/ glang po rin po che bzang po zhig yin gyi/ myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos glang po 'dul sbyong mkhan mkhas pa/ pho nyas
bkug nas 'di skad ces smra'o/ /des pa/ khyod kyis glang po rin po che 'di myur ba kho nar legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po 'dul sbyong
