mkhan mkhas pas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas/ glang po rin po che de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob par byed de/ de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa
thams cad slob pa na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs nas dper na/ glang po che gzhan rnams lo du ma dang / lo khyud skor du mar bslab pa thams cad bslab nas bslab
pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du/ glang po che rin po che de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad bslab pa na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs so/ /de dul bar rig nas
'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar byed de/ lha/ glang po rin po che bzang po ni/ dul lags te/ da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i

rgyal pos glang po rin po che de brtag par 'dod nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe glang po rin po che che de la zhon nas rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin pa na zhal
tshus la 'bab ste/ sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ glang po rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig
rten du byung na/ rta rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'di la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rta ni/ thams cad sngo ba/ mgo nag cing / rngog mjug
stug pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa yin te/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos de mthong nas sems mngon par dad par gyur nas kye ma rta rin po che bzang po zhig yin
gyi| myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces smra'o/ /des pa/ khyod kyis rta rin po che 'di myur
ba kho nar legs par dul bar byas la nga la phul cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rta mkhan mkhas pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po las mnyan nas rta rin po che de la bslab pa thams cad
nyin zhag gcig la slob par byed de/ de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs pa ni/
dper na/ rta gzhan rnams lo du ma dang / lo khyud skor du mar bslab pa thams cad bslabs nas bslab pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du/ rta rin po che de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab
pa thams cad slob pa na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs so/ /de dul bar rig nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar byed de/ lha/ rta rin po che bzang po
ni/ dul lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta rin po che brtag par 'dod nas/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe rta
rin po che la zhon nas rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas pa'i sa chen po bskor te rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin pa na zhal tshus la 'bab ste/ sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung
na/ rta rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ nor bu rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor bu ni/ zur brgyad yod pa/ bai DUr+ya bzang po'i rigs can/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ rnam par dang ba yin te/ 'khor
los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang na me mar gyi bya ba thams cad nor bu de'i 'od kyis byed de/ /de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos nor bu rin po che brtag par 'dod nas/ mun nag smag tu
gyur la/ lhas mtshan mo char gyi rgyun dal bu dal bus 'bebs shing glog 'gyu ba'i dus su nor bu rin po che de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhag nas skyed mos tshal gyi nang du dpung gi
tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig dong ba na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi bo ji snyed pa thams cad dang / rgyang grags phyed kho ra khor yug tu
nor bu'i 'od kyis gsal bar gyur te/ sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ nor bu rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ 'khor
los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ btsun mo rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'di la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo
ni/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ ha cang mi dkar ba/ ha cang mi sngo ba/ nya khar pa ltar pags pa 'jam pa/ ha cang mi ring ba/ ha cang mi thung ba/ bong ran pa/ ha
cang mi sbom pa/ ha cang mi skam pa/ ha cang mi tsho ba/ sha bri ran pa gang yin pa ste/ sring mo/ de ni/ grang ba'i tshe lus la reg na/ do ba/ tsha ba'i tshe lus la reg na/ bsil ba/ yul
ka ling+ka'i gos ltar reg na 'jam pa'o/ /sring mo/ /de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ni tsan+dan gyi dri 'byung ngo / /kha nas ni ut+pal sngon po'i dri 'byung
ngo / /ji srid kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun mo rin po che'i bar du bshad pa de srid kyis bu mo des kyang nas kyi bya ba zin nas des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab
par brtsams pa/ 'phags pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo rin po cher gyur cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nas byi dor byas pa
khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo/ nas 'di su zhig gis byi dor byas/ btsun pa/ bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig gis bgyis
lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod bram ze'i bu mo de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam dag byas sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bgyis lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ des na/ khyod
bram ze'i bu mo de dang lan gcig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad nga la rgyas par gsol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bram ze'i bu mo dang lhan cig
skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir bu mo de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa ma brjod/ btsun pa/ bdag gis 'di snyam du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni/ zab
pa lags pas/ bu mo 'dis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis so/ /snyam du bsam nas/ de'i slad du bdag gis de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod
lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis ma legs pa zhig byas te/ khyod kyis gal te de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod pa byas na/ des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod pa zhig/ kun dga' bo/ 'on kyang bu mo de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher
'gyur ro/ /kun tu bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi don du nas byi dor byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher
lung bstan to/ /zhes sgra grags pa dag bu mo lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba zhig gis thos nas dge slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba rnams kyi nas byi dor byas te/
de rnams kyis kyang smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag de'i 'khor du gyur cig/ ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis nas kyi bshos gsol
par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi mug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku che ba rgyud pa de dang de rnams su phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs pa bcad
cing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa de/ da ni/ nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba lta zhes mchi ma dbyung bar brtsams
so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod ci'i phyir mi dga' zhing mchi ma glog/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan
'das 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su 'khrungs nas rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ste phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs pa bkum zhing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa
grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa de/ da ni/ stsang nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba lta snyam bgyid lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'i bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyi zan za bar 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lags so/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyi mche ba'i bar nas nas kyi zan phyung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bza' bar brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis sngon 'di lta bu'i ro myong bar dran nam/ btsun pa/ bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su skyes shing 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs las chen por gyur
lags na/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mche ba'i bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyi bshos 'di lta bu'i ro ni/ sngon myong bar mi dran lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
la ni/ ro bro ba'i mchog ces bya ba/ ro rnams 'phrog pa yongs su dag pa yod de/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas kha zas phal pa la longs spyad na/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ro brgya par
'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ni/ dgra mtha'
na nas gsol lo/ /zhes sgra grags so/ /mtha'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs
su 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das ni/ dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo/ /zhes thos nas de rnams kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la pho nya btang ba las/ de rnams nang du ma chud de/ sgo na sdod do/ /
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas 'bras sA lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste bskur ro/ /de nas bdud sdig can de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge
sbyong go'u ta ma la bdag gis lan mang po zhig mtho btsam par byas na/ lan 'ga' yang skabs ma rnyed kyi 'dir yang re zhig 'di la brgal bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bor
bdag nyid mngon par sprul te shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gar 'dong / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin
gyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ni/ dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo/ /de nas khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don du 'bras sA lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya po 'di bskur ba lags so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bcom ldan
'das la ni/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams mngon par dad de/ gal te nam mkha' la bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed zed na/ der yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdud
rtsis 'gengs par byed na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nas gsol/ slar log cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ bdag cag chas lags na/ da ci ste ldog /mchi'o/ /
bdud kyis bsam pa/ bdag gis 'di dag bzlog par ma nus kyi/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /zhes de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas char pa shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams

te/ des re zhig rta de dag gi lte ba man chad nub pa tsam gyi bar du char phab bo/ /de nas shing rta de dag gi glang rnams bkrol te dong ngo / /de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba
dang thabs cig tu dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ni/ ri rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas lha'i bdud rtsi la longs spyod do/ /
de nas ded dpon des zla ba gsum 'das nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas

gnang ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ri bo rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas pa yang 'ongs so/ /de nas ded dpon gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba
dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs

te smon lam btab par brtsam pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cing / rta cang shes ni/ bu rgyal tshab tu gyur cig /rta lnga brgya bo 'di dag kyang bu lnga brgyar gyur cig /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo btsun mo rin po cher lung bstan pa gang lags pa de ni/ bdag gi btsun mo rin po cher gyur cig /bud med lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba gang
lags pa de ni/ de'i 'khor du gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ded dpon de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas ded dpon de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ ded dpon/ khyod ni/ 'khor los

bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /rta cang shes ni/ khyod kyi bu rgyal tshab tu 'gyur ro/ /rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang bu lnga brgyar 'gyur ro/ /bu mo ni/ btsun mo rin po cher 'gyur ro/ /bu mo bud med lnga brgyar
gnyis kyis ma tshang ba de dag kyang de 'khor du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ bram ze me sbyin gyi drung du song la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la 'di skad ces/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul du kho bos zla ba gsum gnas zin te 'gro'i
shes par gyis shig ces smros shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba

dang / de'i tshe rgyal po bram ze me sbyin bkra shis 'ong ba la sdod cing 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sgo ba'i skyes pa la smras pa/ kye nang rje tshur/ khyod rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gang na ba der

song la phyin nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la 'di skad ces dge slong kun dga' bo lha mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /zhes smros shig/ 'phags pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo ba'i skyes

pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i ltar nyan nas/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ dge slong 'phags pa kun dga' bo lha'i
zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /des smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ nga bkra shis 'ong ba la sdod cing 'dug gi/ dge slong kun dga' bo ni/ bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin
te/ de nyid nga'i bkra shis su gyur cig /de la ni/ bzang po lnga yod de/ ming bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / kha dog bzang ba dang / spobs pa bzang ba dang / sgrub pa bzang ba yin gyi/ nang du

spyon cig /shes ldan kun dga' bo la su zhig 'gog /sgo bas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la de bzhin du smras nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang du zhugs so/ /mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de rnams kyang de nyid
dang lhan cig nang du zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la nad med par gyur cig/ ces byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bos/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod nad med par gyur cig /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul du ngas zla ba gsum du
gnas zin te 'gro'i shes par gyis shig /ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /'phags pa kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa kun
dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das dang ji ga yul dgra mthar dbyar bde bar bzhugs sam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal bar ma gyur grang / mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ khyod ni/
rgyal srid la mi rtog pa lags te/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das ni/ zla ba gsum
du nas rul ba'i bshos gsol lags so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum du nas rul ba'i bshos gsol ba mad dam/ rgyal po chen po/ mad
lags so/ /de brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang po zhig gtor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang blon po rnams bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ngas khyed cag rnams nyin re zhing lnga brgya'i
bza' ba dang / bca' ba bsod pa rab tu mang po sta gon gyis shig par ma bsgos sam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de kho na skad bka' stsal pa mchis kyi/ che ge mo zhig la stsol cig ces ni/ khyod
kyis bka' ma stsal to/ /'on kyang da dung zhal zas sta gon kho na bgyid do/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad ces bya
ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nongs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ nongs lags so/ /ji ltar yang byis pa lags/ ji ltar yang rmongs pa lags/ ji ltar yang mi
gsal ba lags/ ji ltar mi mkhas pa lags te/ 'di ltar/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dgung zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas mi gda' ba'i phyogs su mchis
lags so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po so brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nongs pa de glo bar chud cing nongs par mthong lags na/ thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ nongs
pa la nongs par gzung du gsol/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis nyes pa la nyes par khas blangs na/ bden te/ ji ltar na yang byis pa yin/ ji ltar na yang rmongs pa yin/ ji ltar na yang mi gsal ba yin/
ji ltar na yang mi mkhas pa yin te/ gang yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas mi snang ba'i phyogs na 'dug gam/ rgyal po chen po/ gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyes pa shes
shing mthong la/ de mthong nas 'chags par byed na/ khyod kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur gyi/ 'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes shing mthong la/ de mthong nas 'chags shing phyir sdom par byed na/ dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur gyi/ 'phel ba kho nar
shes par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag gis ji srid 'tsho ba'i
bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshe thung ngu'i dus su byung zhing / gdul ba'i don bya ba ni/ rab tu mang la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la yang 'bab pas mi gnang ngo / /
gal te de lta lags na/ bcom ldan 'das lo bdun nas zla ba bdun dang / dgung bdun zhig gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis der yang ma gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
bram ze me sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ngas gal te 'di'i zas gcig kyang gsol bar ma gnang na/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin khrag dron du skyugs nas dus las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i gnas
yod do/ /snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te rang gi gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gis na zhal zas 'di thams cad sangs
rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ zhal zas thams cad dogs la bkram la/ dge slong rnams kyi zhabs kyis
bcags na/ de de ltar na/ yongs su longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /kha zas ji snyed yod pa 'di thams cad sa la kun tu khrom zhig /de rnams

kyis thams cad du kun tu bkram mo/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das dge
slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na/ rgan zhugs shig mi bzod pa skyes te bdag cag zla ba gsum du nas rul pa zos na/
da ni| rgyal po sdig can 'di'i 'byor pa ston to/ /snyam du bsam nas/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/
'phags pa rnams ni/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed do/ /zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag bza' ba dang / bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas reg
par byed pa yin no/ /snyam nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong rgan zhugs che ge mo zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas sa la
bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pas/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams smod par byed/ 'phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis bza' ba dang / bca'
ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas bcag par mi bya'o/ /bcags na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar
bzhugs pa rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed de zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma'

ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i
gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas dge slong
rab tu mang po dbyar zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas/ chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag gis yul
dgra mtha' rnams su dgung zla gsum mchis lags kyi/ btsun pa/ spyil bu gzhig lags so/ /dge slong dag/ khyed kyis spyil bu ma zhig ci /spyil bu rnams ji srid du yun ring du gnas par
gyur pa de srid du sbyin bdag gi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ba nyid dang / bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur ba nyid do/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni/ sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa
dang | dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos la gnas pa zhig /gang gi gtsug
lag khang na gnas shing / sems kyi ting 'dzin tshad med pa'i lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas na/ gzhi de las sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun
pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi dpag tu med par rig par bya'o/ /gtsug lag khang ji lta bar chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal yang de dang 'dra ste/ bsod nams
kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa dang / sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad re zhig bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras
bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo/ /zhes gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /

dper na/ chu bo chen po lnga po 'di lta ste/ gang+gA dang / ya mu na dang / sar yu dang / gnas ldan dang / chen po zhes bya ba de dag 'bab cing 'dres par 'gyur ba de la ni/ chu'i tshad chu'i bum pa'am/

chu bum pa brgya'am/ chu bum pa stong ngam/ chu bum pa brgya stong 'di snyed ces gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i tshogs chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du/ bsod
nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyis 'bras bu

'am| bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo/ /zhes gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho
bkra shis gtsang la dag /ngogs bde rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho mchog der/ /mi dang ri dwags tshogs kyis bsten pa yi/ /chu bo so so nas 'bab 'du ba ltar/ /de bzhin gos dang zas skom ster ba'i

mi| |mal cha stan dang gding ba sbyin byed la/ /bsod nams rgyun ni kun nas 'du 'gyur te/ /dper na rgya mtshor chu klung 'bab pa bzhin/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ gang gis na phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs pa bkum pa la sogs pa bsod nams kyi

tshogs kyis slong mo pa'i skye bo tshim par mdzad de/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du sems can gyi don gyi slad du bdag nyid 'o brgyal nas mdzad pa thams cad mdzad lags pa/ yul dgra mtha' na dge slong

lnga brgyar gnyis kyi ma tshang pa dang thabs cig tu nas rul pa gsol la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ni/ bdud rtsi 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong
ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ skye rgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
pa| bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du

byung ste/ de 'khor dge slong brgyad khri dang rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na tshogs rnams slob par byed pa'i bram ze zhig lnga
brgya'i tshogs la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang lhag par bkur sti byas/ rim gro byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas te dgra bcom par bkur ro/ /
gang kho na nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du gshegs pa de kho na nas bzung ste de la su yang bkur stir bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang /
rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mi byed pa dang / de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la shin tu phrag dog skyes par gyur to/ /ji

tsam na/ dge slong slob pa dang / mi slob pa rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas tshod ma

ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / 'bras chan gyis lhung bzed bkang ste slar log pa bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/ kye dge slong dag /ji 'dra ba'i bsod snyoms shig rnyed blta'o/ /de dag drang po'i rang bzhin

yin pas bstan pa dang / de phrag dog gi rang bzhin can zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bos te smras pa/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni/ tshod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / 'bras
chan za bar 'os pa ma yin gyi/ nas rul pa za bar 'os pa yin no/ /de rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang nas mkhan po/ de de lta lags te/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni/ tshod ma ro sna tshogs dang
ldan pa dang / 'bras chan 'tshal bar 'os pa ma lags kyi/ nas rul pa 'tshal bar 'os pa lags so/ /de na yang bram ze'i khye'u bzang po/ dad pa can/ dge ba'i bsam pa can gnyis shig 'dug
pa de dag gis mkhan po/ /de skad ma gsungs shig /'di dag ni/ bdag nyid chen po ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi 'tshal bar 'os pa lags kyi/ nas rul ba ni/ 'os ma lags so/ /zhes smras so/ /dge
slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi tshogs rnams la smod par byed pa gang yin pa de/ nga nyid yin no/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyar gnyis kyis
ma tshang ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba 'di dag yin no/ /bram ze'i khye'u bzang po/ /dad pa can/ dge ba'i bsam pa can gnyis po gang
yin pa de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di gnyis yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nyan thos slob pa dang / mi slob pa rnams la
sems gdug pas ngag gi las rtsub mo phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang bas rjes su yi rang ba dang / gnyis kyis rjes su yi ma rang ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par
smin pas/ bde bar yul dgra mthar de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu nas rul ba gsol to/ /shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ni/ lha'i
bdud rtsi la longs spyod do/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/ gcig tu dkar ba'i las rnams
la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
kun dga' bo/ /tshugs ka gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs
lnga len nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / tshugs kar gshegs nas tshugs ka'i chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram na bzhugs so/ /de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos nas gcig tu dben pa bag yod pa/ rtul ba dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so/ /
gcig tu dben pa/ bag yod pa/ rtul ba dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtong bar gnas pa na/ gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas

khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyid pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /
tshangs par spyod pa la brten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar bgyid pa'i chos de lta bu mdor bsdus te legs par bshad du gsol zhes de skad ces gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gA gang na ba de logs su gzigs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun gyis shing sdong po chen po zhig khyer ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge
slong de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / khyod kyis chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun gyis shing sdong po chen po khyer bar mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /gal te 'di tshu rol gyi
'gram du ma chags pha rol gyi 'gram dang / dbus su ma chags/ skam la ma byung / mi dang mi ma yin pas ma bzung / klong du ma nub/ khong rul par ma gyur na/ dge slong / shing sdong po chen
po de ni/ rim gyis rgya mtshor gzhol bar 'gyur/ rgya mtshor 'bab par 'gyur/ rgya mtshor bab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gal te dge slong khyod kyis tshu rol la ma chags zhes bya ba nas khong
rul par ma gyur na/ de ltar na/ dge slong khyod rim gyis mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar 'gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab par 'gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa la bab par
'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ tshu rol gyi 'gram ni/ ci lags/ pha rol gyi 'gram ni/ ci lags/ dbus su thogs pa ni/ ci lags/ skam la byung ba ni/ ci
lags/ mis bzung ba ni/ ci lags/ mi ma lags pas bzung ba ni/ ci lags/ klong du nub pa ni/ ci lags/ khong rul pa ni/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bcom
ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos nas zhes bya ba nas 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu mdor bsdus te legs par bdag la bshad
du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong / tshu rol gyi 'gram zhes bya ba de ni/ nang gi skye mched drug gi tshig bla dwags yin no/ /pha rol gyi 'gram zhes bya ba de ni/ phyi'i skye
mched drug gi tshig bla dwags yin no/ /dbus su thogs pa zhes bya ba de ni/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi tshig bla dwags yin no/ /skam las byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi tshig
bla dwags yin no/ /mis bzung ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'di ltar/ 'di na la la rab tu byung ba dang / khyim pa 'dres par gnas te/ dga' ba mtshungs pa dang / bde ba mtshungs pa dang / bde na bde
ba dang / sdug bsngal na sdug bsngal zhing / 'phral gyi bya ba byung zhing byung ba rnams yang dag par blangs te mthar 'byin par byed pa lta bu yin no/ /mi ma yin pas zin pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di ltar/
'di na la la tshul khrims sam/ brtul zhugs sam/ dka' thub bam/ tshangs par spyod pa bsten pa 'dis/ bdag lha'am/ lha gang yang rung ba zhig tu gyur cig /ces smon lam btab nas

tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lta bu'o/ /klong du nub pa zhes bya ba ni/ ji ltar/ 'di na la la bslab pa phul nas babs pa lta bu yin no/ /khong rul pa zhes bya ba ni/ ji ltar/ 'di na la la tshul khrims
'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos can/ khong myags shing phyir 'dzag pa/ shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa/ lung bod ltar spyod pa dang / dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod
pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba yod pa lta bu yin te/ dge slong / khyod kyis gal te de bzhin du tshu rol gyi 'gram du ma thogs zhes bya ba nas mya ngan las
'das pa la bab par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis shing sdong po chen po'i dpe 'di'i gdams ngag gis gtams te/
gcig pu dben pa/ bag yod pa/ rtul ba dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod bar gnas pa na/ gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag par
kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de'i tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /
tshangs par spyod pa la brten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes bya bar shes nas go bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa de/ dgra bcom pa sems shin tu rnam par grol
bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na gnag rdzi dga' bo zhes bya ba 'dug par gyur pa 'khar ba la brten nas gnag skyong zhing 'dug pa las/ de'i 'khar
bas sbal pa zhig brdzis so/ /de gnad rnams chad la thug /tshigs rnams bye la thug pa dang sems bskyed pa/ gal te bdag gi lus 'gul tam/ skad byung na/ gzhi des gnag rdzi dga' bo'i gtam gyi
bar chad du 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so/ /de nas gnag rdzi dga' bos 'khar ba phyogs
gcig tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom
ldan 'das la gnag rdzi dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ tshu rol gyi 'gram du mi chags/ pha rol gyi 'gram du mi chags/ dbus su mi chags/ skam la mi 'byung / mis
mi bzung / mi ma lags pas mi bzung / klong du mi 'bying / khong du mi 'drul bar bgyi lags na/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa
dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /dga' bo/ khyod kyis bdag po rnams la gnag gtad dam/ btsun pa/ mi 'tshal
lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa/ ba rnams kyang gzhon la be'u rnams kyang tshar lags te/ so so'i gnag ra 'tshal bas/ so so'i gnas su mchis lags pas/ bdag legs par
gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par
spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /dga' bo/ ba rnams kyang gzhon la/ be'u rnams kyang tshar te/ rang rang gi gnag ra shes pas rang rang gi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang gnag rdzi zas dang /
gos bdag gir byed pas ni/ 'di ltar/ bdag po rnams la de bya dgos so/ /de nas gnag rdzi dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
snga nas song ngo / /de nas 'jigs so/ /'jigs so/ /zhes sgra chen po 'byin cing rgyug par brtsams pa dang / lam gyi bar nas gnag rdzi ngo shes lnga brgyas mthong ste/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci
zhig gis 'jigs/ des smras pa/ skye bas 'jigs so/ /rga bas 'jigs so/ /'chi bas 'jigs so/ /de rnams kyang de'i phyi bzhin du rgyug par brtsams pa dang / gnag rdzi dang / phyug rdzi dang /
rtsa thun dang / shing thun dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba dang / lam gol bar 'tsho ba'i mi gzhan dag kyang de rnams mthong nas rgyug par brtsams so/ /lam gyi mdun nas 'ongs pa rnams kyis de dag de ltar
sgra 'byin pa mthong nas de rnams kyis dris pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ci zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'jigs so/ /ci zhig gis 'jigs/ skye bas 'jigs so/ /rga bas 'jigs so/ /'chi
bas 'jigs so/ /de rnams kyis thos nas slar log go /ji tsam na ri bor dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / de nas ri bor de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs des/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po de mthong nas
sdangs pas phan tshun du 'dong bar byed de/ kha cig ni/ bros so/ /kha cig ni/ rdzas rnams sbed do/ /kha cig ni/ go bgos nas 'dug go /mi dpa' bo gzhan dag cig yod pa dag gis bsu
nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ci zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'jigs so/ /ci zhig gis 'jigs/ skye bas 'jigs so/ /rga bas 'jigs so/ /'chi bas 'jigs so/ /de nas ri bor

na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de bag phebs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gnag rdzi dga' bo song nas ring po
ma lon par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du gnag rdzi dga' bo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar
'tshal ba bzlog ste sdum par btang lags/ shA ri'i bu/ gnag rdzi dga' bo slar khyim pa khyim na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/ /gsog 'jog yongs su spyod
pas 'dod pa rnams longs spyod par 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas med do/ /gnag rdzi dga' bo de'u re bdag po rnams la gnag gtad de 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu
bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par
shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa la brten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
dus gzhan zhig na gnag rdzi dga' bos bdag po rnams la gnag gtad nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/
btsun pa/ bdag gis bdag po rnams la gnag gtad lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
'thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la gnag rdzi dga' bo 'khor lnga brgya dang rab tu byung ba
dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ /de ltar rab tu byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa de zhes bya ba nas sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du'o/ /chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring por ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang
gis yin pa'o/ /sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bus bltas na/ dud 'gro dag nas shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon
par dad pas yin nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gang yang zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ ma la
bdag gis zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas sngon sbal pa byed pa'i lha'i bus rna cha dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs nas
zhes bya ba nas gang+gA'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa 'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes
kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das
dang / chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te
skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshong ba khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rnam
par rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa lta bur 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong rnams nam

gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson zhing gnas pa de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na snang ba rgya chen po mthong ngo / /de mthong nas kyang the tshom du gyur nas
bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ mdang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten
skyong ba bzhi mchis sam/ dge slong dag/ nga blta ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin
gyi| 'on kyang gnag rdzi dga' bo'i 'khar bas sbal ba brdzis te gnad rnams kyang chad la thug /tshigs rnams kyang bye la thug pa dang / gnag rdzi dga' bo'i gtam bar chad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas

mi g.yo zhing sgra ma phyung bar 'dug nas de la sems mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa de/ nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bshad
nas bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su song ba yin no/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gnag rdzi dga' bo dang /
'khor lnga brgyas las ci zhig bgyis na/ gnag rdzi dag gi nang du skyes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
bgyis pa lags/ sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na sbal par skyes par gyur cing / bden pa mthong bar bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge

slong dag/ de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags la tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i

tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/ de wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma

bzhin du'o/ /de'i gsung rab la gnag rdzi dga' bo rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum pa/ chos smra ba/ rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can/ 'khor lnga brgya pa rtsod pa'i chos la mkhas pa zhig ste/ de dge 'dun
gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams zhi bar byed pa dang / de nas dge slong khengs pa nga rgyal can gnyis shig lan 'ga' yang de'i drung du mi 'dong ngo / /dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis phan

tshun du rtsod pa byung nas don de'i phyir de gnyis de'i drung du dong nas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/ bdag cag gnyis la 'di dang 'di lta bu'i rtsod pa byung na/ zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ des bsam
ba| gal te bdag gis 'di gnyis kyi rtsod pa deng kho na zhi bar byas na/ rag ma las pas 'di gnyis phyis 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ des dge 'dun thams cad bsags nas rtsod pa de
dge 'dun gyi nang du gleng nas chad par ni/ ma byas so/ /phyi de nyin yang de la ri bor du dgos pa zhig byung nas de der song ba dang / de nas de gnyis kyis thogs so/ /zhes dge 'dun gyi nang du
rtsod pa de gleng nas de nas dge 'dun gyis zhi bar byas so/ /ji tsam na/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa de/ ri bor de nas 'ongs te lam gyis dub pa bsal nas lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams
la dris pa/ re zhig rtsod pa pa dang / rtsod zla gnyis mi 'ong ngam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ de gnyis kyi rtsod pa de/ zhi bar bgyis lags so/ /su zhig gis zhi bar byas/ dge 'dun

gyis so/ /ji ltar byas/ de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa dang / des ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba/ tshe dang ldan pa dag mi shes te/ ji ltar gnag rdzi rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas so/ /de rnams
kyis kyang mkhan po/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar/ gnag rdzi rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa zhi bar bgyis so/ /zhes mthun par smras so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dus kyi dge slong sde snod gsum

pa gang yin pa de ni/ gnag rdzi dga' bo 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni/ gnag rdzi lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin no/ /gang yang 'dis yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la gnag rdzi zhes bya ba'i tshig smras shing / lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kyis kyang mthun par smras pas/ las de'i rnam par smin
pas/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'khor lnga brgya dang gnag rdzi rnams su skyes par gyur to/ /gang 'dis bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas
pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pas/ da ltar 'di 'khor lnga brgya dang nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams

cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag/ sngon sbal pa byed pa'i lha'i bu yang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung kho na'i gsung rab la dge slong spong ba pa

zhig tu gyur te ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang / ri bor zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der son to/ /de mtshan mo'i thun dang po la skyil mo krung bcas te/ yid la bya ba goms par bya bar brtsams pa dang / ji
tsam na 'don pa byed pa'i dge slong rnams kha ton byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas de sgras sems rtse gcig nyid du ma btub nas des bsam pa/
'di dag kha ton zer du chug gung thun la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas gung thun la langs te 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong gzhan dag kha ton byed nas des bsam pa/ thun tha ma la 'dug par
bya'o snyam nas/ de thun tha ma la langs te 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na gzhan dag la ton byed nas de 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pas kun nas dkris pa drag po skyes nas des smras pa/ 'od srung
gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni sbal pa bzhin mtshan thog thag sgra 'byin to zhes byas so/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ dge slong spong ba pa gang yin pa de ni sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu
'di nyid yin te/ gang yang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la sbal pa zhes tshig tu smras pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar sbal par skyes
par gyur te/ da lta'i bar du yang sbal bar skyes pa yin no/ /gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pas/ des na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes par gyur to/ /gang yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pas/ des na da ltar bden pa mthong bar byas so/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa
ni gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtson par bya ste/ dge slong dag/ khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gA brgal ba dang / de na ngang pa dang / nya dang / rul sbal lnga brgyas bskor te bskor ba byas so/ /de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa mdzad de/
bzhin bzang dag /'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin pas/ nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis la/ ci nas
kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyis shig /de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la tshig gsum gyi chos thos nas kha zas za bar byed pa ni

bdag cag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas/ de rnams kyis kha zas bcad pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams ni me'i shas che bas dus las 'das te shi 'phos pa dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams

su skyes so/ /chos nyid kyis/ lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o/ /de rnams kyis

bltas na dud 'gro dag las shi 'phos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ me tog man dA ra bas thu ba bkang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dang / chu bo gang+gA snang bas
gsal bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas
bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang / des
lan gsum du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa/ 'di lta bu ni/ bdag cag la phas ma bgyis te/ mas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi tshogs dang / sdug pas ma lags/ rgyal
pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/ dge sbyong dang / bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/ sems
can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams nas ni/ rkang pa drangs/ lha dang mi rnams su ni/ rab tu bkod/ 'khor ba las ni/ ring du mdzad/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/
rus pa'i ri bo las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni/ phye/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo
nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa/ bdag cag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su

mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas sngon nya dang / ngang pa dang / rus sbal byed byed pa'i lha'i bu de rnams tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang zhes bya ba nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ nya dang / ngang pa dang / rus sbal 'di rnams kyis las
ci zhig bgyis na/ des na/ ngang pa dang / nya dang / rus sbal rnams su skyes lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na/ lha rnams su skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ngang pa dang / nya dang / rus sbal 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa dag ni/ zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar

gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/ de wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na drang
srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i bstan pa la de rnams rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de na dge slong de rnams
kyis bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo rnams dral bas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas nya dang / ngang pa dang / rus sbal rnams su skyes par gyur to/ /gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des
na lha rnams su skyes par gyur to/ /gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa des na/ bden pa mthong bar byas so/ /dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ gcig tu
nag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag/ khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gA brgal pa dang / yi dwags sngon du ma tshig pa lta bu/ keng rus bsgreng ba lta bu/ rang gi skras lus g.yogs pa/ lto ri sul ltar
'dug pa/ kha khab kyi mig tsam yod pa 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor nas de rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag cag yi dwags rnams ni/ rnam par ltung ba'i lus can rnams lags te/ sngon gyi las kyis nongs pas chab kyang mi rnyed lags na/ 'tshal ma mthong ba lta smos kyang

ci 'tshal/ khyod ni/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba lags na/ bdag cag la chab stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la chu bo gang+gA bstan nas/ chu bsil skye bo kun gyis nye bar spyad bya ba/ /skal ldan

shing rta klung chen 'di ni grong khyer dang / /yul 'khor dag dang grong khyer tshim par byed cing 'bab/ /zhing rnang sA lu ku mu da dang / ut+pal skru na/ /yi dwags rnams kyis gsol pa/ chu bo skye bo kun gyis nye bar
spyad bgyi ba/ /skal ldan shing rta 'bab 'di bdag cag rnams la bskams/ /'di ni khrag gi dri mas gang zhing lag pa na/ /dbyug pa dgra star bcas pa thogs pas 'di srung mthong / /bcom ldan

'das kyis gang+gA'i lha la bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer tshim byed cing / /zhing rnang sA lu ku mu da dang ut+pal skru na/ /ci phyir yi dwags skom pas rab nyen tshim mi byed/ /khyod la
byis pa'i skye bo sdug bsngal snying rje med/ /gang+gA'i lhas gsol pa/ byis pa'i skye bo la bdag 'jigs pas ma lags shing / /tshig rtsub rgyus kyang mi mthun chab gtong mi bgyid de/ /nongs bgyis
sgrib pa chen pos bsgribs pa 'di dag la/ /chu bo bskams gyur 'di la bdag gis ci zhig nongs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u
dgal gyi bu/ yi dwags rnams la chu blud cig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yi dwags rnams la
chu blud par brtsams pa dang / yi dwags de rnams kyi kha khab kyi mig tsam po dag bskyed par ma nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ de rnams kyi kha bskyed nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u

dgal gyi bu chen pos chu blud pa dang / de rnams skom pas nyen pas mang du 'thung pas lto rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dang ba bskyed nas shi'o/ /zhes bya ba nas bden pa mthong nas rang
gi gnas su song ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ yi dwags 'di rnams kyis
las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na yi dwags rnams su skyes lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na/ lha rnams su skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
dag/ 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa dag ni/ zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bu 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/

bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/ de wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs

so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i nyan thos rnams kyi dad pa las bslangs na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba byed do/ /gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das 'od srung gi bstan pa rgyas par ma gyur pa de'i tshe dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong yang nyung bar gyur to/ /gang gi tshe rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong yang mang bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na 'dun khang zhig na dge bsnyen

lnga brgya 'ga' zhig gi phyir lhags shing 'dus par gyur pa dang / dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong rab tu mang po dag de rnams kyi drung du dong nas sbyin du gzhug par 'dod pa na/ de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub po'i

las phyung ba/ 'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni/ yi dwags rnams su skyes pa bzhin rtag tu lag pa zed par byed do/ /zhes smras so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/

yi dwags lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang yang 'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la yi dwags kyi tshig smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar
yi dwags rnams su skyes par gyur te/ da lta'i bar du yang yi dwags rnams su skyes pa yin no/ /gang yang de la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na/ lha rnams su skyes so/ /gang yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des na bden pa mthong bar byas so/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa

ni/ gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo
gang+gA las rgal ba na/ glang po che'i sta stangs kyis g.yas phyogs nas/ chu bo gang+gA gzigs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du g.yas phyogs nas chu bo gang+gA la gzigs par mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed cag chu bo gang+gA'i gling gzhi nyan par
'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa da de'i dus la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chu bo gang+gA gleng gzhi gang lags pa shad pa na/ dge
slong rnams nyan par 'gyur lags so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po so dgu pa/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba rgyal po smyug sbam zhes bya ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa zhig byung
ste/ de'i yul 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ shing me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa/ lha rnams dus dus su char 'bebs
pas/ sa gzhi lo tog dang ldan zhing 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'khrug long dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams rab tu zhi bar gyur la/ mi rnams rtag tu chos la

gzhol ba na/ chos kyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /ji tsam na rgyal po de so ga'i dus la bab nas shing rnams kyi me tog kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs
dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas/ skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ba dang / ji tsam na mi lus gnyer mas gang

ba/ mgo skya ba/ lus kyi yan lag rnyis pa/ dbang po rgud pa/ sha skem pa/ zho sha chung ba zhig 'khar ba la brten nas gom pa dal bu dal bus 'gro ba zhig mthong ngo / /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la

smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mi/ lus gnyer mas gang ba/ mgo skya ba zhes bya ba nas/ 'khar ba la brten nas 'gro ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ de ni/ 'du
byed rnams dengs pas rgas 'khogs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ chos 'di ni/ thun mong lags

so/ /de nas rgyal po yid mi bde zhing chas pa dang / yang / mi skya bo rbab rbab po/ lus gas shing hrul hrul po/ lto ri sul ltar 'dug pa/ rma rnag gis gang ba/ yan lag dang nying lag rnams las 'dzag pa

lhan pa rnams kyis dkris pa zhig /shugs ring po ring por 'byin cing / 'khar ba la brten nas 'theng zhing 'gro bar chas pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mi skya bo seng

po zhes bya ba nas/ 'theng zhing 'gro bar chas pa 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag
nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ chos 'di ni/ thun mong lags te/ nye bar spyod pa'i las bgyis pa rnams la sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas
'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ rnam pa thams cad du sdig pa mi bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas chas pa dang / yang des/ ras sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyis khyogs

brgyan nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / dung dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag bun long zhing mi bzhis bteg nas 'gyogs mis ni/ sna drangs/ skyes

bu lag na shing thogs pa dag ni/ phyi bzhin 'brang zhing / kyi hud pha/ kyi hud sdug pa/ kyi hud spun/ kyi hud jo bo zhes kun tu dud mo'i sgra 'don pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /

ras sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan cing zhes bya ba nas/ dud mo'i sgra 'don pa 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /blon po rnams kyis smras
pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ gum pa zhes bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ chos 'di ni thun mong lags so/ /de nas rgyal

pos/ rgas pa dang / nad pa dang / shi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste/ bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod rnams spang dgos so/ /snyam nas/ slar log ste mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug

go /de'i yul na bram ze dus dpog ces bya ba/ phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig yod de/ de ji ltar rgyal pos rgas pa dang / nad pa dang / shi ba mthong ste/ yid byung nas mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs

nas 'dug pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang bram ze brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing / shing rta rta rgod ma dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te/ gser gyi 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs

thogs nas/ rgyal po smyug sbam gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bram ze dus dpog chab sgo na mchis so/ /de nas rgyal po phyir byung nas/ dkor khang du 'dug pa dang /

bram ze dus dpog gis/ rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas te 'dug nas smras pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du thugs ngan gyi khang par zhugs te bzhugs/ rgyal pos/ ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bram ze dus dpog la rgyas
par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ 'jig rten ni/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa lags pas/ 'di la thugs ngan bgyir ma mchis so/ /sems can legs pa'i las bgyid pa rnams kyang mchis
nyes pa'i las bgyid pa rnams kyang mchis/ gnyi ga'i las bgyid pa yang mchis te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba rnams ni/ rtag tu las legs pa bgyid de/ gum na yang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha
yang 'khor los bsgyur ba lags te/ mi'i bde ba khyad par du 'phags pa bstar nas/ lha'i bde ba yang nyams su bstar bar 'gyur mod kyi/ lha/ 'on kyang mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa mchod sbyin
la brtson par mdzod cig /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /yul thams cad du dril sgrog bcug ste/ rgyal po gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed kyi/
khyed shog la longs spyod cig ces sgos shig /de nas rgyal pos sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba byin no/ /der 'bras khu dbo ba'i
dong dag byas nas/ der dran po dag blugs pa dang / bsil bar gyur pas ma dros pa ma dros pa zhes bya bar grags so/ /de'i 'bras khu dang / 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba lo bcu gnyis tshang bar bkang bas lud

par gyur pa'i kha de nas 'bab chur bab pas/ 'bras khu'i chu 'bras khu'i chu zhes bya bar grags so/ /sdom la/ gzhon nu bskyed dang glang chen sgra/ dpung rgyal ldan dang nor bu can/ sA la stobs dang sA la'i
stobs/ /gser bre dang ni gnas bcas dang / /thug pa dang ni mnyan yod dang / /ma dros grong khyer bin du dang / /yangs pa can ni tha ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul gzhon nu bskyed par gshegs

nas/ gzhon nu bskyed par tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /phyogs 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba btsas nas 'di nyid du chen por gyur to/ /des na grong khyer yang
gzhon nu bskyed pa zhes bya bar grags so/ /krung krung sgra can du gshegs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ krung krung sgra 'dir rgyal po

gso sbyong 'phags kyi glang po che dam pas krung krung zhes bya ba'i skad phyung bas/ krung krung can zhes bya bar grags so/ /dpung rgyan ldan du gshegs nas/ dpung rgyan ldan gyi phyogs shig tu 'dzum pa

mdzad do zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ /nor bu can du gshegs nas/ nor bu can du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nor bu can 'dir
byang chub sems dpas nor bu mang po'i mchod sbyin byas pas nor bu can zhes bya bar grags so/ /sA la'i stobs su gshegs nas/ sA la'i stobs kyi phyogs shin tu 'dzum pa mdzad nas zhes bya ba nas sangs

rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gser gyi brer gshegs nas/ kun dga' bo/ gser gyi bre 'dir byang chub sems dpas gser mang po mchod sbyin byas pas/ da dung yang bram ze rnams
gser bres 'jal zhing 'gyed pas/ gser gyi bre gser gyi bre zhes bya bar grags so/ /gnas bcas su gshegs nas/ gnas bcas su tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/
gnas bcas 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /de dus gzhan
zhig ni spyi bor sha rmen 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa zhig skyes te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa skyed par mi byed do/ /de yongs su smin
nas brtol ba las gzhon nu zhig byung nas gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ lpags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba zhes bya ba nas/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhes

bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /spyi bo skyes spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar grags so/ /rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyis gzhon nu byung ma thag tu/ btsun mo'i 'khor drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang / mthong ma
thag tu btsun mo de thams cad kyi nu ma las 'o ma zags nas so so nas smras pa/ nga las nu nga las nu zhes smras pas/ nga las nu nga las nu zhes bya bar grags so/ /de la kha cig gis ni/ spyi bo
skyes/ kha cig gis ni/ nga las nu zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzhon nu nga las nu yul zhig tu song ba dang / rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags na bar gyur nas/ de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me
tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis bkur sti byas kyang de slar thu bar gyur nas/ des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag myur du gzhon nu la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas/ dbang skur cig /
lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes nas blon po rnams kyis pho nyas btang nas rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags snyung bar gyur nas/ des bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu spyan drongs la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba nyams
su myong bar gyis shig ces byung gi/ de bas na/ gzhon nu myur du gshegs pa'i rigs so zhes spring ngo / /de chas pa na/ rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags shi'o/ /de nas yang blon po rnams kyis/

yang de la pho nya btang ste/ gzhon nu khyod kyi yab nongs kyi/ gshegs te rgyal srid bzhes su gsol zhes spring ba dang / gzhon nu nga las nus bsam pa/ bdag gi yab ni nongs na/ bdag der ci ste 'gro snyam du
bsam nas/ de nyid na 'dug pa dang / yang blon po rnams 'dus/ blon po'i gtso bo pho nyar btang nas/ de song ste smras pa/ gzhon nu gshegs pa la rgyal srid bzhes su gsol/ /des smras pa/ gal te

bdag gis chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid 'thob na/ 'di nyid du rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /blon po rnams kyis spring ba/ lha/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba la ni/ mang du 'tshal te/ rin po che'i
gcal dang / seng ge'i khri dang / gdugs dang / cod pan dang / dbu rgyan gyis pho brang gi nang du rgyal srid du dbang bskur 'tshal lo/ /de bas na/ gzhon nu 'di nyid du gshegs pa'i rigs so/ /des smras
pa/ gal te bdag gis chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur na/ thams cad 'di nyid du 'ong grang / gzhon nu nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro ba gnod sbyin lha gnas zhes bya ba des/ rin po che'i gcal
dang / seng ge'i khri de nyid du blangs so/ /pho brang na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang gdugs dang / cod pan dang / dbu rgyan khyer te rang lhags te/ pho brang na gnas pa rang lhags shing rang lhags pas/
gnas bcas gnas bcas zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mnyan yod gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka'
bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nas rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / ji tsam nas phyogs shig
na/ bram ze zhig zan ma zos par zhing rmed pa na/ de'i ched du bu mo zhig thug pa khyer te 'ongs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs de nyid du gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo

'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu yang de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can la thog mar sangs rgyas mthong ba de ltar ni/ lo bcu

gnyis su zhi gnas goms par byas pa la sems las su rung ba skye ba dang / bu med pa bu rnyed pa dang / dbul pos nor gyi gter mthong ba dang / rgyal srid la dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba ni/ de lta
ma yin no/ /des thug pa de khyer te myur bar bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye go'u ta ma/ 'di ni/ thug pa lags te/ gal te shes ldan
go'u ta ma bdag la thugs brtson/ /'jam gsol cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la khron pa rnying pa zhig bstan nas/ bram ze khyod kyis gal te yongs su btang na/ khron pa rnying pa 'dir

lugs shig /des khron pa rnying pa der blugs so/ /des khron pa der blugs pa dang / 'di ltar/ yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus khron la rnying pa de thug pas gang nas
rlangs pa 'thul zhing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de bos nas/ bram ze thug pa brims shig /des brim par brtsams pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ji ltar dge 'dun thams

cad kyis 'thungs kyang / khron pa rnying pa de bzhin du thug pas gang na rlangs pa 'thul zhing 'dug par 'gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas bram ze de lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur te/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang
'dra bar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad par mdzad pas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus na bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye
shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang
dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ /deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /
de nas bram ze de tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul ngor rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las
thar par lta bur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /ji tsam na zhing drung du phyin pa dang / zhing de la gser gyi nas sha stag skyes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ya mtshan skyes nas mig bgrad de tshigs su bcad
pas smras pa/ kye ma yon tan rang bzhin zhing / /nyes kun rnam par spangs pa la/ /bdag gis de ring sa bon btab/ /de ring nyid du 'bras bu thob/ /de nas bram ze de/ rings pa rings par rgyal po'i drung
du song nas son pa dang / rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byas nas/ rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bdag gis srang nas stsal pa de nas gser sha stag tu gyur gyi/ de la spyan pa zhig bsko bar gsol /
rgyal pos spyan pa bskos te btang ba dang / bram zes phung por byas te bgos pa las/ rgyal po'i skal ba nas tha mal par gyur pas/ spyan gyis rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo
ba/ yang bgos shig /yang bgos pa dang / de bzhin du rgyal po'i skal ba ni/ nas tha mal par gyur nas/ de ltar lan bdun gyi bar du bgos na/ de kho na bzhin du nas su gyur pa dang / rgyal

bo ngo mtshar skyes nas/ de bdag nyid song ste bltas na/ de bzhin du gyur nas/ des bram ze de la smras pa/ bram ze/ 'di ni/ khyod kyi bsod nams las skyes pa yin gyi/ rgyal po'i skal ba thong la/ khyod kyis

ci dpags pa de kho bo la byin cig /de nas bram ze de shin tu mgu bas ci byin pa de dag gser gyi nas sha stag tu gyur te/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig na/ zhing pa

skya bo rbab rbab bo/ /rkang pa dang lag pa ser ga byung ba/ sha na'i ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon pa lnga brgya zhing rmed do/ /rmon pa de dag kyang lcag gzer bu can gyis bzhus pas/ lus smas shing rma byung bas

rnag 'dzag la/ sdam pa 'don bzhin zhing rmed do/ /zhing pa de rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byas bzang po brgyad cus
mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bi 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can

rnams la thog mar sangs rgyas mthong ba ni zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyang ring po kho na nas zhing pa rnams 'ong ba
gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang gdul ba'i don du lam las bzur nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas zhing pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhing pa de rnams kyis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin
mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi
shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ldan nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi

dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag cag /bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba nas/
sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs pa bkab par gyur/ ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la gdams ngag byin nas/ de rnams kyis 'bad pa dang / rtsal ba drag

po zhes bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /glang de dag kyang gnya' shing dang / ru thag bcad nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la kun nas bskor nas 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de rnams la tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ dper na/ chu bo gang+gA brgal te gshegs pa na/

ngang pa dang / nya dang / rus sbal rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song ba bzhin no/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/

btsun pa/ sngon zhing pa bgyid bgyid pa'i dge slong 'di dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las des zhing par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom
pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/ sngon glang bgyid bgyid pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag gis kyang las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na glang rnams su skyes shing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag /sngon

byung ba/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/ de wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs

so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i bstan pa la zhing pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de na 'di dag gis ma bklags/ ma bton/ yid la bya ba goms par ma byas so/ /'on kyang dad pas
byin pa zos shing zos nas 'du 'dzi la chags te/ le los dus 'das par byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ dge slong lnga brgya po gang yin pa de ni/ zhing pa lnga brgya
po 'di dag nyid yin no/ /gtsug lag khang gi bdag po gang yin pa de ni/ zhing pa 'di dag gang gi yin pa'i khyim bdag 'di nyid yin te/ gang yang 'di dag gi gtsug lag khang gi bdag pos dad pas
byin pa zos nas/ ma bklags/ ma bton yid la bya ba goms par ma byas la/ 'du 'dzi la chags te/ le los 'das par byas pa'i las des na/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar gtsug lag khang gi bdag
po de'i zhing pa rnams su gyur te/ da lta'i bar du yang zhing par skyes pa yin no/ /'di dag gis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyod pa
spyad pa des na/ da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /sngon glang byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di rnams kyang yang dag
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /'di dag gis de na bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo rnams dral bas/ las des na glang rnams sku skyes so/ /gang
yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na/ lha rnams su skyes so/ /gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing bsrung bas da ltar lha'i
bur gyur nas bden pa mthong bar byas so/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/ dge

slong dag /khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
bo/ chu mang gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chu mang du gshegs pa dang / phyogs

gzhan zhig na/ bram ze zhig zhing rmed do/ /de nas bram ze des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa

zhes bya ba nas kun nas bzang pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /des bsam pa/ gal te shes ldan go'u ta ma'i drung du phyag 'tshal du song na ni/ bdag gi las 'chor/ 'on te phyag 'tshal
du ma song na ni/ bsod nams yongs su nyams par 'gyur na/ de la gang gis na/ las kyang mi 'chor la/ bsod nams kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod snyam pa las/
de blo skyes pa/ 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du phyag byas nas/ de lta na las kyang mi 'chor la/ bsod nams kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des ji ltar lcag gzer bu can nyid thogs
shing gnas de nyid na 'dug bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ bram ze 'dis nyes te/ pha bi la sa phyogs 'di na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig par bzhugs so/
snyam pa de lta bu'i so so rang gi rig pa'i ye shes shig yod par 'gyur na/ nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs te phyag byas pa zhig /de lta na pha bis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis la phyag
