kye ma'o/ /lha la 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang mnga' ba lta/ rgyal po dga' ba dang mgu bas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi rnams su sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dag bzhag go /

de'i tshe mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ste/ des mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi kha zas sbyar to/ /des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas
tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blo ldan chos dang mthun pa yis/ nor rnyed bsag par mi bya ste/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /yon gnas la ni yon du dbul/ /dge sbyong bram ze
des pa dang / /phongs pa legs par tshim byas na/ /shes rab can de lus zhig nas/ /lha yi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pas de ltar shes byas nas/ /dad ldan chags pa med
sems kyis/ /yon gnas rnams la byin pa ni/ /dpa' bo ser sna med pas bsngags/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po me long gdong zhes bya ba/ mthu dang ldan pa gang gis
mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma'i kha zas sbyar ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal
po me long gdong zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan pa der gyur te/ ngas mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi kha zas sbyar to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sbyin pa'am/
sbyin pa'i bgo bshang des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i
phyir sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bzang zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ des grong
khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod
nams dag byas te/ des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lha dang mi yi nang dag tu/ bdag gi 'byor ba mthong nas ni/ gang gis
phun sum thob pa yi/ /sbyin pa su zhig sbyin mi byed/ /gang gis skyes bu brgya phrag thibs mnan cing / /ser sna dgra bor gyur pa zil mnan nas/ 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pas
sbyin gtong ste/ bdag ni dpa' bo'i dpa' rab yin par sems/ /gang zhig lag na mtshon thogs g.yul ngor 'jug /de ni dpa' bo min zhes thub rnams gsung / /gang dag 'jigs
pa med par sbyin gtong ba/ /de dag dpa' bo yin zhes kun mkhyen gsung / /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bzang zhes bya ba gang gis/ grong khyer brgyad khri
bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa

de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bzang zhes bya ba der gyur te/ nga nyid kyis de na grong khyer
brgyad khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag

byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni/

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du
gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob pa gang yin
pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ yul lnga len par rgyal po gnyis byung ste/ byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa dang / lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'o/ /de la/ byang
phyogs kyi lnga len pa nor can zhes bya ba/ grong khyer glang po che'i khyim zhes bya ba na 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab
pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med pa/ nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ chos
kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa dang / chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /grong khyer de na yang mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ ngang pa
dang / ngur pa dang / bya ka ran+da pas mdzes par byas pa/ yid du 'ong ba yod do/ /mtsho de na klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba gnas te/ des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab
pas/ sa gzhi lhag par lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /yul yang bza' ba dang / btung ba shin tu mod la/ 'jig rten yang sgrib pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang /
ldan pas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la kha zas sbyin par byed do/ /lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po ni/ chos ma yin pa lhag par gnas pa/
gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ spro thung ba zhig pas/ chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed cing / chad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / 'tshog pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'ching ba dang /
su mi 'dod dang / khong sgril dang / gnod pa sna tshogs kyis yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la rtag tu skrag par byed do/ /de chos ma yin pa la lhag par gnas pas der lha yang dus
dus su char gyi rgyun legs par mi 'bebs so/ /des na skye bo'i tshogs de 'jigs pa dang / yi chad pas rang gi srog la mi lta bar yul yongs su spangs te/ byang phyogs kyi yul
lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul du dong nas gnas so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po ri dwags 'chor ba'i tshul du byas nas yul rnams brtag pa'i phyir
byung ba dang / grong rdal dang / grong khyer gang yin pa dag ni/ stong par gyur cing / skyed mos tshal dang / lha khang rnams ni/ zhig ral du gyur pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la
smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci'i phyir grong rdal dang / grong khyer 'di stongs par gyur cing skyed mos tshal dang / lha khang rnams ni/ zhig ral du gyur/ skye bo'i tshogs de dag ni/ gang du
dong / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po nor can gyi yul du mchis so/ /ci'i phyir/ lha/ mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/ /shes ldan sbyin gyi/ smros
shig /de nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid bgyid pas/ de'i yul 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang /
lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang zhing / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun ma mchis la/ nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras sA lu dang / bu
ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jig rten la yang sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang ldan pas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa
dang / phongs pa rnams la kha zas stsol bar bgyid do/ /lha ni/ gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ spro thung bas/ chad pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'tshog pa dang / gsod pa dang /
'dzin pa dang / 'ching ba dang / su mi 'dod dang / khong sgril ba dang / gnod pa sna tshogs kyis yul mi rnams la rtag tu skrag par mdzad pas/ de na/ skye bo'i tshogs de
'jigs shing yi chad nas byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul du mchis lags so/ /lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis na/ skye bo'i
tshogs de/ slar 'ongs nas grong rdal dang / grong khyer 'di dag tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gal te byang phyogs kyi lnga len
pa'i rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid mdzad de/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / thugs brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyangs na/ ring por mi thogs par skye
bo'i tshogs de slar mchis nas grong rdal dang / grong khyer 'di rnams su gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de lta
na| ngas kyang byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin rgyal srid byas te/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyang bar
bya'i/ khyed kyis ci nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs de slar 'ongs nas grong rdal dang / grong khyer 'di rnams su gnas par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /lha/ yon tan gzhan yang 'di lta bu

mchis te/ grong khyer de na mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ ngang pa dang / ngur ba dang / bya ka ran+da pas mdzes par bgyis pa/ de na klu'i bu skye
ba sna tshogs pa zhes bgyi ba zhig gnas te/ des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/ lo tog lhag par phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /de nas gzhi lhag par lo tog dang /
ldan pas yul yang bza' ba dang btung ba shin tu mod lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gis ni/ klu'i bu de/ 'dir khugs par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/
lha| rig sngags dang / gsang sngags 'chang dag gis de khugs par 'gyur gyi/ de dag btsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal pos gser gyi thum po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse
mo la bcings nas yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ gang gis byang phyogs lnga len pa'i yul nas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khugs na/ de la gser gyi thum po 'di sbyin no/ /
bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur sti bya'o/ /ji tsam na/ sprul khas sdigs pa zhig blon po rnams kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ bdag la gser gyi thum po 'di stsal na/ bdag gis
klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa 'phrog ste/ khrid de mchi'o/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di khyer cig /des smras pa/ khyed cag gang la yid ches shing yid brtan pa de'i lag
tu bzhag la/ klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khrid de mchis nas 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas sprul khas sdigs pa des/ mi yid brtan du rung ba'i lag tu gser
gyi thum po gtad nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song ngo / /de nas des mtsho de'i kho ra khor yug tu brtags nas/ mtshan ma la mkhas pa zhig pas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs
pa de ni/ phyogs 'di kho na nyid na 'dug go /snyam nas/ de nas de gtor ma dang yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ bdag la gtor ma dang yo byad rnams
stsol cig dang / zhag bdun gyi nyin par klu'i bu de 'phrog ste khrid de mchi'o/ /sbrul khas sdigs pa de yang des mthong nas/ de ni/ bdag 'phrog tu 'ongs te/ zhag bdun gyi bar bdag 'phrog
nas/ pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal chen po bdag gis myong bar 'gyur na/ ji ltar bya/ su la skyabs btsal snyam pa dang / yang / mtsho de nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/
rngon pa sran can dang / spang leb can gnyis gnas te/ de gnyis mtsho de'i drung na gnas bcas nas gang dag skam la yod pa'i srog chags ri bong dang / ldang sko ka dang / phag la sogs
pa mtsho de la 'thung du 'gro ba dang / gang yang chu na yod pa nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa la sogs pa bsad cing 'tsho bar byed pa las/ de na yang sran can ni/ shi'o/ /spang leb
can ni/ gsan no/ /klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pas bsam pa/ rngon pa spang leb can ma gtogs pa skyabs gzhan med do/ /snyam nas/ de nas mi'i cha byad du byas te/ rngon pa spang
leb can gyi drung du song nas smras pa/ kye nang rje/ rgyal po nor can gyi yul gyi 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba zhes bya ba nas/
'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / bal glang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ su'i mthu las gyur pa/ ji ga khyod kyis shes sam/ des smras pa/
shes te/ rgyal po de chos dang ldan pas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed de/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis yul
bskyangs pas so/ /des smras pa/ ci de 'ba' zhig gam/ gzhan gyis kyang yin/ rngon pas smras pa/ gzhan gyi yon tan zhig kyang yod de/ mtsho 'di na klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs can
zhes bya ba gnas te/ des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /de na sa gzhi lhag par lo tog dang ldan pas yul yang bza'
ba dang / btung ba mod par gyur to/ /skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis klu'i bu de yul 'di nas 'phrog na/ klu'i bu de cir 'gyur/ rung bar mi 'gyur te/
de pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang yul mis 'phrog na/ de la khyod kyis ji ltar bya/ srog dang dbral bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis klu'i bu de gang
yin pa shes sam/ mi shes so/ /de nyid nga yin na/ lho phyogs lnga len pa'i sprul khas sdigs pa nga 'phrog par byed de/ de gtor ma dang / yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas zhag bdun gyi nyin
par 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'ongs nas mtsho ngogs su seng ldeng gi phur bu grwa bzhir btsugs pa/ tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bres te/ gsang sngags rjod par byed kyi/ de nas ha cang

yang mi ring pa zhig tu khyod mi mngon par 'dug la/ gang gi tshe des cho ga de lta bu bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe mtsho'i nang gi chu khol zhing lud par 'gyur te/ nga yang 'byung gi/ de'i tshe khyod kyis
sbrul khas sdigs pa de'i gnad du mdas bsnun la de ma thag tu drung du song ste gsang sngags slar sdus shig /ma bsdus na/ khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de/ sa la bor ra re zhes
smros shig /gal te des gsang sngags rnams ma bsdus par srog dang bral te shi na ni/ kho bo ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro/ /rngon pas
smras pa/ gal te khyod gcig pa la phan thogs na yang de bzhin du kho bo kho nas byas na/ yul mtha' dag la phan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ kho bos skyabs bya'i song zhig/ de nas
klu'i bu des de la dben pa'i phyogs shig bstan nas/ ji tsam na rngon pa de zhag bdun gyi nyin par phyogs dben par bdag nyid gab ste 'dug pa dang / sbrul khas sdigs de yang 'ongs nas/
gtor ma dang yo byad kyi cho ga bya bar rtsom ste/ des phyogs bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi btsugs/ tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bres te gsang sngags brjod do/ /de nas chu de khol du cha ba dang /
rngon pas gnad du mdas bsnun nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste smras pa/ khyod kyis nged kyi yul na gnas pa'i klu'i bu gsang sngags kyis dbrog gam/ gsang sngags slar sdus shig/
ma bsdus na/ khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la bor ra re/ de nas sbrul khas sdigs pas sdug bsngal nyams su myong bas nyam thag cing / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas
skrag nas gsang sngags brtul ba dang / rngon pas de ma thag par de bsad do/ /de nas klu'i bu gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa las thar te/ mtsho nas byung nas rngon pa la 'khyud
de 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ni kho bo'i ma yin la/ khyod ni/ kho bo'i pha yin te/ 'di ltar/ khyod la brten pas kho bo pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ma skyes so/ /tshur
shog/ gnas su 'dod ngo / /zhes des de gnas su khrid de song nas/ bza' ba dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas te/ rin po che dag bstabs nas ma dang pha la smras pa/
yab yum/ 'di ni/ bdag gi snying du sdug pa/ skyabs dang gnyen du gyur pa lags te/ 'di'i mthus/ bdag khyed dang / lhan cig pa las bral bar ma gyur to/ /de dag gis kyang de
la dam pa sbyin par byed de/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs byin nas des de rnams khyer te mtsho de nas byung ngo / /mtsho de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na/ bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu
phun sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de/ de na drang srong byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ sems can rnams la sdug par 'dzin pa zhig gnas so/ /de

nas rngon pa de drang srong de'i drung du dus gsum du 'gro bar rtsom zhing / de la klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang lhan cig ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad rgyas par smras so/ /de nas drang srong des smras pa/
khyod la rin po che dang gser ci dgos/ de'i gnas na don yod pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa yod kyi de slongs shig/ de nas rngon pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa la chags pa skyes nas/ drang srong
gi tshig mnyan te slar klu'i gnas su song ba dang / de nas ji tsam na/ klu'i khang pa'i sgo na don yod pa'i zhags pa de mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag 'dod pa'i zhags pa
gang yin pa de ni/ 'di kho na yin no/ /snyam nas/ klu'i gnas su zhugs so/ /de nas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang / klu gzhan rnams kyis yang dag par dga' ba dang mgu ba dag byas nas
rin po che dag bstabs pa dang / des smras pa/ kho bo la ni/ rin po che mi dgos kyi/ 'on kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di kho bo la byin cig /skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa/ khyod la 'di
ci dgos kho bo cag la ni/ dgos pa ste/ gang gi tshe nam mkha' lding gis gnod pa byas pa de'i tshe 'dis kho bo cag srung bar 'gyur ro/ /rngon pas smras pa/ khyed cag la ni/ nam mkha'
lding gi gnod pa lan 'ga' zhig 'byung ba na/ 'di dgos kyi/ kho bo la ni/ dus kun tu dgos kyi gal te legs pa byas pa dang / phan btags pa dran pa lta na/ byin cig/ klu'i bu
skye ba sna tshogs pa 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis bdag la phan cher btags kyi/ pha ma la brtags te sbyin no/ /snyam nas/ des pha ma la brtags te zhags
pa de byin no/ /de nas rngon pa de bdag thob pa bzhin du bde ba dang / yid bde bas tshim nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te/ klu'i gnas nas byung nas rang gi khyim du song ngo / /ji tsam
dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po nor can btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed
pa las/ bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med nas/ lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ bdag gi khyim du nor zas 'di snyed cig bsags kyang / bdag la bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med pas/
bdag 'das na/ bdag gi rgyud 'chad cing yul 'chor ba dang / bdog pa ril yang rgyal po gzhan gyis dbang bya bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / de
la dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / grogs po dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/ de skabs de/ de rnams la rgyas par
smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rnams la gsol ba mdzod cig dang / khyod la sras mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de bu med de/ bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang / chu lha dang /
lus ngan dang / nor lha la sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing / lha'i bye brag gzhan yang / 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / nags tshal gyi lha dag dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /
sum mdo'i lha dag dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos dang mthun pa dag dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten
na| gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dang bu mo dag skye'o/ /zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/ de ni/ de lta bu ma yin te/ gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na/ re re la yang 'di lta ste/
dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon par gyur pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gsum po
de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang ma dag chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/ gnas gsum po de dag
mngon du gyur pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' zhig btsun mo dam pa
de'i mngal du zhugs so/ /bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa
dang / dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang / mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang / gang las mngal du zhugs pa de yang shes pa dang / khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa
ste| gal te khye'u yin na/ dku g.yas par brten cing 'dug la/ gal te bu mo yin na/ dku g.yon par brten cing 'dug go/ de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas/ khyo la smras pa/
rje'i sras/ bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni/ 'di ltar/ bdag gi dku g.yas par brten cing mchis pa las na/ nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyi/ dgyes pa bskyed du
gsol| de yang yid dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs nas/ 'di skad ces/ kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa bu'i ngo mthong ba dang / kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing
mi mthun par mi skye ba dang / kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang / gsos pas phyir gso ba dang / bgo skal la spyod pa dang / kho bo rigs rgyud la yun ring du gnas par bsgrub pa dang / bdag
cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung du'am/ mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ 'di/ de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur
cig/ ces ming gis yon bsngo ba byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa rjod par byed do/ /de la sems can zhugs par rig nas/ 'di lta ste/ mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin

par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang / sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas ha cang mi kha ba dang / ha cang mi skyur ba dang /

ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang / ha cang mi mngar ba dang / ha cang mi tsha ba dang / ha cang mi bska ba dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba spangs pa'i zas
dag dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang / khri nas khrir dang / khri'u nas khri'ur dang / zhod kyis
gzhir mi 'bab pa dang / des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par nyam bag tu bzhag go/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/ mdzes
pa| gsal ba/ gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba/ yan lag
dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de btsas pa na/ kun dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rnga brdungs ba rgyal pos thos nas smras pa/ de ci'i phyir yin/ btsun mo rnams kyis
rgyal po la smras pa/ lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ khyod kyi sras po zhig bltams so/ /de nas rgyal pos grong khyer de thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal te/ byi
dor byas nas/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng / shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag bshams/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs
kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram ste bsgo ba/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin cig/ btson thams cad khye zhig/ de'i phyir nyi ma bdun gsum
nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ khye'u 'di/ rgyal po nor
can gyi sras lags pas/ khye'u'i ming nor bzang du gdags so/ /zhes de'i ming nor bzang zhes bya bar btags so/ /khye'u nor bzang ma ma brgyad po/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis
dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang /
zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis bsring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed
par byed do/ /gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug ste zhes bya ba nas brtag pa brgyad dang / dbye ba dang / klog pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gsal bar gyur to/ /zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ ljongs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu dang / brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di mngon par rgyal
bar byas te gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ de'i phas chung ma gsum po che ma dang /
'bring ma dang / chun ma dag bzhag cing gnas pa'i khang pa rnam pa gsum po/ dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi rnams brtsigs nas/ skyed mos tshal rnam pa gsum po/ dgun
gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi dag btsugs so/ /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la skyes pa med par song nas sil snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga'
bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rngon pa spang leb can ri dwags tshol zhing de dang de dag tu rgyu ba na/ ri bo gzhan zhig la phyin pa dang / des ri bo de'i
zhod na/ drang srong gi bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs rgyu ba/ de na mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos g.yogs pa/ ngang
pa dang / bya ka ran+da ba dang / ngur bas mdzes pa de mthong nas/ de bsti gnas der 'khyam par brtsams pa las/ ji tsam na/ drang srong skra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang / spu rnams
ring ba/ lus rlung dang tsha bas gdungs pa/ shing gos gyon pa zhig shing drung du gnas bcas te/ rtswa'i spyil bu na 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang rkang pa la
mgo bos phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas dris pa/ legs ldan/ phyogs 'dir khyod bzhugs nas/ yun ji srid cig lags/ lo bzhi bcu lon no/ /khyod kyi yun de srid cig tu phyogs
'dir lon no/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'ga' lta gzigs pa'am/ gsan pa lta mchis sam/ drang srong zhi ba'i bdag nyid des/ dal bu dal bus smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod
kyis mtsho 'di mthong ngam/ legs ldan mthong lags so/ /'di ni/ /tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing zhes bya ste/ ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba dang / bya sna tshogs kyi
tshogs kyis bsten pa/ kha ba dang / dngul dang / ba mo'i mdog lta bu'i chus shin tu gang ba/ shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog gis bskor ba'i chu'i rdzing 'dir tshes bco lnga la mi'am
ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bya ba/ mi'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas/ mgo khrus dang bsku mnye sna tshogs dang 'ongs nas khrus byed do/ /de khrus byed pa'i tshe
bro gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra nyan pas bya dang / ri dwags kyang yid 'phrog par byed do/ /kho bo yang de'i sgra thos nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba chen pos zhag bdun 'da' bar byed de/

bzhin bzang kho bos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di mthong ngo / /de nas rngon pa spang leb can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis klu las don yod pa'i zhags pa thob pa ste/ de mi'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma
la gdab bo/ /snyam nas/ de dus gzhan zhig na/ tshes bco lnga la don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te/ mtsho 'gram dang nye bar me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma tshang tshing zhig tu 'khras nas
gcig tu bsgrims pas bya ra byed cing 'dug go /ji tsam na/ yid 'phrog ma mi'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ de 'dra ba'i 'byor ba nyid kyis tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing du khrus kyi phyir zhugs
pa dang / rngon pa spang leb can gyis de ma thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa btab pa las/ des mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma zin to/ /don yod pa'i zhags pas zin nas/ mtsho'i nang na mchong
brgal zhing 'jigs pa'i sgra yang phyung ba dang / mi'am ci mo'i tshogs lhag mas de thos nas/ phan tshun brgyugs te mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma la brtag par brtsams pa las bzung bar mthong
ngo / /mthong nas kyang skrag nas bros so/ /rngon pa des/ mchog tu gzugs bzang mo/ /blta na sdug pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gzung ba'i phyir drung du gtugs pa dang / des smras pa/ ma
rabs khyod ni nga la ma reg cig /khyod kyi 'di ni thog tu bab ma yin/ /nga ni gzugs bzang rgyal gyi 'os yin pas/ /'dzin pa legs par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /rngon pas smras pa/ gang
de khyod ma bzung na 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ kho mo mi 'bros kyi/ gal te yid mi ches na/ 'di'i mthus kho mo steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro'i gtsug
gi nor bu 'di zungs shig /rngon pas smras pa/ su shes/ des de la gtsug gi nor bu byin nas/ smras pa/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di su'i lag pa na gnas pa de'i dbang du kho mo 'gyur ro/ /
de nas rngon pas nor bu de blangs te/ zhags pas bcings bzhin du khrid de song ngo / /de'i tshe gzhon nu nor bzang ri dwags 'chor du chas pa dang / rngon pa des gzhon nu nor bzang gzugs
bzang po/ /mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni/ rgyal bu gzhon nu yin la/ 'di yang / mchog tu gzugs bzang mo/ /blta na
sdug pa yin te/ gal te 'di mthong na/ btsan thabs su khyer bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di skyes kyi tshul du bdag nyid kyis dbul lo/ /snyam nas/ de nas de zhags pas
bcings bzhin du/ rgyal po gzhon nu nor bzang gang na ba der khrid song nas phyin pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis bud med rin po che 'di skyes su 'tshal
te mchis na/ bzhes su gsol/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor bzang gis/ mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma/ gzugs bzang mo/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog rgyas pa/ mchog
dang ldan pa/ yon tan thams cad 'dus pa/ bud med kyi mtshan bco brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ yul gyi mi bas bzang pa/ nu ma gser gyi bum pa dang / rus sbal ltar rgyas shing / rlo ba dang /
mkhrang zhing mkhregs pas shin tu legs par zlum pa ltem pa/ mig mthong mthing la rtsa dmar zhing dkyus ring la pad+ma gzhon nu 'dra ba/ sna'i gzegs ring zhing mtho ba/ ma mchu byi ru dang /
nor bu dang / rin po che dang / bim pa'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ 'gram pa ma rnyong zhing yongs su rgyas pa/ mkhur tshos lhag par dga' bar byed pa'i ri mo'i thig le can/ smin ma rim gyis
mdzes shing 'dzar la bung ba'i tshogs ltar gnag pa/ dpung pa zla ba dri ma med pa ltar rgyas la ring ba/ lto gnyer ma zab mo gsum dang ldan zhing yid tsam rnyong ba/ nu ma'i g.yur gyi ro stod bags
kyis 'dud la/ dku shing rta'i yan lag ltar dbyibs shin tu mdzes pa/ lag pa chu shing gi snying po 'dra ba/ brla byin gyis phra ba zlum pas mdzes pa/ rtsa shin tu mi mngon zhing gya gyu med
pas yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ nor bu mang po'i mgo rgyan dang / mgul gdub dang / rkang gdub dang / gdub bu dang / do shal dang / se mo do'i sgras 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ skra gnag
la 'jam pa/ bde sogs ltar rkang pa rkang gdub kyis brgyan cing gser gyi 'og pag can/ lto phyang de ba/ do shal mang po dpyangs pa/ mdog gser gtso ma ltar bzang ba mthong / mthong
ma thag tu gzhon nu nor bzang 'dod chags kyi zhags pa/ chu zla dri ma med cing / gsal ba g.yo ba'i rang bzhin lta bur gzung dka' ba/ rlung chu rlabs dang bcas
pa'i chu srin lta bur rtogs par dka' ba/ nam mkha' lding dang rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar 'gro ba shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur myur du 'gyur ba/ spre'u ltar sa gcig na mi 'dug pas
g.yo zhing gtsab yab can gyis ni dam du zin/ 'dod chags kyi mda' rtag tu nyon mongs bsten pa la goms pa'i 'dod chags kyi bde ba ro myang ba la brkam pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi
yul ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa las mi ldog pa/ bzang mo la rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis shin tu dri ma can du byas pa/ 'phrad pas 'dod pas shin tu dbyung mi bzod pa'i sgra 'byin pa/
tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i gzhus 'phangs pas ni/ snying la phog ste/ me'i nang du phye ma leb bzhin du de nyid du 'gyel to/ /smras pa/ dbyar gyi char sprin nang nas glog ni 'gyu ba ltar/ /
bzhin ras zla ba 'dra de nor bzang gis mthong ste/ /de la chags pa'i 'dod pa steg tshol las byung ba'i/ /'dod chags mda' yis de yi sems la pho ga/ //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po
zhe lnga pa/ de nas rgyal bu nor bzang gis yid 'phrog ma de khrid de glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song nas/ rngon pa de la yang grong khyer mchog gcig byin no/ /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang yid
'phrog ma dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir dong nas lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed/ yid 'phrog ma'i gzugs dang / na tshod dang / bsnyen bkur
brgya phrag du ma'i yon tan gyis gzhon nu nor bzang gi sems ji ltar de dang skad cig kyang 'bral mi phod pa de ltar 'phrog go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ bram ze gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing
'ongs pa las/ de las gcig ni/ rgyal po la rten bcas so/ /gnyis pa ni/ gzhon nu nor bzang la'o/ /rgyal po la brten bcas pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal pos mdun na 'don du bcug
ste/ longs spyod kyi skal ba yang byin no/ /gzhon nu nor bzang gi gang yin pa de la ni/ des longs spyod kyi skal ba tsam zhig byin pa dang / smras pa/ gzhon nu gang gi tshe yab 'das nas khyod
rgyal por bcug pa de'i tshe/ bdag la ci zhig bgyi/ gzhon nu nor bzang gis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod kyi grogs po bram ze/ nga'i yab kyis mdun na 'don du bcug pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyang
nga'i mdun na 'don du gzhug go/ zhes bya ba'i gtam de gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/ bram ze mdun na 'don des thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ngas ci nas gzhon nu nyid kyis
kyang rgyal srid mi thob pa de ltar bya na/ mdun na 'don du gzhug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po de'i yul du ri bor pa zhig bsngo bar gyur nas/ rgyal pos de
'bebs su dmag kha chen zhig btang ba las de bcom/ rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar log go /de bzhin du kha che bdun gyi bar btang ba las/ de rnams kyang
bcom/ rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar lhags so/ /rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du rang gi dpung nyams shing gzhan gyi mthu skyed par mdzad/ gang
yang lha'i yul na mtshon gyis 'tsho ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad dgug tu gsol/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsam pa/ gzhon nu nor bzang gsad pa'i thabs bya ba'i dus ni/ 'di
yin no/ /snyam nas/ de nas rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha de lta bus ni/ dbab par rngo mi thogs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar bya/ nga nyid kho na 'gro'am/ mdun na 'don gyis
smras pa/ ci'i slad du lha nyid gshegs/ gzhon nu nor bzang 'di ni/ dar la bab cing mthu rtsal snyems pa dang ldan pa lags pas/ dmag 'di rnams dang lhan cig tu dgyer
gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes/ de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu bkug nas bsgo ba/ gzhon nu/ dmag dang lhan cig tu dengs la ri bor rnams phob cig
lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzang gis rgyal po las mnyan nas btsun mo rnams kyi gan du song ste/ yid 'phrog ma mthong ba dang / des thams cad brjed par gyur
to/ /de nas yang rgyal pos bsgo ba dang / yang / de mthong ma thag tu thams cad brjed par gyur to/ /de nas mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu nor bzang ni/ yid
'phrog ma la lhag par chags pas mchi bar rngo mi thogs kyi/ dmag bsdogs la gzhon nu btsun mo rnams kyi nang nas byung ba dang / ci nas kyang yid 'phrog ma'i drung du mi mchi bar
thal byung gtang bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dpung gi tshogs sta gon gyis shig /blon po rnams kyi rgyal po las mnyan nas/ dpung
gi tshogs glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung phun sum tshogs pa/ 'tshog chas go mtshon rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa dag sta gon byas so/ /de nas gzhon nu phyir
byung ba dang bsgo ba/ gzhon nu dpung gi tshogs sta gon byas kyi song zhig /des smras pa/ lha/ yid 'phrog ma la bltas te mchi bar bgyid/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu
thogs par 'gyur gyi ma lta zhig /yab/ gal te de ltar na/ ma la bltas te mchi'o/ /gzhon nu ma la ltos shig /des yid 'phrog ma'i gtsug gi nor bu khyer nas/ ma'i drung
du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yum/ bdag ri bor ba rnams 'bebs su mchi lags kyi/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di/ khyod kyis shin tu dben par sbos la/ yid
'phrog ma 'gum pa la thug pa ma lags par ji ltar gyur kyang ma stsol cig /ces des de skad ma la bsgos nas mchi phyag byas te/ dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang /
rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang chas te rim gyis yul 'das nas/ ri bor ba de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du btab ste 'dug go /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos
kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lam de nas gnod
sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar chas so/ /de la ma de nas chas pa na/ nam mkha'i lam la thogs par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis lam 'di nas
lan mang po zhig tu song na bdag gi bzhon pa lan 'ga' yang thogs par ma gyur na/ gang gis na/ de ltar thogs pa 'di lta rgyu ci yod snyam pa las/ des gzhon nu nor bzang mthong
nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ dmag la chas pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ 'di'i grogs byas te ri bor
pa 'di rnams srog chags 'ga' yang gnod par mi 'gyur bar dbab po/ /snyam du bsam nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len la smras pa/ lnga len tshur shog /khyod kyis
gzhon nu nor bzang ri bor pa rnams dang g.yul ma bkye bar srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod par mi bya bar phobs cig /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis/ bka' bzhin

'tshal zhes rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas/ lha'i yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs shing ta la'i tshad tsam gyi skyes pa dang / ri'i tshad tsam gyi glang po che dang / glang po che'i
tshad tsam gyi rta dang / gzhal med khang gi tshad tsam gyi shing rta rnams sprul to/ /de nas ral gri dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung thung dang /
mda' dang / dgra sta la sogs te/ mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sil dkrol gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas 'jigs pa chen po ston cing / lnga len mthu chen po tshogs
rnams dang ri bor du phyin pa dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta'i sgra dang / sil dkrol gyi sgra sna tshogs dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi mthus/ ra ba dag ral
bar gyur to/ /de nas ri bor na gnas pa de rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs de dag/ ra ba dag ral ba mthong nas/ mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te dris pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams
kyis smras pa/ myur du sgo phye zhig /gzhon nu nor bzang 'di'i mjug nas 'ong ste/ dpung gi tshogs 'di ni/ de'i yin no/ /gal te myur du ma phye na thams cad rmeg med par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams
kyis/ bdag cag rgyal la mi ldog ste/ /gzhon nu blo dang ldan la min/ /rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho rnams kyis/ /bdag cag 'jigs shing skrag gyur med/ /ces
smras nas/ de rnams kyis sgo phye ste/ de nas rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng nas/ bum pa gang ba dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis gzhon nu nor bzang bsu'o/ /des kyang dbugs phyung
nas de rnams bgrang ba las sna bo bskos te dpya thang bcad/ gte'u yang bzung ngo / /de nas ri bor pa de rnams cham du phab nas/ gzhon nu nor bzang slar log go/ rgyal po nor can gyis

de nyid kyis nub mo rmi lam na bya rgod cig 'ongs te/ rgyal po'i lto dral nas rgyu ma gzangs te grong khyer de thams cad kyi mtha' bskor ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi khyim du 'ongs par mthong nas/
de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag /mi dga' zhing spu zing zhes byed nas/ myur ba myur bar langs te mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ gzhi 'di las bdag
rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las/ de nam nangs nas/ rmi lam de bram ze mdun na 'don la smras
pa dang / des bsam pa/ lhas/ rmi lam de lta bu mthong ba ni/ gdon mi za bar gzhon nus ri bor pa rnams pham par byas kyi/ log pa bzhin du bstan par bya'o/ /snyam nas smras
pa| lha/ khyed kyi rmi lam du gzigs pa ni/ bzang po ma lags te/ gdon mi 'tshal bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ sku tshe'i bar chad du 'gyur lags so/ /'on kyang
'di zlog pa'i thabs mchis te/ de yang bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig las mthong ngo / /zlog pa'i thabs de ci yin/ lha/ skyed mos tshal du rdzing dbyibs legs pa/ tshad la bab pa bgyis la/ de
nas rdo thal gyis byugs te legs par bstar nas/ ri dwags phra mo rnams kyi khrag gis bkang la/ de nas lhas khrus la gshegs pa na/ rdzing de la them skas gcig las 'jug par bgyi'o/ /
gcig las zhugs nas gnyis la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/ /gnyis pa las zhugs nas gsum pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/ /gsum pa las zhugs nas bzhi pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/ /de nas bram ze
rig byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis lha'i zhabs lces bldags la/ mi ma yin pa'i tshil gyi bdug pas bdug go/ de ltar na/ lha'i dngos sdig 'byang zhing yun
ring por rgyal srid skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de dag thams cad ni/ nus na/ 'di ltar/ mi ma yin pa'i tshil bu 'di ni/ shin tu dkon no/ /mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ /lha/
mod pa gang lags pa de/ dkon lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de ji lta bu zhig yin/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha/ yid 'phrog ma 'di/ mi ma lags pa ma lags sam/ rgyal pos smras
pa| mdun na 'don/ 'di la gzhon nu'i srog 'dug gi de skad ma smra zhig/ des smras pa/ lha/ khyim gyi phyir ni 'ga' gtang ste/ /grong rdal phyir ni khyim gtang ngo //
yul ljongs phyir ni grong rdal te/ /bdag gi phyir ni sa gtang ngo / /zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam/ rgyal po bdag nyid brtan gyur nas/ /gzhon nu blo ldan de la ni/ /gzhan zhig stsal bar spyod grang
gi /yid 'phrog 'di ni dgum par mdzod/ /bdag nyid la mngon par chags pa ni/ mi byed pa ci yang med pas/ des khas blangs so/ /de nas mdun na 'don gyis ji skad bstan pa
bzhin du bya bar brtsams te/ rdzing brkos nas rngo thal gyis byugs shing legs par bstar nas/ ri dwags phra mo rnams kyi khrag gsog pa la zhugs so/ /sbyor ba de/ nor bzang
gi btsun mo'i skye bos shes nas/ de rnams dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bdag cag lang tsho la bab cing / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ da ni/ bdag cag
dang / gzhon nu nor bzang du yongs su dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag/ yid 'phrog mas mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir
lhag par dga'/ ji tsam na/ gzhan zhig gis yid 'phrog ma la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba skyes nas gzhon nu
nor bzang gi ma gang na ba der song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas snying rje rje skad du sgra gcom chung ngus don de dal bus smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gal te de ltar na/ legs par rtogs shig/
bdag gis kyang brtag go/ yid 'phrog mas brtags nas yang smras pa dang / des brtags na yang bden par mthong nas/ de nas des gtsug gi nor bu de dang gos shig/ yid 'phrog ma
la byin nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod dus la ma bab par ma 'gro zhig/ de ltar na/ kho mo la kham mchu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro /de nas rgyal po ji skad bstan pa'i rim pa bzhin du khrus la
chas te khrag gis gang ba'i rdzing bur zhugs nas byung ba dang / de nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la bram ze rnams kyi lces bldags so/ /ji tsam na/ mi'am ci mo khrid de shog cig ces bsgo ba dang /
de ma thag kho nar yid 'phrog ma nam mkha' la 'phags te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni reg dang 'phrad pa dang / /bdag ni bgad dang brtses pa las/ /bal glang mo btags thar pa ltar//
da ni bdag mo 'gro bar bya/ /rgyal pos kyang nam mkha'i lam nas 'gro ba mthong nas/ de skrag ste mdun na 'don la smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'bad par bya ba de ma grub par/ mi'am ci yid 'phrog
ma bros so/ /mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha/ da ni/ don grub ste/ dngos sdig dang bral lags so/ /de nas yid 'phrog nam mkha'i lam las 'gro ba na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yang
bdag gnas skabs 'di thob pa de ni/ drang srong des bstan pa las gyur gyi/ gal te des ma bstan na ni/ bdag gzung zhing 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba zhig /de lta bas
na/ re zhig drang srong de'i drung du 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ de de'i bsti gnas su song nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas drang srong la smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod kyis bstan pas/ bdag bzung
ste mchis nas/ mi'i reg pa rnams thob cing srog gi bar chad du cung zhig gis ma gyur to /de bas gsol ba ni/ gal te brgya zhig la gzhon nu nor bzang bdag tshol zhing mchis na/ de la
bdag gi sor gdub stsol la/ 'di skad kyang gsung ba'i rigs so/ /gzhon nu/ lam yang bgrod par dka' ste/ nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi slar bzhud cig /gal te bzlog kyang mchis
su ma btub na/ de la lam bstan pa'i rigs kyi/ gzhon nu yid 'phrog mas bstan pa/ byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum mchis so/ /de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum mo/ /
de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum mchis so/ /de dag brgal ba dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs can mchis so/ /de'i byang phyogs na ni/ ri bo phur pa'i rtse mchis so/ /de nas lam chu sgra
can dang / seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang / phur ba'i dbyibs dang / sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang / mi g.yo ba dang / rab
grol te/ ri bo de dag khyod kyis rgol cig /de la ri bo seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / phur pa'i dbyibs la ni/ phug nas 'jug /rdo rje can la ni/ bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/ thabs
'di dag gis ri bo de rnams brgal bar bgyi'o/ /'khrul 'khor ra gdong can dang / lug lta bu dang / skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag kyang gzhom par bgyi'o/ /phug na sbrul kha
chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni/ zho shas gzhom par bgyi'o/ /gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig /phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni/ /bdag gi slad du gzhu
brdungs la/ /mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis/ /gang nas lug gnyis phan tshun nas/ /rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni/ /de gnyis rwa re bcag mdzod dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur
lags so/ /'jigs pa che skyed mtshon thogs pa'i/ /lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na/ /de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /srin mo
lcags kyi mchu can zhig /kha 'dzum gdangs par bgyid gzigs na/ /de tshe de yi dpral ba la/ /phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod/ /de bzhin khron pa klong drag 'khyil/ /drug cu'i khru
can la khyod mchongs/ /skra mig seng ge'i ltar ser zhing / /mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang / /gzhu bkang ste ni gsad mdzod la/ /chu srin 'dzin
khris gang ba yi/ /chu bo mang po brgal mdzod cig/ nang gi phye ma leb gdungs dang / /sna tshogs dud mo rgod pa dang / /sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung / /nang ga na ni srin
mo khro/ /phye ma leb na mi ma yin/ /gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang / /sna tshogs can na 'dod rgyur gzugs/ /dud mor ma'i ma ci yi bran/ /rgod pa na ni mi'am ci'i/ mna' ma sbrul mang
sbrul can na/ /'od ma can klung shal ma yi/ /nang ga la ni brtan par bya/ /phye ma leb la brtul phod bya/ /gdungs par 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo / /sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs/ /dud
mo can du yid bde bas/ /rgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i/ /sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod/ /sbrul can du ni sbrul dug gi/ sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can/ /klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa
yi/ /sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod/ /chu bo rnams brgal nas gcan po'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te/ gzhom par mdzod cig/ de nas ni/ mi
'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so/ /zhes gsungs shig/ drang srong de la yid 'phrog mas de skad smras nas/ rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te de nas song ngo / /ji tsam na
gzhon nu nor bzang gis ri bor de phab nas skyes khyer te/ glang po'i grong khyer du 'ongs so/ /zhes rgyal pos thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/ /de nas gzhon nu ngal sos nas/
pha'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas mdun du 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas smras pa/ gzhon nu/ khyod bde bar 'ong sam/ lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin
gyis ri bor pa phab ste gte'u bzung / sna bo bskos lags te/ dpya dang skyes kyang 'di dag lags kyi/ phyag mdzod du gzhug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ legs par byas kyi
bzhes so/ /de nas gzhon nus pha la phyag byas nas chas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu skyes la lhan cig kho nar longs spyad kyi 'dug cig /lha/ bdag gis yid 'phrog ma ma
mthong nas yun ring zhig lags pas mchis lags so/ /gzhon nu/ deng 'gro ba bshol la/ sang song zhig/ de gal gyis 'chu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab/ nges par der nyid
bdag mchis lags so/ /rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de nas gzhon nu rang gi khyim du song na/ btsun mo'i pho brang gi sgo dpal gyis stong par mthong nas/ de sems khong du chud bzhin
du zhugs na/ yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas/ snying stor te phan tshun du rgyu zhing / yid 'phrog ma/ yid 'phrog ma zhes sgra phyung ngo / /ji tsam na btsun mo rnams tshogs nas/ btsun mo de rnams
gtam rlung la bskur ba dang / de'i snying la zug rngus zugs pas/ yang nas yang du dris pas/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /de mya ngan gyis yid blong bar gyur to/ /bud med de rnams
kyis smras pa/ lha/ btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na de bas bud med shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na/ ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ des pha snying rje med cing
byas pa chud gzon pa thos nas/ ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ yum/ yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur cing / /gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /
yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na/ /bdag yid 'phrog ma gang du mchis/ /yid kyis rab tu rgyug snyam na'ang / /bdag gi yid ni kun tu rmongs/ /de dang bral bar gyur pa yis/ /snying ni shin
tu gdungs pa nyid/ /bdag gi yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog la/ /yid du 'thad cing yid la dga' ba yi/ /yid 'phrog dang bral bdag lus gdungs pa yi/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di
ni gang nas mchis/ /des smras pa/ bu/ yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur nas kho mos btang ngo / /yum/ ji ltar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad rgyas
par smras pa dang / des pha snying rje med cing byas pa mi gzob yin no/ /zhes smras nas/ yang smras pa/ yum/ gang du mchis/ bshul ni/ gang nas/ des smras pa/ gang du
yid 'phrog song ba yi/ /lam de ri dang drang srong dang / /seng ge dag gis rtag bsnyen cing / /chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa yin/ /de yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi bzad
bar nyam thag cing snying rje rje skad du bla zhing smre sngags 'don pa/ yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur pa'i/ /yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na/ /zhes bya ba nas/ bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas 'ongs/ /
zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas mas smras pa/ bu/ btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bud med dag yod na/ ci'i phyir mya ngan byed/ gzhon nus smras pa/
yum/ de ma rnyed par bdag dga' bar ga la 'gyur/ des de dbugs phyung yang 'on kyang mya ngan gyis gdungs nas de'i khungs tshol zhing phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams te de'i blo skyes pa/ gang kho na

las thob pa de nyid la re zhig dri'o/ /snyam nas/ des rngon pa spang leb can gyi drung du song ste dris pa/ khyod kyis yid 'phrog ma gang nas rnyed/ des smras pa/ ri bo che ge mo'i ngos la drang srong
zhig gnas te/ de'i bsti gnas na tshangs pa 'du ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing mchis te/ der khrus la zhugs pa las/ drang srong gis bstan nas rnyed do/ /des bsam pa/ de ni/ drang srong
gi drung du song dang de las khungs phyin par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /rgyal pos gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma dang bral bas shin tu yid blong ba'i gtam de thos so/ /de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu
khyod yid blong du ci yod/ da ni/ de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i chung ma sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ yab/ bdag ni/ de ma lags pa'i mchis brang gi 'khor dang mchis par rngo mi thogs lags
so| |rgyal pos de la lan du ma smras kyang ma bzlog go /de nas rgyal pos grong khyer gyi sgo dang / ra ba'i khar ci nas kyang gzhon nu phyir mi 'chor bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu
srung ma dag bkod do/ /de nas gzhon nu ni/ /mtshan thog thag mi nyal bar gyur to/ /lnga po 'di dag ni/ mtshan mo cung zad nyal gyi/ phal cher mi nyal te/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa bud med
la chags pas sems bcings pa dang / bud med skyes pa la chags pa dang / srog chags ngur pa dang / chom rkun pa'i ra bgo dang / dge slong brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ /zhes
gsungs so/ /de nas gzhon nu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag sgo nas song na rgyal po'i sgo srung gi srung ma gtum po dag yod de/ de rnams kyis bdag chad bas gcod pa'am/ srog
dang bral bar byed par 'gyur gyi/ ci nas kyang ma la bdag srung ma med pa'i lam nas 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ de mtshan mo langs te/ ut+pa la sngon po'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa'i phreng ba
rgyal mtshan la brtags nas/ gang na srung ma'i mi med pa de nas babs pa na zla ba shar to/ /de nas des zla ba la bltas nas yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i smre sngags 'di lta bu dag 'don par byed
de| zla nya rgyu skar rgyal po mtshan mo gsal mdzad kye/ /khyod ni snar ma'i mig tu sdug pa ded dpon bzang / /cig bdag gi sdug pa ut+pal lta bu'i mig /yid 'phrog ces bgyi khyod kyis sa steng
gzigs lags sam/ zhes smras nas/ sngon gyi dga' pa nyams su myong ba dran zhing song ba las/ ri dwags mo zhig mthong nas de la yang smras pa/ kye ma ri dwags mo khyod rtswa chu lo ma za/ khyod ni
legs 'gyur ba der spyod bdag ni rngon pa min/ /ri dwags mo ltar mig dkyus ring bas gzugs bzang ba/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /de de nas song ste phyogs

gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu mdzes par byas pa'i snying po la bung ba dag longs spyod pa mthong nas/ de nas bung ba zhig la smras pa/ sbrang rtsi'i bung ba ri bo mthon mthing
lta bu'i mchog /smyug ma'i sbubs dang pad+ma dag la gnas 'cha' ba/ /skra yi tshogs ring kha dog bung ba ltar gnag pa/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /phyogs de nas

kyang song ba dang / sbrul zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ kye ma'i sbrul nag shing lo lta bur lce g.yo zhing / /mig dang kha yi nang nas dud pa'i tshogs 'byin pa/ /khyod kyi gdug pa'i me dang
'dod chags mer mi mtshungs/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /de nas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu son pa dang / tshal gzhan zhig na khu byug sgra 'byin pa zhig mthong ngo / /
mthong nas kyang khu byug de la yang smras pa/ kye ma khu byug tshal mchog ljon shing la gnas pa/ /'dab chags tshogs kyi rgyal po bud med yid 'phrog pa/ /ut+pal sngon po lta bur dri med mdzes
pa'i mig /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang / shing mya ngan 'tshang bya ba me tog thams cad rgyas pa zhig mthong
nas/ ming gi rnam grangs bkra shis zhes brjod pa/ /ljon pa rnams kyi rgyal po cher gyur pa/ /yid 'phrog mya ngan gyis ni blong ba bdag /thal mo sbyar na khyod kyis mya ngan sol/ /de de
ltar yid blong zhing rim gyis drang srong de'i bsti gnas su phyin nas/ /des drang srong de la dul ba dang bcas pas phyag byas nas smras pa/ bzod 'phags gos su shing shun dang ni g.yang gzhi
mnabs/ |rtsa ba myu gu skyu ru bil ba ka bde gsol/ /drang srong mgos btud phyag 'tshal bdag gi yid 'phrog ma/ /khyod kyis gzigs sam khyod ni bdag la myur du gsungs/ /de nas
drang srong des gzhon nu nor bzang la/ byon pa legs zhes bya ba dang / stan bting bya ba la sogs pa sngar bya bas yang dag par dga' ba byas nas smras pa/ smin ma 'dzar ba'i smin tshugs mthon
mthing bzhin legs mthong na dga' ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ /bzhin ras zla ba nya 'dra ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i mig de bdag gis mthong / /dpon khyod bag brkyang bzhugs te rtsa ba 'bras bu sna
tshogs gsol bar mdzod cig dang / /slad kyis bde blag 'byon 'gyur 'di la bdag gi yid la the tshom yong ma mchis/ /smin ma bzang mos 'di skad tshig smras te/ /gzhon nu khyod la sred
pas bdag mi bde/ /nags khrod gnas pa'ang sdug bsngal chen po ste/ /gshegs par gyur na nges par bdag mthong ngo / /des sor gdub rgyan 'di byin nas smras pa/ lam yang la bgrod dka' bas nyon mongs
par 'gyur gyi slar log cig /gal te bzlog kyang 'dug tu ma btub na/ de la lam bstan pa'i rigs so/ /des yang 'di skad ces bstan te/ byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod do/ /de dag brgal ba'i
pha rol na yang gsum/ de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum yod de/ de dag brgal ba dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs can zhes bya ba yod de/ phyogs de nas sman 'di dag blang bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ shin

tu 'o ma 'dzag ces bya ba'i sman yod de/ de mar la btsos nas btung bar bya'o/ /des na skom pa dang bkres pa med cing / dran pa dang mthu stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /spre'u zhig kyang bkri bar bya/ gsang
sngags dag kyang bslab par bya/ gzhu mda' dang chas pa dang / nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang / dug gsod pa sman dug sel ba dang / lcags kyi phur pa gsum dang / pi wang yang bcang bar bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal

po gangs can gyi byang phyogs na/ ri bo phur pa'i rtse yod do/ /de nas lam chu sgra can dang / seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod rgyur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang / phur pa'i
dbyibs dang / sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang / mi g.yo ba dang rab grol lo/ /khyod kyis ri de dag brgal dgos te/ de la ri bo seng ldeng can la ni/ phug nas 'jug rgyud gcig pa dang / phur pa'i
dbyibs la yang phug nas 'jug /rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/ thabs 'di dag gis ri rnams brgal bar bya'o/ /'khrul 'khor nga gdong can dang / lug
lta bu dang / skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag gzhom par bya'o/ /phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni/ zho shas gzhom par bya'o/ /gang
na sbrul ni nag po zhig/ phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni/ /bdag gi slad du gzhu brdungs la/ /mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis/ /gang la lug gnyis phan tshun nas/ /rdung bar byed
pa mthong na ni/ /de gnyis rwa re bcad mdzod dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /'jigs pa che skyes mtshon thogs pa'i/ /lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na/ /de gnyis las ni gcig
brdegs dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig /kha 'dzum gdangs par bgyid gzigs na/ /de tshe de yi dpral ba la/ /phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod/ /
de bzhin khron pa klong khrag 'khyil/ /drug cu'i khru can la khyod mchongs/ /skra mig seng ge'i lhar ser zhing / /mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag/ gzhu bkang de ni
gsad mdzod la/ /chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yi/ /chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig /nang gi phye ma leb gdungs dang / /sna tshogs dud ma dgod pa dang / /sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung / /nang ga na

ni srin mo khro/ /phye ma leb na mi ma yin/ /gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang / /sna tshogs can na 'dod sgyur gzugs/ /ngud mor mi 'am ci yi bran/ /dgod pa na ni mi'am ci'i/ /mna' ma sbrul can sbrul mang
na/ /'od ma can klung shal ma li/ /nang ga na ni brtan par bya/ /phye ma leb la rtul phod bya/ /gdung bar 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo / /sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs/ /dud mo can du yid bde bas/ /
dgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i/ /sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod/ /sbrul can du ni sbrul dug gi /sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can/ /klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa yi/ /sbyor ba kun tu rgal bar
mdzod/ /chu bo rnams brgal nas gcan pa'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran btsugs te gzhom par mdzod cig /de nas ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so/ /
zhes gsungs shig /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang gis ji skad bstan pa'i sman pa dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dug sel gyi sbyor ba rnams btsal ba'i phyir drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag

byas nas song ngo / /de nas des spre'u ma gtogs par ji skad bstan pa thams cad sta gon byas nas/ de nas de rnams khyer te/ yang drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang / des de la spre'u byin nas smras pa/
gzhon nu/ /'bad pa 'dis ci bya/ yid 'phrog ma 'dis ci zhig dgos/ khyod gcig pu ni/ grogs med pas lus gdon mi za bar 'gyur gyi thong / gzhon nus smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag
ni| gdon mi za bar mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mkha' la zla ba rgyu ba grogs shig ga las mchis/ /mche ba'i mthu stobs ldan pa'i ri dwags gtso bo dang / /
me yis nags sreg pa na grogs shig ga las mchis/ /bdag lta bu la grogs po mthu ldan ci zhig 'tshal/ /kye ci rgya mtsho che chur 'jug par mi bgyi'am/ /ci lags sbrul gyis zin
ces gso bar mi bgyi'am/ /sems can spungs can gyis bstan brtson 'grus cher brtsams te/ /gal te 'bad de ma rungs 'di la nyes pa med/ /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang yid 'phrog mas
bstan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang chas te/ rim gyis ri dang / chu bo dang / phug dang / g.yang sa la sogs par sman dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dug sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas mi
'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu son pa dang / gzhon nus/ grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa/ skyed mos tshal gyi tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pas mdzes par
byas pa/ bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa/ rdzing bu dang / mtshe'u ring po dang / gru bzhi dang / mi'am ci mo rnams kyis bskor ba de la/ mi'am ci mo rnams chu len du 'ong ba mthong nas/ de nas
gzhon nu nor bzang gis de rnams la smras pa/ chu mang po 'dis ci zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mi'am/ ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis/ de mi'i
lag tu son par gyur pas de'i mi'i dri bshal ba lags so/ /gzhon nu nor bzang gis dris pa/ ci/ bum pa 'di dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de'i steng nas ldugs sam/ 'on te rim gyis/ de
rnams kyis smras pa/ rim gyis so/ /des bsam pa/ thabs 'di bzang ste/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'di bum pa gcig gi nang du gzhug go/ snyam nas/ des mi'am ci mo gcig gi bum par ma tshor
bar bcug nas mi'am ci mo de la smras pa/ khyod kyis bum pa 'dis thog mar yid 'phrog ma la khrus byos shig/ des bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la dgos pa zhig yod par 'gyur ro/ /snyam
nas/ de nas des bum pa de thog mar yid 'phrog ma'i spyi bor blugs pa las/ ji tsam na sor gdub kyi rgya pang du lhung ba dang / yid 'phrog mas de 'phrigs so/ /de nas mi'am ci mo la dris pa/ 'dir
mi 'ga' zhig ma 'ongs sam/ des smras pa/ mchis so/ /song la de dben pa zhig tu zhog cig /des de nang du khrid nas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go /de nas yid 'phrog mas pha'i rkang pa gnyis la
gtugs te smras pa/ yab/ gal te bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa/ gzhon nu nor bzang de mchis na/ de la khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ des smras pa/ de mi yin te/ cir yang mi mkho bas/
ngas de dum bu brgyar byas te phyogs bzhir gtor te gtong ngo / /yid 'phrog mas smras pa/ yab/ mir gyur pas 'dir ga la mchis/ bdag nyid de skad mchi bar bas so/ /de nas mi'am
ci'i rgyal po ljon pa kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/ de kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/ gal te gzhon nu de 'ongs na/ ngas khyod rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
pa/ nor dang / yo byad mang po dang / mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te de la chung ma'i don du sbyin no/ /de nas yid 'phrog ma dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas/ gzhon
nu nor bzang lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas mi'am/ ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bstan to/ /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ gzhon nu nor bzang gzugs bzang po/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog
rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te de nas de bgam par 'dod nas gser gyi sdong po bdun dang / shing ta la bdun dang / rnga bo che bdun dang / phag bdun
btsugs so/ /gzhon nu nor bzang ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin no/ /lha rnams

kyang de dag la gegs med par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gar dang / glu dang / pi wang dang / 'khar rnga dang / shin tu sgra snyan dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / rdza
rnga la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra'i khyad par ni/ kun nas 'bud cing / mi'am ci stong phrag du mas ni/ yongs su bskor nas ral gri ut+pa la sngon po'i

'dab ma 'dra ba thogs te/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mthong bar gser gyi sdong po'i drung du song nas/ chu shing la gcod pa bzhin du sdong po de dum bu dum bur bcag par brtsams te/ de nas de til 'bru
tsam du brlags so/ /mdas ni/ shing ta la bdun dang / rnga bdun dang / phag bdun gtsang mar phyung ste ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo bar gnas so/ /de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang / mi'am

ci'i brgya stong phrag du mas a la la zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra chen po phyung ngo / /mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas mthong zhing thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /de nas mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog
ma 'dra ba sha stag stong gi dbus su yid 'phrog ma bzhag ste gzhon nu nor bzang la smras pa/ gzhon nu/ tshur yid 'phrog ma ngo shes par gyis shig /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang gis/ de
ngo shes par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod ni ljon pa'i bu yin la/ /kho bo'i sdug pa yid 'phrog yin zhes na/ /bden pa 'di yis myur ba kho nar
ni| |yid 'phrog gom pas myur du 'gro bar shog /de nas de ma thag tu gom pas song ba dang / mi'am ci rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu nor bzang 'di ni/ stobs dang / brtson
'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa shin tu tshogs pa lags te/ yid 'phrog ma dang thab rir bab lags na/ ci'i slad du 'di la mtho btsam/ 'di la yid 'phrog ma stsol cig /de nas
mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'am ci'i tshogs rnams kyi rjes su bsngags pa dang / mi'am ci rnams kyi 'dun pas gzhon nu nor bzang la rjes bkur sti chen po byas nas
yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te lag pa g.yon pas bzung / gser gyi bya ma bum lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas/ gzhon nu nor bzang gi drung du song ste smras pa/ gzhon
nu| yid 'phrog ma 'di mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/ kho bos khyod kyi chung ma'i phyir byin gyi/ mi rnams ni/ ngo mi rtag pa yin gyi ji ltar yang 'di mi dor cig /yab/
bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzang gis/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las mnyan nas/ mi'am ci'i gnas kyi khang pa na yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig skyes pa med par sil
snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi yul dran nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mya ngan gyis
gdungs par gyur nas/ yid 'phrog ma la smras pa/ pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis non par gyur to/ /de nas yid 'phrog mas/ de ltar gyur pa dag pha la rgyas par
smras so/ /des smras pa/ gzhon nu dang lhan cig song la/ mi rnams ni/ slu bar byed pa yin gyis/ khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas nor bu
dang / mu tig dang / gser la sogs pa mang du brdzangs te btang nas/ de yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha'i lam la/ mi'am ci'i shugs kyis chas pa na/ rim gyis glang po'i

khyim gyi grong khyer du phyin to/ /de nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dar gyi chun 'phyang dpyangs/ rgyal mtshan
dang / ba dan btsugs/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por ngag bshams/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bkram ste dga' dga' ltar byas so/ /de nas gzhon nu ma'i gtso bo stong phrag du mas yongs

su bskor cing / yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du zhugs so/ /de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal sos nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag khyer te/ pha'i drung du song nas/
rgyal po'i stan gyi glo zhig tu 'dug ste/ mi'am ci'i grong khyer du song ba dang / 'ongs pa rnams rgyas par smras so/ /de nas rgyal po nor can gyis/ 'di ni/ shin tu stobs dang / brtson 'grus
dang / pha rol gnon pa can no/ /zhes bya bar rig nas/ rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /gzhon nu nor bzang gis bsam pa/ gang bdag yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tshogs
pa dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa 'di ni/ sngon byas pa'i rgyu'i khyad par yin gyi/ ma la da yang bdag gis sbyin pa dag ni gtang / bsod nams dag ni/ bya'o
snyam nas/ des glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gzhon nu nor bzang zhes
bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rgyal po nor bzang zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ngas
gang yid 'phrog ma'i phyir stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon par bstan nas/ lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa des/ ngas bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob mod kyi/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de dang / brtson 'grus de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam/ rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no//
rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/
rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer na/ rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang
rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa rnams rab tu zhi ba zhes
bya ba nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par
byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu 'das nas/ khye'u
gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ dpung pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i
gzengs mtho ba zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa bzang / dge ba'i bsam pa can/ bdag la phan pa
dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ bdag nyid chen po/ chos 'dod pa/ skye rgu rnams la byams pa/ thams cad sbyin pa/ thams cad gtong ba/ chags pa med par gtong
ba| gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin no/ /de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos nas/ dpag tshad brgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skye bo 'ongs te/ thams cad kyang yid la re ba rdzogs par byas nas
gtong ngo / /de nas re zhig cig na/ byang chub sems dpa' shing rta nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / spug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI las 'bar
bar byas pa/ tsan+dan sa mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/ seng+ge dang / stag dang / gung gi pags pas g.yogs pa/ rta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa/
gser dang / dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'khrol pa bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas/ grong khyer dam pa nas skyed mos tshal du mngon du song ngo / /de nas bram ze rig byed
dang / rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol mngon du bsu nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /yang smras pa/ khyod ni 'jig rten
thams cad du/ /thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/ /bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di/ /khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad sgrol/ shing rta de las myur ba myur bar babs te/ snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas bram ze de dag la shing rta de byin nas smras pa/ bdag
gis ji ltar bram ze la/ /mchog tu dga' bas shing rta btang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog// //'dul ba gzhi/
bam po zhe drug pa/ de dus gzhan zhig na/ glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba/ me tog kun mu da dang / kha ba dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can
bdun legs par gnas shing / rkang lag legs par gnas pa/ glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/ mthong na bkra shis pa
la zhon nas/ shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang / mdza' bshes dang / g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du sos ka'i dus la bab
pas| shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal
gyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang / de nas phyir rgol bas rbad pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod
rgyal bar gyur cig ces smras nas/ yang smras pa/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ /khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/ /khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni/ /bdag cag
rnams la stsal ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu
dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po'i mchog de byin nas smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/ /mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum//
btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis/ khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis glang po'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes
bya ba phyir rgol bas rbad pa'i bram ze rnams la sbyin no/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shin tu khros/ 'khrugs nas/ gzhon nu thams cad
sgrol bkug ste smras pa/ gzhon nu/ khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song zhig/ de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol phas spangs pa dang bsam pa/ bdag gis byang chub kyi
phyir 'bad pa byas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas/ glang po chen po de yang btang ste/ de bas khyim na gnas pas
ni| |ci nus par ni sbyin par gtang / /dka' thub gnas su brten nas ni/ /nges par mchog dag bya ba yis/ /bslangs nas mi sbyin zhes bya ba'i/ /tshig ni smra bar mi phod kyi/ /
de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te/ /dka' thub gnas su rab tu 'gro /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas chung ma rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste/
de dag rgyas par smras so/ /de nas rgyags sbyin mas thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rje'i sras
gal te de lta na/ bdag kyang dka' thub kyi nags su mchi ste/ bdag ni/ rje'i sras dang bral na/ skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nam
mkha' zla bas stongs par gyur pa dang / /ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang / /pad+ma chu yis stongs par gyur pa ltar/ /bud med khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no/ /byang chub
sems dpas smras pa/ bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no/ /khyod ni/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang /
bgo ba mchog la goms pas lus shin tu skyid de ba yin/ dka' thub kyi nags na ni/ rtswa dang / lo ma bting bar ni/ nyal/ rtswa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ni za/ rtswa dur
ba dang / zug rngo dang / rtswa dang / tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni/ rgyu/ yang dang yang du za gcig pa la ni brten/ bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la ni/ brten dgos/ glo bur du 'ongs
pa thams cad mchod sbyin la ni/ 'bod dgos la/ de na yang gdon mi za bar ci nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste/ de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgos so/ /de bas na/ re zhig
da dung yang legs par soms shig /rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bdag rdo ci thogs kyis rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te
de lta na/ dam bcas pa de khyod kyis dran par byos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te/ yab cig bdag gis
sbyin par glang chen stsal/ /nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol/ /bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyi/ /mi yi dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur/ /de
nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs brnangs te skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa/ bu/ sbyin pa'i blo bor la 'dug cig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ri
dang bcas par yang / /gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi/ /sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las/ /sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do/ /zhes smras nas song ngo / /de nas bu dang / bran mo
dang / chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/ grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang bzhin song ngo / /de
nas mi zhig gis du zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas/ mi zhig la dris pa/ kye nang rje/ skye bo'i tshogs chen
po cho nges 'debs pa 'di rgyu ci las gyur/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ ci/ mi shes sam/ 'di ltar mi yi dbang pos nyid kyi sras po che ba bzang / /brtan pa'i ngang tshul
rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di ni spyugs/ /de ni bu dang chung mar bcas te nags mthar chags pa las/ /pho brang 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes cho nges 'debs/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ slar dengs shig/ slar dengs shig/ 'di
ltar/ shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur te/ gnyen gyi skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni/ lam kha'i ngal bso
ba'i bsti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med do/ /mdza' ba rnams dang bral bar 'gyur
bsam nas/ /khyod kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brtan par gyis/ /de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas
bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu/ bdag ni/ khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyi/ khyod
kyis shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs so/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas/ tshig brlang pos bram ze de la smras pa/ e ma'o nags
na'ang mi dbang sras la slong ba gang / /bram ze 'di ni shin tu brtse ba med pa'i blo/ /mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa/ /'di la 'dir ni snying rje
jig mi skye'am/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyags sbyin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na/ /kun sbyin med
par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob/ /sbyin sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog
rtag tu 'thob/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas yang rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa/ /shing rta rab
tu byin pa 'di yis 'dir/ /bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i/ /zag med chos kyi shing rta che bskor shog /de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i
mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhon nu nag po phrag pa la khyer/ rgyags sbyin ma ni/ gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang / rim gyis dka'
thub kyi nags su phyin to/ /de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so/ /ji tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i
phyir dka' thub kyi nags nas song ba dang / bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drang du 'ongs nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu/ khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis
pas/ /spar shugs lhan cig 'khyams bgyid na/ /de yi don du bus pa gnyis/ /khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad sgrol/ bu sdug pa gtong ba la chung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang / de nas bram ze des/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon
nu/ bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na/ 'di ltar/ khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod/ khyod ni kun ster snying rje yi/ /bdag nyid can du sa steng
grags/ /ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis/ bram ze de la smras pa/ kye
bram ze chen po/ rang gi srog ni btang ba la'ang / /lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na/ /rang gi bu ni btang ba la/ /bdag blo gzhan du gyur ci smos/ /bram ze chen po/ de lta mod kyi/ bdag
gis nags su bskyed pa yi/ /bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na/ /ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/ /'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/ /gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas/ /bus pa
btang la bdag min zhes/ /kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gi /bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/ /de nas bram ze des/ thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal
rigs gzhon nu/ rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa
dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stis spos kyi glang po che lta bu/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod par byed pa/ skye bo bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mgon
med pa dang / ltogs pa yongs su sdud pa/ thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa/ khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa'am/ lam gyis dub
pa| 'bras bu med pa'am/ mthong ba don med pa'am/ re ba dang / yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bru 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ cha ma yin te/ khyod
kyis/ med do/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo'i yid la re ba'i kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na/ myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs
par byas nas gtang ba'i rigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu gter gos su gyon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa/ /ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/ /grong khyer
grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang / mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs pa'i gtong phod yod ma yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas/ bu
la chags pa'i blong bas 'di dag sems par byed de/ gal te re zhig bu gnyis po/ /bram zer byin na bu dang ni/ /bral ba las byung sdug bsngal dag /bdag dang rgyags sbyin gyis thob
'gyur/ /'on kyang 'di la mi byin na/ /brtul zhugs las kyang nyams 'gyur zhing / /bram ze 'di ni tshi chad de/ /ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro/ nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i/ /mya ngan
sa steng bdag gis blangs/ /de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa/ /zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis/ sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges
par gtang bar chad nas smras pa/ kye kho bos/ dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi/ /rgya mtsho chen pos so sor 'jigs byed pa/ /gting mi dpog par rab tu bying ba dag/
pha rol brgal phyir lam gyi zam stegs bca'/ /zla ba dri med nya ba'i bzhin ras can/ /ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas/ /mchi ma rlan chus mig ni gang gyur pa'i/ /byis pa
gnyis ni bram ze de la byin/ /yang smras pa/ bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas/ /des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya/ /
bus pa gzhon nu dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas sa g.yos pa de/ tshal de na gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams dngangs nas phan tshun
smras pa/ sa ni mi bzad g.yos gyur pa/ /'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin/ /gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba/ /shin tu gsal bar shes par bya/ /de nas gnas 'jog dang rus gcig
