pa rgan po dka' thub can/ ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des/ drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/ gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags na 'dug pa'i bu byis
pa/ 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis/ thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir spangs te/
des na/ sa g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas/ snying rje rje skad du du zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar nas thams cad
sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yab cig yum ni ma mchis par/ /khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed pa/ /re zhig de ni mthong gyur nas/ /de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngom zum gnag cing / mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/ bu dag/ nga yi snying du mi sdug min//
snying brtse snying rje med min te/ /'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /yon tan mthong nas btang ba yin/ /ci nas nga yis byang chub mchog /zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho
la gnas pa'i/ /rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgral lo/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas/ pha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te thal mo
sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang / sma bab pa'i tshig gis dal bus smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na/ /ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi 'phrin/ /khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces/ /yab
cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol/ /yab/ gzhan yang / byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la nongs pa bgyis pa gang / /gal te la lar thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa'am/ /
gus par mnyan pas yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa/ /de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags zhes bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ /de skad ces smras nas/ pha la phyag 'tshal te lan
gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bla ma la smra bar yid la chags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo / /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas/ yid kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs so/ /byis
pa gzhon nu dag dong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /lha stong phrag du ma yang bar snang la ca co dang /
gzha'i sgra 'byin cing / e ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che/ /bus pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang / /gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa/ /de yi nges pa rmad gcig go /de nas rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba
dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te bsti gnas logs su chas pa las/ sa che thang du g.yos pa des myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de nyid du song ba dang / lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad thar par bya bar brtson pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /snyam nas/ seng+ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag
nas 'dug pa dang / rgyags sbyin mas ri dwags kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa/ ri dwags rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/ /kho mo'i lam 'di bkag nas ci ste 'dug /ji ltar bdag ni
mi 'phyo nges shes na/ /lam las zur te myur du 'gro bar gyis/ /gzhan yang / khyod kyang ri dwags rgyal po'i chung ma la/ /bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/ /btsun mo yin pas chos
kyi spun gyur gyi/ /ri dwags rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye zhig /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha seng ge'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo / /de nas
rgyags sbyin mas bkra mi shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas/ yud tsam zhig bsam pa/ ji ltar bar snang la dud mo'i sgra grags pa dang / ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i lha rnams mya ngan byed pa'i
sgra grags pa las na/ gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to/ /snyam nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang / /ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang / /ji ltar bdag
ni dogs pa las/ /bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges/ /ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa las/ /bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang / /ji ltar lus kyang rmya ba las/ /bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges/ /zhes de lta
bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bsti gnas su zhugs te mi dga' bzhin bltas na/ bu de gnyis ma mthong nas/ de nas rmongs shing snying 'dar nas/ bsti
gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/ phyogs 'di na ni/ gzhon nu nag po sring mo dang lhan cig ri dwags kyi phru gu dang rtag tu rtse rtse/ 'di ni/ de gnyis kyi sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin/
'di ni/ de gnyis kyi rtse mo'i cha byad yin na/ de gnyis ni/ mi snang na/ gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi /lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas nyal ltar srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re
zhing bu mthong bar 'dod pas/ rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ rje'i sras/ khye'u dang
bu mo gnyis gang du mchis/ thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig /re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas/ /bus pa de gnyis de la byin/ /de la
rjes su yi rang rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyags sbyin ma ri dwags mo mda' dug can zhig gis phog pa bzhin du sa la 'gyel nas/ nya chu'i gnas nas byung ba bzhin du ni/
'gre ldog par byed/ krung krung bu stor ba bzhin du ni/ snying rje rje skad du ngu / ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni/ 'ba'i sgra tshogs 'don cing smras pa/ pad+ma gzhon nu lta bu'i byad bzhin can/ /
lag pa pad+ma'i 'dab ltar gzhon sha can/ /bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ba/ /'gro ba gang du song nas sdug bsngal gyur/ /ri dwags bu ltar drang zhing ri dwags mig /ri dwags
lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na/ /de ring bdag gi bu gnyis ji lta bur/ /gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug bsngal gyur/ /mig ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni/ /snying rjes du ba shin tu
sdug bsngal ba/ /de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas/ /skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho/ /de gnyis bdag gi pang nas bskyed bskyed pa/ /zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za/ /bzod
dang gnam pas bla ma brtag dka' ba/ /bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo/ de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang / /rtsa lag rnams kyis gzu lum spangs pa las/ /skye bo sdig can ngan dang
'phrad gyur nas/ /bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo/ /skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na/ /de gnyis yid dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bran du gyur pas gdon mi za
bar ni/ /de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongs su gzir/ /bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ /srog chags sdug pa brgya dang bral ba yi/ /sdig las shin tu mi bzad 'dir byas pa
des na ba be'u med bzhin cho nges 'debs/ /bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang / /sems can kun la yid ni mnyam gyur pa/ /bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po/ /bran du gyur pa las
ni thar phar shog /rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrings pa'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma thib be 'dug par mthong nas/ snying du sdug nas 'khyud de smras pa/ bus
pas ril ba chung ngus chu bcus pa'i/ /lo ma rnams las thigs pa 'dzag pa yi/ /ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin/ /bus pa nu zho ma blud lta bur ngu / /yang bus pa gzhon nu de
gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dwags kyi phru gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste/ snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal bus smras pa/ de yi ne'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang / /gnas su
ma tshugs mtshon cing tshol byed pa/ /ri dwags phru gu rgyu ba 'di dag kyang / /bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam de rjes bcad
dang / bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyi rjes drang por ma byung gi /gya gyus gang bar mthong nas lhags par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa/ ji ltar 'then
pa'i rjes byung dang / /la lar myur du song ba las/ /brdegs te khrid par gdon mi za/ /kye ma bram ze brtse med mchog /mgul ni dbugs kyis brdzangs shing skad kyang 'dzer/ /ma mchu
mdzes pa 'dar zhing bdag gi bu/ /ri dwags bzhin du mig kyang rig rig ste/ /rkang pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig gu/ de nas byang chub sems dpas de de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag
nyid de mthong nas/ mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa/ kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis/ /btang ba ma yin sdang bas min/ /
sems can kun la phan don du/ /gtang bar dka' ba'i bu de btang / /mchog tu gtang dka'i bdag nyid dang / /bu nor chung ma rnams btang nas/ /sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du/ /
byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rgyags sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la brtan gtang dka' ba'i/ /bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang / /bdag dang chung ma bzhon dang nor
yang btang byas te/ /kun la thams cad gtang ba'i blo gros nga la yod/ /de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brtan te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyi/ /khyod blo
gzhan du ma 'gyur zhig /gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhed na/ /dogs pa med par bdag stsol cig /gzhan yang / dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyi phyir/ /sdug pas chags pa btang ba yi/ /
don de myur du thob nas ni/ /srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dang rgyags sbyin ma brtson 'grus shin tu rmad du byung
ba dang / shin tu bya dka' bar rigs nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te steng gi nam mkha' las bsti gnas der lhags nas snang ba rgya chen pos nags de gsal
bar byas te/ nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blo ngan gzhung gis bcings pa'i blo gros can/ /longs spyod la chags snying gi
zhags pa bu yis bcings pa'i nang na yang / /khyab bdag khyod gcig chags pa med pas dga' ba bskyed pa'i bu gtong bas/ /nges par go 'phang bde dang zhi ba dri med rga ba med pa 'thob/ /de
skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ 'di gcig pu g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis rgyags sbyin ma bslang
ngo| |snyam nas bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur te byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas/ yang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ yan lag kun bzang khyim thab las/ /'phyo ba med cing snying nye ba/ /
rigs na bsngags pa'i sring mo 'di/ /bdag la bran mo'i don du stsol/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas/ bram ze la smras pa/ ngo tsha med cing brkam pa
khyod/ /'di na bram ze tha shal te/ /khyod lta 'phyon ma mi byed cing / /dam chos dga' ba nga 'dod dam/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol/ snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis
rgyags sbyin ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang / de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag ni bdag la g.yar ngan med/ /de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags/ /
gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes/ /de ltar khyod slad g.yar ngan bgyid/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ go 'phang mi bzad mya ngan med pa tshol bdag
la/ /sa steng 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngan bya mi dgos/ /khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brongs/ /bdag ni ri dwags 'chi ba bzhin du bsti gnas 'then/ /de skad ces smras
pa dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rab tu dga' bas bsam pa dang / sbyin pa 'di ni nags tshal 'dir/ /bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin/ /rgyags sbyin 'di yang yongs btang nas/ /
yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur/ /snyam du rig nas/ rgyags sbyin ma lag pa nas bzung ste bram ze de la smras pa/ bdag gi mchis brang sdug pa 'di/ /snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan/ /ya
rabs tshul can snyan par smra/ /bram ze mchog khyod bzhes su gsol/ /de nas mche ba bzang po yi/ /chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir btang / /chu la gru ni ji lta bar/ /sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug
g.yos/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te/ khyod dang / bu dang / bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dbugs brdzangs pas sgra ngar ngar por 'gag bzhin 'di skad
ces smras so/ /bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la/ /ci 'dra ba yi las ngan byas/ /de nas ba be'u shi ba bzhin/ /skye bo med pa'i nags nang du/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i
cha byad mi snang bar byas te rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ skal bzang bdag ni bram ze ma yin mi yang ma yin gyi/ /bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya byin lha min
'joms byed de/ /khyod kyi 'dul ba mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yi/ /bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis/ /de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags sbyin ma yid bde ba
skyes nas brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ spyan stong ldan pa bdag gi bu/ /bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing / /mes po'i drung du phyin par yang / /sum cu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod/ /
de skad ces smras nas/ yang dbang po chen po bsti gnas su zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste/ rgyags sbyin ma lag pa g.yon pa nas ba zung nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras
pa| bdag gis khyod la rgyags sbyin 'di/ /g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par bya/ /khyod kyis su la'ang ma sbyin cig /bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur/ /de nas lha rnams kyi
dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bram ze khye'u dang / bu mo khyer ba de/ ji ltar grong khyer gzhan zhig yin no/ /snyam nas grong khyer de nyid du song nas/ bus pa gzhon nu de dag btsong bar brtsams
pa de lta bur rmongs par byas so/ /ji tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyi dpon po nag po dang / /dra ba can dang de gnyis ni/ /bram ze shin tu ma rungs pas/ /
grong khyer mchog 'dir 'tshong zhing mchis/ /de skad thos nas/ rgyal po de sems mi dga' nas smras pa/ gzhon nu gnyis myur du ston cig /blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba dang / grong khyer ba

rnams myur du rgyal po'i drung du nye bar lhags so/ /ji tsam na blon po gzhan zhig gis/ rgyal po'i drung du khrid pa dang / mi yi dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bo gos med cing / /lus rbeg dri ma
can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni/ /mod la seng ge'i khri las sa yi steng du lhung gyur te/ /pho brang 'khor mi blon tshogs bud med dag kyang du bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras
pa| gang zhig nags na gnas na yang / /sbyin la mngon par dga' ba'i yid/ /mig bzang de ni myur du 'dir/ /chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /phyi zhig na rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shi ba dang bram ze dang / blon po dang / grong mi dang / yul mi rnams lhan cig tu
bsti gnas der song nas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol ba btab ste rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcug go/ de nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to/ /des

dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / gnyen gshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag sbyin nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
byang chub don du gnyer ba yis/ /rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang / /'jigs pa med par sbyin pa btang / /gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang / /rta dang
nor bu'i rna rgyan dang / /de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin/ /chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bu dang bu mo yongs btang nas/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol

tu| |mi yi dag pa thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza'
bo dang / nye du dang / gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga
nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba der gyur te/ nga nyid kyis de na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye
du dang / gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ nga'i sbyin pa'am/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des/ bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen
tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas pa
gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de 'byor pa
dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / byed pa dang / chom rkun dang / nad rab tu
zhi ba/ 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang phun sum tshogs pa ma bu gcig pa la byams pa bzhin du rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/
des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las
khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ dpung pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba zhig btsas te/ de'i nye du rnams
'dus nas/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /shes ldan dag /gzhon nu 'di ni/ rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen gyi bu yin pas/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol zhes bya
bar gdags so/ /zhes gzhon nu thams cad sgrol du ming btags nas/ ma ma brgyad la gtad de zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga rnams la byang bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de gang ci

slong ba thams cad slong ba po dag la sbyin par byed pas de'i ming thams cad gtong ba/ thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags so/ /khams kyi rgyal phran gyi bu mo rgyags sbyin ma zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de/
de'i ched du bslangs nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ ji tsam na khye'u zhig btsas pa dang /
de'i ming nag po zhes bya bar btags/ yang de dang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i ming dra ba can zhes bya bar btags so/ /rgyal po
thams cad kyi bshes gnyen la glang po che'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mthus khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed do/ /des thams
cad sgrol la smras pa/ bu/ bdag gis gang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed pa de dag thams cad kyang glang po che'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyi/ khyod thams
cad gtong na yang glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan ni/ zhog cig /khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi mthus na bdag cag thams cad rgyal po thams cad bshes
gnyen 'dis zil gyis mnan/ kha cig gis smras pa/ rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i mthus bdag cag 'dis
zil gyis mnan to/ /de dag gis smras pa/ gang gis na glang po'i mchog de dgug pa'i thabs bzang po lta ci yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po thams cad bshes
gnyen gyi bu thams cad sgrol zhes bgyi ba de/ mi sbyin pa'am/ mi gtong ba ci yang ma mchis te/ de ci slong pa de thams cad sbyin pas/ de'i ming thams cad gtong ba/ thams cad
gtong ba zhes bya bar grags kyi/ bram ze dag cig mngags dang de rnams kyis bslangs na/ khugs par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis bram ze dag bkug nas smras pa/ bram ze dag /
dengs la/ thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal na thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba las glang po'i mchog slongs shig /de dag mngags nas/ thams cad kyi grong rdal du dong ngo / /gzhon nu thams cad sgrol
glang po'i mchog /me tog kun da dang / ku mu ta dang / khab dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po'i mdog lta bu mche ba drug pa/ bdun legs par gnas pa/ glang po ches srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro
ba| rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/ mthong na bkra shis pa la zhon nas/ shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang / grogs po dang / g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing / zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis
yongs su bskor ba bzhin/ grong khyer nas byung nas skyed mos tshal logs su song ngo / /de nas mngags pa de dag gis gzhon nu thams cad sgrol mngon du bsus nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs
gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /yang smras pa/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ /khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/ /khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni/ /bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i
rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mchog de las babs nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bram ze de dag la glang po'i mchog de
bstan nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng / /bram ze rnams la glang chen gtang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /blon po rnams
kyis rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis/ glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bgyi ba/ phyir rgol bas
mngags pa la stsal to/ /rgyal pos thos nas shin tu khros/ 'khrugs te bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dengs la/ thams cad sgrol khrid de shog cig /de rnams kyis khrid de 'ongs pa
dang / rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen gyis/ thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ gzhon nu/ kho bos khyod la gang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed pa de thams cad ni/
glang po'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyi/ khyod thams cad gtong na yang glang po'i mchog 'di zhog cig ces/ snga mo zhig tu ma bsgo'am/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis glang po'i mchog yongs su btang /
des mnyan nas smras pa/ yab/ bslangs na ji ltar mi stsal/ ci/ ji snyed bslangs pa de thams cad de sbyin nam/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyim na gnas pa'i skyes bu yis/ /
ci rigs par ni sbyin pa gtang / /'on te nags su song na ni/ /nges pa yin ni mchog bya'o/ /yab/ gal te sbyin pa dag gtang / bsod nams dag bgyir ma mchis na/ dka' thub kyi
nags su brtan par bgyi'o/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin du gyis shig /byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyags sbyin ma/ bdag ni/ dka' thub kyi nags
su gnas kyi/ khyod khyim na bag yod par gnas shig /des smras pa/ rje'i sras dang thabs cig dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par bgyi'o/ /rgyags sbyin ma/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/
sbyin pa la dga' bas/ gal te khyod 'ga' zhig slong na/ byin par 'gyur ro/ /rje'i sras/ gal te khyod kyis btang na stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis dam bcas
pa de dran par byos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pa'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa/ yab cig bdag gis sbyin slad glang chen btang / /nongs pa gang lags sa bdag
bzod par gsol/ /bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyi/ mi dbang khyod kyi phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur/ /de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i blong bas mchi mas brnangs nas smras pa/
bu/ sbyin pa dang / dka' thub kyi nags kyi blo gros 'di zlog cig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ri dang bcas par yang / /gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi/ /sa bdag bdag ni
sbyin pa las/ /sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do/ /zhes smras nas song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta mchog gi nang du zhugs nas dka'
thub kyi nags su chas so/ /de nas bram ze rig byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis/ thams cad sgrol bsus nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur
cig /khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/ thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/ /bram ze dag la shing rta 'di/ /khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces
smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram ze dag la shing rta'i mchog de bstan nas
smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng / /bram ze rnams la shing rta btang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta
la zhon nas rgyags sbyin ma dang lhan cig song ba dang / de nas bram ze rig byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bsus nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu/
khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/ /thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/ /bram ze rnams la rta 'di ni/ /khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces
smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol rta de las babs nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram ze de rnams la rta de bstan nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag
rab dga' bas dang / /bram ze rnams la rta btang ba/ /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /de nas byang chub sems dpas ni/ nag po khrid /rgyags
sbyin mas ni/ dra ba can khrid de rkang pas dong nas/ byang chub sems dpas gangs ri'i sul me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bsam
gtan byed do/ /rgyags sbyin mas ni/ 'bras bus bsnyen bkur byed do/ /ri bor gzhan zhig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/
dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ /dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ khye'u mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas pa/ ngan to re
zhes sgra 'byin pas/ de'i ming ngan to re/ ngan to re zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ri bor gzhan zhig na/ bram ze rig byed bzhi shes pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de
dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ ji tsam na bu mo gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes ma/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/ bsrings bskyed nas chen mor
gyur pa dang / bram ze des/ bdag gi bu mo 'di byad gzugs sam/ rigs sam/ bzo'am/ nor gyi phyir ni/ su la'ang mi sbyin no/ /'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa zhig
yod na/ bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes dam bcas so/ /de nas ngan to re gsang tshig don du gnyer zhing / gsang tshig tshol ba bram ze de'i gan du song ste phyin nas smras pa/ mkhan
po'i zhabs la bdag bkur sti bgyid par 'tshal lags so/ /ci'i phyir/ rig byed bklag pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin du gyis shig /de de las rig byed bklag par brtsams
pa las/ de yid gzhungs pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yin pas/ des ring po ma lon par rig byed rnam pa bzhi la byang bar gyur to/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ bdag gis dam bcas pa ni/ bdag
gi bu mo 'di rigs sam zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ bram ze'i khye'u 'dis bdag las rig byed bzhi byang bar byas pa yin na/ mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/ gal te 'dis bu
mo ma 'dod na ni/ legs so/ /snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ bdag gis bu mo 'di/ byad gzugs sam/ rigs sam/ bzo'am/ nor gyi phyir su la yang mi sbyin te/
'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa zhig yod na/ bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes dam bcas pa las/ bdag las khyod kyis rig byed bzhi byang bar byas pa las/ khyod
la bu mo 'di chung mar sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig /blang bar bgyi'o/ /zhes des de la dpal gyi 'byor ba chen pos bag mar btang nas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ chung ma
khrid la rang gi khyim du song zhig /des chung ma de khrid de rang gi khyim du song ba dang / des de la smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bdag ni/ shin tu gzhon pas/ las bgyid rngo mi thogs kyi/ bdag la bkol
ba stsol cig /des de la smras pa/ bzang mo/ kho bo la bkol ba ga la mchis/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ thams cad ces bgyi ba'i grong rdal na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bgyi
ba de'i sras thams cad sgrol zhes bgyi ba de/ gang cung zad ci slong ba de thams cad stsol gyi/ de la bdag gi bkol ba slongs shig /bzang mo/ gal te de lhan lhan cig tu 'dong ngo / /de nas ngan to
re thams cad kyi grong rdal du phyin nas dris pa/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gang na/ de dag gis smras pa/ dka' thub kyi nags na gnas so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po zhe bdun pa/ de

nas ngan to re chung ma dang lhan cig dka' thub kyi nags su song ba dang / de'i tshe rgyags sbyin ma me tog dang / 'bras bu'i phyir song ngo / /de nas bram ze ngan to re rgyags sbyin ma me tog dang / 'bras bu'i
phyir song ba dang thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/ chu gter gos su gyon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa/ /ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/ grong khyer grong rdal bcas
pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang / mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs par gtong phod yod ma yin/ bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas/ /sba shugs lhan cig 'khyams bgyid na/ /khyod kyis rjes su brtse
bgyis ta/ /bdag la bkol ba stsal ba'i rigs/ /kho bo la bkol ba ga la yod/ de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na nag po dang / dra ba can rtse zhing 'dug pa dang / des smras pa/ bus pa gzhon nu 'o ni
dag sbyin cig /de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bu sdug pa yongs su gtong ba la yud tsam zhig sems par gyur to/ /de nas bram ze des thams cad
sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu/ kho bos khyod thams cad gtong ba'o/ /zhes thos nas de'i phyir kho bo khyod la slong na/ 'di la khyod kyis dpyad du ci zhig yod/ snying rje yi ni bdag nyid
khyod/ /thams cad gtong bar sa steng grags/ /ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/ /khyod kyis sa steng bya ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bram ze de la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang / bdag gis res 'ga'ang ma dpyad na/ /rang gi bu ni gtang ba la/ /bdag blo gzhan 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /bram ze chen po/ de lta mod kyi/ bdag
gis nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i/ /bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na/ /ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/ /'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/ /gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas/ /bus pa
btang la bdag min zhes/ /kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gi/ /bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/ /de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal rigs gzhon
nu/ rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stis

spos kyi glang po che lta bu/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / glo bur dang / skye bo bla ma la mchod pa dang / bkren pa dang / mgon med pa dang / phongs pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa/ thams cad kyi re ba yongs
su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis/ bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa'am/ lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa'am/ mthong na don med pa'am/ re ba dang / yun ring po nas brnag

pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ cha ma yin te/ khyod kyis med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na/ myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/
khyod kyis bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas te gtang ba'i rigs so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bram ze/ gal te de lta na yongs su gtang ngo / /bus pa gzhon nu dag btang ma thag tu/ stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byed par
'gyur du 'ong ngo / /snyam nas seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang / de nas rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/ ri dwags rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/ /khyod ni ci ste lam
bkag 'dug par byed/ /gal te bdag ni mi 'phyo bden zhe na/ lam las zur te myur du 'gro bar gyis/ khyod kyang ri dwags rgyal po'i chung ma la/ bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/ /btsun
mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyi/ /ri dwags rgyal po'i chung mas bdag lam phye/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / ri dwags kyi rgyal mo de lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo / /
de nas rgyags sbyin ma bsti gnas gang na pa der song ba dang nag po dang / dra ba can gang na yang ma mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bus pa gzhon nu
gnyis gang na mchis/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig /re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas/ /bus pa de gnyis de la byin/ /de la rjes su yi rang rigs/ /de
brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / de la chu mang pos btab nas brtas te smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bus pa gzhon nu dka' thub kyi nags nas bskrun pa bde ba'i bdag nyid can de dag /khyod kyis
ci'i slad du yongs su spangs/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus las bla gos phud de rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ ci/ nga de gnyis la byams pa med snyam mam/ nga'i ba spu'i
khung ba thams cad nas gas te khrag phyung ba la ltos/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas gal te 'ga'
zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma bslangs te de la byin na/ g.yog byed pa med par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas/ bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi cha byad du sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i
mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/ grogs po/ g.yog byin cig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag la g.yog ga la yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgyags sbyin ma byin cig /byang chub sems dpas
rgyags sbyin ma'i gdong du brtag par brtsams pa dang / rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa shes nas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ gal te khyod kyis bdag nyid btang na/ stsal du gsol/

byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bram ze khyod la sbyin no/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas rang gi cha byad du 'dug nas smras pa/ drang
srong / bdag gi rgyags sbyin ma 'di/ khyod la bcol gyi/ khyod kyis su la yang ma sbyin cig /rgyags sbyin mas brgya byin gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te smras pa/ ko'u shi ka/ ci nas

kyang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis bran nyid du mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams

kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bus pa gzhon nu khyer ba'i bram ze ji ltar thams cad kyi grong rdal du 'tshong bar brtsams pa de ltar rmongs par byas so/ /de gnyis rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis mthong
nas de rnams rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bus pa nag po dang dra ba can ni/ bram ze zhig tshong dus na 'tshong zhing mchis lags so/ /des bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dengs la khrid de shog
cig /de gnyis khrid de 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos srang la gzhal te mnyam du gser gyis blus so/ /rgyal po des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /gang zhig khye'u
dang bu mo yangs su gtang bar byed pa de la gzhan yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba ci yod/ gzhon nu de khug cig dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug go/ blon po rnams kyis de
dka' thub kyi gnas nas bkug ste/ de rgyal po'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag nas des grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi khang pa brtsigs nas lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag
mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te/ des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad
de smras pa/ byang chub bsod nams don gnyer bas/ /dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang / /'jigs pa med par sbyin pa byin/ /gser dang dngul dang ba
lang dang / /rta dang nor bu rgyan rnams dang / /de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran/ /tshul khrims ldan pa rnams la sbyin/ /chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas/ /'jig rten 'di

dang pha rol tu/ /mi yi dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/

khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur te/ ngas de na bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ /ngas bu dang chung ma yongs su btang

ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen
tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa

de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/ de 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / zhes bya ba nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal

srid byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na ltas mkhan dag gis wA ra NA sir lo bcu gnyis su char pa mi 'bab bo/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du dril
sgrog tu bcug pa/ de'i yul na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer ba dag nyon cig /ltas mkhan dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan gyi/ khyed cag las gang dag la lo bcu gnyis su
bza' ba dang btung ba yod pa de rnams ni/ 'dug cig /gzhan rnams ni/ bza' ba dang btung ba mod pa'i yul du dengs shig /lo legs par gyur pa dang slar yang shog cig /de'i tshe wA ra NA si'i
grong khyer na khyim bdag 'dum byed ces bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam
thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /des mngan bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje/ bang ba na bdag 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas pa lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/ 'on te med/
des smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /de nas khyim bdag 'dum byed 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ 'dug go/ skye bo'i tshogs gzhan ni/ bza' ba dang btung ba mod pa'i yul du dong ngo / /sangs rgyas
'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/ bas mtha'i gnas mal dag la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur

bas/ ji tsam na wA ra NA si de'i phyogs gcig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas so/ /phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya'o/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po dag snga dro sham thabs
bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te khyim bdag 'dum byed ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / khyim bdag 'dum byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag /khyod kyis rab tu byung ba lnga
brgya la lo bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms 'bul nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /re zhig mngan la rmas te bgyi'o/ /des mngan bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje/ bdag 'khor dang bcas

pa dang / rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs so/ /ji tsam na
phyi dro'i dus su rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po gzhan yang lhags nas khyim bdag 'dum byed la/ khyim bdag /rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po 'di dag la khyod kyis lo bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms dbul
bar nus sam zhes bslangs pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /khyed cag la g.yar gyis blangs lags na/ yang bslang ci 'tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ de dag kyang
gzhan la/ bdag cag kyang gzhan yin no/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /gal te de lta na/ de ri zhig mngan la rmas te bgyi'o/ /des mngan bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje/ bdag 'khor dang

bcas pa dang / rab tu byung ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs te zhus pa/
khyed cag gi dus gang lags/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gung tshigs ma yol ba'o/ /de nas khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis/ sbyin pa'i khang pa brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta ba'i mi dag kyang bskos/ dus
tshod brjod pa dag kyang bskos te/ des nyi ma re re zhig rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug go /mu ge de yang lo bstud ma kho nar bar ye ma chad nas/ de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs
rgyas rnams la zhus pa/ 'phags pa dag /lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ram/ char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis sa bon stsal tam/ thob cig /de dag gis sa
bon btab bo/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni/ 'og tu 'jug pa yin gyi/ des bsam pa/ 'jig rten na yon gnas gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni/ rang sangs
rgyas rnams yin la/ sbyin bdag gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni/ khyim bdag 'dum byed yin gyi/ bdag gis 'di dag gi grogs bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
gyis dbang po chen po'i char phab pa dang / lo tog de rnams ku bar skyes so/ /de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhus pa/ 'phags pa dag/ bdag cag gi lo tog
bskrun pa gang lags pa de dag ku bar skyes par gyur na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma bcad par skrun cig /de rnams kyis bskrun pa las/ me tog dang / 'bras
bu rdza ma'i tshad tsam chags so/ /de nas de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas de dag la rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma gcad cig dang / rang nyid smin nas gas par 'gyur ro/ /
ji tsam na de rnams smin nas gas pa dang / gang gis sa bon ji lta bu btab pa de de'i kho na lta bu sha stag gis gang bar gyur to/ /de nas mu ge rgyun chad nas lo legs par gyur nas yul phyogs
sna tshogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / srog chags gang dag mu ges 'jigs skrag nas dong ba rnams kyang yul wA ra NA sir 'ongs so/ /de nas mu ge rgyun chad de lo legs par gyur nas/
khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis de na rang sangs rgyas stong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sna tshogs dang / tshod ma ro dang ldan pa rnams kyis tshim par byas te/ tshigs su bcad de smras
pa/ blo ldan mkhas pas nor dang ni/ /dad pa shes rab rnyed nas ni/ /skyes bu de yis rtag par yang / /'dod chags bral la yon dbul lo/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing
grags ldan pa'i/ /brtan rnams gang gis bshos gsol pa/ /de yi rigs ni bde bar 'phel/ /de ltar tshul khrims phun tshogs pa'i/ /yon gnas dag la yon phul na/ /'jig rten 'di
dang pha rol du/ /bde ba dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag 'dum byed ces bya bar gyur pa gang gis mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ rang sangs rgyas stong la

bsod snyoms sbyar cing / de'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim bdag 'dum

byed ces bya ba der gyur to/ nga nyid kyis de na mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms sbyar bas/ nga'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byas so/ /rgyal po
chen po/ nga'i sbyin pa'am/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang
nga'i sbyin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /sdom la/ sprin shugs dbang po sprul mgo gnyis/ /de bzhin chu
sreg ne tso dang / /ston mo rus sbal sde bzang dang / /ded dpon tshogs su bsdus pa yin/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir

sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun pa rab tu mang po dag cig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te rgya mtsho
chen por 'jug par 'dod nas/ de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste gcig la gcig phan thogs par mngon pa med kyi/
ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa/ rkyal gyi cha spyad dag khyer te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes de ltar chad bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs
pa na dgos pa/ rkyal gyi cha byad/ kha cig gis ni/ shing shal ma la'i spang leb/ kha cig gis ni/ ras sgye nang tshangs can/ kha cig gis ni ku ba brgyus pa/ kha cig gis ni/ ra rkyal khyer te rgya

mtsho chen por zhugs so/ /de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bshig go /gru bo che ba shig pa dang de rnams rkyal pa re re la zhon te chu ji lta ba bzhin du
khyer te dong ba las/ de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/ des lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang / de na bud med gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes ma/ blta na
sdug pa dag yod de/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /jo bo dag /tshur spyon/ bzhin bzang dag /tshur spyon/ bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang / khyim thab ma mchis pa rnams kyi
khyim thab dang / gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas dang / gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / rten ma
mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig /'di dag ni khyed kyi zas kyi khang pa dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / gnas mal gyi khang pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang /

dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang / 'dzam bu gling gi rin po che rab tu mang bo 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru
dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dag lags kyi/ khyed tshur spyon/ bdag cag dang lhan cig tu rtsed mo bgyi/ dga' bar
bgyi/ dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o/ /khyed cag la su yang smos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud cig /de dag bud med de rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de dag de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so/ /de nas tshong pa mkhas
pa'i rang bzhin can zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir bud med de dag gis lho phyogs kyi lam lhag par srung bar sems/ ma la bdag gis bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de mal du gnyid
log par rig nas/ bags kyis dal bu dal bus mal nas babs la lho phyogs kyi lam du 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ de de ltar nges par byas nas bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de gnyid kyis log
par rig nas/ bags kyis dal bu dal bus mal nas babs te ral gri rnon po mchan du thogs nas lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang / de de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra/
kyi hud ma/ kyi hud pha/ kyi hud sring mo/ kyi hud spun/ kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling bkra bas spangs sam/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na re skyid ces sgra 'byin pa dag thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'jigs
par gyur/ rmongs par gyur/ skyi bung zhes byed par gyur to/ /de nas tshong ba mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can des/ 'jigs pa dang / skyi bung zhes byed pa de shin tu legs par bsal nas lho phyogs

kyi lam de kho na'i rjes su song ba dang / des de na lcags kyi mkhar chen po mtho zhing rgya che ba zhig mthong nas/ des grong khyer de'i mtha' kho ra khor yul tu bskor na/ ci nas kyang sgo cung zad cig rnyed

grang snyam nas/ des grong khyer de'i mtha' kho ra khor yug tu bskor ba dang / chung du na byi la'am sprul 'dzul pa'i sgo tsam yang ma rnyed do/ /de na shing shi ri sha zhes bya ba spom la ring ba zhig mthong nas/

de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can des/ shing shi ri sha de la pags kyis de dal bu dal bus 'dzegs nas skye bo'i tshogs chen la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag /ci'i phyir kyi hud ma/ kyi hud pha/
kyi hud sring mo/ kyi hud spun/ kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling bkra bas spangs sam/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na re skyid ces shin tu smre sngags 'don/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje/ bdag cag 'dzam
bu'i gling gi don 'thun nor tshol ba rab tu mang po dag cig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod pa las/ bdag cag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag
rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gcig la gcig phan 'dogs par mngon pa med kyi/ ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa/ rkyal gyi cha byad dag khyer te rgya
mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes de ltar chad bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rkyal gyi cha byad/ kha cig gis ni/ shing shal ma la'i spang leb/ kha cig gis
ni| ras sgye nang tshangs can/ kha cig gis ni/ ku ba brgyus pa/ kha cig gis ni/ ra rkyal khyer te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/ /bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa

dang chu srin nya'i rigs kyis gru po che bshig go /gru bo che bshig nas bdag cag rkyal pa re re la zhon te chu ji lta ba bzhin khyer te dong ba las/ bdag cag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i
rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/ des bdag cag lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang / de na bud med gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes ma/ blta na sdug pa dag yod de/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smras
so| |jo bo dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzang dag tshur spyon/ bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang / khyim thab ma mchis pa rnams kyi khyim thab dang / gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas
dang / gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / rten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig /'di dag ni

khyed kyi zas kyi khang pa dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / gnas mal gyi khang pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang / dga' bar 'gyur

ba'i rdzing dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po
dang / sbug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dag lags kyi/ khyed tshur spyon/ bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o/ /khyed
cag las su yang smyos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud cig /bdag cag bud med de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ bdag cag de dag dang
lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ khye'u dang bu mo dag btsas te/ ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun gzhan rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i gru bo che zhig go/ zhes
ma thos pa de srid du bud med de dag dang bdag cag lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ gang gi tshe bud med rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu

mang po gzhan dag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang / chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bshig go /zhes thos nas/ de nas bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs te kha cig ni/ zos so/ /
skyes pa za bar byed pa na lhag rol skra'am/ spu'am/ sen mo'am/ so lus pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par za bar byed do/ /de rnams za bar byed pa na khrag dron po'i thigs pa sa la lhung ba
gang dag yod na yang de dag kyang sor mo'i rtse mo rnams kyis brud de sa dang bcas par khar 'jug par byed do/ /bdag cag kha cig ni/ lcags kyi mkhar 'dir bcug go/ /kye nang rje/ 'di dag ni/ mi'i
bud med ma yin te/ srin mo yin gyi 'di dag las bdag nyid srung shig /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ skye bo'i tshogs chen
po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gis na/ khyed cag dang / bdag cag legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs 'ga' ci yod/ de rnams kyis 'di skad ces
smras so/ /kye nang rje/ re zhig bdag cag gang gis na/ legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs ni/ cung zad kyang kho bo cag la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal
te bdag cag gis 'di snyam du/ kye ma bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di las brgal te 'bros so/ /snyam du bsam na/ de'i nyis 'gyur ram/ de'i sum 'gyur gyis mthon por 'gyur ro/ /gal
te bdag cag gis 'di snyam du/ kye ma bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di las brgal te 'bros so/ /snyam du bsam na/ de'i nyis 'gyur ram/ de'i sum 'gyur gyis zheng du skye bar 'gyur te/ de
ltar re zhig bdag cag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs bdag cag la med do/ /'on kyang gang gis na/ khyed cag ni/ slar legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling
du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod de/ 'di na bdag cag gi bar snang la rgyu ba'i lha rnams/ kye ma 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rnams gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la/ byang phyogs kyi gseb lam

gang na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu za ba/ bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim pa/ mgo 'phang bstod de pha rol tu 'gro ba ni/
su yod/ su ni/ pha rol du bkri/ su ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling du legs pa dang bde bar phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yod par mi 'gro ba ni/ byis pa'o/ /zhes sgra 'byin pa thos kyi/
khyed de'i drung du dengs la 'di skad ces/ bdag cag pha rol tu mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol du bkri zhing legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du
gsol zhes smros shig /de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po des smras pa shin tu legs par bzung ste chub par byas nas/ bags kyis dal bu dal bus shing
shi ri sha las babs nas g.yas phyogs kyi lam de nyid du song ste bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de/ mal na gnyid kyis log par rig nas/ bags kyis dal bu dal bus nyal lo/ /de nas tshong pa

mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / nang par sngar langs nas 'dzam bu gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi don
mthun rab tu mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dang / re zhig gang na skyed mos tshal dben pa yod pa zhig tu shog cig dang / kho bos khyed cag dang lhan cig gsang ste gleng dgos
pa cung zhig yod kyi/ khyed su yang smyos kyang khye'u'am bu mo ni/ khrid de ma 'ongs shig /shes ldan dag/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang
po rnams kyis mnyan to/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po rnams skyed mos tshal rab tu dben pa gang na ba der dong pa dang / de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis skye
bo'i tshogs chen po de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed gleng pa de dag /'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams la rgyas par smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ 'di dag ni/ bud
med ma yin te/ 'di dag srin mo yin gyi/ shes ldan dag /'di las bdag nyid srung bar gyis shig /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams de bzhin du gso sbyong bco lnga pa
nyid la byang phyogs gseb lam gang na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu za ba/ bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim pa/
mgo 'phang bstod de pha rol tu 'gro ba ni/ su zhig yod/ su ni/ pha rol tu bkri/ su ni/ legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yod par song ba

dang / tshong pa rta rdzi'i rigs shig gis rta'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi shugs can rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
shes ldan dag /rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can ni/ pha bi yin te/ pha bi'i drung du dong la 'di skad ces/ bdag cag pha rol tu mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu
bkri zhing / bdag cag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra'o/ /de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis don 'thun rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras
so| |shes ldan dag/ bdag gis ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs chen po des smras pa'i don go ba ltar na/ 'di ni/ bdag cag gis rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can de'i drung du dong nas 'di skad ces/ bdag
cag pha rol du mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu bkri zhing / bdag cag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra ba'i dus la bab pa

ma yin no/ /'on kyang gang gi tshe rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu zos nas zhes bya ba nas 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de

ni/ bdag cag rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi drung du dong la 'di skad ces/ bdag cag pha rol tu mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu bkri zhing / bdag cag legs pa dang bde

bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra ba'i dus la bab pa yin no/ /de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu zos nas zhes bya ba nas su ni/
legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te rta'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi shugs can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag
cag pha rol tu mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu bkri zhing / bdag cag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi
shugs can gyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po la legs par rab tu gtams shing rjes su bstan pa/ shes ldan dag /bud med de dag lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par mdzes
pa/ lhag par blta na sdug par byas na khye'u dang / bu mo rnams khrid de 'ongs shing / de rnams 'di skad ces/ jo bo dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzang dag tshur spyon zhes bya ba nas bdag cag dang lhan
cig rtse bar bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dga' mgur spyod bar bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /'on te khyed cag la 'ga' zhig gis cung zad smras te bdag cag mi dgos na/ rang rang gi bu
dag khrid de dengs shig ces zer ba de la/ khyed cag las gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gi chung ma'am/ bu pho'am/ bo mo'am/ bdag gi zas kyi khang pa'am/ skom gyi khang pa'am/ gos kyi khang
pa'am/ gnas mal gyi khang pa'am/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba'am/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing ngam/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai

DUr+ya dang zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sems phan chad/ de dag kho bo'i rgyab bam/ ro stod la zhon yang shing tog gi 'bras bu smin pa rtsa ba chad pa bzhin du ltung

bar 'gyur zhing / bud med de rnams 'ongs nas za bar 'gyur te/ de dag skyes pa za bar byed pa na/ khrag dron po'i thigs pa sa la ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sor mo'i rtse mos sa dang bcas te brud nas
khar 'jug go/ khyed cag las gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag gi chung ma'am/ bu'am/ bu mo'am zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du mi sems na/ de rnams kho bo'i

spu'i rtse mo bye ba'i cha la brten kyang lhung bar mi 'gyur te/ de dag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa rab

tu mang po la legs par rab tu gtams shing rjes su bstan nas rgyab smad do/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa rab tu mang pos rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la/ kha cig ni/ ro stod du/ kha cig ni/ rgyab
tu/ kha cig ni/ gnya' bar ro/ /kha cig ni/ mjug ma la 'jus so/ /de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed nas
de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la song ba dang / de nas bud med lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par blta na sdug pa rnams kyis khye'u dang bu mo rnams khrid de
lhags nas 'di skad ces/ jo bo dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzang dag tshur spyon zhes bya ba nas bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong

ma bzhin du'o/ /'on te khyed cag la 'ga' zhig cung zad smras te kho mo cag mi dgos na/ rang rang gi khye'u dang bu mo rnams khrid de dengs shig ces smra ba de la gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag gi chung ma'am/ bu

pho'am/ bu mo'am/ bdag gi zas kyi khang pa'am zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sems bskyed pa de dag ni/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi ro stod dang rgyab tu

zhon yang / shing tog gi 'bras bu smin pa rtsa ba chad pa bzhin du de nas slar lhung bar gyur ba dang / bud med de rnams de dag gi drung du dong ste phyin nas za bar byed de/ skyes pa rnams za bar byed pa na/ lhag ma lus

pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ skra'am zhes bya ba nas sa dang 'dren mar brud de khar 'jug par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag gi chung ma'am/ bdag gi bu pho'am
bdag gi bu mo'am/ zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de ltar mi sems pa rnams ni/ 'di ltar/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi spu'i rtse mo'i cha shas la 'jus pa

yang / legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag ni/ mig yin no/ /mig ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ rna ba dang / sna dang /
lce dang / lus dang / yid yin no/ /yid ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ gzugs yin no/ /gzugs ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / bdag ni/ chos yin no/ /
chos ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ sa'i khams yin no/ /sa'i khams ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / bdag
ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ gzugs kyi phung po yin no/ /gzugs kyi phung po ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / bdag ni/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin no/ /rnam par shes pa ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /snyam du sems na/ de rnams sdug bsngal 'thob par 'gyur te/ srin mo'i nang du tshong
pa bzhin/ rgyal po chen po/ gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag ni/ mig yin no/ /mig gi ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni bdag gi yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
du ste/ de ltar mi sems na/ de rnams bde ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ sprin gyi shugs kyis tshong pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas bstan la blun po'i mi/ /gang dag dad par mi byed pa/ /de rnams sdug bsngal 'thob
'gyur te/ /srin po'i nang du tshong pa bzhin/ /shes rab can gyi mi gang dag/ sangs rgyas bstan la dad byed pa/ /bde bar pha rol 'gro 'gyur te/ /sprin gyi shugs
kyis tshong pa bzhin/ /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can du gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang
nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe ngas sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs
tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal
po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ /yul wA ra NA si dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can/ sems can la byams pa zhig gnas so/ /de'i bsti gnas dang ha cang
yang mi ring ba zhig na/ khyim bdag zhing pa gnyis shig zhing rmed pa las/ de gnyis phan tshun rtsod pa byung bar gyur te/ de na gcig khros pa dang gcig shos kyang slar khros so/ /gcig gis brgyab pa
dang gcig shos kyis kyang slar brgyab bo/ /de gnyis ka yang drang srong gi drung du dong nas/ drang srong de la gcig gis dbang btsugs pa dang / gcig shos kyis kyang btsugs so/ /de gnyis rgyal
po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos de gnyis la smras pa/ khyed gnyis la dpang su yod/ gcig gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag gi dpang drang srong lags so/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag gi dpang yang
de kho na lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos drang srong bos te dris pa/ drang srong chen po/ 'di gnyis sngar gang gis nyes/ drang srong gis smras pa/ lha/ gal te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhal
che bcad na/ de lta na bdag gis dbang bgyi'o/ /gzhan du ni ma lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas drang srong gis smras pa/ lha/ gcig khros pa dang gcig bshos kyang slar khros
so/ /gcig gis brgyab pa dang gcig shos kyis kyang slar brgyab bo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'o na gnyis ka chad pas gcad do/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ lha/ khyod la bdag gis sngar lha gal te 'khor
los bsgyur ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhal che bcad na/ de lta na bdag gis dbang bgyi'o/ /gzhan du ni ma lags so/ /zhes ma gsol tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
zhal che ji ltar gcod/ drang srong gis smras pa/ lha/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ gnod pa las zlog cing / phan pa la sbyor bar bgyid do/ /de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gnyis ka dengs la da
phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ drang srong du gyur pa gang gis chos bzhin gyis dbang byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar

mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na zhes bya ba nas nga nyid kyis chos bzhin gyis dbang de byas so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas chos bzhin gyis dbang byas
ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs so/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas chos bzhin gyis dpang byas pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i

phyir ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na rang gi srog yongs su btang nas sems can mang po rjes su bzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ nags tshang tshing zhig na seng
ge ral pa can zhig gnas so/ /lam de nas don 'thun lnga brgya tsam dong nas de dag gi ca co'i sgras dus bskul bas/ sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya ba zhig glo bur du langs nas/ des don 'thun
tshong dpon dang bcas pa bskor ba dang / de rnams skrag nas sgra 'byin cing / zhi ba dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa lha rnams la gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas seng ges

sgra de thos so/ /thos nas kyang phyogs der 'ongs pa dang / ji tsam na sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhas bya bas/ don 'thun lnga brgya tsam bskor ba mthong ngo / /de dang ha yang mi ring ba zhig na/ glang po'i

phru gu zhig kyang rgyu zhing 'dug pa dang / de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ grogs po/ sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya bas don mthun lnga brgya bskor na/ de rnams kyi don gyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su

gtang bar khyod spro'am/ ji lta bu zhig bya/ bdag gi rkang pa khyod kyi klad par bzhag la thal mo sbrul chen po la bsnun pa dang / bdag gi rkang pa brtan pa'i shugs kyis ni/ khyod 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /
thal lcag gis ni/ sbrul lo/ /sbrul chen po'i kha chus reg pas ni/ bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /glang po che'i phru gus/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes khas blangs nas/ seng ges glang po che'i phru gu'i

steng du rkang pa bzhag nas thal mos sbrul chen po la bsnun pa dang / seng ges rkang pa brtan pa'i shugs kyis ni glang po che'i phru gu shi /thal mos kyang sbrul chen po shi /sbrul chen po'i kha chus kyang ri dwags

kyi rgyal po seng ge shi ste/ 'gro ba gsum char yang ngo / /don 'thun gyi tshogs chas pa dang lha zhig gis smras pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpas khyed kyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su btang nas
skyabs byas kyi/ re zhig de'i lus la mchod pa byos la phyir dengs shig/ de nas de rnams kyis de'i rus pa bsregs te rus pa la mchod pa byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ri dwags kyi
rgyal po seng ge zhes bya ba nas ngas don 'thun lnga brgya po de dag sbrul chen po las rang gi srog btang nas thar par byas so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/
ngas sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ zhes bya ba nas ngas sems can rnams rjes
su bzung ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang /
ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir gsod pa la yang byams pa bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ nags khrod cig
na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa/ bya mgo gnyis la sems tha dad pa zhig tu gyur to/ /de la/ gcig ni/ chos can zhes bya'o/ /gcig shos ni/ chos min zhes bya'o/ /
ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ chos can gyis bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu zhig zos so/ /chos min gyis ni/ dug gi 'bras bu zhig zos pa las/ gnyis ka yang dug gi mthus kun tu myos par gyur nas phan
tshun rtsod par brtsams pa dang / gcig gis log par smon lam btab pa/ khyod kyi skye ba gang dang gang du skyes pa'i skye ba de dang der gsod pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bor gyur cig ces
byas so/ /gcig shos kyis kyang smras pa/ bdag ni/ khyod la thams cad du byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems su gyur cig ces byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de
ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /chos min gang yin pa de ni/ lhas sbyin yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ nga'i byams pa'i sems des bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i byams pa'i sems de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang /
tshogs tsam yin no// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po zhe brgyad pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can gyi

skyabs byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ chu gling zhig gi 'gram na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na/ chu sreg rnams kyi nang du skyes nas chu sreg

lnga brgya'i dpon du gyur to/ /ji tsam na chu sreg rgan po zhig /chu sreg de rnams kyi sgo nga dang / phru gu rnams thabs kyis sngar zos nas/ dal bu dal bus 'chag cing / res 'ga' bya ba med pa na rkang pa
gcig bskums nas 'dug go /de nas chu sreg de rnams bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas dpon po'i drung du song ste/ ris mthun pa'i skad gnyug mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang /
de nas dpon pos rang gi khyu rnams de ltar sdug bsngal bar mthong nas chu gling kun nas byul bar brtsams pa dang / chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ lus kyis
rnam par ltung bar 'gyur gyi/ sems kyis ni/ ma yin pas/ des chu sreg rgan pa de dal bu dal bus 'chag cing / phyogs gcig tu song nas rkang pa gcig btsugs te gnas pa mthong nas/ byang chub
sems dpas 'phrigs pa/ 'di ni/ rang gi rigs kyi phyir rgol ba/ rang bzhin ngan pa yin no/ /snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi sgo nga phru gu dang / /rus chags rnams kyang zos
nas ni/ /rkang pa gcig btsugs 'dug pa de/ /kye ma khyod kyi brtul zhugs yin/ /kha cig smra ba yang bden te/ /gom pa dal bus 'dor byed cing / /dal bu dal bus smra ba dang / /gnya' ba gyur gyur byed
pa ni/ /de ni ngan g.yo'i mtshan nyid yin/ /des bsam pa/ dpon po 'dis ni/ bdag gi rgyus shes so/ /snyam du rig nas de nyid la skyabs su song ngo / /de nas dpon pos smras pa/ khu gu/ nam
chu sreg gi tshogs rnams 'khrugs par ma gyur pa de'i bar du khyod kyi sems bde bar gyis shig /de nas chu sreg rgan po de bros nas chu sreg de rnams bde bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe

de'i dus na chu sreg gi dpon por gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chu sreg gi dpon po der gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sems

can rjes su bzung ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su bzung

bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ nags tshang tshing zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na/ ne tso mi skad smra ba zhig tu gyur to/ /de'i tshe wA

ra NA sir rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de/ chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /de nas ne tso nyin re zhing rgyal po de'i khang pa'i pu shu'i steng na yib cing / rgyal po chen po/ chos ma yin

pas rgyal srid ma mdzad cig ces smra'o/ /rgyal po de de dang lhan cig gcugs par gyur pa dang / de nas des rgyal po de dka' thub kyi gnas lnga la rab tu bzhag nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed pa la zhugs

nas/ de ri dwags dang / bya thams cad la mi 'jigs pa byin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ne tsor gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i

dus na/ ne tso mi skad smra ba de yin par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta
ste| 'on kyang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po
chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir gsod pa la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung
ba/ yul ka shi zhes bya ba na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed de/ de rtag tu lus 'phags kyi yul 'dod pa kho na'i phyir lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang mi mthun par gyur to/ /lus
'phags kyi rgyal po de ni/ de bas khyad zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan yang yul de mi 'dod pas/ rtag tu de la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / snying brtse bas gnas so/ /'on kyang de
sred pas 'khol bas yul de kho na 'dod pa'i phyir de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir chas so/ /de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos
thos nas/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi lam bstar du bcug ste/ grong khyer de thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni/ bsgrengs/ dar gyi chun 'phyang
mang pos ni/ dpyangs/ dri zhim po'i pog phor ni/ bshams/ tsan+dan gyi chu'i chag chag gis btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'

ba rab tu mang po dag sta gon byas te/ grong mi dang / blon po rnams bsur bkye nas mgu bar 'gyur ba brgya phrag dag spring ba thos pa dang / rgyal po tshangs sbyin kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/ de nas bsam pa/
lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la so sor yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba zhig byas te slar ldog go /snyam du bsam nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos bkur sti chen
pos bsus nas nang du khrid de/ kha zas bsod pa rnams kyis tshim par byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal dbang bdag la bzod par mdzod/ /khyed la bdag ni rtag tu 'dud/ /bdag ni grogs por
gyur lags na/ /khyed kyis bdag ni brtse bar mdzod/ /des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bzod pa yi ni gzhu brdungs nas/ /khro dang nga rgyal 'joms pa yi/ /yon tan ldan pa'i mda' gcig gis/ /khyod
kyis bdag cag ril bcom mo/ /de nas de gnyis phan tshun yid gcugs par gyur nas/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang rang gi yul du song ngo / /lus 'phags kyi yul mi rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bral

bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal por gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de

yin par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas yid kyi dregs pa bcom pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i yid kyi dregs pa
bcom pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can gyi don chen por byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la

gnas pa na rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gyi dpon po zhig tu gyur to/ /ji tsam na ded dpon 'khor lnga brgya pa nor tshol ba zhig /rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na gru

de chu srin nya'i rigs kyis bshig nas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /de nas rus sbal des tshong pa lnga brgya rgyab tu bskyon nas rgya mtsho chen po las bsgral to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i

dus na/ rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gyi dpon por gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gyi dpon po der gyur to/ /

rgyal po chen po/ ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni/

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po lnga brgya byung ba las/ de na sde can dang / sde bzang

zhes bya ba spun gnyis shig blon po'i gtso bo byed pa las/ sde can gyis sde bzang la rtag tu klan ka tshol zhing gnod pa bya ba la zhugs so/ /sde bzang ni/ de la rtag tu phan par bya ba la zhugs so/ /
rgyal po'i blon po dang / grong mi rnams kyis kyang sde bzang gi ched du sde can dang sdums byas kyang gnas skabs thams cad du gnod pa byed pa las ldog tu ma btub bo/ /de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal
pos mang po zhig spyos nas yul nas bskrad do/ /de wA ra NA sir song nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po'i gtso bor bcug go/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na long bar gyur to/ zhes nu bo sde bzang gis

thos nas/ rgyal po la gsol ba byas te wA ra NA sir song nas mig phye ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen pos/ sde bzang 'di lta bu/ gang gis na mthus phu bo long bar bya ba'i rigs na/ snying rje dang ldan

pa 'dis de'i mig phye'o/ /zhes sde bzang la sems dga' bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ blon po'i gtso bo sde bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gzhan zhig yin snyam na zhes bya ba nas 'on kyang ngas

sems can rjes su bzung ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ tshong khang zhig na/
ded dpon gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / nyo tshong la dgon pa'i lam zhig tu zhugs pa dang / de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag dgon pa'i nang nas 'dod pa
rnams 'di lta ste/ gcig la gcig phan 'dogs par mngon pa med kyi/ ma la bdag cag gis shing rta pa'i 'gron pa rabs gnyis su bcad la/ dgon pa'i lam du 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam nas/
de gnyis kyis shing rta pa'i 'gron pa rabs gnyis su bcad nas dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so/ /de la ded dpon gcig ni/ shing rta pa lnga brgya dang dgon pa'i lam gyi mgon 'dug go/ ded dpon
gcig shos ni/ shing rta pa lnga brgya dang dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so/ /ded dpon gyi mi tshong ba'i mdun nas 'gro bas/ skyes bu nag po mig che la dmar ba/ bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo
rdzab kyis g.yogs pa/ gos rlan pa/ skra gsher ba/ me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa/ mgo 'dren dang / dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras
pa/ kye nang rje/ ci/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu gsar pa mang du skyes sam/ kye nang rje/ bden te/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu gsar pa bskyed kyi/ shes

ldan dag/ rtswa dang / chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma byas par 'or cig /khyed cag rtswa dang / chu gsar pa la longs spyod dang / bde ba dang / legs par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol
bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ded dpon gyi mi 'gron pa gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / 'gron pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag/ shes par gyis shig /kho bo tshong pa rnams kyi mdun
nas 'gro ba na/ 'di na skyes bu nag po/ mig che la dmar ba/ bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo rdzab kyis g.yogs pa/ gos rlan pa/ skra gsher ba/ me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings

pa/ mgo 'dren pa dang / dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces/ kye nang rje/ ci/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang / chu gsar pa mang du skyes sam zhes

byas pa dang / des 'di skad ces/ kye nang rje/ bden te/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu gsar pa bskyed kyi/ shes ldan dag /rtswa dang / chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma byas par
'or cig /khyed cag rtswa dang / chu gsar pa la longs spyod dang / bde ba dang / legs par dgon pa'i laM ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer gyi/ bdag cag gi khal rnams ma dub par

rtswa dang / chu bor la/ bdag cag rtswa dang / chu gsar pa la longs spyad nas/ bde ba dang / legs par dgon pa'i laM ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis rtsa dang / chu rnying pa bor te
dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las/ de rnams dong nas zhag gcig lon yang / rtswa dang / chu gsar pa ma rnyed do/ /zhag gnyis dang gsum dang / bdun gyi bar du song
yang rtswa dang / chu gsar pa ma rnyed do/ /de nas 'gron pas zhag bdun lon pa dang / gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas kha btag go/ de nas ded dpon gcig shos 'di snyam du sems
