pa de'i tshe/ kho bo'i dgos pa thams cad dang / las su bya ba thams cad bram ze gnag lhas skyes la slar gtad nas/ steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi na skyes pa med par song nas rol mo rnams kyis rtse
bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /da ni/ kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag che thang du dmas par
gyur to/ /kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag shin tu che thang du dmas par gyur to/ /snyam mo/ /lha/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes gum pas shin tu sdug bsngal zhing thugs mi dgyes par
gyur te sdug bsngal zhing thugs mi dgyes pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar ma mdzad cig /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha/ bram ze gnag lhas kyi bu bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes bgyi ba mkhas pa/ gsal
ba| yid gzhungs pa/ gzhung dang mthun par spyod pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa zhig mchis te/ 'di ltar/ de'i pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyi las kyi mtha' bgyis pa gang lags pa de dag kyang
bram ze'i khye'u me gso la dris nas bgyid kyi/ ma dris par ni/ ma lags so/ /don du bgyi ba'i don nges par brtag pa gang lags pa de dag kyang / bram ze'i khye'u me gso la dris nas bgyid kyi/
ma dris par ni/ ma lags so/ /lha/ de lta lags pas/ pha gnag lhas skyes kyi las thabs su dbang bskur du gsol/ de nas rgyal po phyogs bdag gis/ bram ze'i khye'u me gso pho nyas
bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod ngas ded phyin chad nas pha gnag lhas skyes kyi las thabs su bcug go /bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u me gsos mnyan to//

de nas bram khye'u khye'u me gso de/ pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes byed byed pa'i zhing las kyi mtha' gang yin pa de rnams kyang byed do/ /de'i pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes don du bya ba'i don nges pa can rtog
rtog pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de nges par rtog go /de nas bram ze'i khye'u me gso'i ming / bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing / bram ze gnag lhas skyes/ bram ze
gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag /tshur khyed gzhon

nu rdul phran gang na ba der dong la phyin pa dang / gzhon nu rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byos la/ gzhon nu rdul phran la 'di skad ces/ ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na/ de bzhin du bdag
cag kyang bde zhing / ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na/ de bzhin du bdag cag kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po ni/ rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang / snying
du sdug pa dang / ne'u zla yin gyi/ rdul phran khyod/ gal te yab 'das nas yab kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na/ ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las/ longs spyod kyi bgo
bsha' mdzod cig ces gyis shig/ mkhan po /bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gis/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes las mnyan nas gzhon nu rdul phran gang na ba der dong
ste phyin pa dang / gzhon nu rdul phran la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byas nas/ gzhon nu rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na/ de bzhin du bdag
cag bde zhing / ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na/ de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug ni/ rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang / snying du sdug pa
dang / ne'u zla lags kyi/ rdul phran khyod/ gal te yab 'das nas/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na/ ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las/ longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod
cig /de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes gzhon nu rdul phran gyis mnyan to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po phyogs bdag dus las 'das te shi bar gyur na/ blon po'i tshogs rnams dang / sna chen
po la gtogs pa dang / rgyal khrims 'dod pa rnams dang / gsang tshig lhan cig 'don pa rnams kyis/ gzhon nu rdul phran pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag cing / de rgyal srid la dbang bskur
ba'i phyir dbang bskur ro/ /de nas gzhon nu rdul phran gyi ming / gzhon nu rdul phran ces bya ba gang yin pa de nub cing / rgyal po rdul phran zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis/
bram ze gnag lhas skyes pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan pos nga'i yab la ji ltar rjes su ston pa de ltar nga la'ang da phyin chad rjes su ston par bya bar soms shig /bka'
bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis mnyan to/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag /khyed cag

rgyal po rdul phran gang na ba der dong la phyin pa dang / rgyal po rdul phran la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byos la 'di skad ces/ lha/ lha gzhon nur gyur pa na bdag cag spyan sngar mchis nas 'di skad
ces/ ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na/ de bzhin du bdag cag bde zhing / ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na/ de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po

ni| rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang / snying du sdug pa dang / ne'u zla lags kyi/ rdul phran khyod/ gal te yab 'das te yab kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na/ ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs
spyod dag las/ longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod cig ces gsol pa dgongs sam zhes smros shig/ gal te 'di skad ces/ ngas dran no/ /zer na/ lha/ da ni/ de'i dus la bab pa lags so/ /
zhes smros shig /'on te des 'di skad ces chen po nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'ged pa su zhig yod ces zer na/ lha/ gnag lhas skyes ma lags pa gzhan
su yang ma mchis so/ /zhes smros shig/ mkhan po/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gis/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes las mnyan nas/ rgyal po rdul phran gang na ba de na
dong ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po rdul phran la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byas nas/ rgyal po rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ lha sngon gzhon nur gyur pa na/ bdag
cag spyan sngar mchis nas 'di skad ces/ ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na/ /de bzhin du bdag cag bde zhing / ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na/ de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
la| bdag cag rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po ni/ rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang / snying du sdug pa dang / ne'u zla lags kyi/ rdul phran khyod/ gal te yab 'das te yab kyi rgyal srid kyi
dbang phyug la bzhag na/ ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las/ longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod cig ces gsol pa dgongs lags sam/ shes ldan dag/ ngas dran no/ /lha/
da ni/ de'i dus la bab lags so/ /'o na sa chen po nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'ged pa su zhig yod/ lha/ gnag lhas skyes ma lags pa gzhan ma mchis
so| |de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po/ khyod kyis sa chen po 'di nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug
pa 'di cha bdun du 'ged nus sam/ lha/ legs par rngo thogs so/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po rdul phran las mnyan nas dkyil dang dkyil na yul khor bu chung dang / khor bu

chung yod pa gang dag yin pa de dag rgyal po rdul phran gyi ris su bcad pa dang / des rgyal po rdul phran yid rangs par gyur te/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis/ kho bo'i rigs ji lta bu zhig tu bcad na/ de
ltar dper na/ mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ bye brag shes pas byas pa lta bur gyur to/ /zhes yid rangs pa yang go bar byas so/ /yul khor bu chung gzhan gang yin pa de dag kyang rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal
rigs drug gi rigs su bcad pa dang / des rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug kyang yid rangs par gyur te/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis ji lta bu zhig tu bgos na/ ji ltar mkhas pa/ gsal ba/
bye brag shes pas byas pa bzhin du kho bo cag gis yun ring po nas bsam bsam pa'i yul de dag da kho bo cag gi rigs su bcad ces yid rangs pa yang go bar byas so/ /de nas rgyal po'i zhim ring rgyal
rigs drug gis/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po/ rgyal po rdul phran la ji ltar rjes su ston pa de bzhin du/ deng slan chad bdag la yang khyod kyis rjes su bstan par
dgongs su gsol/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes bram ze gnag lhas skyes mnyan to/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes rgyal po rdul phran dang / rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang / rgyal rigs shing sA la

chen po lta bu bdun dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la rjes su ston to/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga
brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / ral gri 'dzin stangs mkhan dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang /

zham 'bring byed pa dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu rtul phod pa/ dpa' ba/ rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang / sems srung ba dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus byed pa
du ma la yang rjes su ston par byed do/ /de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyi ming / bram ze gnag lhas skyes bram ze gnag lhas skyes zhes bya ba'i ming gang yin pa de nub par gyur cig/ bram ze chen po
gnag lhas skyes/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes/ bram ze rnams kyis ni/ tshangs par bkur ro/ /rgyal pos ni/ lhar bkur ro/ /
grong mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis ni/ rgyal por bkur ro/ /bram ze rnams kyis ni/ 'di snyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/ tshangs pa'i lam shes
shing mthong nas/ mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /snyam mo/ /rgyal po dang / grong mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis kyang / 'di snyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs
pa'i lam shes shing / tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes/ 'di snyam du
sems te/ bdag da ltar bram ze rnams kyis ni/ tshangs par bkur/ rgyal pos ni/ lhar bkur/ grong mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis ni/ rgyal por bkur/ bram ze rnams ni/ 'di snyam du shes
te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /snyam mo/ /rgyal po dang / grong mi dang / yul
mi rnams kyis kyang / 'di snyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes ni/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing / tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs
par byas te gnas par byas so/ /snyam mo/ /bdag gis ni tshangs pa'i lam yang mi shes/ bdag ni/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas pa yang ma
yin na/ bdag gi pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes las/ bram ze gang zhig dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas na/ de'i drung du tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
zhes thos kyi/ ma la bdag gis dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal po rdul phran
la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ re zhig rjes su ston pa gzhan zhig btsal du gsol/ bdag ni/ dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'tshal lo/ /mkhan
po| da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig /rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang /
khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /re zhig ma g.yeng bar bag yod pas khyim na 'khod cig /bdag ni/ dbyar gyi zla ba
bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do/ /rje'i sras/ da de'i dus la bab lags so/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /re zhig
ji skad thos pa dang / ji skad bstan pa dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa'i rig pa dag zungs shig /lhogs shig/ bdag ni/ dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis
gnas par 'dod do/ /mkhan po/ da de'i dus la bab lags so/ /'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta ba dang / ral gri 'dzin stangs mkhan dang / gzhu

'dzin pa dang / zham 'bring byed pa dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu rtul phod pa/ dpa' ba/ rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang / sems srung ba dang / skra
mkhan dang / khrus byed pa du ma la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /re zhig rjes su ston pa gzhan tshol cig /kho bo ni/ dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do/ /
mkhan po/ da de'i dus la bab lags so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su khang bzang zhig brtsigs nas/ dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam
gtan gyis gnas pa las/ de'i drung du tshangs pa ma 'ongs so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis dbyar gyi zla ba bzhir zhag gcig gis ma lon pa dang / 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi

pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes las dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas na de'i drung du tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes thos na/ bdag gi drung du tshangs pa ma 'ongs so/ /snyam
mo| |de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa'am/ brkyang
pa las bskum pa tsam gyis/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cig/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi khang bzang du 'ongs so/ /de'i tshe tshangs pa mi mjed

kyi bdag po'i kha dog gi mthus/ khang bzang thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis nam gyi cha smad la bab pa dang / khang bzang thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos
khyab par gyur pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di 'dra ba yi kha dog ni/ /bdag gis ma mthong ma thos na/ /gzugs bzang kha dog ldan pa yi/ /grogs po khyod ni
su zhig yin/ /gang la lhar bcas tshangs ris dang / /de bzhin ris ni gzhan dag gis/ /gzhon nu rab shes de lta bur/ /gnag lhas skyes kyis nga shes byos/ /tshangs
pas khyod la 'dud bgyid cing / /bkur sti yang ni bgyid lags kyi/ /bdag gi tshig rnams gsan mdzod la/ /myur du gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /gnag lhas skyes pa khyod kyis ni/ /smras

pa'i tshig de bzung bar byas/ /tshe 'di'i don ni gang yin dang / /phyi ma'i don ni gang yin pa/ /yid la bsam pa de dag ni/ /bram ze nga la dris shig dang / /dris pa de dang de dag ni/ /nga yis khyod la
gtan la dbab/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes/ 'di snyam du sems te/ re zhig bdag gis mthong ba'i chos kyi don gyis thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ bdag gis thob kyi/
ma la bdag gis tshe phyi ma'i don las brtsams te dri bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blo la bsdogs pa'i yid gnyis the tshom dag /tshangs pa kun 'ged gzhon nu la

'dri ba/ /gang du gnas shing gang la bslab byas na/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mi 'chi 'thob par 'gyur/ /bram ze/ mi yi nang na nga'o snyam spangs shing / /gcig por gyur pa snying rjer mos pa dang / /dri
nga med cing 'khrig las chags bral ba/ /'di la gnas shing 'di nyid la bslab na/ /mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'chi med 'thob/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes/ 'di snyam du
sems te/ tshangs pas bshad pa/ bram ze/ mi yi nang na nga'o snyam spangs shing / /zhes bya ba 'di'i don yang bdag gis kun shes/ tshangs pas bshad pa/ gcig pur gyur pa snying rjer mos pa dang / /zhes
bya ba 'di'i don yang dag gis kun shes na/ tshangs pas bshad pa/ dri nga med cing 'khrig las chags bral ba/ /zhes bya ba 'di don bdag gis mi shes so/ /snyam du bsam nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad

de smras pa/ tshangs pa mi'i nang dri nga gang zhig las/ /'jig rten kun na ngogs kyi 'bab chu ltar/ /gang gis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can/ /tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes pa'o/ /khro dang rdzun dang

'khon dang rnam 'tshe dang / /'jungs dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal mi bzod dang / /chags dang zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang / /phrag dog ser sna dag dang 'tshig pa ste/ /de dag bram ze mi'i nang dri nga yin/ /'jig rten
kun na ngogs kyi 'bab chu ltar/ /de yis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can/ /tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ ji skad du
bdag gis tshangs pas smras pa'i don shes pa ltar na/ khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du/ tshangs par spyod pa sal gyis dag pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs
su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba spyad pa 'di ni/ sla ba ma yin pas/ ma la bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
'byung bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
tshangs par skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'di la 'bad pa brtan par gyis/ /chos 'di dag pa g.yung drung yin/ /zhes smras nas/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas

dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag 'das nas rgyal po rdul phran bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes gang na ba der song ste/ bram ze chen po gnag
lhas skyes kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug par dang / rgyal po rdul phran la bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis 'di skad ces smras
so| |sa bdag rgyal chen rdul phran khyod/ /bdag gi tshig ni gsan par mdzod/ /gnag lhas skyes bdag mi spro yi/ /rgyal srid nyid kyis bskyang du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis tshigs su bcad
de smras pa/ khyod kyi 'dod pa mi chog pa/ /gang yin de yang khyod la bskang / /khyod la 'tshe ba de gsad kyi/ /gnag lhas skyes kyis bdag ma spang / /rgyal po bdag 'dod mi chog min/ /bdag la
'tshe ba 'ang ma mchis te/ /mi ma yin pa'i tshig thos nas/ /khyim gyi gzhi la mi spro'o/ /gang las thos nas bram ze khyod/ /'dir ni bdag dang 'dod spong ba/ /mi ma yin pa de ci 'dra/ /dri yi de
ni bdag la smros/ /snying rje yi ni gnas pa yis/ /rab dben bsam gtan byed pa na/ /de nas tshangs pa mdun du 'ongs/ /tha dad phyogs ni snang bar byas/ /bdag gis de yi tshig thos nas/ /khyim gyi gzhi

la mi spro'o/ /bram ze gang du 'gro ba der/ /kho bo yang ni 'gro bya zhing / /khyod kyi nyan thos 'gyur bar gyis/ /gnag lhas skyes khyod ston pa mdzod/ /gang la so so'i skye bo rnams/ /chags pa'i 'dod pa
de dag spongs/ /'dod pa rnams la mi blta zhing / /bden pa'i chos la gnas par mdzod/ /tshangs par skye bar bgyi slad du/ /nor bu dag pa baiDUr+ya/ /ji ltar ma bcos dri med lta'i/ /tshangs par spyod pa
spyad par bgyi/ /mkhan po/ da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
bdag ni/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po/ lo bdun du gzhes shig

dang / lo bdun 'das nas bdag cag bu dang spun dang / gzhan dag rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bkod nas mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /shes ldan dag lo bdun lta ha cang yang thogs
ches so/ /gzhan yang / 'dod pa rnams ni/ chags par 'gyur ba/ longs spyod rnams ni rgyags par 'gyur ba/ srog 'chad pa ni/ shes par dka' ba yin pas/ lo bdun 'das na yang shes ldan
dag rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med pas/ re zhig kho bo rab tu 'byung nge / /mkhan po/ drug gam/ lnga'am/ bzhi'am/ gsum mam/ gnyis sam/ gcig gam/
zla ba bdun nam/ drug gam/ lnga'am/ bzhi'am/ gsum mam/ gnyis sam/ gcig gam/ zhag bdun zhig gzhes shig dang / zhag bdun 'das nas bdag cag bu dang / spun dang /
gzhan dag rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bkod nas mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /shes ldan dag /zhag bdun lta ring po yang mi thogs na/ 'on kyang 'dod
pa rnams ni/ chags par 'gyur ba/ longs spyod rnams ni rgyags par 'gyur ba/ srog 'chad pa ni/ shes par dka' ba yin pas/ zhag bdun 'das na yang shes ldan dag rab
tu 'byung ngam/ mi 'byung gtol med pas/ re zhig bdag rab tu 'byung ngo / /mkhan po/ da de'i dus mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal rigs
shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / thabs ri ra bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la smras pa/ shes
ldan dag /bdag ni/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ rje'i sras/ bdag cag
btsun mo bgyi ba'i dus na ni/ btsun mo/ grogs bgyi ba'i dus na ni/ grogs lags pas/ rje'i sras gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ rje'i sras rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /shes ldan dag /da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /de nas bram ze chen po
gnag lhas skyes kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag ni/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par
rab tu 'byung na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po/ bdag cag gang cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni/ mkhan po la brten te lags kyi/ gal te mkhan po skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos
ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /shes ldan dag /da de'i

dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /'dul sbyor mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta pa dang / ral gri 'dzin stangs mkhan dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / zham 'bring byed

pa dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang / sems srung ba dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus byed pa du ma la smras pa/
shes ldan dang / /bdag ni/ zhes bya ba nas/ skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /shes ldan dag /de'i dus la dbab par shes par gyis shig /de nas
bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes skra dang / kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smig bgos nas dad pa yang dag ba kho na khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal po rdul phran yang 'khor brgya
phrag du ma dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang skra dang kha sbu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bram ze chen

po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / khyim

bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu bdun dang / thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu yang skra bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bram ze chen po gnag lhas

skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam yang skra dang kha sbu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo / /

glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta pa dang / ral gri 'dzin stangs pa dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / zham 'bring byed pa dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/

rtul phod pa/ rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang / sems srung ba dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus byed pa rnams kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas

skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo / /bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes de ltar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa lnga po/ sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa/ shes rab nyam chung bar byed
pa/ gnod par byed pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar byed pa rnams spangs nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa
rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/ khyab pa nas/ rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin
du bzhi pa dang / bla dang / 'og dang / thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di thams cad byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya
chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon
med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas
rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / bla dang / 'og dang / thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di thams cad btang
snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par
byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi ming / bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes bya ba'i ming gang
yin pa de nub par gyur cing / ston pa gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas ston pa gnag lhas skyes 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor brgya
stong phrag du ma dang / grong rdal nas grong rdal dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de'i tshe skye pa'am/ bud med dag las nyes pa 'ga' byung na/ ston pa gnag lhas
skyes phyogs gang na 'dug pa'i phyogs de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag

'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do/ /mdun na 'don bdun 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ ral gris

'tsho dang tshangs sbyin dang / /sna tshogs za dang de bzhin sa/ /rdul can yul 'khor skyong gnyis gnyis/ /de tshe skye bo de bdun 'byung / /ka ling+ka na mche ba'i khyim/ /rdo mang na ni skem byed de/ /srung byed na ni
ma he ldan/ /ang+gar tsam pa ris su bcad/ /lus 'phags na ni mi thi la/ /stang zil can na ma rungs pa/ /wA ra NA sir ka shi ste/ /gnag lhas skyes kyis ris bcad de'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam

du sems/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ston pa gnag lhas skyes gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob

bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thog mar thugs gang du bskyed lags/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ rgyal po 'od ldan zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i yul du glang po rin po che/ me tog ku mu
ta'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis/ glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas
bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhas pa des pa/ khyod kyis glang po che dam pa 'di/ myur du legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal
zhes glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pas/ rgyal po 'od ldan las mnyan nas glang po che dam pa de/ 'dul bar byed de/ de dul bar rig nas rgyal po 'od ldan la phul te/ lha'i glang po che dam pa ni/
dul lags pas/ lha/ da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po 'od ldan glang po che dam pa de la zhon te/ glang po 'dul mkhan yang gong du zhon nas ri dwags 'chor du

song ngo / /ji tsam na glang po che des/ nags kyi bal glang mo'i dri tshor nas/ des dri de'i rjes bzhin rgyugs so/ /de nas rgyal po glang po che rlung ltar mgyogs pas khyer ba dang / glang po che 'dul mkhan
la smras pa/ kye glang po 'dul mkhan/ /nam mkha' 'gul ba 'dra zhing phyogs kun myur du 'dul bar 'gro ba 'dra/ sa ni mtha' dag 'khor lo bzhin 'khor shing rnams mkha' la 'khor

ba 'dra/ glang po'i dbang po gangs ri 'gro ba lta bu 'di rgyug mthong nas ni/ /ri bo 'di rgyugs snyam nas ri rnams gya tshom myur du rgyug pa 'dra/ /kye glang po che 'dul mkhan glang po che'i dbang po thul
cig /thul cig /glang chen dbang po tshar gcad par/ /bzang po rab tu 'bad par gyis/ /glang chen gnya' rengs khyer ba yis/ /kho bo jir 'gyur gtol med khyer/ /glang po che 'dul bas

smras pa/ lha/ drang srong dam pas smras pa'i gsang sngags bzlas bgyi zhing / /'di la lcags kyus tshar bcad 'bad pa yang bgyi na/ 'chi bar nges par rnams kyis tshe yis man bzhin du/ /glang po 'di ni bdag
stobs zil gyis mnan nas mchi/ /mi yi dbang po lcags kyu'am/ /zhags pa'am yang na lcags gis kyang / /'dod chags gnya' rengs khyer ba'i sems/ /tshar gcad nus pa ma lags so/ /'dod
chags sems kyi zug rngu ni/ /ji zhig ltar na skye 'gyur te/ /tshul 'ga' zhig gis rgyas 'gyur la/ /'ga' zhig gis kyang zhi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi tshe glang po'i 'dul mkhan des glang po che dam pa de/
gnas thams cad du bzlog par ma nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ glang po che 'di ni/ 'khrul gyi/ shing gi yal ga la 'jus mdzod cig /de nas rgyal po dang 'dul mkhan shing gi yal ga la
'jus te 'dug go /de nas de'i shi ba las thar te bde bar gyur nas/ rgyal pos 'dul mkhan la smras pa/ khyod kyis glang po che dam pa ma thul bar nga la phul lo/ /des smras pa/ lha/ 'di bdag
gis shin tu dul bar bgyis te/ 'on kyang nags kyi bal glang mo'i dri tshor nas nyan du ma btub lags so/ /lha de lta lags mod kyi/ dpyad dran nas ring por mi thogs par mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /
de nas glang po che de myos pa dang bral bar gyur nas/ zhag bdun lon pa dang dpyad rjes su dran nas rang nyid gnas su 'ongs te 'dug go /de nas glang po che 'dul mkhan gyis/ rings pa rings par
rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ glang po che de ni/ mchis lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis ni/ 'di ma thul to/ /lha/ thul lags so/ /ci mngon/ lha'i spyan sngar bab
par bgyi'o/ /zhes des lcags kyi thu lum so mal du tshos par bsregs pa zhig dpyad kyi sar khyer te len du gzhug par brtsams so/ /de nas des bag tsha ba med pas blang bar brtsams pa dang /
glang po 'dul mkhan gyis smras pa/ lha/ len du ni btab na/ 'on kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ kye mkhas pa/ de ltar shin tu dul ba 'dis bdag cag gi g.yengs pa 'di la rgyu ci
zhig yod/ lha/ bdag gis sngar lus thul gyi/ sems ni/ ma lags so/ /zhes ma gsol tam/ bdag ni/ lus 'dul ba lags kyi/ sems 'dul ba ni/ ma lags so/ /rgyal pos
smras pa/ sems 'dul ba 'ga' yod par khyod kyis mthong ngam/ de lhas bskul nas smras pa/ lha/ lus 'dul ba sems 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
mchis so/ /'dod pa'i rgyus byung nyes gzhom phyir/ /mang po brtsams par byed mod kyi/ /mi nus par ni shes nas kyang / /brtson 'grus nyams nas ldog par byed/ /de dang der ni de lta bu'i/ /
'bad pa rnam pa mang byas kyang / /'dod pa'i 'dod chags nags tshal gyi/ /rtsa nas phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa gzhom par 'dod pa ni/ /kha cig yul rnams spong bar byed/ /de gzhom 'dod

pa gzhan dag ni/ /dga' bzhin dbang po tshim par byed/ /lha dang lha min mi dang seng ge stag dang sbrul dag dang / /srin bu phye ma leb dang 'jig rten 'di dag kun/ /'dod pa'i zhags pa shin tu phra mo rnams kyis
yid bcings nas/ /srid 'gro'i thibs po 'dir ni 'khor lo bzhin du shin tu 'khor/ /bdag ni sna tshogs thabs kyi 'di lta bur/ /gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs pa'i glang po 'dul/ /rgyal po gzugs can ma
lags phra sems ni/ /drang srong chab rlung 'tshal bas ma thul to/ /glang chen 'dul ba gzugs med phra ba'i sems/ /drang srong chu rlung za bas ma thul na/ /gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur de/ /
mi yi 'jig rten dag na yod dam kye/ /gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur te/ /lha gcig mi yi 'jig rten na mchis te/ /rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas mthu bo che/ /nyon mongs spangs pa dpa' bo stobs
ldan pa/ /de dang gang dag de 'drar rjes 'brang ba/ /de dbang 'dir ni gzugs med sems 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brtson 'grus dang stobs thos nas/

sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis su/ /'gro bar rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/ /sngon
gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyi ma bsgral ba/ /skye bo'i tshogs dag bdag gis bsgral bar bya/ /bdag gis skye rgyu legs bskyabs las byung ngam/ /btang ba las byung ba bsod nams yod pa gang / /des ni
sangs rgyas nyid thob 'jig rten dag /'dod pa'i rims nad las ni thar par bya/ /rgyal po chen po/ ji tsam du sems/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyis rgyal po 'od ldan du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i tshe

de'i dus na nang nyid de yin te/ /ngas der thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du

gnyer ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la thog mar bsod snyoms phul lags/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba yangs pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od

ces bya ba zhig byung ngo / /de'i tshe ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe mchog zung dang / bzang po zung ni/ shA ri'i bu dang /

mo'u dgal gyi bu zhes bya'o/ /rim gro byed pa ni/ dge slong kun dga' bo zhes bya'o/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs

pa'i grong khyer du byon pa dang / de rlung shas ches pa'i snyun gyis thebs nas/ des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od las mar dang / til mar dang / bu ram chu khyer te

shog cig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /yangs pa'i 'od shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das rlung shas che ba'i snyun gyis thebs te/ de la mar dang / til mar dang / bu ram chu dgos so/ /de nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan nas mar dang / til mar dang / bu ram chu khyer te bu dang lhan cig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / mar dang / til mar gyis

bcom ldan 'das kyis sku byugs nas/ chu 'jam pos sku khrus byas te bu ram chu'i btung ba gsol to/ /des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzod cing 'tsho bar gyur to /de nas rdza mkhan yangs
pa'i 'od kyis de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag kyang rab tu sbyin pa 'di yis/ shAkya'i rigs skyes pa/ yon tan rigs dang rus dag mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid gyur
cing / /bdag gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar gyi nyam thag 'chi ba yi/ /pha rol zhi ba rgya chen 'jigs pa med par sgrol bar shog /de'i bus kyang smon lam btab pa/ bdag kyang las 'dis ni/ gzugs med
pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro byed par 'gyur cig /ces byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang yin pa de ni/ nga
nyid yin te/ der ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la thog mar bsod snyoms phul lo/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyis bu gang yin pa de ni/ kun dga' bo yin no// //
'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nga gcig pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i slad du yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis lags/ rgyal po chen po/ re zhig grangs med pa dang po la/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas/ /'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar/ /de'i bar bdun khri lnga
stong gi /sangs rgyas rnams ni ngas mchod do/ /grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod pa'i phyir/ /nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/ /rgyal po chen po/
grangs med pa gnyis pa la ni/ sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nas ni/ /dbang po'i rgyal mtshan thub pa'i bar/ /bdun khri drug stong dag gi ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/ /grangs
med gnyis po tshang par ni/ /rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te/ skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/ /grangs med pa gsum pa la yang / /sangs rgyas legs mdzad nas bzung ste/ /
sangs rgyas 'od srung bar dag tu/ /bdun khri bdun stong nga yis mchod/ /grangs med gsum po de la ni/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na/ /de'i tshe nga la skyo sems
med/ /nga ni byang chub sems dpa' na/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni de dag mchog /'jig rten 'dren pa de kun gyis/ /nga ni sangs rgyas nyid du bstan/ /ngas ni sngon bsam gang yin pa/ /nga yi smon
lam thams cad rdzogs/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas khur bor te/ sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'
ste/ rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bos zhus pa/ 'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa khyod kyi byang chub thugs/ /thog mar gang du bskyed pa dag /skal ldan chen po bdag la gsungs/ /khyod sngon byang chub spyod pa na/ /
sangs rgyas ji snyed dus gang du/ /ji lta bur ni bsnyen bkur mdzad/ /mi mchog de ni bdag la gsungs/ /kun dga' bo yi tshig gsan nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'gro la thugs

rje mdzad nas su/ /thub pas byang chub spyod pa gsungs/ /sangs rgyas 'dod chags bral thos shing / /glang po dregs pa'i shes chen dang / /'jig rten sdug bsngal gyur mthong nas/ /ngas ni byang chub sems

bskyed do/ /mi dbang 'od ldan gyur pa na/ ngas ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ /ngas ni brtan por dam bcas te/ /sngon med pa yi sbyin pa btang / /nga ni rdza mkhan gyur pa na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub mthong

nas/ /byang chub phyir ni thog mar ngas/ /mar dang til mar gyis mchod do/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu/ /tshong dpon bu mor gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas kau di n+ya mthong nas/ /ngas ni mar me'i sbyin pa byas/ /
sangs rgyas gzhan gyis ma thul ba'i/ /nga sngon sde snod gsum pa las/ dge slong dge 'dun rtsod pa la/ /dge 'dun la ni bud med smras/ /tshig gi nyes byas byung bas
na| |mod la bud med nyid du gyur/ /slar yang sems dad byas pas ni/ /skyes pa nyid ni thob par gyur/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu/ /nga ni rgyal po'i sras gyur tshe/ /gcen po rin chen gtsug tor
la| |mar me'i sbyin pas mchod byas shing / /ngas ni zla gsum drug cu ru/ /bde mdzad kyi ni zham ring byas/ /ngas ni mya ngan 'das pa de'i/ /mchod rten la ni nor kun phul/ /nga ni tshong dpon
gyur pa na/ /sgra brnyan dbyangs la zla gsum mchod/ /de yi mchod rten mthong po ni/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig rtsig tu bcug /nga ni bram zer gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas dpal 'byung mthong nas dga'/ /
legs par thal sbyar de nas yang / /mi mchog la ni mchod pa byas/ /nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na/ /bstan bcos du ma 'jigs med tshe/ /sangs rgyas phan par bzhed mdzad pa/ /nga yi stan la
spyan drangs so/ /sngon ni dka' thub ldan pa yi/ /drang srong chos la gnas gyur tshe/ /sangs rgyas kau'u ni n+ya mthong nas/ /ngas ni ri bo'i kha nas mchongs/ /drang srong gyur na'ang yid dga' bas//
sangs rgyas blta na sdug mthong nas/ /rtsa ba dang ni 'bras bu'i phyir/ /bsti gnas bzhugs pa ngas spyan drangs/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la/ /drang srong gyur tshe bkur sti byas/ /shing

shun yid du 'ong ba yis/ /ngas ni mi yi mchog bkab bo/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung spangs nas/ /byang chub 'dod pa'i ched du ngas/ /yul 'khor skyong gi zham 'bring byas/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa

nas/ /'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar/ /bdun khri dang ni lnga stong gi/ /sangs rgyas la ni nga yis mchod/ /grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe nga la skyo

sems med/ /grangs med pa dang po'o/ /bram ze'i khye'ur gyur de'i tshe/ /'od dang grags par ldan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong nas/ /ut+pal sngon po bdun gyis mchod/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /dka'

thub spyod ces bya ba yi/ /sangs rgyas mtshan mnga' mthong nas ni/ /mi mchog la ni bla res mchod/ /rgyal por gyur tshe mun 'joms pa'i/ /skal chen la ni rin po che/ /sna tshogs bkra ba'i rol mo yis/ /mchod pa dag

gis bzhengs gsol to/ /kun dga' mi dbang gyur pas/ /seng+ge seng+ge'i rta la mnga' la/ /rin chen yu ba can gdugs kyis/ /mi mchog la ni mchod pa byas/ /rgyal por gyur tshe grong khyer ni/ /stong phrag drug cu

rnams su yang / /mi yi nyi ma bde mdzad ni/ /spyan drangs nas ni mchod pa byas/ /'jig rten 'dren pa mi dbang la/ /bsro khang las dang de bzhin du/ /a kar nag po'i dri dag gis/ /bram zer gyur tshe zham

'bring byas/ /grong khyer rgyal srid 'phel bar ni/ /bram ze'i sangs rgyas sum cu po/ /gtsug tor can zhes 'jig rten grags/ /rgyal por gyur tshe mchod pa byas/ /grong khyer 'bras 'phel dag tu ni/ /sangs
rgyas nyi shu rtsa lnga la/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /tshangs par spyod pas mchod pa byas/ /grong khyer dga' ba de nyid du/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas gtsug

tor 'jig rten grags/ /gtsug lag khang gis mchod pa byas/ /tshong dpon gyur te rgyal ba drug /mchod phyir glang chen rta gser dang / /bud med rnams dang nor bu yi/ /rgyan gyis skyed mos tshal byas so/ /rgyal

por gyur tshe ngang pa yis/ /grong khyer yid 'ong de nyid du/ /byang chub don du gnyer ba ngas/ /gtsug tor can la skra bregs so/ /kun dga' bram zer gyur pa na/ /thub chen ma 'gag de la ni/ /byang chub don du gnyer
ba ngas/ /'bras bu mchog gis mchod pa byas/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la/ /nor bu rin chen gyis mchod cing / /gtsug lag khang na nyams dgas mchod/ /ded dpon du

ni gyur pa na/ /byang chub shing gi drung na ni/ /sangs rgyas legs 'khrugs bzhugs mthong nas/ /thog mar bsod snyoms la spyan drangs/ /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ byang chub shing drung thub pa ni/ /'jig

rten dga' mdzad blo bzang mthong / /'khor ni stong dang rab tu byung / /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas tsan+dan 'od dpag med/ /chu 'jam dang ni til mar dang / bu ram la ni spyan drangs so/ /kun
dga' rgyal por gyur pa na/ /tshangs sbyin grags pa chen po pa/ /'dren pa la ni zhal zas dang / /thams cad sbyin pas mchod pa byas/ /bram zer yang ni gyur pa na/ /thugs rje chen po 'od zer can/ /thub

pa rkang gnyis mchog mthong nas/ /smra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis mchod do/ /rgyal por gyur nas sangs rgyas ni/ /don dam gzigs pa grong mchog tu/ /'jug pa de la ta la yi/ /lo ma'i bsil yab mchod pa byas/ /nga ni

tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /'jig rten gsal mdzad sangs rgyas ni/ /shAkya thub pa me tog gi /sil ma sna tshogs dri sbyar mchod/ /grong khyer mchog tu mthor 'phags pa'i/ /mi mchog 'jug par mthong nas ni/ /rol mo rnams

kyi sgra dag dang / /me tog rnams kyi mchod pa byas/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dam pa zhes bya ba/ /srid pa'i mtsho las brgal ba la/ /thog mar shing rta dag gis bstabs/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /gtso

bo'i ched du lam bstar cing / /dpag tshad brgya ni gang bar yang / /me tog khang brtsegs mchod pa byas/ /sangs rgyas dgra zhi mdzad pa ni/ /grong khyer gshegs zhes ngas thos nas/ /lam ni rgyal mtshan yongs bkang ste/ /

rgyal po'i 'byor bas bsu ba byas/ /nga ni mnyan par gyur pa na/ /shing rta'i yan lag chu 'gram du/ /byon pa ngas ni mthong nas ni/ /thub pa chu yi rgyun las bsgral/ /ded dpon gyur tshe dad pa yi/ /shing rta skal ldan chen po

ni/ /ngas ni gru zam btags nas kyang / /mtsho chen las ni bsgral ba byas/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa tsan+dan sa mchog gi/ /ka bar ldan pa'i khang pas mchod/ /rgyal por gyur

tshe sangs rgyas ni/ /bcom ldan tshangs pa'i tshe mchod cing / /sman sbyin rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas ni/ /ngas ni yams kyi nad zhi byas/ /tsan+dan ldan la char med tshe/ /rgyal po lta bu'i sku khrus byas/ /de tshe lhas ni char phab
pas| |skye bo rnams ni skyabs su dong / /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan zla ba la/ /mchod nas ngas ni byams bsgoms pas/ /bdud kyis btang ba'i yams nad zhi/ /

mi yi dbang por sngon gyur tshe/ /ngas ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul ba la/ /cho 'phrul phyir ni gsol ba btab/ /rgyal po dag tu gyur pa na/ /rin chen ri bo 'od chen ldan/ /'khor

ni brgya stong phrag mang po/ /mthong nas lo lngar mchod pa byas/ /bram zer gyur tshe dad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas don kun bsgrubs pa ni/ /mtshan dang ldan pa mthong nas kyang / /ngas ni bstod pa lnga brgya byas/ /bram zer

gyur tshe yid dga' bas/ /sangs rgyas dbang po rgyal mtshan mthong / /ngas ni thal mo legs sbyar te/ /dam pa stsol ba'i 'od ces gsol/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa nas/ /thub pa dbang po rgyal mtshan bar/ /bdun

khri dang ni drug stong gi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/ /grangs med gnyis pa tshang bar ni/ /rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe nga la skyo sems med/ /grangs med pa gnyis pa'o/

sangs rgyas bde mdzad dam pa la/ /rgyal por gyur tshe mchod byas nas/ /mya ngan 'das nas mchod rten brtsigs/ /rgyal srid rab tu zhi bar byas/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dang bas ni/ /sangs rgyas gang po re skong la/ /tshul dang

'dra bar mchod byas te/ /chos kyi rgyal po zhes bsgrags so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe legs par ni/ /rim gro byas shing mi mchog la/ /de bzhin gser gyi me tog gtor/ /nga

ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can/ /thub chen grong mchog gshegs de la/ /gser gyi dra bas mchod pa byas/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /pad+ma dam pa dpa' chen po/ /rgyal por
grags pa'i grong mchog tu/ /dngul gyi me tog sil mas gtor/ /nga ni bram zer gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas grags mchog slob mi yi/ /dge 'dun gyis ni mdun bltas pa/ /mthong nas mi mchog gnas kyis mchod//

nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /legs gsung byang chub shing drung du/ /bzhugs pa ngas mthong glang po rta/ /shing rta dpung bu chung gis bsrungs/ /sangs rgyas dri med thub chen la/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe bsro khang dang / /mchod

rten las dang mar mes ni/ /de yi tshe na rnam par mchod/ /sangs rgyas sad mdzad rdo leb steng / /snyoms par bzhugs pa mthong nas ni/ /dad pas rol mo'i sgra kun dang / /rgyal po'i 'byor pas bzhengs gsol to/ /
tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/ /'jig rten dga' mdzad dgra thul ba/ /sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa na/ /lam ni sna tshogs brgyan pas mchod/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe yid dga' bas/ /gnas mchog gshegs pa
thos nas ni/ /skyed mos tshal ni brgyan byas nas/ /ngas ni gtsug lag khang brtsigs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan skar 'od la/ /byang chub 'dod pa'i dad pas ngas/ /rgyal po'i mdzod ni thams cad las/ /nor

bu rin chen rnams kyis mchod/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ /tog gis bdud rnams bcom byas nas/ /chos kyi rgyal srid bsgrags pa na/ /ngas ni rgyal mtshan kho na btsugs/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza blo ldan pa/ /bram ze mya
ngan 'das pa la/ /rgyal po ngas ni ril ba dang / /dbyug gu gtsug lag khang chen byas/ /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas 'dren pa don gzigs pa/ /gser dang nor bu mu tig dang / /dri
yi snying po rnams kyis mchod/ /sangs rgyas don kun grub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa na/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dpung dag gis/ /tshogs kun gyis ni mchod pa byas/ /sangs rgyas don dam gzigs

pa ni/ /grong khyer dam par gshegs pa na/ /rgyal por gyur tshe rol mo dang / /me tog kun gyis mchod pa byas/ /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas skar rgyal rkang gnyis mchog /dri yi snying po de bzhin du/ /

rtsa ba'i dri rnams rab tu gtor/ /rin chen bkra ba'i phug na yang / /sangs rgyas skar rgyal la ni ngas/ /de tshe tshigs bcad gcig bstod pas/ /bskal pa dgu ni phyir bsnyil to/ /'bru tshong du ni gyur pa na/ /sangs

rgyas bcom ldan rnam gzigs la/ /de tshe byang chub spyod pa'i phyir/ /mud ga spar gang phul bas mchod/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe ngas mchod pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni gtsug tor can/ /thub pa nyan thos tshogs bcas
pa| |zhal zas kyis ni zla gsum mchod/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa'i tshe/ /'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad skyob/ /skal chen nyan thos bcas pa la/ /zhal zas kyis ni gus par mchod/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe
dad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig pa ni/ /bdog pa kun la spyan drangs nas/ /tshangs par spyod phyir blo gros bskyed/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/ /yang dag sangs rgyas gser thub la/ /gtsug

lag khang brtsigs dad pa yis/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bram ze'i khye'u ni bla ma'i tshe/ /dga' skyong gi ni tshig thos nas/ /'od srung rkang gnyis mchog las ni/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i blo bskyed do/ /

byams pa drang srong gyur pa na/ /rgyal por gyur nas rim gro byas/ /byas pa gzo ba rjes dran nas/ /de nas nga la slar mchod do/ /gang yang sangs rgyas bde mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung bar du ni/ /

ngas ni bdun khri bdun stong gi/ /rgyal ba rnams ni mchod pa byas/ /grangs med gsum po tshang bar ni/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /sngon ni byang chub spyod pa na/ /nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/ /nga ni
byang chub sems dpa'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni de rnams mchod/ /nga ni de dag thams cad kyis/ /'jig rten mdun du lung bstan to/ /ngas ni sngon bsam gang yin pa/ /nga yi smon lam thams cad

rdzogs/ /nga ni sangs rgyas khur bor te/ sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung / /shi bi'i rgyal por nga gyur te/ /sbyin pa dag ni thams cad btang / /nga ni dus dpog gyur pa'i tshe/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/ /rgya mtsho'i

tshong bar gyur pa na/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin don du/ /srog chags rnams ni ma btang zhing / /ngas ni rang gi sha btang ngo / /nga sngon drang srong gyur pa na/ /bzod pa'i pha rol rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /yan lag rnams ni

gtubs pa yis/ /nga yi bzod pa yongs su rdzogs/ /mi ma yin mo'i skyes rabs dang / de bzhin rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / /de bzhin bdag ni bden dga' ba'i/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/ /sman chen blon
por gyur pa dang / gnag lhas skyes su nga gyur tshe/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs nas/ /de bzhin rnga bo che yang bsgrags/ /bram ze rab 'bar gyur pa na/ /ral par 'dab chags
tshang bcas kyang / /bsam gtan las ni ma langs par/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin brtson byas/ /snying rje yongs su bsgoms byas shing / /pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs pas/ /khur lci ba ni ngas bor te/ /dam

bcas pa yang rdzogs par byas/ /nga dang sangs rgyas gang phrad nas/ /mchod pa byas pa'i mi mchog ni/ /de kun mya ngan 'das par gshegs/ /nga ni byang chub la bzhag go /rgyal po 'od ldan dbang po nas/ /
thub pa dbang po rgyal mtshan bar/ /sems can bye ba phrag stong ni/ /srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral ba byas/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ rdzogs sangs rgyas te lha mir bcas/ /'jig rten 'di ni

bsgral ba dang / /sgrol bar mdzad pa smos ci dgos/ /ngas ni 'jig rten don gyi phyir/ /mya ngan 'das na'ang chos kyi gru /brtan pa dag ni bca' byas te/ /brgya stong phrag ni bsgral bar bya/ /mi gang sangs

rgyas skyabs song zhing / /mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas la/ /bya ba byed pa'i skyes bu de/ /'jig rten dag ni skyid de ba/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs rgyal la/ /bya ba cung zad byed pa na'ang de/ /mtho ris
sna tshogs bgrod nas ni/ /bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /yang dag ji bzhin 'di thos nas/ /dge ba bungs ni bskyed de bya/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyams sa re/ /
sangs rgyas mang po'i skabs rdzogs so/ /sangs rgyas 'od ldan dang / shAkya thub pa dang / ko'u di n+ya dang / 'jig rten 'dren dang / gzhan gyis mi thub dang / rin chen gtsug tor dang / bde

mdzad dang / sgra snyan dang / dpal 'byung dang / phan bzhed dang / ko'u di n+ya dang / blta na sdug pa dang / spyan mdzes dang / yul 'khor skyong dang / mar me mdzad dang / dka' thub mdzad dang / mun sel dang / bde mdzad dang /

dbang chen dang / gtsug tor can dang / ma 'gag pa dang / spyan mdzes dang / legs 'khrungs dang / yid bzang dang / tsan+dan dang / tshangs sbyin dang / 'od zer can dang / don dam gzigs dang / shAkya thub pa dang /

mthor 'phags dang / dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / dgra zhi mdzad dang / shing rta'i yan lag dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i tshe dang / tsan+dan dang / dbang po dang / dbang po 'dul dang / rin

chen ri bo dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / tha ma dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / bzod pa mdzad dang / rdzogs ldan dang / thams cad zil gnon dang / rin chen gtsug phud dang / pad+ma dam pa dang / grags pa

dam pa dang / gsung snyan dang / dri ma med dang / sad mdzad dang / dgra thul dang / gnas 'jog dang / skar 'od dang / tog dang / drang srong dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang / don gzigs dang / don dam gzigs dang / don

thams cad gzigs dang / rgyal dang / skar rgyal dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa dang / tha ma
byams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin
du ste/ de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can/ kun tu rgyu rab tu mang
po rtog khang du lhags shing 'dus par gyur nas skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig /sngon ni/ bdag cag la rgyal po dang / blon po dang /
bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong mi dang / yul pa dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas pas/ gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /

gnas mal dang / nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyang rnyed pa las/ da ni/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed ces bya ba nas sman
dang / yo byad rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /des na de ltar bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad na/ de la bdag cag gis ji ltar bya/ de na kha cig gis

smras pa/ tshangs par spyod pa la mi tshangs par spyad pa skyon yin pas/ de la skyon 'di gdags so/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ ji lta bu zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang

mo/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de la/ sring mo dag /tshur dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur ba thob cig ces spro bar bya'o/ /bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa gang yin

bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi yin no/ /de la spro ba bskyed do/ /zhes de rnams kyis de pho nyas bkug ste smras pa/ sring mo shes par gyis shig /sngon ni/ bdag cag gis bkur sti dang zhes bya ba nas nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo

byad rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /da ni/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung bas/ 'jig rten de la bkur sti byed pas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par gyur na/

khyod kyis yal bar 'dor ram/ bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis de la ji ltar bgyi lags/ sring mo/ khyod kyis nye du rnams kyi ched du dge sbyong go'u ta ma la kho mo dang lhan

cig tu mi tshangs par spyad do/ /zhes khyod skur pa 'debs par spro'am/ de lta na/ bdag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti sngon gyi bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mis/ gzhan mu

stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ba dag /dge sbyong go'u ta ma la ni/ skur pa 'debs par bdag mi spro'o/ /sring mo/ khyod ji tsam du dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa

'debs par mi spro ba de tsam du bdag cag dang gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta bar mi bya/ rnam par blta bar mi bya zhing / khyod gnas thams cad du 'dug tu mi gzhug ste/ 'gyod pa de nyid
kyis dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do/ /bud med ni/ shes rab chung ba yin pas/ de skrag nas smras pa/ 'phags

pa| bdag gis ji ltar bu zhig bgyi/ sring mo/ tshur khyod rgyal bu rgyal byed tshal du rgyun du song la dus thag gi tsam lon nas dge sbyong go'u ma la skur pa thob cig /de nyi ma re re zhing langs te rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /ji tsam na lto la snod gcig bcings nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs

so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mi rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/
rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams/ gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mi/
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas gsol pa/ bdag ni 'di ru sbrum bgyis nas/ /chags par 'gyur zhing dga' 'gyur ba/ /snyan cing 'jebs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ /da ltar chos ni
gsung mdzad dam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag min pa smra ba dmyal bar 'gro /bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mis gsol pa/ gang gis byas nas ma byas zhes smra ba'ang / /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dman pa'i chos can mi ni de gnyi ga /pha rol dag tu 'dra bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o/ /bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi
'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la yun ring po nas mtho 'tsham par byed do/ /snyam du bsam nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis snod de sa la lhung bar byas so/ /de nas bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi
skyengs nas rings pa rings par slar song ngo / /de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la
chos kyi dbang du bgyi ba'i bka' mchid kyang bka' stsal/ gang du thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa yang lung bstan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa yang bka' stsal lags pas/ ci nas bdag cag mtsho chen po ma dros par mchis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par
bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi gdon mi za bar

mdzad pa ni/ bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ ji srid sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa dang / sems can 'gas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar
bya ba thams cad btul ba dang / nyan thos kyi mchog zung gcig tu bstan pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sku tshe'i lnga cha btang ba dang / mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen
po rnam par bstan pa dang / grong khyer gsal bar lha las gshegs pa bstan pa dang / yab dang yum gnyis bden pa dag la bkod pa dang / mtsho chen po ma dros par nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
thabs cig tu sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba bstan pa ma mdzad pa de srid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /don 'di la ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
'dun dang thabs cig mtsho chen po ma dros par sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag /mtsho chen po ma dros pa gang na bar 'dong / der
rang rang gi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga
brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te mtsho chen po ma dros par gshegs so/ /gnod sbyin gtum po mi bzad gnas pa yid 'ong zhing / /me tog sna tshogs
shing gis rnam par mdzes byas pa/ /de las rgya mtsho dug can dag tu 'gro ba yi/ /chu bo chen po bzhi po 'di dag phyogs bzhir 'bab/ /gang ga sin+d+hu de bzhin pak+Shu dang / /si ta de dag rdzu 'phrul
stobs thob pa/ /ma gtogs mi rnams kyis ni mi bgrod pa/ /der ni thub pa dge 'dun bcas par bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ chos nyid kyis/
gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur yan chad kyi sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par
'gyur bas/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bsam pa/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam na/ mtsho chen po ma dros par las

kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed par mthong ngo / /de nas de gnyis kyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam/ bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa/ sdong

po ni/ rin po che/ ge sar ni/ rdo rje las byas pa/ pad+ma stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba zhig sprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la pad+ma'i snying po de la bzhugs so/ /dge

slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang pad+ma gzhan rnams kyi snying po la 'khod do/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la snam sbyar 'drub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal ba/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ song la rab tu byung ba'i zla bo khrid de shog cig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal chen po ma dros pa nas
mi snang bar gyur cing / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ston pa dgra bcom

pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu mtsho chen po ma dros pa na sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas khyod la gzhes kyi/ tshur shog /'dong / des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
dgal gyi bu chen po/ re zhig snam sbyar drubs la/ de nas phyis 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ grogs bya'o/ /de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis sor

mo lnga char gyis drub par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ 'o na lta bu drub zin tu zad mo/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gal te

khyod mi 'gro na/ mthus bkur bar bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ ske rags rgya cang phrol nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi

mthu can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ re zhig khyod kyis 'di khyer la/ de nas phyis kho bo khyer cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus

bsam pa/ 'di ni mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas/ gal te 'di 'khyer bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do/ /snyam nas/ des de bya rgod phung po'i ri'i spyi la btags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu

chen pos de drangs pa dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'gul bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ 'dis bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri yang 'khyer bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab la

gdags so/ /snyam nas/ des de ri'i rgyal po ri rab la btags pa las/ yang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dag kyang

g.yos par gyur/ ma dros pa yang kun nas 'khrugs shing / dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang ldeg par gyur nas pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug bzhin du de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/
ci'i slad du klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos pa ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos chen

po gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'di yang 'khyer bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i sdong po la gdags

so/ /snyam nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i sdong po la btags pas ma 'gul bar 'dug go /gang gi tshe de'i rdzu 'phrul la rdzu 'phrul gyis rdugs pa de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtses pa byas zin gyi tshur shog /'dong / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po song zhig dang / kho bo 'ong ngo / /zhes byas nas
ji srid tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ma phyin pa de'i bar du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos

phyag 'tshal te pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug pa dang / de'i 'og tu tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po phyin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'ongs sam/ tshe
dang ldan pa/ kho bo 'ongs so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi

bu chen po ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge

slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ yul dbus su ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung ngo / /de dgos

pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir yul dbus nas yul nas can zhes bya bar song ngo / /de de na 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa las/ de de nyal ba'i rim gro bar 'khrul 'khor las bu mo
zhig byas nas btang ngo / /des de'i rkang pa gnyis bgrus nas 'dug go/ de nas des song zhig ces smras na/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ des bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di bdag dang dga' mgur spyod

pa'i phyir btang ngo / /snyam nas/ des de'i lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pa las/ ji tsam zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por gyur to/ /de skyengs nas bsam pa/ bdag gcig pu zhig tu skyengs par byas kyi/ ma la
bdag gis ni/ 'di rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des sgo'i ngos logs la rang gi gzugs brnyan 'gegs pa zhig bris te/ sgo phag tu yib nas 'dug go /de ldang

ba'i dus gang yin pa de las bral ba dang / de nas 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon gyis bsam pa/ ring zhig lon na/ ci'i phyir de sgor ma byung snyam du sems te/ der song ba las/ ji tsam na 'gegs
te shi ba mthong ngo / /des bsam pa/ ci'i phyir 'dis bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byas snyam pa las/ des 'khrul 'khor zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por 'dug pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems
te/ bdag nyid skyengs pas 'gegs so/ /snyam mo/ /yul nas can gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang su'i khyim yang rung / der mi glo bur ba shi na/ ji srid rgyal po la ma mthol ba de srid du des de la rim
gro mi byed do/ /de nas de rgyal po'i drung du song ste mthol ba/ lha/ yul dbus nas ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig mchis te/ de bdag gis sdum par gnas pa las/ de la bkur sti bgyi ba'i slad du
bdag gis 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig bgyis te btang ba dang / des de lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pas shing gi phung por mchis pa dang / de skyengs nas bdag nyid 'gegs lags na/ lha/ de la g.yar
snga 'brim pa zhig gtang du gsol/ de nas bdag gis rim gro bgyi lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/
dengs la g.yar snga rims shig /de rnams dong nas de mthong ngo / /des bsam pa/ bdag gis ji ltar zung nga las dbab par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'gegs thag chod/
sta re khyer te thag pa gcad par brtsams pa las/ ji tsam na rtsig pa yin par mthong nas/ de nas 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyi slob dpon de skyengs par gyur to/ /de de ltar skyengs par gyur pa dang /

ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon de/ sgo lkog nas phyung ste smras pa/ kye nang rje/ khyod kyis ni/ kho bo gcig pu zhig tu skyengs par byas te/ khyod ni/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par byas
so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas
so/ /da ltar yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so/ /gzhan yang / 'di ltar/ 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ri bor gzhan zhig na
ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gnyis shig byung ba las/ rtsod par gyur te gcig gis smras pa/ nga ni/ bzo legs par shes so/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ nga ni/ de bas kyang lhag par legs
par shes so/ /de gnyis phan tshun 'gran par gyur nas rgyal po'i drung du dong ste/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gcig gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag ni/ bzo legs par 'tshal to/ /
gcig shos kyis kyang smras pa/ lha/ bdag ni/ de bas kyang lhag par legs par 'tshal to/ /rgyal pos de gnyis la sgo khang bstan nas khyed gnyis gang mkhas ni/ ngas mi shes mod kyi/
'on kyang gcig gis ni/ rtsig ngos gcig la bris la/ gcig shos kyis kyang gcig la bris shig dang / de lta na khyed cag gnyis gang bzo legs par shes pa ngas legs par shes par
'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyi bar yol bas bcad nas/ ri mo bri bar brtsams te/ de la gcig gis zla ba drug gis ri mo'i las zin to/ /gcig shos kyis ni zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar to/ /
ri mo'i las zin pa gang yin pa de/ rgyal po'i drung du song ste son pa dang smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis ri mo'i las bgyis lags na/ spyan sngar brim du gsol/ de nas rgyal po'i blon po dang lhan
cig sgor byung nas mthong ba dang / ri mo'i las mkhas so/ /zhes shin tu mgu'o/ /gcig shos kyis kyang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ de bdag gi ri mo'i las la gzigs su
gsol/ des bar chad kyi yol ba bshus pa dang gcig gi gzugs brnyan de la shar ba rgyal pos mthong nas/ ri mo'i las la lhag par 'di mkhas so/ /zhes shin tu ya mtshan skyes so/ /
de nas des slar yol bas bar bcad nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ ri mo'i las ma lags te/ 'on kyang rtsig ngos bstar ba lags so/ /de nas

rgyal po de ya mtshan skyes nas smras pa/ 'di ni/ bzo la lhag par mkhas pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ gang gis zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar ba de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin

no| |gang gis zla ba drug tu ri mo'i las byas pa de ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas so/ /da ltar yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul

gyis pham par byas so/ /gzhan yang / ji ltar 'dis 'di pham par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du drang srong dung dang / bris pa zhes bya ba gnyis shig nye bar brten cing
gnas so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na lhas char phab pas rdzab tu gyur te/ dung dred de rdzab tu rdeg 'chos nas ril ba chag par gyur to/ /de nas des dmod pa bor pa/ rang bzhin ngan pa khyod kyis da
phan chad lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bebs par gyur cig/ ces byas so/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang / wA ra NA si na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas/ de nas de rnams de'i drung du song ste
gsol ba btab pa/ drang srong chen po/ de ltar ma mdzad cig/ des smras pa/ bdag gis rang bzhin ngan pa la bzod par mi nus te/ bdag gis dmod pas bcom pa des/ lo bcu gnyis su char

mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang / skye bo'i tshogs des bris pa la gsol ba btab nas des gsol ba byas te lhas char phab bo/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus

kyi drang srong dung gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bris pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par
byas so/ /gzhan yang / ji ltar 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas pa de nyon cig /bris pas dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir dung gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa las/ dung gi rkang pa gnyis kyis
ral pa mnan pa dang bris pas smras pa/ nyi ma 'char kha'i dus kyi tshe khyod kyi spyi bo gas par gyur cig /dung gis smras pa/ de ltar na nyi ma 'char bar ma gyur cig /ces byas pa dang / 'jig rten du
nam sros par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis dung la gsol ba btab pa/ drang srong chen po/ de lta bu ma mdzad cig /des smras pa/ nyi ma shar bar gyur na/ gdon mi za bar
bdag gi mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /bris pas de la smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ 'ji ba las byas pa'i mgo zhig byos shig /ji tsam na 'ji ba las dung gi mgo zhig byas pa las/ nyi ma shar ba dang gas par

gyur to/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ dung gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/ /bris pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin te/ de na yang 'dis pham
par byas so/ /gzhan yang / ji ltar pham par byas pa de nyon cig /yul dbus su bso mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung nas/ ba so 'bras tsam bre'u chung gang khyer nas yul nas
can du song ste/ de ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs na/ de yang stong par 'dug na de'i chung ma la smras pa/ grogs po'i chung ma/ 'bras bre'u chung gang po 'di tshos la byin cig/ ces

de bzhag ste song ngo / /des btso bar brtsams pa las/ shing zad par gyur kyang ma tshos so/ /de nas de'i khyim thab 'ong nas smras pa/ bzang mo/ 'di ci zhig yin/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des de brtags pa

las/ ba so 'bras tsam sha stag tu mthong nas/ des de la co 'dri bar smras pa/ bzang mo/ 'di tshwa chu yin gyi/ chu bzang po gzhan zhig khyer te 'ongs dang / des 'bras 'di tshos par 'gyur ro/ /des ba so mkhan

gyi slob dpon la/ chu bzang po zhig khyer te shog cig ces smras pa/ des de la smras nas/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu rdzing bu zhig bris te/ der khyi ro bam ba zhig kyang bris so/ /de nas ba so mkhan gyi slob

dpon de bum pa khyer nas rdzing bu yin no/ /snyam nas/ phyogs der phyin te khyi ro bam pa mthong ba dang / des sna bkab nas brtag par brtsams pa las/ ji tsam na de'i chu snod de chag nas ba so mkhan gyi slob
dpon de skyengs par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/ /ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni/
dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin no/ /'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas brnyes pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang rang sangs rgyas
rnams kyis mi shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang dge slong shA ri'i bus mi shes so/ /dge slong shA ri'i bus thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang
dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bus mi shes so/ /dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bus thob pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang nyan thos gzhan rnams kyis mi shes te/ dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu bas/ dge slong shA
ri'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che mod kyi/ des mang du gnas pa la dgongs nas ngas rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu'i le'u'o// //de nas

tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de smras pa/ de ni der song sngon nas spyad pa dang / /rje mthun tshig dag shin tu sgrog pa na/ /gang zhig byas pas 'bras bu che myong ba/ /
chung ngu gcig pu de ni myur dran nas/ /ji ltar seng ge ri yi phug gnas pa/ /'jigs pa med par spyod yul 'gro ba ltar/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i nyan thos 'od srung de/ /sngon gyi gnas nas spyad pa sgrog
byed pa/ /zag med tha ba med pa rnam grol sems/ /nyon mongs med par gnas pa skyon med yid/ /de la chos mchog yod par yid ches nas/ /de yi chos la yid kyis smon byas te/ /rang sangs
rgyas la bdag gis yon du ni/ /khre rgod bre'u chung gang zhig rab phul bas/ /de 'dra ba dang kun tu phrad gyur cing / /smon pas sgra mi snyan du skyes pa ni/ /las de gcig
pu nyid kyi 'bras bu yis/ /lus can bdag gir 'dzin med tshe ring ba/ /khyad par 'gro zhing spyod pa mi dman pa/ /sgra mi snyan du lan stong skyes par gyur/ /las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bu yis/ /lan
stong sum cu rtsa gsum par skyes te/ me tog phreng rgyan byug pa sna tshogs dang / /mthu chen lus mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur/ /de nas 'phos bdag sgra mi snyan du skyes/ /slar yang lha dge dga' bar
byed pa dang / /sems kyi smon lam dbang gis slar yang bdag/ mi ni dge ba rnams kyi nang du skyes/ /las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bus bdag/ bram ze sA la chen po'i rigs skyes te/ /nor
mang skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bkur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga don mi gnyer yang / /bdag gis ston pa lan 'ga' ma mthong zhing / /mtshungs med nyan thos bdag gis ma mthong nas/ /
bdag gis seng ras tshem gyon 'jig rten na/ /dgra bcom rnams la phyag 'tshal rab tu byung / /bdag ni de ltar rab tu byung ba dang / /rgyal ba bu mang mchod rten na bzhugs mthong / /thub zhabs
phyag 'tshal bcom ldan bdag gi ston/ /bdag ni khyod kyi nyan thos gyur ces gsol/ /'od srung ji skad smras bzhin byas te 'dir/ /khyod ston nga yin nga yi nyan thos khyod/ /gal te sdug
bsngal kun las thar 'dod na/ /khyod kyis snyan par bshad pa'i chos snyan nyon/ /gang yang dag la skyes mchog skyob pa ni/ /thugs rje chen po yis ni chos bshad pa/ /bsam gtan bzhi stobs dbang po
byang chub kyi/ /yan lag lam gyi yan lag rnam par thar/ /de dag bsgom pa bdag gis dga' mgur thob/ /zag pa zad cing lus kyi tha ma bzung / /lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa rdul med pa/ /drang po 'di dag dang
ni bdag gir phrad/ /de bzhin gshegs rgyal phun sum tshogs pa gsungs/ /tshul khrims ldan pa gang 'dod 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag gi yid la ci dang ci bsam pa/ /thams cad grub ste srid pa'i tha ma
'di/ /bdag gi skye ba zad cing 'ching ba dang / /sred pa kun nas langs pa nyid bcad de/ /bdag ni chos rgyal thugs las skyes pa'i sras/ /nyon mongs tshogs rnams zad pas mya ngan 'da'/ /bdag ni
thams cad gzigs pa yis/ /sbyangs la gnas pa mchog tu bsten/ /zag pa med cing nyes pa bsal/ /go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis thob/ /gnas brtan 'od srung de lta bur/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen
du| |dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /'od srung gi le'u ste/ /dang po'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nga gnyis pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas

brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus las ci zhig byas na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ shes rab chen po dang / spobs pa chen po dang ldan par
gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis dgon par rang sangs rgyas/ /drang srong dge sbyong zhir gyur pa/ /skal dang ldan pa chos gos ni/ /de tshe rnying pa gyon pa mthong / /de la bdag gis sems
dad pas/ /bang brgyugs nas kyang chos gos ni/ /drubs shing kha bsgyur de bzhin du/ /de la yang dang yang du gtugs/ /de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /de ni bar snang la 'phags nas/ /rang gi gzi
brjid kyis 'bar zhing / /de nas mkha' la gshegs par gyur/ /bdag gis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /ji ltar bdag ni 'di 'dra bar/ /dbang rnon shes rab cher shog ces/ /de lta bu ni smon lam btab/ /

bdag ni phyug po'i rigs su 'am/ /ma rabs dag tu mi skye bar/ /bar ma'i rigs su skye 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu rab byung mang bar shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag /bdag ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang / /

mi yi rnyed pa thob nas ni/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa
la| |bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur ba'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /btsun pa bdag gis zla phyed kyis/ /'gro ba'i pha rol phyin pa thob/ /dge slong dge 'dun
gung bzhugs nas/ /ston pas bdag ni mngon sum du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba/ /shes rab can gyi gtso bor bstan/ /shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun nas/
ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu

chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ni/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ da ni/ khyod kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/
de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag sngon drang srong gyur pa'i tshe/ /nags mtha'i dgon par
gnas pa na/ /der ni skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas/ /bdag la rab byung gsol ba 'debs/ /bdag gis rgyugs nas de yi skra/ /bregs nas kyang ni chos gos dag /kha dog bsgyur nas de la byin/ /de yid dga' gyur
de yi tshe/ /phyogs gcig tu ni nyer song nas/ /skyil mo krung bcas 'dug nas des/ /rang byang chub ni reg gyur te/ /de nas mkha' la song bar gyur/ /bdag gis dad bskyed nyer song ste/ /de nas thal mo

legs sbyar te/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul mchog gsol zhing / /smon lam gdab pa byas pa ni/ /drang srong che 'di ci 'dra ba'i/ /bdag gi rdzu 'phrul de 'drar shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/ /gang dang gang du
skyes par ni/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi srid pa tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes
par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa ni bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas rdzu
